4koma Vol 1
===========

This is the first volume of the
Mushoku Tensei
 4koma adaptation.

Synopsis

"Mushoku Tensei" that famous scene again in 4 panels!

A 34-year-old NEET reincarnated in the world of swords and magic!
The popular life redone fantasy "Mushoku Tensei" is now in 4 panels!
Rudeus, Roxy, Sylphy, Eris ...
Even in 4-panels will be serious!!

Note: Machine translated.

4koma Vol 3
===========

This article contains information about upcoming events, and all of its content is subject to change. Additional information will be added as it becomes available.

This is the third and last volume of the
Mushoku Tensei
 4koma adaptation.

Synopsis

Rudeus was sent to the demon continent with Eris after a magical disaster.

Can the two survive in this pinch of desperation with teamwork and guts ...!?

A Big Brothers Conflict
=======================

A Big Brothers Conflict
 is the 93rd chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Linia Dedoldia

Pursena Adoldia

Summary

Rudeus is at a loss when he realizes it is his fault that Norn locked herself in her room. Sylphiette, Linia and Pursena encourages him and also tries to give him advice on what to do but Rudeus still does not know how to talk to Norn. Rudeus enters the Girl's Dormitory with the help of Linia and Pursena while Sylphiette arranges a distraction. After entering Norn's room and a brief exchange, Rudeus tries to apologize on what has happened but still unable to find the words to tell Norn as he recalls his similar experience from his previous life.

Appearances

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Norn Greyrat

Linia Dedoldia

Pursena Adoldia

Skills

Earth Lance

Regions

A Big Brothers Feelings
=======================

This article is about the Manga article. For the Season 2 Episode 17 Anime, see
My Older Brothers Feelings
.

A Big Brothers Feelings
 is the 92nd chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Norn Greyrat

Summary

Rudeus is in shock upon learning that Norn has locked herself in her dormitory room while Sylphiette decides to go ahead and check on Norn. Recalling what happened to him in his past life, Rudeus concludes that someone could be bullying her and is willing to fight is willing to confront them regardless of their social standing so he tells Linia and Pursena to accompany him to Norn's classroom. After questioning Norn's classmates on what happened, Rudeus is in belief on whose at fault.

A Chance Encounter
==================

A Chance Encounter
 (邂逅
Kaigō
) is the ninth episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on March 7, 2021.

Synopsis

Rudy and Eris find themselves stranded in the wilds of the Demon Continent. Their only chance to survive seems to lie in Ruijerd, a warrior of the infamous Superd tribe of demons, but can he be trusted?

Plot

Looking like his past self, Rudeus has a short encounter with an elusive being known as the Human-God, who instructs him to rely on and help the man who saved him. He then awakens in his current body and learns that he and Eris are stranded in the middle of the Demon Continent, and were rescued by Ruijerd Superdia, a member of the dreaded Superd race, who becomes their friend and promises to escort them back home. Ruijerd brings Rudeus and Eris to a nearby village that coincidentally is Roxy's birthplace, where they meet her parents. During their stay, Rudeus learns from Ruijerd that his tribe's ill repute comes from the cursed spears they received from the Demon-God Laplace, which turned them into mindless murderers, and that the spear in his possession belonged to his son, whose death by his hands made him recover his senses. Moved by Ruijerd's determination to clear his race's name, Rudeus decides to help him, and the two depart from the village with Eris to begin their journey back home.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ruijerd Superdia

Hitogami

Rowin Migurdia

Rokari Migurdia

Rokkus Migurdia

Locations

Demon Continent

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 3

Chapter 1: The Con Artist Who Claimed to Be a God

Chapter 2: The Superd.

Chapter 3: A Master’s Secrets.

Chapter 4: The Foundations of Trust.

Chapter 5: Three Days to the Nearest Town.

Differences with the light novel:

A short PoV where Rudeus falls to the demon continent was cut.

A short PoV where Rudeus doesn't know if he can trust in Ruijerd or not was cut.

Rudeus and Rowin conversation happens in another way in the Light novel.

Part of Ruijerd past where he explains how his group survived and how he dealt a fatal blow to Laplace was cut.

Trailer

3-7(日)放送第9話予告：『無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～』次回予告⑨
Episode 9 Trailer, March 5

Click here to view the Gallery

Trivia

Is the first time that the characters speak the Demon continent language.

A Day Off in Roa
================

A Day Off in Roa
 (ロアの休日
Roa no Kyūjitsu
) is the sixth episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on Fevruary 14, 2021.

Synopsis

Rudy is officially Eris's tutor, but she doesn't want to learn anything but magic. As Rudy struggles to get her interested in other subjects, he realizes that non-stop lessons are causing her stress and proposes a day off in the city.

Plot

Philip thanks Rudeus for protecting Eris and warns him to not reveal to anyone his connections with the Greyrat family or he may be targeted again. Since then, Ghislaine teaches swordsmanship to Eris and Rudeus, while Rudeus teaches magic, literacy and math to both. However, Eris usually skips classes out of boredom and Rudeus decides to give her one day off per week to encourage her. While taking a stroll in the city, Eris attempts to buy Rudeus an expensive book, but he refuses, claiming that she can't give presents to others without her own money and suggests her father to give her an allowance. With her allowance, Eris presents Rudeus with a vial he was previously interested in, which puts him in a pinch, as he is in fear of revealing to her and Ghilsaine that it is in fact an aphrodisiac.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Hilda Boreas Greyrat

Sauros Boreas Greyrat

Alphonse

Paul Greyrat
 (Rudeus's Flashback)

Zenith Greyrat
 (Rudeus's Flashback)

Locations

Roa

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 2

Side Story: The Aftermath and the Boreas Greeting Style

Chapter 3: Her Ferocity, Unabated

Chapter 4: Staff Meeting and Sunday

Differences with the light novel:

In the light novel, Sauros is originally introduced with Philips when Rudeus arrives to the house. In the anime, he's only introduced in this episode.

In the light novel, When Rudeus touches Eris in the barn, Rudeus imagines a "Sage".

In the light novel, Rudeus meets the etiquette teacher of Eris and with Ghislaine, and they decide to give Eris a free day.

In the light novel, it is expanded about who is Perugius.

The Anime adds a scene where Eris buys the aphrodisiac to Rudeus as a gift but this is broken by accident.

Trailer

2-14(日)放送第6話予告：『無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～』次回予告⑥
Episode 6 Trailer, February 12

Trivia

The episode show the silhouettes of the members of
Fangs of the Black Wolf

When they are exploring the city, Rudeus take notes writing in Japanese and not in the language of that world.

Is the first episode that doesn't use a name from a Light Novel chapter

A Friend
========

A Friend
 (友達
Tomodachi
) is the third episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on January 24, 2021.

Synopsis

Rudy begins to explore the village and rescues a green-haired child from a group of bullies. The two grow close practicing magic, but is there more to Rudy's new friend than he thinks?

Plot

After losing his fear of leaving his home thanks to Roxy, Rudeus starts playing outdoors by himself until he rescues a half-elf child called Sylph from a group of bullies. Sylph becomes friends with Rudeus and starts learning magic from him. Six months later, Rudeus brings Sylph home during a storm and after taking away her clothes by force so that they can have a bath, he discovers that she is actually a girl and her full name is Sylphiette. Despite Rudeus apologizes to Sylphiette, she starts avoiding him, much to his chagrin. Some time later, Sylphiette approaches Rudeus and the two make up, with Rudeus determined to cherish the first true friend he has made in his new life.

Characters

Roxy Migurdia
 (recap)

Rudeus Greyrat

Paul Greyrat

Zenith Greyrat

Sylphiette

Somar

Laws
 (cameo)

Lilia

Locations

Buena Village

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 1

Chapter 7: Friends

Chapter 8: Obliviousness

Differences with the light novel:

In the light novel, when she was bullied, Sylphie was protecting the lunch for her father and afterward Rudeus meets Laws when they deliver the lunch and talk for a bit.

A short monologue where Rudeus expect to defeat Paul was cut.

A short monologue explaining that Sylphie doesn't have much affinity with fire magic, had a scar in her hand and learned to read and write thanks to Rudeus was cut.

A monologue where Rudeus explained his level of aptitudes in sword and magic and the types of magic that he wasn't able to use was cut

In the light novel, the reconciliation between Rudeus and Sylphie after the bathroom incident occurs near the tree on the hill.

Trailer

1-24(日)放送第3話予告：『無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～』次回予告③
Episode 3 Trailer, January 22

Trivia

When the opening music start, and Rudeus is crossing the bridge, the frame inspired in
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring.

Around the Minute 12, there are some frames inspired in the painting
The Harvesters
, from the artist Pieter Bruegel the Elder
.

A Little Sisters Life
=====================

A Little Sisters Life
 is the 95th chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Norn Greyrat

Summary

At the Ranoa Magic Academy Girl's Dormitory, Rudeus and Norn are finally able to reconcile and are now in good terms. Rudeus also begins tutoring Norn at the Academy and they eventually started working together on making a book about the heroic deeds of Ruijerd.

Meanwhile Rudeus asks Aisha if there is anything she wants which she asks to be given a salary to which Rudeus and Sylphiette agrees to and Rudeus is curious on what she buys from her money.

A Maid & A Boarding Student
===========================

A Maid & A Boarding Student
 is the 90th chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Jinas Halfas

Summary

A few days after Norn and Aisha begins living at the Greyrat House, Rudeus receive Norn and Aisha's test results from Vice Principal Jinas that they took the other day. Back at the Greyrat House, Rudeus delivers the results and asks them what are their plans. Aisha still wants to continue working as a maid while Norn makes a decision that surprises Rudeus and Sylphiette.

A Smuggling Mission
 (
密輸ミッション
,

Mitsuyu Misshon

manga adaptation
.

A Young Girl's Rage
===================

A Young Girl's Rage
 (
お嬢様の暴力
,

Ojōsama no bōryoku
)
 is the seventh chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Summary

Shocked, Rudeus finds the young lady of the Boreas household to be more than a "problem child" as Philip described- Eris Boreas Greyrat. When asking why she hit him, Eris screams at matching pitch as Sauros that she refuses to be mentored by someone younger than her. In a failed act to teach empathy, Rudeus slaps her for hitting him, only for Eris to go berserker and attack him. Escaping her sight to hide, Rudeus is found by Philip, and tells him he refuses to quit now. Concocting a plan with Philip to engage Eris' studies by staging an abduction of her and Rudeus in the city, and has the Boreas Steward, Thomas, make arrangements.

Much later, Rudeus finds himself and a sleeping Eris bound up with rope in a dingy storeroom. When Eris wakes up, she immediately screeches demands for her release, only for a kidnapper to enter and brutalize her into being quiet. Escaping his bindings, Rudeus overhears the man talking with another and deduces that they've really been kidnapped. Rudeus heals Eris part way, refusing to heal her completely unless she tames herself and not draw attention. Sealing the door to plan an escape, Rudeus tries to find a way that won't teach Eris that violence is a solution. So in lying that their captors plan to kill them later, so he makes her promise to listen to him in exchange for escaping. As the kidnappers struggle to open the door, the kids escape and find they are not in Roa anymore, and Eris immediately breaks her promise of quiet following not seeing any use to doing so anymore.

As their abductors near, Eris tries to bargain for his guidance again, but Rudeus compels her to promise to be silent and listen in exchange for getting home. Once she promises, Rudeus finds a coach station and, through explaining the necessity of reading and math, plans their fares for a ride to Roa over the next two days. As they venture, they find inns for overnight stays and coaches to continue on, but Rudeus also sees Eris's worry drain her, and they finally reach Roa. Seeing Eris's stressed face, Rudeus tries reassuring her that she's safe, but finds her missing again after turning his back for a moment, with only her headband on the ground.

Appearances

Characters

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Rudeus Greyrat

Thomas

Sauros Boreas Greyrat
 (Flashback)

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Skills

Regions

A Young Lady and Violence
=========================

A Young Lady and Violence
 (お嬢様と暴力
Ojōsama to Bōryoku
) is the fifth episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on February 7, 2021.

Synopsis

Rudy arrives in the city of Roa, where he's supposed to spend the next five years tutoring the daughter of the local lord. His student, however, is more than he bargained for, and he'll have to fight to start his first ever job, let alone keep it.

Plot

As Ghislaine takes Rudeus away, he reads a letter from Paul explaining that he found a tutoring job for him to pay for his and Sylphiette's studies, but certain that his attachment to Sylphiette is hindering his development, Paul forbids him from returning home or meeting her for the next five years. In the city of Roa, Rudeus meets his employer, Philip Boreas Greyrat, who is also the mayor and his father's cousin, and is tasked to teach Philip's daughter Eris. However, once Rudeus is introduced to Eris, she acts hostile towards him. Certain that Eris will not listen to him at all, Rudeus comes with a plan to earn her trust by faking their kidnapping with her father's consent. Rudeus and Eris are captured and after earning her cooperation, he uses his powers to escape their captors with her. Back in Roa, Rudeus discovers that their kidnapping was not fake and one of Philip's servants is working with the kidnappers. Rudeus fights the bandits to protect Eris until Ghislaine comes to their rescue, killing them and arresting the servant. Once they return home, Eris accepts Rudeus as her tutor and he begins living in her house.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Paul Greyrat

Aisha Greyrat

Norn Greyrat

Thomas

Locations

Roa

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 1

Chapter 11: Parted

Light Novel Volume 2

Prologue

Chapter 1: The Young Mistress’s Violence

Chapter 2: All According to Plan?

Differences with the light novel:

A short PoV of Paul after his fight with Rudeus was cut.

In the light novel, when Rudeus arrives to the mansion, he meets
Sauros Boreas Greyrat
 and his son Philip meanwhile in the anime only meets Philip.

Sauros is introduced in the next episode.

In the light novel, Eris was kicked in two different occasions by the kidnappers, meanwhile in the anime only one time.

In the light novel, Rudeus and Eris sleep and return to Roa in the next day, meanwhile in the anime they return in the same night

In the light novel, after Eris is kidnapped again, they cover her mouth with  clothes, in the anime no

In the light novel, after the fireworks, Rudeus use the wind magic True Sonic Boom to attack the kidnapper that have Eris , Meanwhile in the anime Rudeus use a unnamed earth magic.

In the light novel, the technique that use Ghislaine to kill the kidnappers was the Sword of Light, a technique that launch a long distance cut without moving of her position, in the anime she do a quick run and cut the kidnappers.

Is unknown if is the same technique (need verification).

In the light novel, the butler Thomas was caught off screen, meanwhile in the Anime he appears after the second kidnapping and confess his plan. After the battle, he was caught by Ghislaine.

In the light novel, after Eris return to the mansion, she is received by the maids, meanwhile in the anime by Philip.

Trailer

Episode 5 Trailer, February 5

Abrupt Approach
===============

Abrupt Approach
 (急接近
Kyūsekkin
) is the third episode of the
second season

Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on July 23, 2023.

Synopsis

After the incident in which Rudeus saved Sara's life, her interaction towards Rudeus has changed, and the two grew closer together. Sara asks Rudeus to help her in buying a new dagger, so Rudeus goes on a date. The two of them have fun shopping and talking at the bar, and the atmosphere becomes intimate. Even though he is reminded of Eris' departure, Rudeus makes up his mind after hearing Sara's feelings towards him...!

Plot

Counter Arrow
 is celebrating after completing a mission where
Rudeus
 is frequently joining the party ever since saving Sara as his reputation as "
Quagmire
" grows.
Sara
, who has grown close to Rudeus asks to help her in buying a dagger much to the amusement of the rest of the party which Rudeus accepts. During the date, they bought 2 daggers then they head to a pub where Sara becomes tipsy and they head back to Rudeus' room at Sara's request.

At Rudeus' room, Rudeus and Sara are about to have sex but, Rudeus feels something is off despite having the desire for Sara and after sometime, Sara grew upset and left. Rudeus is later seen drinking alone and demanding more to drink where Soldat finds him and begins to berate him as always. Rudeus attacks Soldat with fist and breaks down while Soldat does not fight back. Soldat takes Rudeus to the escort district after hearing Rudeus' story of
Eris
 leaving him where she meets Elise who is also grateful to Rudeus for healing her sister last
winter
.

Rudeus and Elise return to Soldat where the latter informs him that Rudeus has become impotent. As they leave the escort district, Soldat advises not to rush things and talk things out with Sara but Rudeus still drunk doesn't really care and begins to badmouth Sara, saying she isn't attractive. To his surprise, she happens to be nearby with Suzanne. Sara is in shock and anger on what she heard, slaps Rudeus and angrily throws the dagger they bought together,  sternly tells him she never wants to see him again. Suzanne scolds him for what he did and she and Sara walk away. Rudeus quickly falls into despair and tries to kill himself with the dagger left behind, but Soldat stops him then urges him to go after Sara, but Rudeus refuses, saying that nothing matters to him anymore. Soldat then offers to Rudeus to join him on a mission to a labyrinth in the Neris Kingdom which Rudeus accepts.

Elsewhere, rumors about Quagmire Rudeus' recent accomplishment of defeating a rogue
Red Dragon
 is being discussed to which
Elinalise Dragonroad
 inquires and learns that Rudeus is at Pippin, Basherant Kingdom.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sara

Suzanne

Timothy

Patris

Soldat Heckler

Elise

Elinalise Dragonroad

Locations

Central Continent

Basherant Kingdom

Rosenburg City

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 7

Chapter 5: The Abrupt Approach

Chapter 6: The Impotent Magician

Differences with the Light Novel:

Ada Eto
=======

Ada Eto is the mother of
Somar
.

Background

Ada is the wife of Mr Eto and the mother of Somar. She lives in
Buena Village
 and fancies
Paul Greyrat
.

Plot

Ada took her son to Paul after he became injured and angrily scolded Paul, blaming
Rudeus
. She would do so a few more times after Rudeus and Somar got into a fight, the real reason being that she fancied Paul and wanted to spend time with him.

References

Adventure Guild
===============

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Adventure Guild
 is one of the biggest organizations in the world. A place where men of great strength and valor gather.

Adventure Guild Main Branch in
Millishion
Adventure Guild Main hall in Rikarisu City, Demon Continent]]
1/2

Adventure Guilds can be found in all major cities in the world. Adventurers can take missions up to one rank above or below their current rank. It's main headquarters is found in
Millishion
, Holy Kingdom of Milis in the Adventurer's District.

Receptionist

Guild Receptionist in Rosenburg City
Eris
 talking to a Receptionist in the Millishion Adventure Guild
Guild Receptionist in Rikarisu City
1/3

The Receptionist is the main contact of the Adventure Guild with its Adventurers and is usually seen at the reception counter who are well endowed females with their
Race
 depending on the Continent or City the HQ is based and usually wears revealing outfits.

Duties

Membership Services
 - Assist Adventurers in registering in the guild and informing them of the guild rules, regulations and other general guild information.

Adventurer Card Services
 - Process Adventurer Cards that includes updating party information and disbanding them

Job Request Services
 - Provide information on a Job Request such as if its still available
; Accept or Decline a job taken by an Adventurer like when Rudeus was refused to solo an A-Rank Job of killing Luster Grizzlies or confirm a completed job and give out payment.

Taking Bets
 - Since fighting between adventurers is a common occurrence everyday, the guild does not interfere nor quell the fighting. Instead, the guild staff like the Receptionist start up progressive gambling and take bets.

Voiced by:
Japanese
 Taichi Yō(
Episode 10
), Komatsu Naoko (
Eris The Goblin Slayer
), Kazama Mayuki (
Season 2 Episode 1
)

Code of Conduct

Use of the Adventurer's Guild
 - If one registers with the Adventurer's Guild, they will receive services available to Adventurers.

Service Content
 - All Adventurer's Guilds throughout the world offer these services: job offerings, delivery of compensation and rewards, purchase of raw materials, and exchange of currency.

Registration Information
 - Adventurers receive a card with their own information under their control upon registering for the Adventurer's Guild. It is possible to re-issue it if lost, but rank will be reset to F. Also, each area has it's own fine for it.

Withdrawal from the Adventurer's Guild
 - If you request it, withdrawal from the guild is possible. Re-registration is possible, but rank will restart at F.

Prohibited Conduct
 - If prohibited actions are discovered, a fine will be applied and Adventurers guild qualifications will be revoked. The below actions are considered prohibited.

Actions which go against a countries laws.

Actions which disgrace and cause the reliability of the guild to fall.

Actions which interfere or obstruct other Adventurers jobs.

Buying, selling, and trading of jobs.

Breach of Contract Compensation
 - If you fail a job you have accepted you must pay compensation for the breach of contract, two times the amount of the job reward compensation. Repayment period is half a year. If compensation is not paid, Adventurers guild qualification will be revoked.

Rank
 - There are seven ranks from F to S based on Adventurers proven skills. As a general rule of thumb, you can only take jobs within one above or below your current rank.

Rank Promotions and Demotions
 - It is possible to raise your rank by succeeding a regulated number of jobs. However, if you feel that your ability isn't up to standard it is possible to remain at your current rank as well. Also, if you fail a certain number of jobs in succession, your rank will be demoted by one.

Obligation
 - In the case that a country is under attack by monsters and a request for assistance is made from the guild, you have an obligation to obey. Also, if an emergency situation arises, Adventurers have an obligation to obey the guild staff members.

Adventurer Card





Adventure Card filled



Adventurer Cards are cards that shows someone as an official adventurer. It also contains Magic Power that can change the letterings of the card into different
Language
 by pressing the center of the back of the card and saying the desired race's lettering you want to see but its costs Magic Power stored in a small magic crystal that normally lasts 1 year. The Magic Power in the card is automatically replenished on completing a job.

The letters of the card changes based on the race. There are cases where races are mixed, but generally blood is stronger on one side and those letters are shown on the card. If one goes too overboard with the card, the magic power in the card will disappear faster. In those cases, the guild will replenish the card if necessary.

Since the
Human
 Race only celebrates their birthday every 5 years,
Rudeus Greyrat
 forgot when his birthday is that he tried to look at his Adventurer Card everyday since it updates the age automatically on the day but in the end decides it doesn't matter.

There are seven sections present in one's Adventurer Card:

Name

Gender

Race

Age

Job

Rank

Party

Party

Rules

A party can have up to seven members.

Only members within 1 rank above or below of the party leader can join the party.

The party rank is decided by the accepted job.

The party is averaged based on all party members.

On completion of a job, all members of the party will receive equal status.

It is possible to take individual jobs while in a party.

The party leader and a guild staff member are required to join a party.

In order to withdraw only the guild staff member is required.

The party leader has authority to forcefully withdraw members.

In the event of the death of the leader, the party will automatically be dissolved.

It is possible to create a clan with more than two parties.

Clans in good standing with the guild will receive a number of privileges.

Known Parties

Counter Arrow

Dead End

Fangs of the Black Wolf

P Hunter

Rikarisu Gang

Stepped Leader

Super Blaze

Tokurabu Village Gang
/Tokurabu Toughs (anime)

Jobs

The Request Board in Millishion, Millis Continent
The Request Board in the Temporary Adventure Guild on
Fittoa Region
The Request Board and Request Cards in the
Demon Continent
1/3

The jobs are done through request cards which varies per continent like for the Demon Continent uses wooden cards
 while in most Human Adventurer guild like in Millishion the request cards are paper
. If the client puts a finger onto it and says a word of "Completed", the request's status will change to "Completed". showing this to the guild, adventurers can exchange it for money. The rewards from F rank jobs are roughly 5 stone coins. E rank jobs are all roughly 1 scrap iron coin. F and E rank jobs are fundamentally all jobs around the town, however, in D rank and above, the number of harvesting jobs increases.

Form

The rank of the job

The job

Reward

Job Details

Place

Period

Deadline

Job Owner Name

Notes about the job

Promotion and Demotion

F > E

Clear 10 F rank jobs.

Clear 5 consecutive E rank jobs.

E > D

Clear 50 F rank jobs.

Clear 25 E rank jobs.

Clear 10 consecutive D rank jobs.

D > C

Clear 100 E rank jobs.

Clear 40 D rank jobs.

Clear 10 C rank jobs.

C > B

Clear 100 D rank jobs

Clear 50 C rank jobs

Clear 20 consecutive B rank jobs

B > A

Clear 300 C rank jobs

Clear 100 B rank jobs

Clear 20 A rank jobs

A > S

Clear 100 A rank jobs

Clear 20 S rank jobs.

Demotion

There is also a rank demotion if one repeatedly fails to clear the jobs.

Failing 5 consecutive jobs of a lower rank will result in a demotion.

Failing 10 consecutive jobs of the rank will result in a demotion.

Failing 5 consecutive jobs of a higher rank will not result in a demotion, but you will not be able to receive higher rank jobs anymore.

Rank Benefits

S Rank

The Guild rents out a horse for free when doing an urgent delivery quest

Inn cost rates are much cheaper

The Guild will offers more profitable jobs

The Guild disregards the majority of incidents that violate the job contract

Adventurer

Redirect to:
Classes#Adventurers

Afar
====

Afar
 (遥か
Haruka
) is the fifteenth episode of the
second season
 (39th overall)
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on April 21, 2024 and also concludes the
Newlywed Arc
 for the Anime.

Synopsis

Rudeus receives a letter from his father Paul to inform him that he sent Norn and Aisha, his younger sisters to Sharia and to take care of them. Meanwhile, Nanahoshi, who was teleported from the same world as Rudeus to the Human World, continues to research
Summoning Magic
 to return to his original world, but she is becoming increasingly impatient as she cannot complete her research...

Plot

On his way back to the Greyrat House, Rudeus receives a letter from Paul informing him that he and his party are currently in East Port at the southern part of the
Central Continent
 and are about to depart for the
Begaritt Continent
 to search for Zenith. But since Begaritt Continent is as dangerous as the
Demon Continent
, Paul has decided to send Norn and Aisha to live with Rudeus in Sharia while they rescue Zenith. Rudeus eagerly accepts Paul's request to help his family as the eldest son while wondering who is accompanying them that he knows.

At the kitchen, Sylphiette is preparing dinner and Rudeus happily tells her that her sisters are on their way to stay with them. During their dinner, Rudeus asks if there is anything he can do for Sylphy who asks him to teach him how to use
Disturb Magic
 that Rudeus used during the Entrance Exam and in return, Sylphie will teach Rudeus Advanced
Healing Magic
 which also becomes their daily routine after dinner. During the practice, Rudeus realizes that he cannot feel another's
Mana
 to interfere with his own which makes him unable to advance his Healing Magic. While Sylphy is practicing Disturb Magic, Rudeus asks if their children will have for
Magic
 too which flusters Sylphy but because she is an
Elf
, it maybe difficult expect a child soon.

At the Ranoa Magic Academy, Nanahoshi shows Rudeus a
Magic Circle
 larger than her previous creations, hoping that they can move to the next step of the Summoning Magic research. Although Rudeus is worried that they might cause another
Teleport Incident
, he begins pouring Mana to the Magic Circle to
summon an object from another world
. As Rudeus is pouring Mana to the Magic Circle, he senses that something is off and the Magic Circle short circuits. Nanahoshi is visibly shaken by this and tells Rudeus that he can leave. While Rudeus is outside Nanahoshi's room, he hears Nanahoshi snaps and begins smashing things in the room, causing Rudeus to restrain her until she calms down.

At the corridor, Rudeus is seen by other students carrying Nanahoshi where he meets Zanoba and After explaining the situation, Zanoba carries Nanahoshi to the Infirmary. Rudeus who is also shaken by what happened, explains what Nanahoshi has been doing and decides that he will bring her to his house until she recovers.

On their way to the Greyrat House, Zanoba once again carries Nanahoshi while Rudeus suddenly carries Juliette to her surprise and asks her how Zanoba is treating her. Juliette happily responds but also made Rudeus wonder how if Nanahoshi is eating properly and that he doesn't know anything about her aside from both of them are originally from Japan.

At the Greyrat House, Sylphy informs Rudeus that Nanahoshi, who is staying at a room prepared for the younger sisters is sleeping and she already perform Healing Magic on her just incase. Sylphy also gives him Nanahoshi's dagger to which Rudeus decides to keep for the time being.

At the Living Room, Rudeus tells Zanoba and Juliette of Nanahoshi's conditions to which Zanoba remarks that even Rudeus has the same expression as Nanahoshi as well. After Rudeus explains how he once felt powerless and shut himself off although Zanoba cannot understand that feeling, he assures Rudeus he will help in any way he can.

At Nanahoshi's Room, Rudeus continues watching over Nanahoshi now blankly staring at the window. After trying to console her but to no avail, Rudeus was about to leave but Nanahoshi utters how Magic Circles are like circuit boards but she is unable to connect one part of it no matter how she tried, leading her to conclude she cannot go back home and lies down.

At Ranoa Magic Academy, Rudeus shows Nanahoshi's Magic Circle to Zanoba, Juliette, Cliff and Elinalise to get their opinions on how to fix it. Cliff tries to figure out the parts where the Mana won't connect but also struggles to fix it so Zanoba suggests to try a multi layered Magic Circle, similar to the doll they
acquired
 at the Greyrat House before renovations. After studying the Magic Circles in the doll, Cliff confirms that fixing the Magic Circle is possible to the relief of Rudeus.

Rudeus brings Nanahoshi to her Research Room at Ranoa Magic Academy and at his signal, the rest presents several Magic Circles layered together. Upon seeing the multi-layered Magic Circle's potential fix, Nanahoshi recovers and begins drawing a new Magic Circle to try again with Cliff assisting her. For next few days, Nanahoshi works with everyone and the New Magic Circle is finally complete. Rudeus pours Mana on the Magic Circle once again and this time, a plastic bottle is summoned at the circle's center. Nanahoshi happily confirms that the first phase to summon an object from another world is a success and they can proceed to the next phase. After Nanahoshi apologizes for the trouble, Elinalise suggests that she treats them as a celebration to which Nanahoshi accepts but they are even after this.

At the pub, the group is joined by Syphie,
Linia
,
Pursena
 and Badigadi and the celebration begins as Rudeus recalls how different his previous life is from what he has now.

At the end of the celebration, Rudeus carries a sleeping Sylphie back to the Greyrat House, where he sees Norn and Aisha at the front door where the latter rushes him with an embrace and Ruijerd also greets him who apparently accompanied her sisters.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Paul Greyrat

Cliff Grimoire

Linia Dedoldia

Norn Greyrat

Aisha Greyrat

Locations

Adaptation Notes

Light Novel Volume 10

Chapter 8: Life with a House

Chapter 9: The Letter

Chapter 10: Breakdown

Chapter 11: Three Heads are Better than One

Differences with the Light Novel:

Elinalise and Juliette are present throughout the research of Nanahoshi's Magic Circle while in the Light Novel its only Rudeus, Zanoba, Cliff and Nanahoshi

The event where Nanahoshi withdraws money from the Magician Guild and Badigadi buying drinks for all the patrons in the pub has been cut

Rudeus carrying a sleeping Sylphiette back to the Greyrat house has been added while in the Light Novel, Sylphiette who is drunk clunged to Rudeus' arms then uses Detoxification Magic when they hear noises from the house.

Nanahoshi sings Tsubasa in the Anime while in the Light Novel Nanahoshi sings "Gandhara" during the celebration

Aisha
=====

Redirect to:
Aisha Greyrat

Aisha Greyrat
=============

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Aisha Greyrat
 (
アイシャ
・
グレイラット
)
 is the daughter of
Paul Greyrat
 and
Lilia Greyrat
 and the younger half-sister to
Rudeus Greyrat
 and
Norn Greyrat
. Raised by her mother to be a maid to the brother she never met, Aisha was initially very skeptical of him. After meeting him, however, she came to hold genuine respect toward him.

Appearance

Aisha has maroon hair that parts from the middle of her head, frames her face and tied behind her head. She also has green eyes and her canine tooth is clearly visible when she smiles.

When she was a child, she wore a child-sized maid outfit created with high quality materials by her mother
Lilia Greyrat
 decorated with frilly embroidery.

As she grew up, she became a woman with average height while having a very well-endowed chest.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Personality

Born and raised by
Lilia Greyrat
, Aisha's personality is more of an adult than those of her age, able to act and speak in the manner of a maid. She is smart, manipulative, cunning, cute and without any regard for what happens to her subject. At one point she worked
Ruijerd Superdia
 to the point where he complains, manipulates
Rudeus Greyrat
 into giving her his side of the story, and escapes the castle by herself.

She has a playful personality and a major brother-complex as she sometimes makes suggestive comments towards Rudeus and has no problem being naked in front of him when taking baths together.

It is revealed that she likes gardening, and cute things but usually forbidden by
her mother
 over maid duties.

Since Aisha is technically an illegitimate daughter of
Paul Greyrat
, she has an inferiority complex and thinks that
her family
 does not love her as much as
Norn Greyrat
. This causes Aisha to be hungry for attention and very competitive with Norn. This is further reinforced by
Claire Latreia
, her step-grandmother who looks at Aisha with disdain and gets angry at her for being more talented than Norn. Due to these factors, her relationship with Norn isn't good.

Background






Aisha being cared for by Lilia in the Anime



Before Aisha was born, her mother Lilia was urgently hired by Paul who is expecting their first child and immediately got hired to be their maid since they are acquainted in their childhood and she also has experiences handling child deliveries. Due to  hearing Paul and Zenith's moans every night, Lilia eventually gave in to her desire and seduces Paul and by the time Zenith got pregnant with Norn, Lilia revealed to be pregnant as well with Paul being the father. With the affair revealed, Lilia admits her fault and initially plans leave the
Greyrat House
 and go back to her family after Zenith gives birth but since its winter, Zenith refuses but is still upset about the matter. Through Rudeus' intervention, Zenith was able to forgive Lilia and also tells her that she is now part of the family much to her joy and would feel indebted to Rudeus. As such, when Aisha was born, Lilia trains her to be a maid for Rudeus even after Rudeus is taken to the
Citadel of Roa
.

In
K417
, the
Teleport Incident
 occurs where Aisha who is age 4 at the time, is teleported alongside Lilia into the Shirone Kingdom where she was mostly raised by and looked up to Lilia. During their time in Shirone, Lilia with the servants of the palace continues training Aisha to serve
Rudeus Greyrat
 and helped her in various ways. Aisha, at the time, did not want to serve her
elder brother
 that she had never met and likewise, doubted Lilia's stories about him after discovering Rudeus' treasure that is kept by Lilia all this time.

After Rudeus saves Aisha and Lilia from Shirone Kingdom, Aisha is impressed with Rudeus and decides to serve as his maid of her own volition. It is also revealed that the reason she did not want to serve Rudeus before was because she thought he was a pervert that treasured the underwear of young girls.

Power and Abilities

Intellectual Abilities






Aisha analyzing trade routes in the Manga



Aisha is regarded as a genius by her family and allies that she is able negotiate her situation that will put her in an advantageous position such as analyzing the trade routes of the merchants they are travelling was able to reach
Sharia
 earlier than expected while using
Ruijerd Superdia
's fighting skills to help with the negotiations.
 She is also able utilize the advice given to her and the available resources at hand to establish the Rude Mercenary Company and solve the problem with
Linia Dedoldia
's debt to Rudeus.

Academic Abilities

Aisha is at fine level in reading, writing history and mathematics that after a year of of study there is not much to teach her.

Magic

Being a talented girl, by the time Aisha started living with
Rudeus Greyrat
, she was at Elementary rank for all six basic magic types. It is stated that Rudeus spends a good deal of his free time teaching magic to Aisha, though no mention is ever made about her skills improving.

Sword Techniques

Aisha is at elementary rank in
Water God Style
 when she was 10 years old

Equipment

Achievements

Aisha is the Vice-President and de facto leader of the Rude Mercenary Company

Perugius Dola
 thinks of Aisha highly, allowing her to come and go from Castle Chaos Breaker as she pleases.

In order to fulfill
Rudeus Greyrat
's dream of eating Japanese food again, she successfully cultivates rice despite the unsuitable weather.

Quotes

 taught me that if a child like me asks with upturned eyes "I want to send a letter to
father
", then even without money it will work out.

Suddenly, Aisha bent slightly at the waist and struck a pose with her hands behind her head. I've definitely seen that somewhere before. "

. If I do it like this, she said it would be an instant knockout.

Trivia

Aisha knows of the secret shrine in the basement.

Aisha keeps a
Rudeus Greyrat
 doll in her room.

According to the diary, Aisha was the only
family
 member that always supported Rudeus.

The name of Aisha and
Norn Greyrat
 are based of playable characters in the video game
Ogre Battle: The March of the Black Queen.

Spoilers ahead

In
Jobless Red Carpet
 (as shown in a light novel), she ends up marrying
Arus Greyrat
 and had a child named
Leroy Greyrat
. This was previously deleted in the web novel due to violations on the website.

Aisha Greyrat/Relationships
===========================

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Info

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Family

Rudeus Greyrat

Rudeus escaping with Aisha in the Anime
Rudeus giving Aisha his headband in the Anime
Rudeus shopping with Aisha in the Anime
1/3

Rudeus is her older half-brother. Her first encounter with him was in the Shirone Kingdom in
Light Novel Volume 6
. There she showed her intelligence, whom she figured out that the person who saved her was indeed Rudeus, who was hiding his identity from her under the alias "Knight of the Shadow Moon". Before meeting Rudeus, Aisha considers herself a genius and the rest of the people around her are idiots. They later on meet again in
Light Novel Volume 11
 where she becomes his maid, as she expressed her interest of becoming one in Volume 6 after seeing Rudeus is more of a genius than she is. Although she is a maid in their house, Rudeus chooses to see her as his little sister instead of one. She is somewhat of a bro-con, acting suggestively towards him but as she grows older, her feelings towards him dies down upon realizing he will only see her as his sister despite her affection for him is apparent and she is content to be his maid for the rest of his life.
 She also has leverage over him, as she found out about the shrine to his wives in
Light Novel Volume 14
 and proceeds to use that to push him around and get what she wants.

Norn Greyrat

Norn is her older half-sister. They were raised together in their early childhood, until the Mana Calamity Incident separated them. The two meet again in the
Millis Continent
, after Rudeus sent Aisha and Lilia to live with Paul. They went to a Millis school together, where Norn started to resent Aisha, as she was constantly compared to her, since Aisha is blatantly more talented than Norn. They constantly bicker and fight. Norn is also a source of insecurity for Aisha, as she feels that she is treated more better than her and the subject of favoritism even though she feels that she is better than her. By
Light Novel Volume 11
 though, their relationship gets better. Even though they still argue and compete, they actually enjoy it.

Lilia Greyrat

Lillia is her mother. She always had a strained relationship with her. Ever since she was born, she was set on the path of being a maid since Lilia wanted her to be Rudeus' maid as a sign of gratitude of what Rudeus has done for saving her
. This caused her to expect certain things from her and didn't give her a normal childhood. They were teleported together due to the
Teleport Incident
, but unlike Norn and Paul, they didn't become close. When Lilia started to live with Rudeus, she still criticized her for certain actions.

Paul Greyrat

Paul is her father. She was never particularly close to him. He tried to maintain his distance from his daughters in
Light Novel Volume 1
, as he wanted to become a strict father. However, after the mana calamity, he was separated from her for two years. It was stated what their relationship was like, but from her somewhat unbothered attitude when she gets news of his death in
Light Novel Volume 12
, she was never close to him unlike Norn and Rudeus.

Zenith Greyrat

Zenith is the "legitimate" wife of Paul. Although they are not related by blood, Zenith treats her as her own daughter. She is seen planting flowers with her after
Light Novel Volume 12
, seemingly socializing with her even though she wasn't able to communicate with her.

Lucy Greyrat

Lucy is her half-niece.

Lara Greyrat

Lara is her half-niece.

Ars Greyrat





Ars proposes Aisha their marriage at the near end of the light novel.



Ars is her half-nephew-turned-husband. He has always been close to her, as he always looked delighted to be around her.
Although one of the redundancy side chapters was deleted by the author following the undeniable controversy, he was not satisfied with the novel (which was violated in terms of use by the site) and allowed himself to revise some minor changes rather than scrapping the same chapter as a whole, continues to keep their relationship along with the elopement and pregnancy.

Sieghart Saladin Greyrat

Sieghart is her half-nephew.

Lily Greyrat

Lily is her half-niece.

Christina Greyrat

Christina is her half-niece.

Leroy Greyrat

Leroy is Aisha and Ars' son. After Rudeus finally finds Aisha, he finds her to be already pregnant and Aisha is ready to accept whatever punishment she deserves but asks that her son be spared.

Friends

References

Aisha Greyrat/Story
===================

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

She is the illegitimate daughter of Paul and Lilia. After the teleportation incident, she and her mother were imprisoned to serve Pax a prince of the Shirone Kingdom due to their affiliation with Roxy.
After Rudeus rescues both of them, she promises herself to serve her
brother, not as his sister but as a maid. Following Rudeus' marriage to
Slyphy, she moves in with her half-sister Norn. From then on, she goes
on to establish Rude Mercenary Company with the help of Rudeus

Almanfi
=======

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Almanfi
 (
アルマンフィ
,

Arumanfi
)
 or
Almanfi of the Bright
 (
光輝のアルマンフィ
,

Kōki no Arumanfi
)
 is one of eleven summoned servants of Armored Dragon King
Perugius Dola
.

Appearance

Almanfi has a blonde hair with a pony tail by his right ear, wearing a yellow fox mask on his face, a buttoned white blazer and long pants.

Personality

Almanfi is loyal, quick-witted, and takes great pride in being one of Perugius' servants.

Background

Almanfi of the Bright is a Spirit Familiar created by Perugius
 with Summoning Magic developed during the
Six-Faced World
 era by Armored Dragon King
Dora
, Perugius' mother
. Almanfi loyally serves Perugius to this day.

Powers and Abilities

Almanfi matching Ghislaine's speed and Sword of Light
Teleportation
1/2

He is able to fight on equals terms with Sword King
Ghislaine
.

He is fast enough to dodge a Longsword of Light.

Almanfi teleports without magic circles

Since Almanfi is a familiar, he can be revived in the
Chaos Breaker
, Perugius' Flying Fortress if he is killed.

Equipment






Almanfi in the Game



Almanfi uses a double edge short sword with a rectangle knuckle bow. When fighting, he holds it in reverse grip style and sheathes it horizontally behind his waist.

Achievements

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Quotes

Rudeus :
 "Almanfi-san, I messed up a bit, I will call someone else."

Almanfi :
 "Then quickly annul this contract. This Almanfi is Perugius-sama's proud servant."

Rudeus :
 "Ah. Yes."

Trivia

Rudeus
 once summoned him by mistake while trying to summon a magical beast to protect his family. He mused that this accident happened due to him trying to summon a dignified (高貴,
kouki
) being, which has the same pronunciation as Bright (光輝,
kouki
) in Almanfi's epithet
.

He is known as "eye" for Perugius because he can determine who is a reincarnation of Laplace just by observing.

His epithet, Almanfi of the Bright comes from the fact that he is the spirit that governs all light spirits.

Angel
=====

Angel
 is the third side story chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Sylphiette

Summary

In Buena Village, Sylphie brings her father, Laws, his lunch and greets the bard before returning to magic practice. Laws details Sylphie's being bullied as a child until Rudeus saved her, and they became inseparable friends, Sylphie practically worshipping Rudeus. But both were too dependent on the other, so Paul sent Rudeus to work for nobles in Roa and Lawls had to talk Sylphie into accepting his leaving to be a stronger mage. After that, Sylphie worked hard just to be independent for herself, still struggling even as Laws tells the Bard.

On the road, Sylphie reviews her assignments for the day, and reflects on how it's been three years since Rudy left. Worrying about his safety, Sylphie also wonders if Rudeus is making friends, especially female friends. Recalling her childhood bedtime stories of a prince saving a princess, Sylphie would see Rudeus as her prince and realizes she loves him, fearful he's gotten with another girl and forgotten about her. She begins to cry again thinking of wives having to be protected by the husbands, begging for rudy to save her again. As she falls into sadness, the Bard finds her looking for a doctor, but Sylphie finds she's carrying an injured Somal. As he calls Sylphie a demon again and to keep away, she yells at Somal reminding him that she isn't a demon before ignoring him to just use chant-less healing on his injury. With the pain gone, Somal and friends quietly blush seeing Sylphie as cute, leaving Bard alone to inquire Sylphie about her chant-less casting.

Hearing how she learned chant-less magic from Rudy, Bard steers the objective of Sylphie's magic that can protect others, and bids farewell. Grateful to Bard's speech, Sylphie is happy thinking she can get stronger to protect Rudeus and that both can protect the other, Sylphie does away with the old story she once thought of as a little girl. Imagining Rudy in love with her, all red with her ears fluttering, Sylphie focuses on getting stronger and more attractive for Rudeus. Then, she is surprised to see a bright light and is caught in the mana calamity. The words in her mind as she vanishes being that she swears to Rudeus that she'll get stronger to be with him forever.

Angelique Curenttale
====================

A woman who
Rudeus Greyrat
 saves from near death under
Orsted
's orders.

Appearance

Bewitchingly gorgeous, according to Rudeus.

Personality

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Background

Born at the western edge of the
King Dragon Realm
 in a village bordering a dense forest. Her parents both apothecaries and taught her how to be one as well before they died due to an Ibri Lizard, while trying to find an Eant Flower, whose petals can cure Ibri disease. They were searching for these plants with the help of
Pham Haindora
's father, a hunter, who wanted to save his wife who had contracted the disease, which has a very high mortality rate after being infected for 10 days. Due to the circumstances of her parents' death, she resented Pham but soon grew extremely close with her and they became best friends.

Plot

Angie and Pham went on an expedition to collect the petals of an Eant Flower to cure the village chief's son,
Dochil
, who has Ibri disease. As they collect the flower petals, they are attacked by the Ibri Lizard that lives near the flowers. At the last moment, they are saved by Rudeus. Rudeus reveals he was sent by a certain person to help her, but doesn't reveal any more details. She falls in love with Rudeus, as he was her knight in shinning armor that she always dreamed about, but after a few attempts to seduce him, Rudeus pulls out Roxy's panties and sniffs and prays to them. This resulted in her infatuation quickly turning to disgust. Before Rudeus parted ways with her, he gave her a
Superd
 race figurine along with a picture book. He tells her to read the book to her future children and to tell them that the Superd race don't need to be feared. She was initially terrified by the figurine, and only stopped herself from getting rid of it because she didn't want to ignore the wishes of the one who saved her life. And after she accidentally popped off the figurines hair, she became less scared as it simply looked like a bald warrior. A few years later, she becomes the second wife to Dochil, who is now the village chief. As requested by Rudeus, she raised her children while reading the picture book to them.

Achievements

Quotes

Trivia

Anime
=====

Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
 (無職転生〜異世界行ったら本気だす〜
Mushoku Tensei Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu
) is a
high fantasy
 anime series based on the original
Mushoku Tensei
 series of
light novels
 written by
Rifujin na Magonote
. The series is being produced by
Egg Firm
 and directed by Manabu Okamoto at
Studio Bind
. The anime officially began broadcasting on Japanese television on January 10, 2021.

Background

Production and Development

On March 15, 2019, the official website of MF Books announced that an anime adaptation project of Mushoku Tensei would be produced.
 It was confirmed on October 16, 2019, with the release of the first promotional video that the adaptation will be a television series slated to premiere in October 2020. It was also revealed Manabu Okamoto would be directing the series at Studio Bind (along with other staff-member reveals), with Egg Firm producing the series.
 On June 19, 2020, however, it was announced the release had been delayed to 2021.
 It was announced on December 6, 2021, that the anime would officially start broadcasting on television from January 10, 2021, onward.
 An early broadcast of the first two episodes was released on December 27, 2020, on the
NicoNico
 streaming service. The first cour began on January 10, 2021, broadcast on Tokyo MX, Sun TV, KBS Kyoto, and BS11 and ended on March 21.

After the first cour, it was announced on May 19, 2021, that the premiere of the second cour, which was slated for July, has been postponed to October, and the anime will re-broadcast the first eleven episodes from July 11 onwards. Also confirming the release of Blu-ray Chapters 3 and 4 were delayed.

 It was announced on August 16, 2021, that the second cour will officially start broadcasting on television from October 3, 2021 onwards.

Overseas Distribution

On December 6, 2020, Funimation licensed the series to simulcast it on their streaming platform in North America, Mexico, Brazil and the British Isles, Europe through Wakanim, and Australia and New Zealand through AnimeLab.
 And on January 7, 2020, Muse Communication licensed the series in Southeast Asia and South Asia to stream it on their Muse Asia YouTube channel, iQIYI, and Bilibili in Southeast Asia.
 On February 13, 2021, Funimation announced the series would be receiving an English dub, with the first episode premiering on February on February 14, 2021.

Synopsis

"I'm going to get serious in this new world!"

A 34-year-old virgin, who is an unemployed recluse NEET, is kicked out of his house on the day of his parents' funeral and is run over by a truck, killing him. When he wakes up, he finds that he has been reborn as a baby in a different world of swords and sorcery!

The man who has been living like a piece of trash vows to live as a boy named Rudeus in the other world with all his might!
What awaits Rudeus is a loli sorceress, his elf-eared childhood friend, a fierce tsundere lady, and a variety of other humans.
He'll have to find his way to the top of the mountain through many hardships, adventures, and battles.

A new life begins to unfold! The fantasy of a new life begins!

First cour KV #2 by Kazutaka Sugiyama
Second cour KV #1 by Kazutaka Sugiyama
Second cour KV #2 by Kazutaka Sugiyama
Second cour KV #3 by Ryo Imamura

Trivia

Mushoku Tensei is Studio Bind's first independently produced show and Toshiya Otomo(the Studio President)'s first solo-led project.

The first promotional video was the first footage the Studio produced with the contribution of Manabu Okamoto, Shingo Fujii, Ryo Imamura, and the staff that was involved at the point of the Studio's formation.

Anime Season 2
==============

Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 2
 (無職転生～異世界行ったら本気だす～第2期
Mushoku Tensei Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu Dai-ni ki
) is the second season of the
Anime
 series based on the original
Mushoku Tensei
 series of
light novels
 written by
Rifujin na Magonote
. The anime began broadcasting on July 2, 2023.

Announcements

In July 31, 2023 the official Twitter Page announces the opening of the
University Arc
 on August 6, 2023 along with the release of the 4th Key visual.

On December 20, 2023 the official Twitter Page released a new key visual for the second cour, confirming its release in April 2024

On February 3, 2024, the official Twitter page released a new key visual for the second part, confirming that the second part would begin airing April 7, 2024
 A new trailer is also announced on the same day that previews the life of
Rudeus Greyrat
 and
Sylphiette
 during their childhood together, their journey after the
Teleport Incident
, their reunion at
Ranoa Magic Academy
 in
Sharia
 leading to their marriage and reunion with
Ruijerd Superdia
,
Norn Greyrat
 and
Aisha Greyrat
.

On February 28, 2024, the official website announces the Part 2 OP will be
On the Frontline
 by HITORIE and ED will be
Mamoritai Mono
 by Yuiko Ōhara

On March 2, 2024, the official twitter also announces the release of fifth preview video that features the new OP

On March 23, 2024, the official twitter released a new preview video that features the new ED and various scenes to be seen for the new season.

On May 12, 2024, the official x released a new preview video for the Labyrinth Arc and a new key visual.

On May 18, 2024, the official twitter announced the postponement of the
Desert Journey
 episode has been postponed to May 26  and airs a special episode featuring the cast in preparation for the
Labyrinth Arc
.

Synopsis

A 34-year-old man, jobless, shut-in and NEET. On a certain day, after he got kicked out of the house, met his death in a traffic incident... or so the man thought. The instant he thought that, suddenly he was reincarnated as "
Rudeus
" in a
world of swords and magic
. With the piled regret and experience from his previous life, he swears to live his life earnestly this time around.

Meeting with various peoples, various magic training... the now developed Rudeus is setting on a really harsh and cruel journey, such as
Teleportation Incident
 involving his hometown,
Fittoa Region
, and other various tales. After prevailing many hardships and successfully coming home, Rudeus became one with her beloved
Eris
. However, the very next morning, Rudeus suffered a heavy shock after realising the sudden disappearance of Eris. He had given up on everything and reverted to his shut-in and NEET self, just like the previous world. Alas, as the only lost person in his family caused by Teleportation Incident, his mother,
Zenith
 has not been found yet. Now he is determined to find Zenith, and Rudeus is standing up on his legs once more.

Episode List

Similar to
Season 1
, Season 2 is scheduled to air 25 episodes that will be divided into 2 cours where Part 1 airs on July 2023 then after a 6 month break, Part 2 will air on April 2024.

 (無職転生～異世界行ったら本気だす～第3期

) is the third season of the
Anime
 series based on the original
Mushoku Tensei
 series of
light novels
 written by
Rifujin na Magonote
. The anime broadcasting is to be announced.

Announcements

At the ending of the
Anime Season 2

Succession
 episode, a teaser is previewed with the logo of the Mushoku Tensei is changing from II to III and Rudeus' speaking of the foreshadowing events for the season.

On June 30, 2024, the official Mushoku Tensei for x announces that Season 3 is in production with the teaser from the Succession episode.

On July 1, 2024, the official Mushoku Tensei youtube channel TOHO animation チャンネル also releases the teaser.(see Promotional Videos)

On July 6, 2025, the official Mushoku Tensei X account announces that Season  is scheduled for Broadcast in 2026 along with the release of the 1st teaser that highlights the events of Rudeus' life in
Sharia
, foreshadowing his encounter with Perugius Dola, Atoferatofe Rybak,
battle
 against Orsted and reunion with Eris.

Anne
====

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Anne
 officially designated as
Automaton SS-01 Anne
 is the first fully functional automaton made by
Zanoba Shirone
 and
Rudeus Greyrat
.

Appearance

Anne was built to look like
Nanahoshi
 but has shorter black hair and dark black pupils.

Personality

Anne's personality is based on the directives of the three
laws of robotics
: Ensure Human Safety, Obey Commands, and Self Preservation. To ensure Anne follows these directives, Rudeus and Zanoba uses the principle of
Perugius Dola
's
summoning magic
 for his familiars that makes a summoned magic beast loyal to its master no matter how powerful the beast is. But because of disobeying some of these commands, Rudeus believed that Anne was defective and has gone berserk.

Even
Perugius Dola
 is surprised that Anne is more human than his spirits while
Orsted
 is still troubled on how to treat Rudeus' creation and never thought this kind of automaton can be created by humans. He also believes that Anne is the most likely the existence
Chaos
 dreamed of when making dolls, and if he is alive, Chaos would love to join Rudeus and Zanoba on their doll research.

Background

"Awaken, my beloved daughter"

Zanoba saying the activation incantation of Anne

Rudeus
 and
Zanoba
 created Anne with the intent of spreading her appearance when
Shinohara Akito
 is brought into the
Human World
 so once he establishes contact, the automaton can inform him on how to contact Nanahoshi.

Before the creation of Anne, Rudeus and Zanoba has created multiple prototypes at a house in a barren plains that resulted in failures one after another such as
Prototype Unit No. 1
 which looks like a golem. They then created
Prototype Unit No. 2
 which has a body closer to a human but to make its movements close to human they need to balance the change of flesh and avoid tampering the core that could cause the activation to fail.

During their numerous failures, they repeatedly examined the memoirs of Mad Dragon King
Chaos
, asked advice from Perugius and Orsted also gave them rare magic stones and knowledge of many materials they can use as parts for the automaton. After one month of failures and learning from it, they succeeded in activating
Prototype Unit No. 3
 which had no face, so they began to work on
Prototype Unit No. 4
.

Prototype Unit No. 4
 is built with the same specs as
Prototype Unit No. 3
 that has a face with a humanoid body and core that serves as the heart located at the chest. At the suggestion of Rudeus, Zanoba activates Anne by uttering the activation chant and pouring
mana
 to the core from his hand, then Anne awakens and after a self check program, she confirms that Zanoba and Rudeus are her Master and Sub-master respectively.

She is the only automaton of the SS Series Anne with nipples.

Plot

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Power and Abilities

Built with the same materials as the
Magic Armor MK II
 (power and speed potential equivalent to a
Saint Class
 swordsman), made from Rudeus' Earth magic

Equipment

The parts used by Rudeus and Zanoba to create Anne's body are made from following compounds of high class materials for their trial and error that are expensive but possessing exceptional durability and feels extremely close to
Human
 Skin:

Bones were made of material from the Magic Armor and has the same strength and durability

Artificial Flesh made from Rudeus' earth magic clay that is mixed with
Red Dragon
 Scales, Phantom Butterfly, sap of an
Elder Treant
 and
Immortal Demon Race
 Blood.

Joints made of powdered bones of
Skeleton
 Deathbreakers

Achievements

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Quotes

“I do not wish to die, I will fix any problem you might have with me, I wish to be of use, so please don’t kill me, please.”

Trivia

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

.

Ariel
=====

Redirect to:
Ariel Anemoi Asura

Ariel Anemoi Asura
==================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

"It's all well and good if the others don't know about this. Even if I sold my soul to the devil, it's impossible to complain if no one knew. I will do anything to win. The stronger the allies, the better."

Ariel before becoming
Orsted
's subordinate

Ariel Anemoi Asura
 (
アリエル
・
アネモイ
・
アスラ
)
 is the second princess of the
Asura Kingdom
.

Appearance

Ariel has long blonde hair with blue eyes and a very attractive face. She is of average height, has a pale complexion and moderate-sized bust. She is regarded as the most beautiful princess ever lived,
 and Rudeus noted her as "objectively the most pretty female" he knows.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Personality

Ariel is a charismatic person who tries her best to create an image of a leader in order to obtain the throne. By nature she is diligent, sociable, and willing to work hard to improve herself. But due to the trauma of being the target of assassinations she became manipulative, sadistic/masochistic and also inherited the depravities of some nobles of Asura Kingdom.

In front of nobles and the connections that she needed to ascend the throne, she seldom says selfish things and always knows how to be politically correct, even when she was young.

Background






Ariel being protected by Lilia from assassins



Ariel is as the second princess of the Asura Kingdom where she inherited the lovely features and shining golden hair from her mother the queen consort, a famous beauty; from her father, the king of Asura Kingdom, she inherited a peerless beautiful voice. Since her childhood, Ariel already possess an overpowering charisma where the majority of Asura Kingdom's residents already sees her as the most beautiful princess who have ever lived and as the daughter of the queen consort, her supporters consider her the legitimate heir to the throne but also makes her the target for assassination.

As 2nd princess and 3rd in line for the throne, Ariel's childhood was flooded with assassination attempts by her older brothers, and at one point
Lilia
 managed to save her from one of those assassination attempts, Ariel started to become sadistic and tends to release those sadistic urges by beating and or torturing her subordinate. Ariel would spend her time on the "White Lily Garden" and talk about their conquest and other indulgences with Luke, her
Guardian Knight
 while
Derrick Redbat
 her
Guardian Magician
 would lecture her about kingship and persistently urge her to become queen of Asura, much to her annoyance.






Ariel and Derrick saved by Sylphiette



When a
Terminate Boar
 appears in the White Lily Garden due to the
Teleport Incident
, Derrick protects Ariel at the cost of his life. In tears, Ariel hears Derrick's final request that she become queen and resolves to fulfill his dying request, just as
Sylphiette
 falls from the sky and kills the terminate boar and after a brief talk, Sylphiette collapses in exhaustion and depleting her
Mana
.

Ariel sees to Syphiette's recovery and despite the
Princess Ariel Faction
 wanting to dispose of Sylphiette for suspicion that she might be an enemy, Ariel insists that she become her new Magic Guardian after Derrick, giving her magic items and a makeover needed for her new life as Silent Fitts for his ability to use
Voiceless Incantation
. One night, Ariel succumb to her sadistic nature and attack Fitts. Aware of the "night workings" that goes on in the Silver Palace from Lilia, Fitts retaliates in a half dazed state with her
magic
 that nearly killed Ariel. While Fitts is
healing
 her, Ariel finds being tormented to be surprisingly pleasant.

As months pass, Ariel is protected by Fitts from assassins sent by
Darius Silva Ganius
 who supports Prince
Grabell Zafin Asura
's faction and the two become friends. The assassinations persisted that
Pilemon Notos Greyrat
 advise that Ariel leave the Asura Kingdom in guise of studying abroad so Ariel dismisses Fitts from her duty as Magic Guardian but Fitts refuses to the joy of Ariel and they leave the Asura Kingdom together with
Luke
 along with 15 escorts of knights, nobles and servants. On their journey to Ranoa, they are repeatedly ambushed but Fitts fought them off and by the time they reach Ranoa's capital Sharia, only 5 of them are left: Ariel, Fitts, Luke and the servants Elmore Bluewolf and Kleene Elrond.






Ariel planning to ally with Rudeus



Ariel and her group are accepted into the
Ranoa Magic Academy
 as refugees of royalty where Fitts is accepted as a Special Student but Ariel refuses such treatment to be with the regular students and her group would eventually defeat
Pursena Adoldia
 and
Linia Dedoldia
. This enables her to become the president of the Student Council as a mere 2nd year and from there she plans her return to the Asura Kingdom to become queen. On Ariel's search for allies, she comes into the information of "Rudeus of the Quagmire" and Fitts confirm that he is her childhood friend from
Buena Village
. Although Luke scoffs at the rumors surrounding Rudeus, like killing a rogue red dragon alone, becoming a Water Saint at age 5, as being fantastically ludicrous, Fitts confirms what she knows about Rudeus, and gives him a glowing endorsement. Ariel then leaks the information to Vice Principal
Jinas Halfas
 who sends the invitation letter to Rudeus to study at the Ranoa Magic Academy.

On their journey back to the Asura Kingdom, Ariel tells
Rudeus Greyrat
 that she wants to speak with
Orsted
. Despite feeling the effects of Orsted's curse, Ariel also become Orsted's subordinate after Orsted reveals his reasons on why he wants her to become queen.

Power and Abilities

When Ariel was in her 4th year at the
Ranoa Magic Academy
 she was taking a melding magic class.
 This was considered a difficult class in Ranoa. For the sake of her charisma, she maintained good grades with the help of
Sylphy
 who tutored her and
Luke
.

Equipment

『Illusionary Ring』








A
magic tool
 that allows the user to take the shape of another, This magic tool took the form of two rings: a green ring, and a red ring.

The person wearing the green ring would become identical in facial features and hair color to the person wearing the red ring
,
 this magic tool don't change, height, build, voice, and the eyes colors.

This magic tool was meant to be worn by the body-double of the Asura Kingdom, but commonly Ariel used they to take the form of Fitts to explore more freely Asura or Sharia.

This magic tool was a secret treasure passed down in the Asura Kingdom family from generation to generation.

Achievements

After centuries, she is the second ruler of Asura that receives
Perugius
' backing after
Kaunis Freean Asura
.

She becomes the next queen of Asura.

Quotes

Ariel:
 "Luke. You, the playboy, unable to endure your sudden urge, hugged me and groped my body."

Luke
:
".....?"

Ariel:
"Originally it is an act that is not allowed, but given that I was also horny, I'll forgive you."

Ariel:
 "Just one thing, Luke."

Luke:
 "...?"

Ariel:
 "I am your princess."

Trivia

Her middle name, Anemoi, is the name of a
group of Greek wind deities
, each of whom were named after a direction. Furthermore, the 4 main families of Asura (Boreas, Notus, Zephyrus and Eurus) all have names derived from members of the Anemoi.

In the Web Novel, she was attacked by Sylphy when she tried to sexually assault her, awakening her masochistic side. This part was omitted in the Light Novel.

In the manga side story, it is described that Ariel gets aroused from unexpected public embarrassment, which is the reason that she has the tendency of collecting things that would be embarrassing if found by others.

Also the reason that she got aroused when she wetted herself in
Orsted's
 presence
.

Ariel did not marry after her coronation, but has a harem of men including Luke and had 5 children as result, all from different fathers.

She is one of the
ORSTED Corp.
 member.

Ariel is very eager to set a marriage between Rudeus's child with the Asura Royal Family to deepen their relation.

Edward
 may be Luke's son, because Rudeus feels a Ikemen vibe just like Luke. If this is true, the old fate between
Eris
/Luke is now between Edward/
Christina
.
