Ariel Anemoi Asura (Anime, Season 2, Part 1)

Ariel Anemoi Asura/Relationships
================================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Family

Grabell Zafin Asura

Grabell is the the older half-brother of Ariel and leader of the First Prince Faction, main rivals of the
Princess Ariel Faction
 that Ariel leads for her bid for the throne of
Asura Kingdom
.

Sariel Anemoi Asura

Sariel is Ariel's daughter between her and a unknown noble who Ariel proposes an arranged marriage with
Sieghart Saladin Greyrat
 into order to form a strong connection with
Rudeus Greyrat
, her main backer to be queen of Asura Kingdom.

Edward Anemoi Asura

Edward is Ariel's son between her and a unknown noble. When Edward declares that he wishes to marry
Christina Greyrat
, Ariel immediately agrees, much to Rudeus' chagrin

Friends

Luke Notos Greyrat

Luke is Ariel's
Guardian Knight
 where his duty is to protect Ariel and to drive away those who tries to get close to Ariel. After Ariel becomes queen, she names Luke to be the head of the
Notos Family
 and  eventually has 1 child with him outside of marriage (to Luke's sadness).

Rudeus Greyrat

After deciding to leave the Asura Kingdom due to assassinations, Ariel travels to Sharia to recruit allies for her bid to be queen and Rudeus is among the "influential"
adventurers
 that caught her attention after hearing rumors that he killed a
Red Dragon
 alone. When Sylphiette confirms that Rudeus is indeed his childhood friend, she feeds the information to
Jinas Halfas
 to invite Rudeus to
Ranoa Magic Academy
.

Rudeus eventually reunites with Sylphiette with help from Ariel where Rudeus offers to serve Ariel but decides not to use his power.
 After the wedding reception of Rudeus and Sylphiette, Ariel makes Rudeus promise to cherish Sylphiette and she will take her back if he makes Sylphiette unhappy and also tells him that she will eventually return to Asura Kingdom to either become queen or die trying.

Sylphiette Greyrat

Sylphiette was originally Ariel's bodyguard under the name of Fitz. She eventually became a friend that Ariel cared for.

Tristina Purplehorse

Ariel:"Excuse me. Are you by any chance... Tristina Purplehorse?"
Tristina:"Wh... Why do you know that name?"

Ariel first meets Tristina during her 5th birthday party but Tristina has gone missing without a trace some time after. During the journey back to Asura Kingdom, Ariel reunites with Tristina who is now a
Thief
 who tells her that she was kidnapped by Darius and became his sex slave for years but eventually gained her freedom and become part of the Thieves Group. After Ariel swears that Darius will be punished for this, Tristina agrees to help Ariel by guiding her through their smuggling routes undetected by their enemies and by testifying against Darius' crimes that leads to his downfall.
 After Ariel becomes queen, Tristina becomes one of Ariel's attendants but still maintains her contact with the Thieves Group in the event that Ariel needs to broker deals from behind the scenes or equivalent back door jobs.

Other

Lilia Greyrat





Lilia protecting Ariel in the Manga



Lilia was Ariel's Imperial Guard Maid during her childhood and protected Ariel from an assassin and got injured in her leg with poison. Although it poison was treated that allows Lilia to survive, it left her unable to run or stomp again which eventually causes Lilia to be dismissed and left Asura Kingdom.
 When Sylphy tells her that it was Lilia who taught her etiquette, Ariel impression of her improves and while the
Princess Ariel Faction
 insists on getting rid of Sylphy, Ariel insists on having Sylphy stay by her side.

Darius Silva Ganius

Darius is the most influential minister of Asura Kingdom and one of the main backers of Grabell who schemes to assassinate Ariel and orchestrate the downfall of the nobles that supports the Second Princess Faction.

Derrick Redbat





Ariel and Derrick in the Anime



Derrick Redbat was Ariel's previous
Magic Guardian
 and possess a strong sense of duty and loyalty to Ariel who he believes should be the next queen of Asura Kingdom being the last direct descendant of
Kaunis Freean Asura
. But due to numerous assassination attempts on her life, Ariel dismisses this notion and also gets annoyed when Derrick would lecture her about kingship. When the Teleport Incident occurs, a
Terminate Boar
 appears to attack Ariel so Derrick protect Ariel with his body, leaving him mortally wounded. Before his death, Derrick tells his request that Ariel become the queen to which Ariel strived to fulfill his Magic Guardian's final request.

Pilemon Notos Greyrat

Pilemon Notos Greyrat is the head of the Notos Family and supports Princess Ariel in her bid for the throne but after hearing of Ariel's death on her journey to Sharia, he joined the First Prince Faction.
 On Ariel's journey back to Asura Kingdom, soldiers under the command of the Notos Family attacks them, leading Ariel to believe that Pilemon betrayed them.

Perugius Dola






Ariel and Perugius in the Light Novel



Ariel:"If my ideals are so vastly different from yours, then I think your aid would be more of a hindrance than help."
Perugius:"Well spoken, Ariel Anemoi Asura! You have made your conviction clear."

Due to Perugius' being a hero during the
Laplace Wars
, his influence in the Asura Kingdom is equal of a king and Ariel who wishes to be Queen of Asura needs his backing where Perugius questions Ariel what is the characteristics of a true king.
 Ariel eventually find the answers and through Perugius' influence and backing, the nobility recognizes Ariel to be the next Queen of Asura Kingdom and Perugius also left one of his familiars in the Silver Palace as proof of his backing of Ariel.

Orsted

Orsted:"You're not concerned I might betray you in the end?"
Ariel:"I'm not foolish enough to throw away my opportunities to avoid all risks."

After Rudeus becomes a subordinate of Orsted, Ariel is also informed of this development that would lead to the mission to make Ariel the next Queen of Asura Kingdom. At Orsted's suggestion, Rudeus brings Ariel to the
Library Labyrinth
 to find the answers of Perugius' question and is able to gain their support that Ariel considers to be way too convenient for its timing. During the journey back to Asura Kingdom, Ariel requests Rudeus that she wishes to speak to Orsted and despite being affected by Orsted's
curse
, Ariel voluntarily becomes Orsted's subordinate after hearing his reasons on helping her and works together with Rudeus to accomplish his plan.

--To be added

Isolte Cruel

Doga

References

Ariel Anemoi Asura/Story
========================

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Volume 7 - Young Man Period - School Entry Chapter

Her first appearance was in Volume 7, as the student council president. She had given a speech during the Opening Ceremony. For most part of the volume, she usually either has
Luke
 or
Sylphiette
 following her around.

She was seen as a charismatic person and controlled much of the student population who saw her as an 'idol'. Rudeus had noted that her voice had a quality to it that made people feel good by listening to it.

Volume 8 - Youth Period - Special Student Chapter

She was told to have become the student council president on her first year due to her influence.
Rinia Dedorudia
 and
Pursena Adorudia
 who were pretty much the head before she arrived, were unhappy and led a group of students against them.

They were however, crushed by
Sylphiette
 who was disguised as Fitts previously single-handedly.

Volume 9 - Youth Period - Sylphiette Chapter

In the chapter, it showed the beginnings the relationship between Ariel and Sylphy.

Sylphy, who fell from the sky after the Metastasis Event, saved Ariel from a Terminate Boar that was sent to assassinate her. She had wanted to thank Sylphy for saving her but Sylphy had passed out after saying her name due to the strain of using too much magic to break her fall and kill the Boar.

She wentt against her Faction who declared Sylphy dangerous or a ploy against her, saying that she refused to allow anyone to insult the person that had saved her. Due to the death of Derek in the Terminate Boar incident, the position of her Guardian Magician was open, Ariel deemed Sylphy capable and made her the next Guardian, albeit under the guise as the male "Silent Fitts".

She respects Sylphy as her savior and is shown to have a vivid imagination because she said that her 'stomach would have been torn' had she not been there.

It was revealed that she had a 'love for tormenting others', constantly playing crude pranks like asking her guards to perform their duties stark naked. It is presumed by others that she got her sadistic personality because she was constantly targetted to be killed.

She loved to target weak people like Luke while she hated to target her previous Guardian Magician Derek as she hardly got a reaction out of him. Once, she targeted Sylphy and she ended up getting attacked by her in self-defence. Sylphy had used her strongest magic against her in a half-crazed and asleep state and nearly killed her. Somehow, it awoke her masochistic side and realized she liked being tormented as much as she loved tormenting others. (this sado-masochistic trait was only slightly touched on in the Anime version, which did not include the fight between Ariel and Sylphy).

She was later forced to flee due to the growing powers of the First Prince Faction and partially because Guardian Magician Derek, who wielded quite an amount of her political power among her loyalists, had died. That had caused her to lose popularity and
Philemon Notos Greyrat
 had pleaded for her to go to Sharia to save herself and rise up once more with connections that could rival the First Prince.

She had taken a treacherous journey towards the Ronoa Kingdom where attempts to kill her happened and at the end point, only her Guardians and two ladies, Elmore Bluewolf and Kleene Elrond remained and later became her closest attendants. The journey had made Ariel, Luke and Sylphy develop a closer bond that was even harder to break, and were comrades through and through.

When she entered the Magic Academy of Ronoa in Sharia, she was offered the title of 'Special Student' but she refused. She had wanted to start as a normal student as it would gain her more loyalty from others, seeing that she was ordinary like the rest, capable of understanding their circumstance.

She had even came up with an elaborate plan. While she was [Admiration], Luke would be her [Might]. Sylphy would be their [Mystery] as opponents would be more cautious of her as they did not know her Guardian Magician's capabilities.

It was seen that when Ariel took breaks, she would be disguised as Sylphy through the usage of a magical tool that allowed one to swap appearances. She did so to ensure that no negative influence would come upon her and the public would know next to nothing about her private life.

Throughout, she had to maintain good grades and she had the help of Luke and Sylphy for that.

She had even allowed Sylphy to reveal her identity to Rudeus, understanding how much she liked him. Her help towards Sylphy did not end there. She even schemed with Sylphy to ensure that Rudeus did know she was a female and his childhood friend, which resulted in them marrying later due to her telling Sylphy devious ways to seduce a man.

Her attitude towards Rudeus was also shown. She thought of him to be a 'powerful ally' but one that she could not control due to how strong he was. He would be a volatile ally that she could not fully trust, so she decides against having him as an ally. She felt that he would greatly boost her military power but it was not worth the risk as if he turned against her while she depended on him, it would backfire on her terribly. She is also rather well informed about his powers, knowing that he was the famed 'Quagmire'.

She is now the Queen. As the queen of Ashura, she remains a reliable ally to Rudeus, going as far as sending him her very best soldiers.

Redundancy

Rudeus says that Ariel is still unmarried because she don't want that her companion get a hold of too much power, but she have various concubine and  5 children of unknown fathers, is implied that a least one of the children is from Luke.

Ars Greyrat
===========

Ars Greyrat
 is the third child and first son of
Rudeus Greyrat
 and the first child he had with
Eris Greyrat
. He is the older brother of
Christina Greyrat
 and half-brother of
Lucy Greyrat
,
Lara Greyrat
,
Sieghardt Saladin Greyrat
 and
Lily Greyrat
.

Appearance

He has red hair like his mother and has emerald eyes like his father.







Personality

He likes breasts, especially big breasts, very much like
his father
 and
grandfather
. He is described as brave and protective of his siblings, as shown when he put himself in between his siblings and some kidnappers and was prepared to use a stick to fend them off. He also would never hurt those weaker than him following the teachings of his mother. He is also shown to be very mischievous and somewhat reckless in making rash decisions like when he got his siblings lost in
Millishion
 and almost got kidnapped.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Background

When Ars was a baby, he was very attached to women, especially
Aisha
, and had a strong dislike for men, crying while
Rudeus
 was holding him.

In a deleted chapter, Ars grew feelings for Aisha. He was caught being seduced by Aisha by Rudeus and
Sylphiette
. After hearing Ars admitting that he wanted to be with Aisha,
Eris
 went furious and gave him a beating.

After
Lilia
 got angry at them, Aisha proposed the idea of running away to
Millishion
 to Ars. After accepting the plan, they both decide to continue their relationship and ran away from home to live in Millishion. Their departure is witnessed by
Roxy
 who regrets the incident.

A year later, after the party finally found them, Ars decides to protect Aisha who is pregnant, blocking them from getting Aisha killed. Ars then challenges his mother in an aggressive sword fight. After seeing genuine love between Ars and Aisha, Rudeus and Eris decided to forgive them both with several conditions, one of which was that Ars had to continue his education and had to be old enough to propose to Aisha.

Since several years later, Ars finally met Aisha again. Ars seems to have grown into a handsome and mature man and now he is ready to propose to Aisha as his wife, bought a house in
Sharia
 as he lived happily with Aisha and their child,
Leroy
.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Power and Abilities

Wind God:
  Eris trained him in the
Sword God Style
 to at least King rank at the age of 19.  He integrated  chantless wind magic into his swordsmanship forming a sub style of Sword god Style.  Wind magic increased his speed and helped with movement.

Also being Advance in water and fire magic but not very good at healing magic.

Equipment

Sword :
 Arus is shown to use a sword.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Relationship

Parents

Rudeus Greyrat

Rudeus is Ars' father. He does not care much for males and will cry whenever Rudeus picks him up to hold him. However, despite of the former, as he grows up, Ars does care for his father and like all his siblings has a lot of respect for him.

Eris Greyrat

Eris is Ars' mother. Despite his caring relationship with his mother, she's always strict and abusive towards him in a deleted chapter. This was later removed in the web novel, instead the author revises their relationship to make her softer side towards her son in the light novel.

Relatives

Aisha Greyrat





Arus proposes Aisha their marriage at the near end of the light novel.



Aisha is Ars' half aunt-turned-wife. He has always been close to her, as he always looked delighted to be around her when he was pre-teen, prefer to his aunt as a big sister.

Although one of the redundancy side chapters was deleted by the author following the undeniable controversy, he was not satisfied with the novel (which was violated in terms of use by the site) and allowed himself to revise some minor changes rather than scrapping the same chapter as a whole, continues to keep their relationship along with the elopement and pregnancy in
Jobless Red Carpet
.

Trivia

He was the one child who
Rudeus
 could not make it back in time to witness the birth.

He was named after The Great Hero of Humanity Ars.

Zenith
 worries that he inherited something bad from
Paul
 and
Rudeus
.

Arus means "stream", "flow", or "current", indicating he has an advance ability of wind, earning a title "The Wind God Style".

Arus Greyrat

Ars Greyrat

Asura Kingdom
=============

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

"The policies made by you two after you become king are different.
Grabell
 will head down the path of weapon development and you will pour resources into military magic development. If you rely on military power, Asura Kingdom will fall. In the case of relying on magic, Asura Kingdom will survive. "

Orsted
 to
Ariel Anemoi Asura





Emblem of the Asura Kingdom displayed in their banners



The
Asura Kingdom
 is a
human
 kingdom holding the world's greatest national power located in the western area of the
Central Continent
 and is one of the most abundant and richest regions in the world as such, becoming king of the Asura Kingdom is the same as becoming the richest person in the world.
 The bountiful resources found in this region and relatively very few
monsters
 showing up makes the Asura Kingdom thrive with people. Asura, however, it is a hard place to make a living for adventurers; knights are dispatched regularly in order to exterminate monsters across towns and villages, hence very few extermination quests are put up. The capital Ars, named after a war hero of the human-race, is the largest city in the world.

Territory

King's Region

Region Lord : Asura Family

Region that governs the kingdom. Population density is high, gathering of goods takes place within the Asura kingdom.
In addition, for the sake of commerce with
Begaritt Continent
, glasswork, etc. are also being sold.

Ars





The Silver Palace in Ars, Asura Kingdom's Seat of Power in the Manga



The Capital of the Asura Kingdom. Named after a hero who led his comrades in the First Great Human-Demon War to victory, it is also the largest city in the world. The headquarters of the
Water God Sword Style
 is also located on Ars where knights undergo training.

High up on the top of a hill sits a majestic castle, the Silver Palace. Surrounding the palace are the huge mansions belonging to the higher nobles. Boulevards extend out of the surrounding city wall. Ars also has a huge coliseum, a gorgeous training ground for knights, beautiful temples for the Saint Milis religion, an aqueduct system that spread throughout the city and headquarters to the world's largest trading companies.

Fittoa Region






Boreas Family Emblem in the Manga



Region Lord : Boreas Family

It was famous as the land of perfume but after the
Teleport Incident
, almost the entire area vanished.

Citadel of Roa

The capital of the Fittoa Region, is a fortified city that have sturdy walls of seven/ eight meters and was the last bastion of defense in the wars against the demon race.

Buena Village

A countryside village, Paul Greyrat was in charge as a knight.

Milbots Region






Notos Family Emblem in the Manga



Region Lord : Notos Family

Famous as the land of alcohol and has a gigantic brewing site. Although beer is a regular commodity in the Asura Kingdom, most of the wine consumed in celebrations are produced in Milbots.

Donati Region

Region Lord : Zephirus Family

Famous for sugar and knitting wool. The export of arms for the northern adventurers and mercenaries is carried out as well.

Wishiru Region

Region Lord : Eurus Family

Though there is no special mention of it's local specialty, the circulation of money or goods is prosperous because it is a doorway for the merchants that come from the south.

Population

Asura Kingdom population is comprised mostly by Humans.

Royal Family






Unnamed King of Asura Kingdom



Asura Kingdom is ruled by an unnamed king and his heirs are scheming against each other on who will succeed him to the throne by gathering support from the kingdom's nobility. Currently the Boreas Family and
Darius Silva Ganius
 supports Grabell's Faction while the Eurus and Zephirus Family supports Halfaus' faction and the Notos Family supports Ariel's faction.

Kaunis Freean Asura

Ariel Anemoi Asura

Grabell Zafin Asura

Halfaus Asura

Nobles

The nobles are the families that served the Asura Kingdom for eons.
 Many of the prominent noble family names follow the color + animal etymology. For example:

Greyrat

Redbat

Bluewolf

Purplehorse

Whitespider

Silvertoad

Yellowsnake

Currency






An Asura Gold Coin



Asura Gold Coin (100,000 yen = 1,000 USD)

Asura Silver Coin (10,000 yen = 100 USD)

Asura Large Copper Coin (1,000 yen = 10 USD)

Asura Copper Coin = (100 yen = 1 USD)

Trivia

The surname of the royal family of Asura, Anemoi is based in the Greek:
Ἄνεμοι
, that means "Winds".

The surname of the four noble Greyrat house of Asura, Boreas, Notus, Eurus and Zephirus, is based in the four chief gods of the Anemoi.

Reference

Atofe
=====

Redirect to:
Atoferatofe Rybak

Atoferatofe

Atoferatofe Rybak

Atoferatofe Raibaku
===================

Redirect to:
Atoferatofe Rybak

Atoferatofe Rybak
=================

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Atoferatofe Raibaku
 (
アトーフェラトーフェ・ライバック
,

Atōferatōfe Raibaku
)
 or
Atofe
 (
アトーフェ
,

Atōfe
)
 is a Demon Lord on the
Demon Continent
. She is a part of the Immortal Demon Clan, and she is said to be the Demon Lord who grants strength.

Appearance

According to
Rudeus
, Atofe has the appearance resembling stereotypical demons the most among people he had met. She has blue skin, white hair, crimson eyes, a pair of bat wings and a large horn protruding from her forehead. Atofe is described to be of average height for a mature woman, being a little shorter than Rudeus.

Her outfit appears both stylish and battle-hardened. Her armor is covered in scratches, and any decorative elements had long been ripped off. She also carries an enormous sword with an extravagant sheath
.

Personality

Atofe's personality is similar to
Eris
', but taken to logical extreme. She is incredibly dumb and aggressive, unable to comprehend even simple statements and would start a fight in a drop of hat. Despite her critical lack of intelligence, she actually hates being called stupid or being implied so, that she would fly into rage when that happens. She's also described to be loose with time, such that having arrived to an audience a day late in her own castle is a common sight.

While described as aggressive, the fact that her soldiers are quite uninhibited and reasonable instead of strict and stiff goes to say that she's not insufferable. She would honor powerful individuals who defeat her in a fair fight and stick to her promise.

She has habit of not taking her opponents seriously as she would take any hit head on, even though she can dodge or block the attack because she would just regenerate shortly after. However when she admits defeat, she becomes calmer and more willing to listen to the person that defeated her.

It should be noted that she was quite docile when reprimanded by her son
Kalman II
.

Background

She is on bad terms with
Perugius Dola
. She was also the Wife of the first North God and the mother and teacher of the Second North God. The current Death God
Randolph
 is also one of her descendants.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Power and Abilities

Immortality
 – She will regenerate even after losing a head or being cut into two.

She was taught by the first North God, her husband
Kalman I
, and is an incredibly powerful person. She later taught the second North God, her son
Kalman II
.

Even before being taught
North God Style
, she had already been a force to be reckoned with, taking a Dragon God or North God to subdue her. However, her lack of intelligence is baffling, truly a person of "all brawn and no brain."

She has enough reflex to block the Longsword of Light -- Eris was able to cut only half of her neck before Atofe blocked and disabled Eris by piercing through her shoulder. Later she defeated Eris in hand-to-hand combat even though she was drunk.

Equipment

Achievements

Quotes

Atofe to Rudeus:
 "Okay, now let's duel!"

Trivia

Atofe has a habit of kidnapping strong people she has an interest in, and forcing them to work as her personal guards with 2 years of break after every 10 years.

Only two people have ever defeated Atofe singlehandedly and earned her respect, the first one is Kalman I and the second is
Rudeus Greyrat
.

Atofe's strength and ferocity is infamous even among Demon Lords, such that after Rudeus defeated her and was given the hero title, the other Demon Lords actually begs for his mercy upon meeting him.

Atoferatofe Rybak/Story
=======================

Volume 14 - Young Man Period - Summoning Chapter

Rudeus and Zanoba first meet Atofe when they are taken to Kishiriku Castle, where she currently resides. She enters through the main gate, prompting a reprimand from Moore, she reacts by stabbing him in the face, but he gets up unharmed. She thanks them both for bringing Kishirika and attempts to give them a reward: to be trained by her for the next 10 years and subsequently join her guard. Rudeus and Zanoba refuse, prompting her to attack her. Zanoba manages to restrain them and Rudeus uses an electricity spell to knock her out, giving them both time to escape.

She corners them as they are about to reach the portal to return home and challenges Rudeus, Cliff, Zanoba, and Elinalize to a duel. Rudeus throws a stone cannon that she easily dodges. Elinalize and Zanoba fight her and manage to restrain her. After Rudeus shook the wet ground beneath his feet, Atofe was stunned. Perugius appeared from the portal and gleefully began draining Atofe's mana, only to ultimately cut her down with a magic attack that defeated her and allowed Rudeus and company to leave .

Auber Corvette
==============

"No, It is fine. It’s easier said than done. Besides, if Auber is determined to escape, then he cannot be killed."

Orsted

Auber Corvette
 is one of the
Three Swords of the North God
, known as
"Peacock Sword" Auber
.

Appearance

Auber is an eccentric man with red eyes wearing a rainbow-colored coat, knee-length shorts, and four swords at his hip. He also seems to wear perfume with a citrusy smell. He has a peacock tattoo on his cheek and his grey hair is styled in the shape of a dish antenna.

Personality

Auber is a pragmatic swordsman that's not afraid to fight dirty. He prefers ambushing his opponent and killing them when their guard is down. He also will not hesitate to retreat when the battle is not going his way
.

In the non-canon Re:Zero collaboration short story, it is shown that he is friendly and helpful.

Background





Auber sensing Eris' bloodlust



Sword God
Gal Farion
, called him to the Holy Land of Sword to help with
Eris
' training. On their first meeting, Eris battles him and releases an enormous amount of bloodlust that Auber felt a chill on his spine and feels that he is facing a beast he needs to kill until they are stopped by Gal.

Plot





Auber using his flame attack against Eris, and Rudeus using his Water Wall spell to protect her.



Took part in three separate assassination attempts on
Ariel Anemoi Asura
, all of which were stopped by
Rudeus Greyrat
.

In the first, after patiently waiting for his chance to kill Rudeus the second he cast his magic, he rushed in to attack but was surprised to see that Rudeus turned around just in time to see him face to face. After a few words, Auber rushed towards Rudeus and with his immense speed along with Rudeus' surprise at suddenly facing Auber, Rudeus' only option to defend was to launch the
Zaliff Gauntlet
 towards Auber. With his surprise attack being ineffective, he made the quick decision to flee just as
Ghislaine Dedoldia
 was about to catch up with Rudeus. During his escape he was able to dodge a
Stone Cannon
 from behind without even looking, spit out oil on his flaming sword to create a flamethrower like effect, and use his magic cloaks to swap locations with a log wearing the matching cloak to avoid being struck down by Eris.

In the second attempt, he was hidden on the side of a wall with a cloth perfectly matching the color of the wall to allow him to be well camouflaged as long as only a minimum of light was near him. Rudeus knew to expect him to be well hidden and sent out his
lamplight spirit
 to find him, which he was eventually able to do. Immediately after finding him, Rudeus sent out a maximum powered and maximum speed Stone Cannon, which Auber was somehow able to sense and avoid instant death, but it did take a chunk out of his leg. This caused him to fall from the wall, and even with his maimed leg, he was able to roll once he landed and take no damage. Rudeus launched another Stone Cannon at him after he landed, but he was easily able to deflect it, and once Luke rushed in and was about to take a fatal strike from his blade, Auber was able to dodge out of the way of another of Rudeus' Stone Cannons. At this point Auber's companion
Nuckelgard
 was killed by Eris, and
Wii Taa
 was badly injured by Ghislaine, but was able to flee by throwing a smoke bomb that launches extremely thick black smoke everywhere. With this distraction Auber was once again able to flee from defeat and be fully healed before his final attempt on Ariel's life.

In the final attempt, Auber acted as the bodyguard of
Darius
 at the party Ariel hosted where all the major nobles and important figures for the
Asura Kingdom
's throne were assembled. There was some light banter with Rudeus where he 'apologized' for all the cowardly attempts on Ariel's life, even though he himself was the one leading all of them, and eventually the party got under way. In the middle of the party, however,
Reida Reia
 burst in, and used her secret
Water God
 art to prevent anyone from moving a single muscle. At this point Auber was instructed by Reida to kill Ariel and Rudeus, but due to some hesitation on Auber's part,
Orsted
 had enough time to rush to the scene and kill Reida, who before engaging in combat with Orsted instructed Auber to flee with Darius and guarantee Darius' safety above all else. Ariel then instructed Rudeus, Eris, and Ghislaine to go after Auber and Darius once everyone was able to move again. The three were able to catch up to Auber since he was carrying such a heavy load, and engaged in a three on one fight against him in a room near the King's residence. After initial negotiations broke down with Darius, Eris and Ghislaine launched towards Auber, who used his Crimson Ink technique to glue them to the ground. Rudeus was quickly able to destroy the adhesive but the group lost the initiative in the fight which allowed Auber to go directly towards Rudeus. After a brief engagement with Rudeus, he was able to nearly cut off Rudeus' left leg with a strike to his shin, and was able to hit Eris was a poison coated dagger hidden behind a Fireball shot by Darius. Rudeus then launched a Burst Stone Cannon towards Darius, which Auber was able to cut in half, though the unique nature of the spell allowed it to explode next to Darius and cause him some damage. This surprised Auber, and in this moment Eris launched a
Longsword of Light
 that Auber was was amazingly able to mostly block using the thick part of his blade causing only a shallow cut on his arm, thanks to the poison in Eris' system. Ghislaine followed up immediately with her own sword of light, which sliced through his flank and killed him.

Power and Abilities





Auber preparing to attack in the Manga



Auber is an extremely skilled swordsman who can dual wield his swords to parry an attack then retaliate at their blind side, Auber also uses camouflage to mask his presence and strike his opponents from behind the instant they are distracted. He carries an arsenal of equipment with him which he expertly uses to distract, evade, and counter his opponents with. He was confident that he could defeat both
Eris
 and
Ghyslaine
 in combat simultaneously.

North
 Emperor

Known named skills:

Crimson Ink - a trap technique involving red balls that explode on contact spreading an extremely strong instant adhesive

Nebulous Cross - a quick dual slash using weapons in both of his hands.

Equipment






Auber Dual Wielding Swords in the Manga



In combat he uses a large variety of tools and equipment such as:

Swords

Auber carries at least four different swords that he sheathe at his hip, one of which is able to burst into flames after reciting an incantation. When dual-wielding Auber uses a long sword on his main hand and a curved short sword for parrying attacks for his off-hand that he can also fight with using reverse grip style
.

Tear gas pouch, which causes opponents who get it on their face to sneeze uncontrollably and is especially effective on beastmen.

Magic cloaks that are able to swap the positions of whatever is wearing them. He uses logs as a medium for his Substitute Art to evade fatal attacks, allowing whatever is wearing the green and brown coats to instantaneously swap places.

Pouch of oil, which he places in his mouth and spits on his sword after using an incantation allowing his sword to burst into flames to create an effect similar to a short duration flamethrower.

Metallic claws that can be used to quickly scale large vertical walls made of stone. It is likely these same claws that he attaches to the end of a rope, which he can throw to allow himself to retrieve items from a distance, such as the cloak he uses to swap places after he has done so.

Small red balls that contain an extremely powerful instant adhesive made by a master apothecary that can only be created using a very complicated process. When a strong shock occurred, they would explode and spray their contents in every direction. The adhesive can be completely nullified using water.

Kunai-like daggers that are covered in poison which he is capable of throwing with extreme precision.

Non-fatal poison and the antidote to the poison. The poison causes those hit by it to have dulled movements, and causes the affected area to become bright purple. The poison is strong enough to be unaffected by beginner and intermediate
Detoxification magic
.

Achievements

Quotes

To Rudeus: "A man who could tame that
beast
, would be a praiseworthy man. Really, like the rumor said.......even
his arm can fly
.”

To Ghislaine moments before death: "Splendidly done."

Trivia

Rudeus
 once noted that Auber was very much like a ninja and wonders if he should try to imitate him
.

He appears in
Volume 9
 of the manga in the short story collaboration with Re:ZERO, helping the protagonist Natsuki Subaru.

Eris noted that she had never blocked Auber's Nebulus Cross technique, which Rudeus was able to on his first encounter with it.

Some practitioners of North God Style views Auber's group to be a wacky faction
 .

Badigadi
========

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Chronology

Demon King of Immortality,
Badigadi
 (
バーディガーディ
,

Badigadi
)
, also known as Badigadi the Immortal is a member of the
Immortal Demon Clan
 and
Kishirika's
 fiancé as well as the former
Fighting God
. First mentioned by his fiancé, he debuts when he travels to
Ranoa Magic Academy
 to challenge
Rudeus
 after hearing tales of him, and joins the school afterward as a Special Student.

SPOILER ALERT!

This page contains
spoilers!
  Read at your own risk.

Appearance

Badigadi is described to be incredibly tall, with 6 muscular arms (where it is usually seen that the top pair is folded on his chest, the middle pair stretched out as if he is flexing, and the bottom pair is holding onto his hips) violet hair and a jet black (black-purple in the anime) skin that changes color to brown when he's drunk.

Personality






Badigadi usually seen laughing in the Anime



Badigadi is a carefree and boisterous person who likes to laugh a lot. According to him, his ideal life is one of endless wandering, dueling strong men and "holding" beautiful women without a care for anything else, including wars and power ranking. This is seen when he battled the
Beast Race
 suitors at
Ranoa Magic Academy
 but did not kill any of them. He is also whimsical and simple, but still wise enough to provide valuable wisdom to people around him. He cares about his subordinates and loved ones so much that he becomes serious when it comes to them.

He holds his own personal value firm and would repay any perceived benefits granted to him, even to someone as nefarious as Hitogami.

Background

After the generation of Demon Kings who served the First Demon God, several factions of Demon Kings have risen in the
Human World
, especially those who are warlike and aggressive. Those Demon Kings were eventually exterminated in the Laplace War. The remaining Demon King Factions were from the moderate faction where Badigadi is said to belong to.  They were peaceful or cautious by nature and mostly never got involved in conflicts.  They chose to stay in the
Demon Continent,
 ruling their own region or city.  Such has been the "basic rule" and norm since the end of the Laplace Wars.

Badigadi is the younger brother of
Atoferatofe Rybak
 and son of
Necross Lacross
 who is one of the 8 Demon Kings that served the First Demon God during the
Six-Faced World
 world era. Badigadi has lived since before the
Laplace war
, which makes him one of the oldest beings in the series. In order to protect
Kishirika
, Badigadi was tricked by
Hitogami
 into stealing the
Golden Armor
 and became the Fighting God, who fought and split second generation Dragon God
Laplace
 into the Demon God and Technique God.

Thinking that Hitogami was helping him, he agrees to help Hitogami 'once' in the future as a favor.

Plot

Badigadi took interest on Rudeus when his fiance Kishirika mentions how amazing that child is because of his
unusually high mana capacity
 and Badigadi wants to see him while openly admitting that he is jealous of Kishirika's attitude towards Rudeus. After deciding on splitting the group, Badigadi accompanies
Elinalise Dragonroad
 to inform Rudeus on the location of his mother
Zenith Greyrat
 who has been missing since the
Teleport Incident
.

Unfortunately, he later becomes one of the final antagonists of the series, after it is revealed that he is one of
Hitogami's
 apostles.

Power and Abilities

Immortality






Badigadi regenerating his body in the Anime



Being one of the Immortal Demon Clans, even if Badigadi's body is destroyed by
Rudeus
, he can regenerate it almost instantly. However, depending on how much damage he sustained, it can result in having a smaller body that grows back over time.

Battle Aura

Badigadi is able to protect his body by reinforcing it using
mana
, thus only a king or higher ranked attack can damage him. Saint-ranked
Nina
 was able to somewhat damage him using
Longsword of Light
, but ended up bending her sword in the process.

Demon Eye
 Immunity

Demon Eyes don't work against Badigadi due to him taking an unknown drug that he found in an old dragon ruin thanks to Hitogami.

Equipment

Fighting God Armor

Achievements

Defeating the Dragon God Laplace

Easily defeating a saint ranked Nina alongside multiple beastman challengers

Quotes

Kishirika:
 “Hahahaha! Well then, let’s see each other again, Badi! When you want to see me again, return to the Demon Continent!”

Badigadi:
 “Indeed, and stay in good health as well, my betrothed! We’ll eventually meet again! Ahahaha!”

Kishirika:
 “Who knows how many years it will be until the next time, though! Bwaahaha!”

Sandor:
 "Great Uncle, why were you here?"

Badigadi:
 "Isn't it obvious?!" It is because the Great I, am an apostle of Hitogami!"

Badigadi:
 "Young Dragon God, I pray that someday your curse is lifted.

Badigadi:
“Children are something excellent. Even The Great I want to create some with Kishirika.
”

Trivia

4200 years ago, he became the Fighting God, third rank of the
Seven Major World Powers
, wearing the Fighting God Armor to protect
his fiancee
 by the suggestion of
Hitogami
.

He killed
Kishirika
 when he lost his reasoning due to using the Fighting God Armor.

He's a contradicting person who both helps
Hitogami
 and warns people not to trust him at the same time.

Badigadi gave one of his arms to the Magic Guild for research in immortality
.

He had sex with Elinalise.

Badigadi/Chronology
===================

Information

Chronology

Badigadi makes his official appearance in Web Novel Volume 6 when he decides to travel to the Central Continent with
Elinalize
 to search for Rudeus.

Later Badigadi traveled to Ranoa Magic Academy with the intention of challenging
Rudeus
, saying that after hearing about him from
Kishirika
 he got 'jealous'. When he arrived he saw Beast Men lined up outside library wanting to challenge Rudeus as well and telling him to wait for his turn. Having no desire to wait he asked if there is any way he can get further ahead, rather than standing in the long queue. Then one of them said "If you don't want to wait in order then you should try to defeat us". He took their challenge and defeated them effortlessly, when Rudeus walked out looking stunned at the scene before him. Seeing no way out of the challenge the demon lord issued out, he accepted and the two made their way to the court yard with the academy students and staff watching. Badigadi agreed to wait while Fitts retrieved Rudeus' staff. During that time Rudeus had hoped to talk his way out of the duel, but to no avail.

After Fitts gave him his staff, Rudeus mentioned that he had fought
Orsted
 and scratched him in the fight. This intrigued Badigadi so he came up with some conditions for their duel. He told Rudeus to hit him with his strongest magic and if he could injure him it would be Rudeus' win, if he could not then Badigadi would counter with just one hit. So Rudeus hit him with his strongest rock bullet and as a result the whole top half of Badigadi's body exploded, his six arms were disassembled and due to impact his lower body went flying several meters. It took few seconds for Rudeus to realize what just happened as he was afraid that he just killed him when he was supposed to be immortal. Then Badigadi began laughing excitedly as he put himself back together expressing how he thought he was going to die and declaring Rudeus the winner. Despite that he still felt like hitting Rudeus, so he punched him with 3 arms at once before Rudeus could react, knocking him out.

Later he enrolled into the academy as a special student much to the shock of everyone, but after a while, he mysteriously left without a word to unknown parts after encountering
Ruijerd Superdia
 at Rudeus's home.

He returned in volume 23 wearing the Fighting God armor and declaring himself a sworn friend and apostle of
Hitogami
. Badigadi as Fighting God was vastly powerful and was able to overpower combined efforts of Rudeus and allies but ultimately got defeated. Even though he says that he only agreed to help
Human God
 'once', it was decided that he is to be sealed in a God-Class barrier (with his consciousness still intact) until Human God is destroyed. Badigadi himself thinks that is for the best.

Barrier Magic
=============

Redirect to:
Protection Magic

Battle Aura
===========

Battle Aura
 (
闘気
,

Tōki
, lit. "Fighting Spirit")
 is a technique used to amplify physical capabilities of the individual to the extreme.

Overview

Battle Aura, in essence, is a form of
Mana
 manipulation, but different from the flashy effects of
Magic
 invocation as it is invisible to the naked eye. It is specifically used as a technique to explosively boost physical power and physical defence. It involves coating the whole body or a specific body part in Mana and forming a mantle of dense energy.

It does not have a specific training regime, an individual will naturally come to understand how to wear
Touki
 the more they train their body. In the case with Rudeus, he is unable to manifest
Touki
 due to the effect of the Laplace factor he inherited. This is attributed to the Laplace factor as Laplace was also unable to use
Touki
, but some, such as
Sylphy
, are able to.

All swordsmen and fighters at or above Saint-class are able to wear Battle Aura. Some use it subconsciously as to why they cannot explain their impermanent outbursts of strength during battle.

Employment

Offense


https://mushokutensei.fandom.com/wiki/File:MT-AN-S1-E02-WEBM-01.webm



Paul's Battle Aura applied on a Wooden Sword



Battle Aura is typically used by all swordsmen. Wearing Battle Aura is woven into the art of swordsmanship, it worked to improve one's physical prowess and strengthening the blade of the sword itself. Swordsmen whose Battle Aura has been fully developed are able to cleave boulders in a single stroke, or unleash a flash of the blade to strike a distant foe.

Other than swordsmen, Warriors, Knights, and martial arts practitioners also wear Battle Aura to enhance their weapons' durability and physical attack.

Defense

Instinctively, swordsmen and fighters sheathe themselves in a protective veil of Battle Aura around the user's body or a specific body part. When mastered, the veil of Battle Aura can become impenetrable to most physical attacks.
It also greatly elevates one's sense of the battlefield.

Special Type

Dragon Battle Aura

Dragon Battle Aura
 (
龍闘気
,

Ryū tōki
, lit. "Dragon Fighting Spirit)
 is taught by the
First Dragon God
 during the time when the
Dragon Tribe
 were struggling in the Dragon World against the larger dragon predators which allows its user to multiply their physical abilities many-folds and harden their skin, that is strong enough to pierce the toughest dragon's hide in 1 blow. Although the power itself is possessed by other races, the Dragon Battle Aura is far superior to the others which allows the Dragon Tribe to be the most powerful in the Dragon World.

Saint Dragon Battle Aura


https://mushokutensei.fandom.com/wiki/File:MT-AN-S1-E08-WEBM-01.webm



Orsted's Saint Dragon Battle Aura protecting him and his immediate area



Saint Dragon Battle Aura
 (
龍聖闘気
,

Ryūshō Tōki
, lit. "Dragon Saint Fighting Spirit)
 is the greatest combat technique of the Dragon Tribe created by the
Dragon God Urupen
.
It is a style that uses relatively less
Mana
, and boasts an overwhelming defensive power that only attacks of very high caliber are able to leave an effect on the user.

Trivia

Demon God
Laplace
 was one who was unable to wear Battle Aura.

Most of those born with the
Laplace Factor
 are inherently unable to wear Battle Aura, and it tends to be weak even for those who can.

Known Users

Paul Greyrat

Badigadi

Nina Farion

Beast Race
==========

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!





Beast Race in the Anime



Beast Race
 (兽族, Juuzoku) is a multi tribe race that originally lives in the Beast World and ruled by the Beast God until the destruction of their world where they live in the Great Forest in the Milis Continent of the Human World.

Appearance

Most of the Beast Race share similarities with the
Human
 Race in terms of having a humanoid form, 2 arms and 2 legs but they have a diagonal hairline where humans have ears while the Beast Race's ears are located on their head and a tail at their lower back. Depending on the Tribe the ears can be further at the side.

Background

Six-Faced World
 Era

The Beast Race are the main race that dwells in the
Beast World
, a world where huge rorests grow endlessly and mountains are connected during the
Six-Faced World
 Era and is ruled by the First Beast God
Pudoria Dordia
.

After the summit of the Gods, the
Beast Race
 teaches how to tame ferocious beasts to the other races and with the knowledge taught by the Human Race from words and letters to communal living and forming a social order, the Beast Race begins to thrive.

When the
First Dragon God
 invades the Beast World, he demands that the Beast Race who had an army of 10,000 troops to bring out
Lunaria
's killer to which the Beast God insists that they do not know and the fight begins. The battle against the Beast Race troops and the 5 Dragon Generals lasted for 3 days and 3 nights while the First Dragon God and Beast God battled. On the fourth day, the First Dragon God defeats the Beast God by splitting him in 2 and slamming him to the ground which causes the Beast Race to be imprinted with fear and hatred of the
Dragon Tribe
 while the destruction of the Beast World begins and at least 90% of the Beast Race died.

Age of Chaos

Around 8,000 - 10,000 years ago after the destruction of the Beast World, the surviving Beast Race were brought to the
Human World
 by the
Human God
 but the ancestors of the Human Race enters a war with the other
Races
 and after years of fighting, each race agreed to settle on their territory that closely resembles their home world thus, the Beast Race settles at the area of the Grand Continent that is full of vast trees in what will be called the Great Forest.

Second Human-Demon War





Beast God Giger in the Manga



With the humans winning the First Human-Demon Wars, they treated the demon race like slaves and grew arrogant to even go to war against anyone whether its their fellow humans, other races and even the Beast Race was no exception. In response, Beast God
Giger
 of the Doldia Tribe rallied the tribes of the Beast Race and battles the human army with a combination of power and wit to rescue the other Beast Race Tribes while defending the Great Forest and eventually defeats the Humans. For his victory, The Doldia Tribe is revered as the chief of the Beast Race who are also the guardian of the
Sacred Beast
 and even after Giger's death, this continued for generations.

When
Kishirika Kishirisu
 reincarnates and starts the second war, the Beast Race allied with the Demon Race and together with the Ocean Race, they managed to push to Humans to a corner but no decisive victory has been made until the Golden Knight
Aldebaran
 sides with the Humans and pushes the allied races that resulted in the death of 10,000 of their troops single handedly done by Aldebaran. In the final battle of the war between the
Fighting God
 and Aldebaran, this resulted in a huge explosion that caused the Grand Continent to be split into several continents which also effectively ends the second war since the continents are now separated by the
Ringus Sea
 with the Beast Race still occupying the Great Forest on the new continent now called the
Millis Continent
.

--To be added--

Beast Race Nobility Confinement Incident (II)
=============================================

Beast Race Nobility Confinement Incident (II)
 is the 61st chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Beastfolk

Beat
====

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Beat
 (ビート,
Biito
), also known as Byt in the Light Novel, is a baby treant Aisha is raising in the mansion in the kingdom of Ranoa.

Appearance

Beat is a a baby treant appearing as a small potted
plant located in the windowsill in Aisha's room, Beat is observed by
Rudeus Greyrat
 to be smaller than 15 cm and at most 20 cm if the root size were to be included. Beat has 4 leaves and 2 vines and currently has no budding flowers or fruits.

Eventually, it grows large enough to open the doors of the estate, protect the garden from pests and ward off intruders.

Personality

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Background

Beat is a treant which has germinated from the seedling of a flower of bacillus. First germinating in the flower bed of the garden and slowly growing then in the middle of the potting plant stage it began to take form. Aisha has said that the treant has only begun to move immediately around the time Rudeus came back from his trip from the Begaritto continent.

A flower of the bacillus is noted to be a material in aphrodisiacs and is also cultivated as part of the raw materials typical in the production of perfumes.

Powers and Abilities

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Trivia

The name Beat (ビート,
Biito
) is derived from baby treant (ベ
ビート
ゥレント,
Be
biito
urento
).

Beat will open the gates of the Mansion, acting as an automatic door.

Beat will attack intruders and those perceived as threats like Orsted.

Beethove Tovetha
================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Demon King
Beethove Tovetha
 is a
Demon
 belonging to the Nen Tribe in the form of a slime who is the owner and keeper of the
Library Labyrinth
.

Appearance

Beethove Tovetha is an enormous slime and a huge eye ball that is constantly looking up the ceiling, that indicates the use its Demon Eyes. Beethove also has dozens of tentacles that is always seen to be holding a pen to write books.

Personality

"You...de...Filed...it..."

-Beethove Tovetha

Due to the unique nature of how Beethove Tovetha communicates, he tends to ignore almost anyone who enters his Library Labyrinth and would tend to rewrite books most of the time. Beethove Tovetha also has great interest on books from the future and has great interest on its author like how Beethove Tovetha willingly helps
Rudeus Greyrat
 after seeing the contents of his
future self
's
diary
.

Beethove Tovetha also highly treasures the books he made and gets enrage easily despite trying to reason with him if anyone damages the books in his collection and will command his minions to also be enraged to kill anyone who would defile them.

Background

The origins of Beethove Tovetha and his
Library Labyrinth
 is unknown but the existence of books and other recordings belonging to
Kaunis Freean Asura
 during the
Laplace Wars
 implies that Beethove Tovetha has been creating books in the Library Labyrinth around that time or even earlier.

Plot

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Power and Abilities

Demon Eyes

Beethove Tovetha posses the All Seeing Eyes that he uses to see all books all over the
Human World
 that he transcribes with his tentacles keeps the finished books in the Library Labyrinth. Beethove Tovetha uses the Demon Eyes constantly as if Beethove Tovetha is only looking up the ceiling of the Library Labyrinth but he is actually using it to see the books he wants to transcribe.

Physical Abilities

Equipment

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Achievements

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Quotes

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Trivia

Begaritt Continent
==================

Map of Begaritt Continent



Begaritt Continent
 (ベガリット 大陸
Begaritto Tairiku
) is a continent in the southwest that has a large number of labyrinths, there is high concentration of mana in this region. The strength of the monsters is equal to those of
Demon Continent
. Due to the harsh environment and the number of monsters that spawn the continent is said to be the second most dangerous in the world after the Demon Continent. There aren't any established countries in Begaritt, only towns or safe areas.

Population

A variety of races live here. The majority of them are Human Race Adventurers or ex-Adventurers.

The language spoken is the
Fighting God Tongue
.

Localization

Maze City of Rapan

The most prominent city of Bergaritt Continent that was built inside of an enormous rib cage of a
Behemoth
 monster, which could easily contain an average-sized city, the buildings are mostly made of earth and monster materials.

Teleport Labyrinth

An S-rank labyrinth located in a cave of a cliff near the city of Rapan.

Ports

The Continent has two ports, one that connects with the West Side of the
Central Continent
 in the Asura Kingdom, and the other that connect with the South Side of the Central Continent in Dragon King Realm.

Monsters

Due to the high
mana
 density, the population and strength of the monsters appearing on the continent are close to the level of the
Demon Continent
. Combined with the harsh desert environment, Begaritt is regarded as the second most dangerous continent.

See list of
monsters on Begaritt Continent

Currency

The currency is the Shinsa, but bartering products with monster material or food is more common.

Trivia

It is the only continent disconnected from the
Ringus Sea

The stories said that
Kalman II
 defeated a Great Behemoth where the Maze City of Rapan was built.

The glass is an outstanding product of this region, better than in Asura.

The series never showed the value of Shinsa, but one could buy a meal with 3 Shinsa.

The
succubus
 was a monster that originally was found only in the Demon Continent until
Laplace
 mass produced them to destroy the warriors of the Begaritt Continent.

Begaritt Continent

Belfried
========

A master craftsman who specializes in creating boxes, or "beds", for dolls in
Sharia
.

Appearance

As tall as
Zanoba
 with a sharp gaze, frazzled hair, hollowed cheeks, and calloused hands.

Personality

Extremely passionate about his craft, to the point where he calls dolls his "daughters", and the boxes he makes for them their "beds", and he will correct anyone who calls them otherwise.

Background

.

.

.

Trivia

Bell
====

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Bell
 is a female
Human
 hailing from the countryside of the Fittoa Region and a student of
Asura Royal Academy
 and the best friend of
Christina Greyrat

Appearance

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Personality

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Background

"For Ma, Pa, y'all at the village, I'll do mah best."

-Bell

Bell is a village girl from the
Fittoa Region
's countryside. In the aftermath of the
Teleport Incident
, she obtained exceedingly good results in the newly built school and is enrolled to the
Asura Royal Academy
 by recommendation. Aside from her parents, the whole village is proud of her achievements that even the village chief also came to celebrate her achievement and even organized a fund-raising campaign to finance her travel expenses to
Asura Kingdom
's capital Ars.

Plot

"I will protect you from now onwards!"

-Christina Greyrat to Bell

Despite the Asura Royal Academy labeling itself to have a meritocratic system, more than half of the students are from noble pedigree who begins bullying Bell who spends her crying to sleep almost every night. Despite her resolve to help her village, Bell slowly crumbles in despair and her desire to return to her village grows stronger by the day until Christina intervenes and tells off the high aristocrats to stop the bullying. Despite being ignored Chris begins to argue against them which resulted to fist fights that Chris somehow wins due to the special education from her
Greyrat Family
 despite having a swollen face and blood dripping. Seeing Chris' smile and declaration, Bell cried tears of joy as for the first time since she attended the academy and become friends with Chris.

Since then, Chris is in a constant conflict with the high aristocrat students of the academy and Bell would also defend Chris who also continue to help other students of low standing and their group become a faction but they are still viewed by their enemies as a mere mob without ability or authority that could never really pose a threat

Power and Abilities

Benedict Kingdragon
===================

Information

Relationships

Appearance

Queen
Benedict Kingdragon
 was the 18th princess of the
King Dragon Realm
 and Queen Consort of Shirone as a result of her marriage to
Pax Shirone
.

Appearance

She is beautiful but looks like a middle school girl. Her hair has dash of aqua blue, similar to that of the
Migurd Tribe
, but not quite the same.

Personality

Benedict is apathetic and quiet, speaking very few words in a stuttered manner. She loves her husband and son deeply.

Background

Benedict's mother a
Slave
 was from a
Demon
 race of unknown origins and was used as a plaything of the King of Kingdragon where Benedict was eventually born. Although Benedict was the 18th princess, she had no rights to succession and due to being a child of a slave, she was shunned especially due to her blue hair which became a stigma that marks her as a descendant of a slave but despite this, the King of Kingdragon acknowledged Benedict to be her daughter, due to which she was brought up properly.

Story

Benedict married Pax Shirone and had a son with him.

Trivia

Biheiril Kingdom
================

The
Biheiril Kingdom
 is a Human/Orc kingdom located in the northenmost part of the
Central Continent
 and besides Onigashima, the orcs' homeland. Orcs are highly respected by humans and vice-versa, this is because a party of human adventurers had saved the orcs from the ocean-race in the past, causing the two to become closer.

The
Superd
 have taken residence in a forest inside the Biheiril Kingdom.

Territory

First City

The First City is the capital city of the Biheiril Kingdom.

Second City

The Second City of the Biheiril Kingdom.

Third City

The Third City is a port city that connects to Onigashima, the Orc Island.

Population

Currency

Biheiril Gold Coin = 10,000 Yen ($100)

Trivia

The Biheiril Kingdom is full of North Style swordsmen looking for strong people to fight with

Birthday
========

Birthday
 (
バースデイ
,

Bāsudei
)
 is the eleventh chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Eris Greyrat

Summary

Somewhere else in the world, a
a Superd man
 approaches two other creatures, begging for their lives.

Back in Roa, Sauros introduces Eris while Philip advises Rudeus stay silent of his Greyrat bloodline, lest he become a political bargaining chip. As Rudeus orders food for later, some guests among the party gossip as to who the unknown boy (Rudeus) is and they crowd him. When the music starts, Eris declines a dance invitation to save Rudeus and be her dance partner, but her nervousness shows until Rudeus makes a funny face to distract her into flowing to the rhythm. With gossip that he could be a Greyrat, the music changes to something Eris never practiced, so Rudeus brings her in close to match her movements. While Rudeus thinks she's unwell, she carries on and as they dance she smiles, quietly growing a crush for Rudeus.

After a magnificent performance, Sauros hoists both of them onto his shoulders in pride. Afterwards, Rudeus leads Ghislaine and Eris to another room and present them a table of food. While Eris is happy to dig in, Rudeus stops her to present her and Ghislaine their own wands. Like how Roxy gifted him, Rudeus presents their wands for mastering his Elementary magic lessons from master to student. While Eris is bluntly wanting a figurine Rudeus made, Ghislaine humbly accepts his gift and is happy to earn the title "mage"; a detail Rudeus was ignorant of as Roxy never told him. Moving on, Rudeus presents the Sylphie figurine Eris wanted, but she changes her mind and accepts her wand. As Eris eyes Ghislaine for a gift, but her culture has no such customs, so Rudeus advises she simply gift an item on her person. So, Ghislaine gifts a family ring said to ward off wolves.

With the gift-giving done, they finally get to eating. After Rudeus and Eris fall asleep, Ghislaine puts the two of them in bed and takes her leave. Rudeus wakes up and finds Eris sleeping beside him, but as he moves in for a "meal" he sees her holding the wand he gifted her and Ghislaine's ring. Commenting on how the ring does hold some effect, Rudeus gives up his intent to let Eris sleep; while Eris is mostly awake holding the gifts she got from her mentors as she rests.

Appearances

Characters

Ruijerd Superdia
 (Cameo)

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Rudeus Greyrat

Sauros Boreas Greyrat

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Edna Rayrune

Bloody Count
============

Redirect to:
Bloody Kant

Bloody Count’s
==============

Redirect to:
Bloody Kant

Bloody Kant
===========

Information

Relationships

Appearance

Bloody Kant
 (also known as Bloody Count) is an adventurer and writer that taught magic to
Roxy
 for the first time who gave her the pointed mage hat that she always wore and a recommendation letter for
Ranoa Magic Academy
.

Appearance

A woman of twenty to thirty years of age, with red eyes and long blonde hair.

Personality

She likes learning new things.

Background

She was born in a village near the sea in the
Kingdom of Asura
 and her parents were magicians. From her early ages, she was always immersed in books of heroic stories, where the protagonist explores the world, meets different people, and defeats evil monsters. To explore the world, she left her village and became an adventurer.

Power and Abilities

So far, she has only used Water Bullet when she teaches magic to Roxy.

But to explore the Demon Continent alone and being an S rank adventurer, she must be a least intermediate or advanced rank mage.

Achievements

S rank adventurer.

Famous writer.

Books written by Bloody Kant

Walk the World

Book which describes the cities around the world like
Rikarisu City

,
Millishion

, and
Asura Kingdom

 that Rudeus would quote excerpts from.

Great Men of the World - Heroes

Book published in K480 that features the prominent people in the fields of magic, education and arts during the Armored Dragon Calendar Year 400s century which is referenced by the [Biography of Rudeus Greyrat]

Quotes

To Roxy's family:
"I'm traveling the world! I'm going to write a book about all the things I discover."

Trivia

Like
Roxy
, she left her village to explore the world.

Even though she doesn't appear in the
Web Novel
 and
Light Novel
, sometimes when Rudeus arrives to a new place, the narrator give a description of the place made by her.

The author states two possible scenarios: that the adventurer Bloody Kant and the writer Bloody Kant of the year K480 aren't the same person (Descendant/Disciple?) or it might be a manuscript made by her that was published years later under her name.

References

Blu-ray
=======

The
Mushoku Tensei
 anime adaptation will be compiled into four Blu-ray volumes. The first two volumes include episodes from the first cour while the next two volumes will include episodes from the second cour. Each volume has a  limited special edition that comes with special benefits along with additional store benefits from respective sellers.

Blu-ray Specifications:

Layer: Dual-layer (BD50G)

Resolution: 1080p High-resolution

Pulse-code Modulation: Linear PCM 2.0ch stereo

Aspect Ratio: 16:9 Widescreen

Discs: 1 (+1 OST CD for Ch. 1 & 3)

Chapter 1

Release Date

April 21, 2021

Release Price

16500 JPY

Product No.

TBR31094D

Content

#1:
Jobless Reincarnation

#2:
Master

#3:
A Friend

#4:
Emergency Family Meeting

#5:
A Young Lady and Violence

Limited Edition Benefits:

Slipcase featuring characters illustrated by
Shirotaka

Digipak with illustration by animation director Mizuki Takahashi

52-page booklet

A Day in the Life of a Knight Stationed in Buena Village
 original novel about
Paul Greyrat
 written by
Rifujin na Magonote
.

Staff interview of chief producer Nobuhiro Osawa

Cast interview of Yumi Uchiyama (
Rudeus Greyrat
 CV) and Konomi Kohara (
Roxy Migurdia
 CV)

Collection of setting material and character design

Original Soundtrack CD with 7 extra tracks

Other Special Benefits/Regular Edition Benefits:

Creditless opening videos for episodes 3, 4 and 5

Creditless ending video

Promotional video collection of PV 1, 2 and 3.

Blu-ray Season 2
================

The Blu Ray for the
Anime Season 2
 adaptation will be compiled into four Blu-ray volumes similar to the Season 1
Blu-ray
 impilation. The first two volumes include episodes from the first cour (including
Episode 0
 while the next two volumes will include episodes from the second cour. Each volume has a  limited special edition that comes with special benefits along with additional store benefits from respective sellers.

Blu-ray Specifications:

Layer: Dual-layer (BD50G)

Resolution: 1080p High-resolution

Pulse-code Modulation: Linear PCM 2.0ch stereo

Aspect Ratio: 16:9 Widescreen

Discs: 2 (+1 OST CD for Ch. 1 & 3)

Breakdown
=========

Breakdown
 is the 84th chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Summary

Rudeus and Nanahoshi continues their testing of Otherworld Summoning and uses a larger
Magic Circle
 than usual but the spell fails. Nanahoshi dismisses Rudeus but before he can leave, Nanahoshi begins tearing down the things in the room in frantic rage causing Rudeus to try to stop her and she eventually collapses.

Volume 1

Brokenhearted Magician
======================

The Broken Hearted Magician
 (失意の魔術師
Shitsui no majutsu-shi
) is the first episode of the
second season

Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on July 09, 2023.

Synopsis

Rudeus
 set out to find his mother,
Zenith
 and heads to the northern region of the Central Continent. However, he is still depressed after
Eris
 left him and disappeared. Rudeus, who met Sarah and Suzanne of the adventurer party "Counter Arrow" in a carriage while enroute to the northern land, accompanies Counter Arrow for a Rank A request at the adventurer's guild.

Plot

Continuing his search for Zenith, Rudeus travels to the remote northlands, though he is still depressed over Eris leaving him. Needing to earn money to continue his travels, Rudeus reluctantly agrees to join the party Counter Arrow, consisting of frontline fighters Suzanne and Patrice, mage Timothy, healer Mimir, and archer Sara. However, Sara is mistrustful of Rudeus, and he can't help think about how similar she is to Eris. He accompanies Counter Arrow on a quest to slay
grizzlies
, but the situation escalates when the party ends up getting surrounded by them. Witnessing the Counter Arrow members fighting for their lives, Rudeus regains the will to live and helps the party fight off the grizzlies. Upon returning to town, Rudeus is accepted as a member of Counter Arrow. After realizing that he hasn't lost everything and still has friends and family like Roxy to count on, Rudeus finally comes to terms with Eris leaving him and burns the lock of her hair he had as a keepsake.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Suzanne

Sara

Timothy

Patris

Mimir

Brokenhearted Magician/Gallery
==============================

This page is an image gallery for
Brokenhearted Magician

pertain

Buena Village
=============

Buena Village



Buena Village
 (ブエナ村
Buena Mura
) is a small village sitting on the vast
Fittoa Region
 plains of the
Asura Kingdom
. It is located in northern Fittoa closer to the east-west corridor of the
Red Wyrm Mountains
.

Buena is a small hamlet surrounded by vast expanse of agricultural fields and prairies which comprised of approximately thirty households where most of the houses are built far apart from each other.
 Most of the villagers are engaged in the occupation of farming. The village's main produce is Asuran wheat that is used to make bread. Other than wheat, vegetables are also grown, and
Vatirus
 flowers are cultivated which is a main component of making perfume and also edible.

At the edge of the village exists a forest where mana is concentrated and monsters occasionally appear. A watchtower is also built near the edge to keep a watch on monsters and other activities concerning the forest. Once every month, a group of young men, made up of knights, hunters, and the local militia, would head into the woods and exterminate monsters which have been accumulating its species.

Chronology

Childhood arc





Paul and Zenith settling down on Buena Village



After leaving the
Adventure Guild
 and getting married,
Paul Greyrat
 and
Zenith Greyrat
 settled down at Buena Village where Zenith conceived their first child. Paul was stationed as a knight overseeing the production of the village and extermination of monsters that roamed the nearby forest
. During this time
Lilia
 arrived in the village to work as a handmaiden at the Greyrat estate after she was relieved of her guards-maid duties from the Asura Royal Palace
. Zenith took up a job that utilized her abilities as a Healer in the village clinic after their child,
Rudeus Greyrat
, was born.





Roxy arriving at the village



Three years later, to teach the magically-gifted young boy, Rudeus,
Roxy Migurdia
 arrived in Buena Village to take up the profession as Rudeus' private magic instructor
. Along her stay, Roxy was able to befriend the villagers, help out during harvest and earn their respect. After two years, her pupil already reached her level as a proficient mage, Rudeus became a Water Saint. Disheartened and also encouraged by his talent, Roxy left the village soon after in order to expand her own knowledge to become stronger.

While exploring the village outskirts, Rudeus came across a scene of bullying and decided to help out the victim. In this manner, Rudeus made his first friend
Sylphiette
, who became his playmate and first pupil in magic
. Two years later, a family crisis befell them due to Paul having an affair with Lilia while Zenith was pregnant; Lilia became part of the Greyrat family as a result. Zenith's first daughter
Norn Greyrat
 and Lilia's first child
Aisha Greyrat
 were born around the same time.

Not so long after, Paul, in order to let his son experience the outside world and earn his own money, knocked Rudeus unconscious and sent him away from the village to take up a job where he has to tutor a young girl at the
Citadel of Roa
.

Tutor arc

Due to the mana calamity known as the
Teleport Incident
 which befell the
Fittoa Region
, Buena village was engulfed in its effect and its denizens were scattered across the world. The village wholly disappeared from the map along with the Fittoa Region.


Gallery

Level View
Panorama
Riverside
Forest Banks

Trivia

Rudeus once remarked that the village looked like the picturesque ones in Switzerland.

Even though the village has disappeared and its inhabitants scattered across the world due to the
Teleport Incident
, the hill where Rudeus and Sylphiette used to play remained as a landmark. Though the tree that grew on top is gone.

Caravaggio
==========

Caravaggio
 (
カラヴァッジョ
,

karavajjo
)
 was
Paul Greyrats
 horse and the only horse of the family.

It didn’t have a particularly impressive pedigree or anything but Paul went through a lot over the years with the horse and loved it dearly, second only to Zenith. He tended to it every day and would occasionally take it out on long rides with a bright smile on his face.

Apperance

Plot

Caravaggio carried Rudeus and Roxy to practice Saint Tier magic. He almost died from Roxy's spell and had to be healed.

Trivia

Roxy misunderstood Rudeus's fear of going outside as him being afraid of Caravaggio

Celebration
===========

Celebration
 is the 86th chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
. This chapter also announces that the Manga series will be on hiatus until February 2023.

Cover Characters

Nanahoshi Shizuka

Zanoba Shirone

Elinalise Dragonroad

Cliff Grimoire

Summary

After receiving advise from the other Special Students, Nanahoshi completes her new
Magic Circle
 is able to summon a plastic bottle from her home world. With the summoning successful, Elinalise teases Nanahoshi being so close to Rudeus but then dismisses it as a joke and suggests they celebrate. Nanahoshi accepts the suggestion and as they head out, the rest of their friends join them.
