Elinalise Dragonroad
====================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

If you find a good man, you better not let him get away. You have to use your upper lips as well as your lower lips so he doesn't get away.

Elinalise, to
Roxy Migurdia
 and previously to
Zenith Greyrat

Elinalise Dragonroad
 (
エリナリーゼ・ドラゴンロード
,

Erinarīze Doragonrōdo
)
 is a former member of
Paul
's party, cursed with an affliction that forces her to regularly have sexual intercourse. Following the
Teleport Incident
, she helped
Roxy
 search for
Rudeus
' family and later joined him at the
Ranoa Magic Academy
, where she fell in love with
Cliff
 after he found a remedy for her
curse
.

Appearance






Elinalise in Volume 5



Like many of her race, Elinalise is shown to be a beautiful and youthful-looking elf of 200+ years. She often sports white-blonde hair in heavily defined ringlets. In body, she has a curvy figure with small breasts, wide hips and shapely legs. Her eyes are a light reddish-brown and she sported the signature pointy ears, customary of all elf kind. She sported black shorts and frilled stockings that ran up to the mid-thigh. In addition to this, she wore gold-colored bands around her forearms and her top was of a small red and white corset and is always seen in her battle attire with her Estoc and Buckler.

Personality

Elinalise is erotic, lustful, and carefree. She does however possess somewhat of a maiden's heart. She is aware of the reputation her promiscuity creates and is conscientious of it regarding the children and grandchildren she has - for example, she tended to be aloof towards her granddaughter Sylphiette as to keep her granddaughter from being affected by her reputation. After
Cliff
 says that he will try his hardest to remove her curse, she falls in love with him and tries to remain faithful to him as much as possible. Though he allows her to continue sleeping with other men until he creates a garment to help surpass it; afterwards, Elinalise convinces him to finally consummate their romance (having starving for him in her heart, rather than carnally like other men).

She notably never tried to seduce
Rudeus
 when they traveled; largely because of the erectile dysfunction caused by his
Eris
 trauma and hating the idea of becoming family with
Paul
. Though she did
beg
 him to stop at towns, so she could sleep around to sate her curse.

Background

She was found over 200 years ago in a Magic Crystal inside of a Labyrinth by
Perugius
. She had no memory of who she was. She was taken to a Elf town where she would eventually recover and get married. As a side effect of being in a Magic Crystal, she became cursed to need sex. The sperm of the men would fertilize the Magic Crystals inside of her. She would then give those crystals to her husband to sell. One day, while leaving the village to sell the crystals, he was robbed and killed. Five days later, she started attacking men who didn't mind having sex with her. After doing this a few times, the women of the village kicked her out. She worked as a prostitute for a while until then she became an adventurer.

She joined Paul's party
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 as a warrior. Following the departure of Paul and
Zenith
 from the party, the group was then disbanded.

Plot






Elinalise with Roxy and Tallhand heading to the Demon Continent



After the
Teleport Incident
, Elinalise accepted
Paul's
 request of finding his family without him knowing. Together with
Roxy
 and
Talhand
, they began a journey throughout the
Demon Continent
 in search of Paul's family.

After Roxy learns the location of Zenith, they part ways where Roxy and Tallhand heads to
Millishion
 to inform Paul while Elinalise finds
Rudeus
 and informs him as well. She also urges him to live his own life and joins him on his travels to the
Magic Academy
. She sees the Academy as a great place to meet men. She eventually meets and falls in love with
Cliff
.

During the wedding reception of Rudeus and
Sylphiette
, Elinalise congratulated them but she suddenly fell in tears. Sylphiette asks her if she is her grandmother which shocks Rudeus and Cliff while Elinalise tried to denies it initially, she eventually admits it and would also take turns on fulfilling Sylphiette's bodyguard duties.

After saving
Zenith
 with Rudeus, she eventually marries Cliff and has a child with him.

Power and Abilities






Elinalise tanking Tarantula Deathlords in the Anime



An experienced adventurer who was able to naturally avoid monster swarms on the way to
Begaritto
. Although her power is described as a bit low by Rudeus and
Atofe
, that's only in comparison to people like
Ghislaine
 or
Zanoba
. She is also described by Rudeus after his first quest with her as first class, suiting her S-class rank. Rudeus also thought she could "go solo" as an adventurer if she wanted. She is a skillful
Tank
 and has good aggro ability and compensates for her lack of power with magic items like her estoc that releases vacuum blades or the gladius she picked up in Lapan that releases shock-waves. She is also very agile as even Atofe compliments her on her footwork after she manages to block her counterattack.

Magic






Elinalise using Ice Smash against Manatite Hydra



Elinalise had to repeat her 3rd year because the Begaritt Labyrinth incident took her away for 6 months. She drops out after getting pregnant. Since the first two years of the
Ranoa's
 curriculum teach elementary magic in the four types of offensive magic plus detoxification and healing, it can be presumed that she is able to do at least that. She is also shown to be able to cast elementary Water Magic against Manatite Hydra.

Curse

Elinalise is afflicted with a curse inherited from being trapped in a labyrinth magic crystal. This curse causes mana to accumulate within her body, which must be crystallized through receiving a male’s sperm. If she fails to receive it, the mana bulges too dangerously within her, ultimately leading to her death. As a result, she produces a mana crystal once per month.

During pregnancy, her condition can be temporarily subsided as the mana flowed into the unborn child instead, eliminating the need for sexual intercourse to avoid death. As result, her children born inherit exceptionally high mana capacity without exception. Thanks to Cliff’s research, a magical device was devised that suppressed the curse—allowing her to go over a year without intercourse by the time Cliff graduated. Because the device requires a high amount of magic power,
Rudeus
 has to charge it himself.

Equipment

Estoc






Elinalise's equipment in the Game



Elinalise wields a thorn-like Estoc, a silver double edge straight sword with a thin blade that she uses elegant techniques matching her extravagant appearance. An Estoc is not a weapon an adventurer normally carries since it is used in duels between nobles of the
Asura Kingdom
 or used with armor in the sword city in the far north. But the Estoc that Elinalise uses is a
Magic Item
 that was found deep within a maze which is far sturdier than normal swords and with a single swing, it can fire off a vacuum that can cut down a tree several meters ahead.

Buckler






Elinalise using her Buckler to bash Manatite Hydra's head



Elinalise also uses a brown buckler with a silver cross which is also a magic item that holds the ability to soften the impact of blows it receives which makes Elinalise a formidable frontliner of her party to distract enemies.

Gladius

Elinalise cutting through an Armored Deathlord with her Gladius
Rudeus using the Gladius to release a Shock Wave upon piercing
1/2

Because of her Estoc being inconvenient against armored monsters in the
Teleportation Labyrinth
, Elinalise purchased a one handed Gladius, another Magic Item that releases a Shock Wave when it pierces something. Although the damage is not high, it can be used in an instant to send an opponent flying backwards to make some distance. Because of the ability's practical use it has a high purchase price that Elinalise paid with several magic crystals.

Achievements

Attains Rank S
Adventurer

Quotes

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

In the alternate reality where Roxy is killed by the
Human God
, after Cliff is killed, she leaves Rudeus and is never seen again, presumably to go back to being an adventurer.

It was previously observed that she carries a lot of magic crystals and by trading and selling them, she seems to never run into any financial problems. This is probably due to her curse by which she transforms sperm into magic crystals.

She laments about her past as a prostitute and promiscuousness as she believes that this may affect the opinion of others about her descendants (
Sylphy
) and that's why she tries to hide any relationship with them.

She becomes Roxy's teacher in sexual techniques, something that bothered Sylphy since Elinalise never wanted to teach her anything.

Despite the fact that Cliff managed to create an artifact (panties) that stops the curse for up to a year, her libido doesn't drop, requesting that Cliff fulfill his marital duties daily. Possibly due to her body having grown used to being carnally hungry for so many years.

It is implied that her true identity might be Laplace's servant Rostelina, who was sealed in a magic crystal to condition her into a vessel that could resupply
Orsted
 with mana
.

Elinalise Dragonroad/Relationships
==================================

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Family

Cliff Grimoire

Elinalise and Cliff in the Anime
Rudeus introducing Cliff to Elinalise
Cliff telling Elinalise they will get married
Elinalise returning to Cliff after her journey from Rapan
Elinalise and Cliff's wedding in the Light Novel
1/5

Cliff Grimoire is Elinalise's love interest and later her husband who calls her Lise. On their first meeting, Elinalise is reluctant to accept his feelings but agreed to give him a chance and explain her situation as suggested by Rudeus. They begin dating after Cliff resolves to remove the
curse
 afflicting her.

When Elinalise decides to go to
Rapan
 to assist Paul in rescuing Zenith, she initially plans to leave Cliff but when Cliff tells her that they will get married with a
Milis Religion Wedding Ceremony
 when she returns and gives her a prototype of the
Curse Supressing Tool
 for her journey. Elinalise is so touched by this that she happily accepts in tears.
 Since then, Elinalise became devoted and truly loves Cliff that she is proud to tell Paul how great Cliff is.

Clive Grimoire

Her son between her and Cliff

Laws

A son between her and a unknown man.

Sylphiette Greyrat





Elinalise and Sylphiette in the Anime



Sylphiette is Elinalise's granddaughter on behalf of her son Laws while she considers herself distant from her family due to her curse. Laws actually told Sylphiette who her grandmother is and her past. During Sylphiette's wedding Elinalise tries to congratulate Sylphiette and Rudeus but is overcome with emotions to which Sylphiette asks her if she is her grandmother. Elinalise tried to deny this but she is already in tears but after talking it over
, they are able to reconcile and are in good terms that Elinalise would occasionally takeover Sylphiette's bodyguard duty.

Lucy Greyrat

Her great-granddaughter on behalf of her granddaughter Sylphiette

Friends

Roxy M. Greyrat

Her friend.

Paul Greyrat





Elinalise meeting with Paul in Rapan



Elinalise and Paul are members of the
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 Party until they disbanded where the fallout causes Elinalise to avoid seeing Paul as much as possible
 and while she initially does not want Paul to become his "son" that she avoids seducing Rudeus, she willingly accepts this for the sake of Rudeus and Sylphiette when they got married.
 When Elinalise meets with Paul, she accepts his apology and later tells Paul that she considers him, to be her son that shocks Paul when he finds out that Sylphiette is Elinalise's grand daughter.

Mushoku Tensei Sequel

Elinalise's mysterious past is one of the story threats that remained unresolved by the end of the Mushoku Tensei. Because of this, and her being from one of the older-lived races, she might reappear in the planned sequel series.

Emergency Family Meeting
========================

Emergency Family Meeting
 (緊急家族会議
Kinkyū Kazoku Kaigi
) is the fourth episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on January 31, 2021.

Synopsis

The Greyrat family is overjoyed when Zenith announces that she's pregnant with a second child, but the mood takes a dour turn when Lilia reveals that she is also pregnant and Paul is the father. Will this be the end of Rudy's happy family?

Plot

The Greyrat family is at joy when they learn that Zenith is pregnant again but their happiness is cut short when their maid Lilia reveals that she is also pregnant after having an affair with Paul. To protect Lilia from Zenith's wrath, Rudeus convinces his mother to forgive her by having Paul take all the blame for the incident, despite realizing that she was the one who seduced him, which earns him Lilia's gratitude and loyalty. Zenith and Lilia give birth to two girls, called Norn and Aisha respectively and Rudeus considers leaving to study at the Ronoa Magic Academy after recieving a letter from Roxy, but Sylphiette does not want to part ways with him and he decides to look for a job to pay for their tuition. However, certain that Rudeus' attachment to Sylphiette is hindering his growth, his parents decide to separate them by entrusting their son to an old friend of the family, the beast woman Ghislayne who leaves the village with him.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Paul Greyrat

Zenith Greyrat

Lilia Greyrat

Sylphiette

Norn Greyrat

Aisha Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Roxy Migurdia

Pax Shirone

Locations

Buena Village

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 1

Chapter 9: Emergency Family Meeting

Chapter 2: The Creeped-Out Maid

Chapter 10: Stunted Growth

Chapter 11: Parted

Differences with the light novel:

A short scene where Rudeus tells the truth to his mother about his previous lies about Lilia and Paul was cut.

Part of the Lilia past, when she was a Royal maid was cut.

A short scene where Rudeus help in the birth of Aisha and Norn was cut

A short scene where Paul show how are real fights with monsters to Rudeus was cut

A short scene that explain what are the labyrinths, magic items and magical implements was cut

In the Light novel, Rudeus is teaching magic to Sylphie in his room.

Paul enter to Rudeus room with the letter from Roxy after Rudeus decides to stay with Sylphie

A short PoV that shows Paul thoughts about Rudeus wish to go to Ranoa with Sylphy, how Laws and Paul see how Sylphy was attached to Rudeus and when Paul decides to send a letter was cut.

In the light novel Ghislaine arrive with the carriage after the battle between Paul and Rudeus, meanwhile in the anime is before the battle.

Rudy gets his wish for a little sister times 2.

The affair was largely due to her and Paul being childhood friends, giving the excuse of them being comfortable with each other; otherwise Paul had been faithful to his wife, ignoring the other women in the village.

Ending Theme 1
==============

Only
 (オンリー
Onrī
) is the first ending theme song of the
Mushoku Tensei anime adaptation
 performed by Yuiko Ōhara. It was released as a digital single on the second episode's broadcast day on January 17, 2021.

The song was not used for
Episode 1
's end-credits, it had its official debut as the ending theme song from
Episode 2
.

Ending Theme 2
==============

Kaze to Iku Michi
 (風と行く道 lit. "The Way to Go With the Wind") is the second ending theme song of the
Mushoku Tensei anime adaptation
 performed by Yuiko Ōhara.

Lyrics

Romaji
English

Ano hi no you ni ichibanboshi ni negau kaeri no michi

Tadaima no nochi no kūhaku o

Natsukashisa no nokoru kono keshiki ni takushite

Dakarakoso bokura wa motto tsuyoku nareru

Michi no nai michi o koete donna iro no sora mo

Itsuka wa utsukushiku naru koto o shitta

Kaettekita me o tojireba

I came home

Ending Theme 7
==============

Tsubasa
 ( ツバサ, lit. "Wings") is the seventh ending theme song of the
Mushoku Tensei anime adaptation
 performed by Shion Wakayama,
Nanahoshi Shizuka
's voice actor. It is a cover from the song "Tsubasa", sung by
Under Graph
 in 2004. It is only used in
Episode 39.

In April 21, 2024, the Mushoku Tensei official X handle: @mushokutensei_A also announced the use of the song in the
Afar
 episode with the screenshot of Nanahoshi singing.

Lyrics

Romaji
English

Videos

Trivia

The song was first heard in
Episode 33
, when Nanahoshi crooned its melody.

Entering the Labyrinth
======================

This article is about the 102nd Manga Chapter. For the Season 2 Episode 20 Anime , see
Into the Labyrinth
.

Entering the Labyrinth
 is the 102nd chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Paul Greyrat

Zenith Greyrat

Roxy Migurdia

Summary

Rudeus, Paul, Elinalise, Geese and Talhand enters the Teleportation Labyrinth where Geese reminds Rudeus on the
Roles
 of each party member while Talhand reminds him not to use Fire Magic to avoid consuming the oxygen. With the Geese leading through the labyrinth with the "An Exploratory Account of the Teleportation Labyrinth" Book to guide them, they manage to easily go beyond the 1st and 2nd floor. But when they reach the 3rd floor, Rudeus can sense Roxy...

Appearances

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Elinalise Dragonroad

Geese Nukadia

Paul Greyrat

Eris
====

Redirect to:
Eris Boreas Greyrat

Eris's Depression
=================

Eris's Depression
 (
エリスの憂鬱
,

Erisu no Yūutsu
)
 is the tenth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Summary

After Rudeus informs Ghislaine of his idea for a day off from studies, the two escort Eris on a shopping spree in town the next day. Still needing to explain the need for reprieve, Ghislaine still can't understand Eris was just gaining stress from continuous studies. While Rudeus also advises Ghislaine take a break, he's happy that he too can have a day off. Later, Rudeus was planning to do some independent reading, but saw Eris running off during an etiquette lesson with Miss Edna, which lead to her pleading Rudeus to encourage Eris take in her studies.

Finding her in a stable, she kicks him in the head and tells him she refuses to continue being forced into scenarios she doesn't feel comfortable with. Hearing her words, and remembering his brothers in his old life, Rudeus shares how he once gave up on things midway and regretted the choice. So he advises that she continue, so that she'll feel a sense of accomplishment having done so in hindsight. Once she sees his point, Rudeus asks she return to her dance lessons- while positioned directly atop her. Kicking him off her, she agrees to go back to her dance lessons and demands Rudeus accompany her.

There, while Rudeus does superb, he figures out a trick to help her step to the rhythm of the dancing. With a blindfold and using claps, he has her mimic feint maneuvers like her lessons with Ghislaine, saying go as the "feint" and the claps being the "attacks". With that, Eris flawlessly danced, and Rudeus reminds her that she can incorporate lessons from subject into another. When Edna inquires how Rudeus reached his solution, his explanation of sword arts using dance astounds her and Rudeus discovers this world has no sword dancing arts. Earning praise from Edna, Eris also voices her amazement at Rudeus's ability, with them looking forward to Eris dancing at her 10th birthday celebration. At the celebration, Rudeus is among the crowd and is impressed by Eris's arrival,

Appearances

Template:JuvenileP

Eris Boreas Greyrat
===================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Chronology

Powers and Abilities

Relationships

Gallery

As expected of Rudeus.

— Eris, on several occasions

Eris Greyrat
 (
エリス・グレイラット
,

Erisu Gureiratto
)
, born
Eris Boreas Greyrat
 (
エリス・ボレアス・グレイラット
,

Erisu Boreasu Gureiratto
)
, is a noble girl and second cousin of
Rudeus
. She is a Character with a short temper but has potential in the
Sword God Style
.
 During her journey to return home following the
Teleport Incident
, she grows to love Rudeus.

Appearance

She is pointed to be beautiful with long red hair, red eyes and nice figure. She also has swords around her waist on both the left and right sides.

At the end of the Decisive Battle Chapter, she has streaks of white in her hair due to
mana
 strain.

Personality

Upon meeting Rudeus, Eris was contemptuous, impulsive, defiant, and condescending; she is also short tempered and prone to violent outbursts. It's implied that her attitude is a direct influence of her grandfather,
Sauros
.

During her time with Rudeus, she still maintains her violent tendencies but has greatly changed after her tenth birthday and will resort to violence to anyone who holds negative emotions and/or intentions against Rudeus. However, despite the outer aggressiveness, Eris also has a high level of shyness, often hitting Rudeus for touching her suddenly even though she does the same to him. She and Rudeus have a mutual inferiority complex where both would assume the other is more wonderful than themselves, easily leading to misunderstandings which also causes her to leave Rudeus to go train in the Holy Land of Swords to be on equal standing with Rudeus.

During her time on the Holy Land of Swords, Eris became taciturn and uncaring as she obsessively trains to become stronger while recalling the memories of her defeat from
Orsted
 and the sight of Rudeus in a near dead state. She also does not interact nor talk with with almost anyone unless its a topic about Rudeus until she trains together with
Nina
 and
Isolte Cruel
.

Eris gets excited easily on seeing things she have never seen before like the Migurd Village houses that uses giant turtle shells as roof tops in the
Demon Continent
.
 When Eris enters the Chaos Breaker, she raises her voice in amazement upon seeing how small the village is from the sky causing
Sylvaril
 to take an immediate liking to her upon seeing Eris' carefree smile and offers to guide her around the castle.

Originally, she had a tendency to constantly release blood lust, but she later controls it after years of training at the Holy Land of Swords. She is named the 'Mad Dog' or Mad Sword King due to her personality of bearing fangs at anyone for a period of time and is noted to be 'free'. She also has a high libido (she beat Rudeus in bed), often attacking Rudeus but it was later toned down after aging.

Background

Her full name is Eris Boreas Greyrat. The Boreas was one of the great noble families in the
Asura Kingdom
 who rules the
Fittoa Region
. Her behavior prior to meeting Rudeus was uncontrollable and violent. She was considered a failure as a noble. After the Teleport Incident, she was accompanied by Rudeus and
Ruijerd
 on her way to the
Central Continent
. Sometime after starting her training in the Holy Land of Swords she relinquished her Boreas name.

Back then, her biggest influences were
Sauros Boreas Greyrat
 and
Ghislaine Dedoldia
. Her family was also known to have a beast race fetish.






Eris meeting Gal in the Holy Land of Swords



When Eris arrives at the Holy Land of Swords,
Gal
 took interest in her potential in the sword to cut down Orsted, a dream he also shares despite Eris calling him a small fry that Gal laughs off in amusement. After defeating
Jino Britts
 and Nina, Eris fights Gal and gets immediately knocked back by Gal's
Battle Aura
 causing her body to fly outside, smashing
down the gate in the process, and smacked into a pile of snow. Gal then tells Ghislaine to tend to Eris' wounds and bestows her with Saint Rank of the
Sword God Style
 and personally foresee her training.






Eris training in the Manga



For the next six months, Eris trains and swings her sword on a peninsula located north of the dojo that she found after an hour of walking to avoid interference from other students. During this time, Gal's instructs her to keep swing her sword until she gets tired, sit and think while resting and when she is tired of resting go back to swing her sword. Otherwise she eats when she's hungry and go back to her room to sleep when she is sleepy.






Eris releasing her bloodlust and attacks Auber



One day after returning from her sword practice,
Auber Corvette
 is standing in her way to the dojo and she tells him to move before Auber can finish his sentence eventually causing Eris to release a huge amount of bloodlust and a fight ensues. Despite losing her sword during their fight, Eris continues to attack causing Auber to get a chill on his spine and realizes he needs to kill this beast to stop her, but Gal stops the fight. Eris collapses on the snow breathing heavily and frustrated, and then Auber mentions to Gal that it is his first time meeting such a serious swordsman and realizes she is the Mad Dog that Gal mentioned. Eris stands up swaying like a ghost causing Auber to ready his sword upon seeing this, but Eris just glares at him and returns to her room to rest. One year later, Eris becomes a North Saint with Auber's training.

Achievements

This is the current achievement that Eris gained through her adventure, action, and training:

Sword King

North Saint

Elementary Fire Magic

Defeated
Gal Farion
 with Ruijerd's help

Defeated North Emperor
Auber Corvette
 with Rudeus and Ghislaine

Defeated North King Twin Swords
Knuckle Guard

A ranked Adventurer

Chopped off Dragon God
Orsted
's arm

Quotes

Orsted:
 "Eris Boreas Greyrat, huh? Is he that important to you? Someone who isn't Luke."

Eris:
 ".....Luke?"

Orsted:
 "The man fated to become your husband."

Eris:
 "I don't know anything about that."

Orsted:
 "It seems so."

Eris:
 "I'm fine with waiting. I'll attack together with Rudeus."

Orsted:
 "... That's surprising. Eris Boreas Greyrat will fight together with her companions. Is this also a part of your madness? Certainly, if Eris Boreas Greyrat held a little more judgement, if she were to study under a suitable master, I see... So this is what happens?"

Eris:
 "I'm no longer a part of Boreas. It's just Eris Greyrat."

Orsted:
 "The Eris I know, is a different person, is she..."

Aisha:
 "Huh, but, Eris-ane is the one wearing red."

Eris:
 "What, you don't want to match with me?!"

Aisha:
 "No, that's not it. I shouldn't attract that much attention because I'm an assistant. Shouldn't Eris-ane stand out more?"

Eris:
 "You're not an assistant! As my younger sister, wear something good!"

Eris to Atofe:
 "Get away."

Atofe:
 "Who the hell are you?"

Eris:
 "Eris Greyrat."

Eris:
 "Fight me! Demon Lord Atofe, get down here!"

Eris:
 "Rudeus, catch Lucy for me. She hates baths. Even though earlier she said that she needs to take a bath since she was sweating during sword practice." I caught Lucy. Sorry, Lucy. However, you need to take a bath after exercising.

Lucy:
 "I don't wanna! Red-mama's violent!"

Rudeus:
 "Violent? Eris… Hitting me is one thing, but you shouldn't hit children."

Eris:
 "How rude, I don't hit her! I'm just a little… bad at washing hair." So that's it. When I look at Lucy, she puffed out her cheeks and grumbled,

Lucy:
 "Yeah, when Red-mama washes my hair, stuff gets in my eyes and it hurts."

Trivia

Eris is the Goddess of War in the religion Rudeus has created. A wooden sword is currently taking the place as her symbol and is enshrined in the basement.

Eris name possibly comes from Greek mythology that is the Greek
goddess of chaos, strife, and discord
. Her name is the equivalent of Latin
Discordia
, which means "discord". Eris's Greek opposite is
Harmonia
, whose Latin counterpart is
Concordia
. Homer equated her with the war-goddess
Enyo
, whose Roman counterpart is
Bellona
. The dwarf planet Eris is named after the goddess, as is the religion Discordianism. Other names also come from Greek mythology like Anemoi, Boreas, Zephyrus.

When Eris left Rudeus after their first time together, she left her panties and stole a pair of Rudeus' underwear. While in his depression-like state, Rudeus threw Eris' panties into a heating stove.

In some previous loops where Rudeus didn't exist,
Luke
 courts Eris and eventually the pair get married. In that timeline, Eris only has the potential of Sword Saint.

In Orsted's previous loops, Eris is known as Red Lion instead of Mad Dog/Mad Sword King who also the second person needed for
Ariel Anemoi Asura
 to become queen and along with Luke as her bodyguard would fight off numerous assassination attempts on Ariel and paving the way for Ariel's ascent to the
Asura Kingdom
's queen.

Like
Paul Greyrat
, Eris is the second character in the story to relinquish her name and nobility status.

Rudeus once referred to her as his Husband when he thought
Zanoba
 might be confessing to him because in their relationship, Eris is the more sexually aggressive one and she made him feel like a maiden in love. While he gives arm pillows to his other wives, he would get one from Eris.

Eris became the husband after she defeated Rudeus in bed on their first wedding night. Rudeus dominated the battle until his physique allowed it but Eris' stamina overcame him and he accepted his defeat happily at the end.

Eris considers that she is only good at 2 things: with the sword and at sex.

While Rudeus has a Harem consisting of his wives, Rudeus considers himself a part of Eris' Harem, which consists of himself along with
Linia
 and
Pursena
.

Even though Eris is quite wild in bed she is very shy about showing this to other people. Rudeus suffered a lot to convince her to do a foursome.

Like all who have descended from the Boreas Greyrat Household, Eris has inherited a love for Beast Girls. In addition, she also is fond of dogs and cats, possibly an extension to the inherited trait.

Despite being very jealous even with Rudeus' other wives, she has no problem with Rudeus sleeping with a slave (Linia), due to the teachings of her family although Rudeus refused Eris' offer to sleep with Linia since he considers it a betrayal of his wives.

Even though she learned language, math, science, and etiquette in her childhood, she forgot all of them later on and can only read easier words.

Out of all of Rudeus's wives, Eris is the only one with large breasts. Because his other wives all had very small breasts, she and many others mistakenly assumed he only liked small breasts.

Eris dies at the age of 74. Despite her age, she was still training very energetically, one day after her morning run and after practicing with her sword, she returned home tired and collapsed in bed, then passed away from old age.

Eris Boreas Greyrat/Chronology
==============================

SPOILER ALERT!

This page contains
spoilers!
  Read at your own risk.

Information

Chronology

Powers and Abilities

Relationships

Gallery

Volume 2 - Juvenile Period - Home Teacher Chapter

She is introduced as an impulsive and violent character. Initially, Eris didn't have any respect nor did she want to be tutored by
Rudeus
. Eris had problems with the fact that Rudeus was younger than her, and thus Rudeus had to resort to a different tactic to convince her.

Rudeus' plan was to kidnap Eris, and to show her the benefits of knowing magic, reading, and math throughout the kidnapping but due to unforeseen issues the plan derailed. They were kidnapped by men who were planning to sell them off, but Rudeus was able to thwart their plans and save both of them.

Seeing Rudeus' magic, Eris was inspired to learn and accept him as her tutor. Later under the guidance of Rudeus, she manages to somehow control herself a bit, and she was able to pick up many different skills and improve her magic. Though her magic is no where near Rudeus, her swordsmanship is much better than his.

Volume 3 - Juvenile Period - Adventurer Chapter

She was teleported together with Rudeus to
Demon Continent
 and becomes an adventurer and a member of party
Dead End
. She trains with
Ruijerd
 to become stronger.

She is seen to often take the vanguard along with Ruijerd in fights with magical creatures, constantly improving herself. At the start, she hardly picks fight because she didn't understand that people were insulting her.

Volume 4 - Juvenile Period - Voyage Chapter





Volume 4 appearance



For the first time in her life made friends other than Rudeus in Dorudia Village.

Volume 5 - Juvenile Period - Reunion Chapter

She went to subjugate goblins by herself, but
Cliff
 came along with her. She then compared him to Rudeus and told him he is no good. Later she fought off some assassins and killed a human being for the first time in her life. Later upon returning to the inn where they were staying she found Rudeus in a depressed state and comforted him after his fight with his father. Seeing this Eris committed herself to kill
Paul Greyrat
, however Ruijerd stopped her.

Volume 6 - Juvenile Period - Homecoming Chapter

She fought against
Orsted
 and lost without even landing a single hit. Later she found out that her family died. In her depressed state , she told Rudeus her birthday wish is for him to be her family, after that she lost her virginity to him and then she left to train herself in art of sword.
In this Volume her thoughts about Rudeus were revealed as well.

Volume 8 - Youth Period - Special Student Chapter

She appeared briefly in the extra chapter, which described her debut in Holy Land of Swords as well as the introduction of her rival,
Nina
.

She was seen as 'dangerous' from the start due to her constant bloodlust release and seemingly savage. She is also the reason for Nina no longer being complacent as she poses as a huge threat against her.

Volume 11 - Youth Period - Younger Sister Chapter

Eris appears in the volume's extra chapter, briefly describing her training routines based around the goal of defeating the Dragon God Orsted. She trains everyday swinging and honing her sword and while coming back from training she encounters
Auber
. Auber stands in the way of Eris and asks her if she could pass a message to
Gul Farion
, which she ignores and demands that he stands aside. Feeling that Eris is releasing a lot of killing intent similar to one of a wild beast, Auber unsheathes his sword and the two duels. Eris is barely able to keep up and the battle started to heat up to a death battle until Gal Farion intervened. Auber is then introduced and starts trains Eris.

Volume 13 - Youth Period - Labyrinth Chapter

Eris appears in the volume's extra chapter where
Reida
 and her disciple, Isolte, show up as requested by Gal Farion to train Eris. Eris, Nina, and Isolte starts to train together to overcome their weaknesses and learn about the other sword styles. She trains to counter Isolte's Water God Style, which is her weakness as well as Orsted's main sword style.

Volume 14 - Young Man Period - Everyday Chapter

After a duel with the other Sword King Candidates, Eris is named as the new Sword King and was allowed to receive one of the swords from her shishou. Sword God give her the proof of mastery (this was a title that neither the two Sword Emperors, nor
Ghyslaine
 had been given).

Volume 15 - Young Man Period - Human God Chapter

After she receives
Rudeus
' letter she immediately traveled to Sharia to meet him. Arriving at his house she met with
Aisha
,
Lilia
,
Sylphy
,
Roxy
, and
Norn
. When she learned that Rudeus has already left to fight Orsted, she remembered the reason why she trained in order to stand beside him, and came to aid him. When Eris arrived, she saw Rudeus badly injured and Orsted hurt with his weapon unsheathed. Eris is initially impressed about what Rudeus was able to accomplish simply by himself, and is able to impress even Orsted. Knowing that this is one enemy that they cannot beat, she then urges Roxy and Slyphy to escape with Rudeus. Seeing all of this, Orsted makes Rudeus a deal which Eris initially disproved of, but he still accepted.

In the aftermaths of the battle, Eris stays around the house and there was an awkward tension between her and Rudeus. After prodding from Roxy, Eris confronts Rudeus on the current relationship status he has with his other wives and declares that she still loves him. Eris then challenges him to a duel to decide if she could also be loved as well, which Rudeus submits and declares that he still harbored feelings for her and proposes to her, to which she agrees. They consummate their marriage right that night.

Volume 23 - Young Man Period - Decisive Battle Chapter

Eris Boreas Greyrat/Powers and Abilities
========================================

Information

Chronology

Powers and Abilities

Relationships

Gallery

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Physical Abilities





Eris battling assassins in the Anime



Rudeus considers Eris a prodigy in terms of raw talent. Through out her life, Eris is trained by prominent people in the sword, mainly in the Sword God Style by
Ghislaine
 in her youth, by
Ruijerd Superdia
 after the
Teleport Incident
 and in North God and Water God Styles during her time at the Holy Land of Swords. Because of this, Eris possess physical prowess, speed and endurance capable of fighting multiple enemies regardless of their swordsmanship rank. Eris is also very nimble and agile, being able to do acrobatic moves and jump at heights twice or more then her height which makes her an unpredictable enemy on where she can attack.

Sword God Style





Longsword of Silence



Sword God Gal Farion took interest in training Eris after hearing her intent to cut down the Dragon God, a dream that they both share. After completing her training in the Holy Land of Swords, Eris has attained Sword King rank. When she became Sword King, Gal Farion offered her the chance to challenge him to become Sword God, an opportunity that not even Ghislaine was given when she first became Sword King. Eris' talent was so greatly recognized by Gal Farion that if Eris actually wished to, Gal Farion would have allowed her to become Sword Emperor by fighting Ghislaine who was also a Sword King. Eris declined, but in recognition of her skill, she was awarded "Sword Mastery" -- a title that had never been bestowed to the current Sword Emperors and Sword Kings.

North God Style

On her first few years in the Holy Land of Swords, Eris is trained by
Auber Corvette
 the North Emperor in the North God Style. After one year, Eris reached the rank of North Saint.

Superd Bloodlust Technique






Eris releasing Bloodlust in the Manga



Ruijerd taught Eris a high-level
Superd
 technique to unleash her bloodlust (also known as killing intent) like using her gaze to provoke her opponents. This release of bloodlust caused her opponent to sense violent emotions as if they are encountering a monster on the roadside when they see Eris, which causes even
Reida Reia
 to have goosebumps on their first meeting and almost reflexively draw her sword which is unusual for a Water God Style user to attack first.

Presence Search






Eris searching for the presence of other adventurers



Ruijerd also taught Eris how to search for the presence of others by staying still which allows her to perceive sound, her surroundings and even the flow of
Mana
. Eris practices this everyday that she is able to sense even the faintly audible sound of weapons clashing from afar.

Magic Abilities

Beginner Magic

She reached beginner level magic after being taught by Rudeus. She can conjure fire, appeared to be used to burn Gal Farion after she defeated him.

Equipment

Nameless Sword


https://mushokutensei.fandom.com/wiki/File:MT-AN-S1-E09-GIF-01.webm



Eris' first sword



A
sword
 made by Yulian Jalisco that doesn't lose it's edge. Rudeus received it from
Rowin Migurdia
 in Volume 3 as a thanks for telling him of
Roxy
's whereabouts which he then gives to Eris. The sword is a single edge falchion with a curved blade where the edge side is vastly wider than the back side and has two red ornaments on its blade ridge. The blade is also attached to both ends of the cross guard and has a knuckle bow. She fights with it using forward grip style and sheathes it horizontally behind her waist.

Phoenix Elegant Dragon Sword






Phoenix Elegant Dragon Sword in the Light Novel



Dragon Emperor made and gave this
sword
 to the first Sword God. It has the ability to nullify, or weaken (e.g. for strong opponents such as
Orsted
),
Battle Aura
. Eris received it from
Gal Farion
, the current Sword God, in volume 16 as a gift for being titled Sword King and the need of having a longer sword.

Yubi Ori [Prominent]






Prominent in the Light Novel



Yubi Ori or Prominent is a
sword
 made by Yulian Jalisco, one of the 48 demon swords.
Rudeus
 received it from
Orsted
 which he gave to Eris and is sheathed at the right side of her waist. It is worth about 100,000 Asura gold coins supposed to be for funding Rudeus' missions as Orsted's subordinate but was unable to sell it due to difficulty on finding a buyer at a short time.

References

Eris Boreas Greyrat/Relationships
=================================

Information

Chronology

Powers and Abilities

Relationships

Gallery

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Family

Sauros Boreas Greyrat





Sauros praising Eris and Rudeus in the Anime



Sauros is Eris' grandfather who Eris first imitates from his manners of speaking loudly and even resorting to violence. When Rudeus first meets Eris, Sauros is among the few people Eris likes and obeys while Sauros in turn spoils her and grants her requests no matter how unreasonable it is. After seeing how Eris has changed under Rudeus' guidance, Sauros grants Eris' request who has not made any unreasonable request in a while to have the
Aqua Heartia
 created to be Rudeus' present for his 10th birthday.

Rudeus Greyrat

Rudeus using X-Healing on Eris
Eris and Rudeus escaping captivity in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus training in Swordsmanship in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus dancing together in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus during the Teleport Incident
Eris and Rudeus in the Demon Continent
Eris consoling Rudeus in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus spending the night together
1/8

Rudeus is Eris' childhood teacher and later husband. In
Volume 2
, he taught her arithmetic, beginner level fire magic, and reading and writing. Eris is initially hostile to Rudeus and would also be violent towards him but throughout the duration of their time spent together in the
Citadel of Roa
, Eris would become less feral and warm up to
Rudeus
. After Eris' 10th birthday, Eris is able to successfully complete dancing through Rudeus' method and would openly praise him and also imitate his manners which also noticed by Eris' family that
Philip Boreas Greyrat
, sends a letter to
Paul Greyrat
 for an arranged marriage between them
 and Eris would later arrange a party for Rudeus' 10th birthday.

After the
Teleport Incident
, Rudeus and Eris are teleported to the
Demon Continent
 and begins to travel with
Ruijerd
 where they established the
Dead End
 party but deep down inside, she is afraid that Rudeus might abandon her so she strives to become stronger and the two get closer but this fear still lingers throughout their journey. Around this time, she developed a close bond with Rudeus and even developed romantic feelings for him and believes that as long as she is with Rudeus, they can do anything and everything will be alright.

But after
Orsted defeats their party effortlessly
, and witnessing Rudeus nearly die before her, she developed an inferiority complex from feeling helpless until they return to Roa where she learns that Sauros, Philip and Hilda have died and the remaining Boreas Family refuses to adopt her. Feeling Rudeus is all she have left, she spent the night with Rudeus and lost her virginity but realizes afterwards that she must become strong wants to stand beside Rudeus as equals and asks Ghislaine to bring her to the
Holy Land of Swords
 to train in the Sword God Style while the memory of feeling helpless as Rudeus nearly died still in her mind as she trains to cut down Orsted and hopes that she will meet Rudeus again. Her sudden departure caused a big misunderstanding between the two in which he thought that Eris left him due to his subpar bed skills. It led to his severe depression and impotence until he was cured by to
Sylphiette
's "comforting" actions.

Eventually, Rudeus met his
future self
, who warned him about the murderous tragedy that would befall on everyone he cared about, including his families and Eris. Future Rudeus gave his diary to Rudeus, which allowed Rudeus to send Eris a letter in this timeline. Future Rudeus advised Rudeus to be careful and to not expose
Hitogami
's true intentions to his allies. Rudeus sent Eris a letter expressing that he was receptive with accepting Eris into his family, and that he was going to challenge Orsted. The result was that Orsted joined Rudeus's side to fight against Hitogami in the future. Eris would eventually get the letter and come to his aid. After the battle, in which Rudeus lost: they would get married and Eris would have two children,
Ars Greyrat
 and
Christina Greyrat.

After getting married, Eris continues to accompany Rudeus as his bodyguard while doing missions for Orsted except when she is pregnant. When Rudeus fondles her breasts, she would occasionally punch him in the face and when it comes to raising children, Eris would usually discipline them while Rudeus will simply talk to them when they misbehave.

Paul Greyrat





Eris angry at Paul in the Anime



Paul:"What's this Rudi, hiding behind a woman, you've become quite the lady-killer haven't you?"
Eris:"Rudeus isn't hiding behind me! I'm hiding Rudeus! From a worthless father!"

After the reunion of Rudeus and Paul at
Millishion
 resulting with Rudeus being depressed, Eris is angry at Paul when she is told what happened. When Paul visits Rudeus again, Eris stops him from approaching and is about to attack Paul until Ruijerd stops her and brings her out of the inn.
 Paul later gives the money of 20 Royal Notes (1 million Yen) to Rudeus given by the
Boreas Family
 to search for missing members like Eris so he can bring Eris back to the
Citadel of Roa
. Paul also reveals that Philip plans that Rudeus will be married into the Boreas Family with Eris as his wife prior to the Teleport Incident.

Ars Greyrat

Ars is Eris' first son with Rudeus. He was born longer or less than 10 days before Rudeus came back from Shrione. His appearance resembles Eris, with the same red hair and green eyes. Like any other greyrat male, he is perverted like his father who likes pretty girls.

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Christina Greyrat

The second daughter with Rudeus.

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Friends

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Eris and Ghislaine in the Anime
Eris and Ghislaine sparring in the Anime
Eris reuniting with Ghislaine
1/3

Ghislaine is Eris' teacher in the
Sword God Style
 since she was 5 years old. Eris is initially hostile to Ghislaine and their first sword lesson is what Ghislaine describes as "painful love" that Eris barely able to walk then tries to attack Ghislaine with a wooden sword at night but was unable to get her revenge. Eris became obedient towards Ghislaine but still waiting for revenge for months but they eventually grew closer since they have the same behavior in their childhood.

Ruijerd Superdia

Eris meeting Ruijerd in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus travelling together with Ruijerd
Eris and Ruijerd sparring in the Anime
Ruijerd watching over Eris while in Millishion
Ruijerd greeting Eris after her mission
Eris in tears when Ruijerd is leaving them
1/6

Ruijerd is Eris' mentor and friend. On their first meeting, Ruijerd rescues Eris and Rudeus who is teleported to the
Demon Continent
 in the aftermath of the
Teleport Incident
 where Eris is frightened to tears of Ruijerd due to stories being told about the
Superd Tribe
 during her childhood.
 After learning that these stories were not true, they got along well with the encourgement of Rudeus despite the awkward start since Ruijerd does not talk much. During their journey, Ruijerd trains with Eris who acknowledges him to be her teacher in combat after Ghislaine and Ruijerd later recognizes her as a
Warrior
.

Nina Farion

Rival in the Holy land of Sword, they hated each other at first but when they got older, they became friends.

Isolte Cruel

Rival to Eris and Nina; brought in by
Gal Farion
 to train the two against
Water-God Style
. They have friendly relations and have no hostile intentions towards each other.

Lineana Dedoldia

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Minitona Dedoldia

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Pursena Adoldia

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Tersena Adoldia

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Others

Auber Corvette

Eris and Auber sparring in the Manga
Eris and Auber in the Light Novel
1/2

Auber Corvette is Eris' trainer in the
North God Style
 which Eris took 1 year to become a North Saint. Eris first meets Auber at the front of the Sword God Style Dojo where it immediately turned to a fight and both are ready to kill each other until Gal stops them.

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Gal Farion

Her Second master in the
Sword God Style
.

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Luke Notos Greyrat

Her husband in the original timeline.

"Note: This section is under construction and revision."

Orsted

She holds hatred for him due to Rudeus being beaten twice by him, but her murderous urges are stopped by Rudeus mostly due to Orsted becoming an ally.

References

Eris Gaiden Manga Chapter 1
===========================

Eris Gaiden Manga Chapter 1
 is the 1st chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei
 Eris Seriously Sharpen her Fangs
manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Orsted

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Gal Farion

Nina Farion

Isolte Cruel

Reida Reia

Jino Britts

Auber Corvette

Summary

Eris wakes up from a nightmare of Rudeus nearly dying at the hands of Orsted that she had been having repeatedly. Ghislaine takes Eris to the Holy Land of Swords and they meet with Sword God Gal Farion who is amused by Eris' desire to cut down the Dragon God and tests her sword skills by having her do a mock duel with Jino then Nina.

Appearances

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat
 (Flashback)

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Orsted
 (Flashback)

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Gal Farion

Nina Farion

Jino Britts

Skills

None

Regions

Central Continent

Holy Land of Swords

Space of the Present

Monsters

None

Differences from Light Novel

Eris meeting with Gal Farion and becoming his student follows the events of the Light Novel but the rest such as the journey to the Holy Land of Swords and Ghislaine and Eris' talk after the battle are original stories of the manga.

Original scene with Ghislaine and Eris talking before arriving at the sanctuary, where they explore Eris' goal of defeating Orsted and protecting Rudeus.

Original scene with Ghislaine treating Eris' wounds after her confrontation with Gal Farion, much of their conversation is seen during her internal monologue in volume 6 of the light novels before leaving Rudeus.

The remaining events on the Light Novel such as Nina trying to capture Rudeus is covered in the
Nina Farion Arc
.

Eris Gaiden Manga Chapter 2
===========================

Eris Gaiden Manga Chapter 2
 is the 2nd chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei
 Eris Seriously Sharpen her Fangs
manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Summary

Eris begins her training with Gal Farion but she struggles to master the
Sword God Style
's Longsword of Light. Seeing no progress in their training, Gal stops the training and tells her to go play but Eris heads to town instead.

Monsters

Goblins

Hobgoblin

Differences from Light Novel

Original manga chapter

Trivia

Original chapter that narrates a small adventure of Eris rescuing a girl kidnapped by Gobling.

In volume 20 of the light novel, it is made clear that Goblin-like moustros reside on the continent of Milis, but the manga shows how some live on the continent of central, a small mistake of the Spin Off.  During the same volume Rudeus has an internal monologue about how Goblins would possibly be considered demons because of their primitive life, if they lived in the central continent.

Eris Gaiden Manga Chapter 3
===========================

Eris Gaiden Manga Chapter 3
 is the 3rd chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei
 Eris Seriously Sharpen her Fangs
manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Summary

Gal Farion is reading a letter and gets angry then cramples and throws the paper near Eris who tells him off while she throws the letter to the bin. Gal in response also tells her off that she still hasn't mastered the Longsword of Light despite having figured something out. Gal then tells her to go kill the sender of the letter with a warning that if she doesn't master the Longsword of Light, she will die.

Summary

On her return to Gal's dojo, a man tries to ask questions but she cuts him off then tells him to move. The man still tries to converse with her so Eris decides to kill him.

Volume 1

Eris Gaiden Manga Volume 1
==========================

This article contains information for the First Volume of the
Mushoku Tensei
: Eris Seriously Sharpen her Fangs
Manga
 adaptation and its chapters.

Synopsis

Eris Boreas Greyrat
 is a former noble girl, who one day was
transported
 to the
other side
 of the world with her cousin
Rudeus
. She grew as a swordswoman, but ultimately was unable to save Rudy as he was nearly killed. Deciding that she wants to be someone who can support him rather than the other way around, Eris decides to leave Rudeus and go on her own
journey
.

Chapter 2

Chapter 3

Chapter 6.2

Eris The Goblin Slayer
======================

Eris The Goblin Slayer
 (エリスのゴブリン討伐
Eris no Goblin Tōbatsu
) is the first OVA of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series to be released on March 16, 2022 along with the Bluray version of Volume 4.

Synopsis

While Rudeus reunites with his father in
Millishion
, Eris sets out to fulfill her dream of slaying
goblins
. While at the Adventures’ Guild, however, she encounters
Cliff
, a conceited young mage who threatens to spoil her adventure.

Plot

A short scene gives clues on clues of a young boy's birth, the death of his parents, and his subsequent adoption by a powerful church figure.

In present time,
Eris
 leisurely explores Millishion while
Ruijerd
 is secretly watching over her. She sees signs of discrimination against
Demons
. In the Adventure Guild, she accepts a mission to slay goblins but also stops some adventurers from picking a fight with
Cliff
. However, when he calls her ugly, she beats him up.

Eris goes on with his mission with Cliff tagging along, but his
Exodus Flame
 damages the goblin ears needed for the mission. Eris, annoyed by this, tells Cliff to go back, but he manages to convince her to hunt more goblins at the forest.

At the forest, they get lost, and Eris uses her ability to sense nearby people. What they found was an assassination attempt by the
Pope Faction
 against a
young girl
 protected by knight of the
Order of the Temple
. Eris dispatches the assassins and Cliff is smitten. The surviving knight is
Therese
 and we learn that Cliff belongs to the Pope Faction.

Back at Millishion, Cliff confesses to Eris, but gets rejected and realizes he stands no chance against her feelings for Rudeus and goes home depressed. Eris returns to Rudeus and finds him upset after his fight with Paul. Cliff sits in his room, thinking about Rudeus.

Characters

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ruijerd Superdia

Cliff Grimoire

Therese Latreia

Miko of Memory

Rudeus Greyrat

Locations

Millis Continent

Millishion

Forest

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 5

Interlude: Eris the Goblin Slayer

Differences with the light novel:

Cliff's background is more detailed in the Light Novel in comparison to a silhouette montage used in the Anime.

Trailer

TV未放送：『無職転生』BD4巻映像特典 番外編「エリスのゴブリン討伐」予告編／Blu-ray第4巻 3月16日(水)発売

Trivia

Cliff's first meeting with Eris and being punched by her in the face shares similarity with Rudeus's first meeting with Eris in
Episode 5
.

This episode takes place during the events of "Family Squabble," but follows Eris instead of Rudeus.

Family Meeting and Growing Pains
================================

Family Meeting and Growing Pains
 (
家族会議と伸び悩み
,

Kazoku kaigi to nobiyami
)
 is the fifth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Summary

After Rudeus discovers that Sylph is a girl and her full name is Sylphiette, he acts rather awkwardly with her until she tells him that he only need act normal. Given his definition of "normal", Rudeus tones it down further just in case. After that event, Paul mocks Rudeus for confusing Sylphie with a boy. When he tries to give tips of how to get cute girl, a gardening Zenith reprimands him until Lilia appears to stop her due to her two-months along pregnancy. As everyone is happy with the news, Lilia suddenly vomits in front of them. Lilia announced that she is also pregnant, Rudeus unsurprisingly looks to Paul, who confesses to the family that he may be the father, to which Zenith slaps him. In a family meeting, Zenith asks of Lilia's plans after having her baby, and Lilia aims to help Zenith's childbirth before leaving after having her own baby. With Zenith unconfortable with this, Rudeus forms a plan knowing that Paul was at fault, as well as how Zenith and Lilia already have a long friendship for over six years. Acting innocent, Rudeus asks why everyone is upset when he's going to be having two sisters, and leads to a conclusion that Paul threatened Lilia because he knew "her weakness". He draws a conclusion that all fault lay with Paul, exonerating Lilia of blame. Thus Zenith, moved by her son's words, decides to let Lilia stay; much to the maid's surprised joy.

Around Rudeus' seventh birthday, his sisters Norn and Aisha are born healthy, while his mentoring Sylphy has her really progress in the past couple of years compared to himself, finding he has stagnated since Roxy's leave. When Paul arrives and delivers Rudeus a letter from his teacher, he reads that she tells him of her position as a court mage of the Kingdom of Shirone and she was promoted to King Class Water Magic. Further into the letter, she writes of the expectations that she had for his growth was more impressive. Rudeus starts feeling that he has peaked with his sword and magic skills, he makes up his mind up that he's ready to go to the school. While he would want to leave Buena Village, Sylphy clings to him begging him not to leave her, so Rudeus promises that he'll stay by her side. Paul eavesdrops on the children from behind the wall, and silently hearing the conversation gives him an idea.

At lunch, Rudeus informs Paul how his magic studies are stagnant and how he would like to attend the Ranoa University of Magic. However, because Sylphy doesn't want him to leave nor can she afford it, he requests that Paul pay both their tuitions. Paul immediately refuses his request because his sword training is not complete, while also that they don't have the money for both and that he is too young to leave. Undeterred, Rudeus asks if he can find him a job as tutor or magician to earn himself the tuition for Sylphy. With Paul confirming Rudeus' determination, he asks his son to come to the garden, where he asks what Rudeus would think if he ordered him to leave Sylphy behind. When Rudeus immediately answered that he will not like the idea, Paul finds the answer predictable and takes a practice sword to quickly attack Rudeus. As he does, a catwoman approaches the house and finds Paul and Rudeus' fight commence.

Appearances

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Zenith Greyrat

Paul Greyrat

Lilia

Sylphiette

Norn Greyrat

Aisha Greyrat

Roxy Migurdia

Ghislaine Dedoldia
 (Cameo)

Skills

Regions

Buena Village

Fittoa Region

Others

Differences from Light Novel

The PoV of Paul reprimanding Rudeus because of his fight with the other children was cut.

Trivia

Family Squabble
===============

Family Squabble
 (親子げんか
Oyako-genka
) is the sixteenth episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on October 31, 2021.

Synopsis

Rudeus and his friends arrive at Millicion, the capital of the Holy Land of Millis. As Rudeus decides to stay for a while to raise funds, as he strolls around the city, he finds a child being kidnapped. He follows the kidnappers to save the child, and gets into a fight with them, but it turns out that someone he knows well is involved.

Plot

TBA

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ruijerd Superdia

Geese Nukadia

Paul Greyrat

Norn Greyrat

Vella

Shella

Somar

Locations

Millis Continent

Millishion

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 4

Chapter 10: The Holy Sword Highway

Light Novel Volume 5

Chapter 1: The Holy Country of Millis.

Chapter 3: Family Squabble.

Differences with the light novel:

A minor explanation of how the city of Millishion  is organized and how work was cut.

In the anime Geese leave the group before they enter to the city, meanwhile, in the Light novel after they enter.

The anime add a scene where Rudeus proposes a plan to increase the Reputation of Ruijerd with giving a Ruijerd Statue as a charm to persons that they help.

A short scene where Rudeu explores the market of the city and thinks about what happened to the other persons in Roa was cut.

In the Light novel, Rudeus finds about the kidnapping in his exploration.

The battle between Rudeus and Paul and his me was a little longer in the light novel .

Rudeus use the magic icicle field to decrease the temperature against Vierra.

Vierra and Shierra support for a short time Paul in the fight against Rudeus.

Light Novel Volume  5 Chapter 2: Paul's Story
 was cut (probably delayed until next Episode, need confirmation).

A short scene that explain how the Search and Rescue Squad of Paul worked.

Some thoughts of Rudeus after he returned to the inn was cut.

Trailer

TVアニメ『無職転生』次回予告⑯：10-31(日)放送第16話「親子げんか」予告

Fangs of the Black Wolf
=======================

Fangs of the Black Wolf
 (黒狼の牙
Kokurō no Kiba, lit. Kuro Ōkami no Kiba
) is a Rank S Adventurer Party led by
Paul Greyrat
 in his youth. The party had varying personalities and was one of the most famous parties in the
Central Continent
 before it was disbanded after Paul and Zenith quit to settle down.

Members

Paul Greyrat
: Leader of search group; vanguard swordsman; frontline tank

Geese Nukadia
: Leader of preparation group; thief

Tallhand
: Middle guard; magician

Ghislaine Dedoldia
: Vanguard swordswoman

Elinalise Dragonroad
: Warrior; frontline tank

Zenith Latreia
: Healer

Achievements

Attains Rank S

Trivia

All members of the party were outcasts in their own house, family, or village.

Except for
Geese
, who is not a true outcast but rather is the last living member of his tribe.

Navigation

Fate
====

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!







Fate
, also known as
Destiny
 is the rough history of the path an individual takes in their life.

Background

Laplace
: "May the fortunes of war be with you."
First Dragon God
: "everything shall be left to fate"

-The First Dragon God and Laplace's final farewells to each other

Like
Mana
, Fate is possessed by all beings in the universe of
Mushoku Tensei
 even during the
Six-Faced World
 Era but very few beings are able to see fate and try to influence it.

Due to Orsted being in a timeloop made by the
First Dragon God
, Orsted has seen the past and knows the future of nearly everyone in the
Human World
, as such he refers to the original timeline history to be pre-ordained by Fate and he acts to ensure that original timeline is followed as much as possible against his upcoming battle against Hitogami.

Strong Fate

The path of history of individuals who are protected by a strong fate's cannot be altered easily and despite multiple attempts to alter it, not even by
Gods
. But the strength of fate can also be ambiguous especially during pregnancy of the individual. Another exception is when a massive calamity occurs like the
Teleport Incident
 which could also cause the death even those protected by a strong fate.

Notable Individuals with Strong Fate

Rudeus Greyrat

"With each person he encounters, the world greatly changes"

-
Orsted

Rudeus is protected by an unusually strong fate that when
Hitogami
 tries to influence the course of events involving him, it rarely works out. This strong fate also causes the fate of his family and future wive's fate to also greatly change and in turn, his strong fate is also inherited by his children and descendants.
.

Orsted who has knowledge on the supposed fate of most people of the
Human World
 in his numerous time loops believe that it was because of their encounter with Rudeus has caused massive changes in their fate, like
Isolte Cruel
 and
Doga
 getting married which has a very small chance to occur in his other time loops because of their circumstances. As such, Osted's plans for the next hundred years to defeat Hitogami has been thrown off the rails that he wonders where to begin on the next loop since his writings to record the many changes on the current time loop with Rudeus could not keep up. This leads him to also think if there is even a point of writing the changes since the chance Rudeus existing on the next loop is quite small, making the notes pointless otherwise, if Rudeus exist on the next loop, his recording will prove to be a powerful weapon.

Sylphiette

Sylphiette: "Anyway, I think thats the whole reason its fun to think about how things might have turned out. Because I'm really happy with how they did."
Eris: "...I wonder if I'll feel the same once I have a child too."

In the timeline that Rudeus does not exist, Sylphiette became the apprentice of Roxy and later becomes an
Adventurer
. Due to her green hair, she is still hated by people but in the end, she conquered several notable labyrinths and made a name for herself as one of the world's most prominent dungeon explorer and to Orsted's knowledge she never got married.

While in the timeline where Sylphiette meets Rudeus, she learns
Chantless casting
 even for her
Healing Magic
 that not even Rudeus can do and eventually marries Rudeus. Due to her strong fate, she became
Ariel Anemoi Asura
's
Guardian Magician
 and protected her from all assassinations until they made it to
Sharia
.

Roxy Migurdia

Rudeus: "Huh. Okay. So Roxy and I were destined to get married then? That makes me kinda happy."
Hitogami: "Can't say I feel the same."

In the timeline that Rudeus does not exist, Roxy trains Sylphiette as her apprentice and like Sylphiette she never marries.

But in another timeline with Rudeus, they did get married but Roxy and her supposed
child
 dies due to
Magic Stone Disease
 causing Rudeus to fall into depression and death of most of his friends and family. When Rudeus discovers what caused Roxy's death, he is already
old
 but he manages to
travel back in time
 to warn his younger self to prevent the disease from happening before passing away.

Heeding the warning of his future self, Rudeus manages to prevent Roxy's death but Hitogami angrily confronts him in his dream on how his plan to kill Roxy has failed. Rudeus several proposal but Hitogami refuses as fate cannot be easily changed by his initial proposals. In the end, a compromise is made where Rudeus must kill Orsted and in return, Hitogami will leave him and his family alone.

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Orsted: "Eris Boreas Greyrat... is Rudeus so precious to you? what of Luke?"
Eris: "Luke?"
Orsted: "The man who was destined to be your husband."
Eris:"That's news to me."

In the timeline that Rudeus does not exist, Eris is skilled with a sword that she eventually becomes a
Sword Saint
 and despite her beautiful appearance and impressive status, her fiery personality earned her the title "Red Lion". The Asuran Guard selects her for her sword skills to be part of their ranks and that is how she met
Luke Notos Greyrat
 which is love at first sight for him. Despite being punched numerous times, Luke continues to pursue Eris and that softened her heart and the two eventually gets married and were extremely affectionate with each other. As such, the
Boreas Family
 headed by
Philip Boreas Greyrat
 and
Sauros Boreas Greyrat
 joins the
Princess Ariel Faction
 while Eris and Luke works together to protect Ariel from assassination attempts numerous times, securing Ariel's path to kinghood.

Ariel Anemoi Asura

Orsted:"To turn Asura Kingdom's second princess, Ariel Anemoi Asurra, into the Asura Kingdom's queen."
Rudeus:"Ooh"
Orsted:"If it is necessary, we will manipulate her like a puppet."

In Orsted's original history, Ariel becomes queen of Asura Kingdom and is protected by a considerably powerful fate. In order for Ariel to become queen, the power of 3 people are needed: Derrick Redbat, Eris Boreas Greyrat,
Tristina Purplehorse
 who will testify to cause the downfall of Prime Minister
Darius Silva Ganius
.

Derrick Redbat

"I supposedly had fate on my side protecting me from death as well, but if Derrick's bloody end was any indication, I'd better not let it go to my head."

-Rudeus Greyrat

In Orsted's original history, Derrick Redbat is the
Guardian Magician
 of Princess Ariel and during her fated meeting with
Perugius Dola
, Derrick successfully persuades him to back Ariel on becoming queen of Asura Kingdom. Derrick would continue to be Ariel's advisor and eventually become the prime minister.

But despite being protected by a strong fate, Derrick is killed during the Teleport Incident so the plan of Rudeus and Orsted to make Ariel queen has changed since coming to
Sharia
 and her connections to numerous talented personnel has been established.

Leo





Leo watching over Lara in the Light Novel



"The Human God cannot manipulate inhuman beings. Furthermore, he cannot manipulate a great number of people at the same time. As long as we move, he will have his hands full with our interference. Based on his personality, that will be more than enough prevention."

-Orsted

Leo is the sacred beast of the
Beast Race
 who is protected by a strong fate who is born once every several hundred years. Since ancient times, the appearance of Leo means that the world will be in crisis. After becoming an adult, Leo is fated to set out on a journey together with a
hero
 and save the world.

In order to protect Rudeus' family from Hitogami's manipulation, Orsted instructs Rudeus to use a guardian beast protect his family by
Summoning Magic
 which in turn, Hitogami won't be able to make a move against them.
 Thus, Leo is summoned by Rudeus and since then, Leo has been watching over Roxy until Lara is born
 and they are always seen together.

Weak Fate

Notable Individuals with Weak Fate

Miko of Memory

Despite her power, the Miko of Memory has a weak fate that regardless of the time loop Orsted remembers, she would die around the age of 10 and would never live to see age 30. Thus, the chance of the Miko of Memory being an apostle of Hitogami is close to zero.
 In order to protect her and as thanks for revealing the memories of
Zenith
 with her power, Rudeus lets her join the
ORSTED Corporation
 as a subordinate of Orsted and as additional protections, Rudeus gives her an emblem of the Dragon God and also summons a guardian beast to protect her, similar to how Leo protects his family.

Luke Notos Greyrat

Rudeus: "The Human God may have considered that we'd discover his connection with Luke. Perhaps his entire aim is to goad us into killing him."
Orsted: "That's perfectly possible. The Ariel that I knew valued Luke greatly. Without him, she may not succeed on the path towards kingship."

Despite having a weak Fate. Hitogami turned Luke into his disciple to monitor Rudeus. Throughout their journey back to Asura Kingdom, Luke has been suspicious of Rudeus despite Luke asking first to help Ariel become Queen.

History

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

References

Father And Sister
=================

Father And Sister
 (
父と妹
,

Chichi to Imōto
)
 is the thirty-fifth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Norn Greyrat

Paul Greyrat

Summary

Paul
 fights Rudeus over his apparent disregard for the other victims of the
Teleport Incident
. Rudeus gets the upper hand due to his use of his
demon eye
.
Norn
 steps in and pushes Rudeus away.

Navigation

Feris Greyrat
=============

Redirect to:
Ferris Greyrat

Ferris Greyrat
==============

Ferris Greyrat
 (フェリス・グレイラット Ferisu Gureiratto) Is the granddaughter of
Ars
 and great-granddaughter of
Rudeus
, at whose death she was present and she is associated with
Orsted
.

Appearance

Ferris Greyrat is identical to her Great-grandmother
Eris
; She has long, straight, red hair, red eyes, a single-fold eyelids and a determined line to her chin.

Personality

Not much is known about Ferris' personality but Rudeus sees her as slightly spoiled because she took his bracelet without asking. However, she also showed guilt and remorse (after taking the bracelet) and respect for Rudeus.

Background

Ferris Greyrat Is the daughter of
Leroy Greyrat
 and was born approximately in the year K476.

Plot

Light Novel Volume 26

Story 1: The Final Dream

When she tried to take the bracelet off Rudeus while he was sleeping, he woke up again and Ferris ran to tell her family. Later, Rudeus asked her if she took off his bracelet and in tears she confessed and Rudeus gave her the bracelet.

Many years later, she helped her relatives and Orsted to seal the
Man God
 and they noticed Rudeus in the Void and everyone said their goodbyes before they went through a teleport circle again.

Equipment

Sword:
 Ferris is shown to own a sword.

Dragon God's Bracelet :
 Its crest was engraved by Dragon God with the ability to block Hitogami's future foresight from seeing the future of the wearer. Feris inherited it from Rudeus.

Achievements

Sealing the Man God

Trivia

She is the first known great-grandchild of Rudeus.

Fighting God Armor
==================

Fighting God's Golden Armor is a
magic tool
 created by Demon-Dragon God
Laplace
. The person who wears it is considered the "
Fighting God
".

Backround





Golden Armor worn by Badigadi



Dragon  God Laplace created the Golden Armor sometime before the
Second Great Human-Demon War
. Laplace used the armor during the early stages of the war, but soon realized the armor had become sentient and was trying to take him over, which caused Laplace to seal away the dangerous tool he had created. It was later stolen by
Badigadi
 at the behest of
Hitogami
, and used to defeat and split Dragon God Laplace into two different entities, breaking the world in the process.

Many  Years later, the armor was once again used by Badigadi to fight Rudeus and his allies and later briefly by
Aleksander Ryback
 to fight against
Orsted
.

Characteristics and Abilities





Golden Armor design



Characteristics

Sentient
 - The armor is infused with such a monumental amount of mana that it developed its own consciousness.

Shape Change
  - The armor will change its shape to fit the size and body type of whoever wears it.

Self Repair
 -  If part of the armor is destroyed it will reform itself.

Abilities

Great Power Boost
 - Whoever wears the Golden Armor will feel neither pain, or fatigue and will have their power increased across the board substantially.

Magic Resistance Aura
 - The golden light radiating from the armor will render most magic ineffective, however there is a limit and some high level spells might be able to get through.

Battle Master
 - Regardless of the wearers knowledge when it comes to battle, the armor itself is a battle master. It knows how to use, counter and adapt to countless weapons it has trained with and can imitate many martial arts. The armor could analyze the flow of battle and has a repertoire of over 1000 secret techniques (including one that was used to disrupt Laplace's reincarnation technique)

Drawbacks

Life Force powered
 - The Golden Armor is powered by the wearer's life-force and will eventually kill the wearer, with even
Orsted
 dying from it when he tried to wear it in one timeline. The only known exception are members of the immortal demon clan, since they cannot die at all.

Heal Seal
 - Since the armor cancels magic cast on the wearer, it also prevents healing magic from being used on them. However, races with innate regenerative abilities, like members of the immortal demon clan, can bypass this.

Frenzy Inducement
 - The Golden Armor is cursed; the longer one wears the armor, the more the armor suppresses the wearers will, replacing it with its own, causing the wearer to become insane and battle hungry.

Trivia

At some point,
Orsted
 attempted to wear the Golden Armor, but he did not know how to take it off so it eventually killed him.
