Navigation

First Demon God
===============

First Demon God
 was a man with eight arms and six horns, spanning a height of over three meters. He was considered the second most powerful
God
.

Appearance

A man with eight arms, six horns, a height of over 3 meters, and magic eyes.

Plot

The battle between the
First Dragon God
 and First Demon God is unusually long because because of the Demon God's power to regenerate his body parts and his other ability to alter his size. On the 100th day of battle, First Dragon God activates the Magic Circle beneath the feet the the gigantic Demon God which causes the body of the Demon God to rapidly collapse. After, the First Dragon God collapses and the Dragon Generals carried him back to the
Dragon World
.

--To Be Added--

References

First Dragon God
================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

"I'll send my child ten-thousand years into the future. In the meantime, I want you to find Hitogami's true identity, his whereabouts, his weaknesses... Find a way to defeat him and convey that to my child!"

First Dragon God giving Laplace's mission

The
First Dragon God
 is the first generation Dragon God whose name is not revealed. Under his leadership,
Dragon Tribe
 became the most powerful beings in the Dragon World and through this, he is recognized as the ruler of the Dragon World. He is also the husband of
Lunaria
 and the father of
Orsted
.

Appearance

At a glance, the First Dragon God is easily seen as the leader of the Dragon Tribe to anyone who sees him for the first time and his most outstanding features were his golden eyes, he has a silver beard and skin covered in silver scales with long fangs and claws. He is a little bigger than the rest of the Dragon Tribe and his gaze is sharp, but filled with unfathomable warmness.

Personality

The First Dragon God was a wise and benevolent figure. Like Lunaria, he deeply cared for his people. After personally saving
Laplace
 from the verge of death, The First Dragon God was willing to raise him as his own son despite him being a dragon and demon hybrid. As such, he was worshipped and trusted by his people that was seen in their gesture of giving a salute of the highest honor for the Dragon Tribe and they addressed him as "Dragon God-sama"
.

After Lunaria was killed, his personality took a dark turn and became consumed by his fury, leading to him destroying four out of six worlds in the
Six-Faced World
.

Background

Like most of the First Generation Gods, the First Dragon God originated from the
Creator God
 who created the Six-Faced World where he is tasked with managing the dangerous balances of the Dragon World. Because of this divine origin, they became known as Gods and the First Dragon God worked diligently with the Dragon Tribe to make the world prosper.

But despite the Dragon Tribe having a long lifespan and powerful, their civilization was unable to thrive and their civilization remained primitive for a long time. Perhaps out of pity or frustration, the Human God meets with the other Gods and suggests that the Gods meet on a regular basis of information exchange to help each of their world prosper. In exchange, the Dragon Tribe taught the use of Battle Aura and thanks to this, the Dragon Tribe learns the use of words and letters to communcal living and forming a social order that gave the light of civilization to the Dragon Tribe.

The First Dragon God changed the life of the Dragon Tribe who were hiding in caverns by the hillside, living only where they could not be caught by large dragons in the Dragon World. He taught them how to use
Dragon Battle Aura
 and by grouping together, finding strength in numbers, and preying on the dragons, the Dragon Tribe stood as the strongest in the Dragon World. The Dragon Tribe would eventually conquer the largest mountain in the Dragon World, Dragon Roar Mountain and from there, they built their capital city Kayos from its hollowed out center with the First Dragon God's home at its center and later expanded to an additional 122 towns.

To protect the Dragon World, the First Dragon God appoints the five most powerful individuals among the Dragon Tribe and they are called the Five Dragon Generals. On one of their meetings, the Human God introduces her daughter to the First Dragon God for an experiment if its possible for Gods to have children with other races and what power will they have, although the First Dragon God initially did not love Lunaria, he grew to love her when she gave him a child and he makes plans to prepare the Dragon World for his birth.

Plot

On his travels to the Demon World, the First Dragon God found Laplace who lives at the edge of the world and at the brink of death after being attacked by a hydra and brings him to the Dragon World and is welcomed by him and Lunaria as their own son despite having blood of both demons and dragons and their child is about to be born.
 After a few years, he asks
Dora
 to train Laplace to become a Dragon Warrior and would receive reports from Dora and Laplace of his progress where Laplace would become a renowned dragon trainer through out the Dragon World.

When
Crystal
 died in what looks like a dragon attack, the First Dragon God held a meeting with the remaining Dragon Generals where Laplace serves as a stand-in for Dora who was on pregnancy leave at the time. They concluded that Crystal's death has a possibility that it was done by a demon and when the suggestion that Laplace be assigned to investigate, the other Dragon Generals strongly objected but in the end they agreed to let Laplace investigate since.

Another meeting was held after
Necrolia Nacrolia
 the culprit who killed Crystal was captured where Laplace gives his report on his investigation, the Human God giving counsel and his battle and capture of Necrolia. Although the Dragon Generals are urging to go to war against the Demon World, the First Dragon God chose to negotiate with them instead and at the suggestion of
Szilard
, the First Dragon God grants Laplace the title Demon Dragon King and successor of Crystal as Dragon General and becomes his assistant to negotiate with the Demon God.

"Rather than that, look, Demon God, at this man... He's now an important figure in the Dragon World, a living proof that the Dragon Race felt no hostility towards the Demons."

-First Dragon God to Demon God

The First Dragon God attends a meeting with other five
Gods
 at Demon God's castle Gaileck located at its capital city Daileck in the Demon World where they normally trade insults with each other and only the Dragon God and
Human God
 wants peace. The First Dragon God then introduces Laplace to the
Demon God
 and tells him how Laplace has become an important part of the Dragon Tribe and is now a Dragon General despite having blood of Demons and Dragons to dispell the rumor that the Dragon Tribe has no hatred towards Demons. After some further inquiry particularly the death of his son Necrolia which the First Dragon God already told everyone who has knowledge to never expose the truth before the meeting, the Demon God also admits he does not want a war and agrees to have peace between him and the Dragon God and despite the tense situation, the other Gods also does not want a war and agrees to work for peace.

With the Gods agreeing to cooperate with each other, the Dragon World welcome engineers from the other worlds to assist in the technological advancement which is slow for the Dragon Tribe and in return, Dragon Warriors are sent to other worlds to help subdue monsters that are otherwise impossible to defeat and despite teleportation and monster appearances still occurred, they no longer suspect each other.

"How strange. Although everyone of Dragon World I considered my own, but it feels a little special holding this child."

-First Dragon God

The First Dragon God and Laplace returns from the meeting with the Gods but to their surprise, they see the Dragon World having a festival where everyone is jubilant and they are welcomed with a joyous chorus. Having caught on what has happened, the First Dragon God flies at great speed to his mansion and Lunaria welcomes him with their child held in her hand. The First Dragon God then holds on to the child then Lunaria asks him to name the child but the First Dragon God is unusually hesitant to name their child and did not give a name for the time being. All the Gods of the other world also came to give their blessings to the new born child which is a spectacular and majestic moment since Gods do not typically appear in other worlds let alone all six of them in the Dragon World and the peace between Six World continues.

However, the peaceful era of the Six Worlds lasted until the First Dragon God finds Lunaria dead in her room in a pool of her own blood which indicates she died while protecting their child. The First Dragon God is enraged by this and his roar is heard through out the Dragon World that frigtened most of its denizens.
 After Lunaria's funeral rites, a meeting is held with the Dragon Generals presenting their lists of suspects and during this time, the Human God also joins them to reveal that the other worlds are suspicious of the Dragon World and they might have plotted to kill his child but Lunaria was killed during the attempt. Although the First Dragon God is in disbelief of the other world's plot, he commands his Dragon Generals to prepare for war.

The First Dragon God and the Five Dragon Generals goes to the Beast World who greets them with 10,000 troops. The First Dragon God shouts to bring out Lunaria's murderer but the
Beast God
 does not know and the battle begins which lasts for 3 days and 3 nights. The First Dragon God and Beast God attack on each other causes shockwaves that creates several tornadoes but is not enough to penetrate each other's scales nor fur.  On the fourth day both the Gods had sustained enough damage and the battle is settled by the Beast God biting the shoulder of the First Dragon God and it spewed blood but the First Dragon God is waiting for this and he grabs the left and right head of the Pudoria and using his Dragon Battle Aura to tear his body in 2 then slams Beast God to the ground causing a huge crater to form and a shockwave that caused even the Dragon Generals to be blown away. The First Dragon God emerges from the crater and roars then hands Laplace a jewel and goes back to the Dragon World while the destruction of the Beast World begins upon the Beast God's death.

The First Dragon God and the Five Dragon Generals goes to war against the Ocean World and Sky World whose army dyed the sea black and the sky blot out the sky respectively but like the Beast World it is a massacre that eventually resulting to First Dragon God killing of both the
Ocean God
 and the
Sky God
 and the destruction of their world. Despite the victory, the First Dragon God's body is still afflicted by the wounds from his battles from the Gods he defeated. The Beast God's bite on his shoulder is still bleeding, the poison from the Ocean God is eating away his leg and the Sky God's beam of light blinded him on one eye but the war still continues as they prepare for war against the Demon World.

The war between is particularly fierce since the 5 Dragon Generals are matched by the Demon World's 8 Demon Kings, making it impossible to destroy the Demon World. So the First Dragon God also brought the full force of Dragon Warriors to invade the Demon World who in response, the Demon World's fighters are rallied to battle them. The war became a back and forth between invading and defending the Dragon and Demon World and vice versa which raged for decades but eventually take its toll on both sides due to massive casualties caused by the advancement in technologies of both worlds. With the fighting force of the Dragon Tribe nearly depleted, the Dragon Generals luring and isolating one Demon King after another at the suggestion of the Human God, causing the Demon God to appear in battle where the First Dragon God battles him.

The battle between the First Dragon God and Demon God is unusually long because because of the Demon God's power to regenerate his body parts and his other ability to alter his size. On the 100th day of battle, First Dragon God activates the Magic Circle   beneath the feet the the gigantic Demon God which causes the body of the Demon God to rapidly collapse. After, the First Dragon God collapses and the Dragon Generals carried him back to the Dragon World.

"In the end, Dragon God-sama's words were true and we were wrong... thats... great. Betraying Dragon God-sama was a mistake... thats... wonderful..."

-Dora's last words upon learning the truth

The First Dragon is bed ridden after fighting the Demon God and the wounds from the his battle Gods have not yet healed. When Laplace gave his report about his encounter with Necros, the First Dragon God prepares to invade the Human World much to the shock of Laplace and when relayed to the rest of the Dragon Generals, they were shocked as well and  opposed the order.
 The Dragon Generals tried to persuade the First Dragon God to reconsider the invasion but he replied that he will go alone so the Dragon Generals responds that they will stop him by force.

The First Dragon God is shocked by the intention of the Dragon Generals to fight him but accepts their decision. Before the start of the battle, the city of Kayos is evacuated and the First Dragon God asks Laplace what he plans to do to which he responds he will fight beside the First Dragon God. But the First Dragon God instead commands him to protect his son which the latter obeys as they watch the battle begin. The Dragon Generals used the technology they have developed against the demons but despite his injuries from his battle against the other Gods, the First Dragon God defeats the 4 Dragon Generals with most of them being severely injured, even missing limbs. Just as the battle finishes, the Human God strikes the First Dragon God and took out the Divine Jewel inside his body. The Human God then admits that the murder of Lunaria, war between the Gods, destruction of all the other worlds were his plan to begin with and how he manipulated everyone to accomplish it. The First Dragon God further pressed for answers but the Human God shattered the Divine Jewel causing the First Dragon God to be gravely wounded and the destruction of the Dragon World began as the Human God flies away.

"May the fortunes of war be with you" ..."everything shall be left to fate."

-Final Words Exchange of the First Dragon God and Laplace

Chaos and Maxwell asked for forgiveness and offered to end their life as well like Szilard did before them but the First Dragon God forgives them and gives them a mission to buy him time. After hearing Dora's words reported by Laplace, he asks Laplace to bring him to Dora's Teleport Research Laboratory. At the laboratory, the elderly researchers is greatly concerned for the First Dragon God as they lead him to the laboratory's innermost chamber which has an altar that functions as a gateway to another world and a stone monument with sophisticated Magic Circles. After studying the monument, the First Dragon God began to draw
Magic Circles
 onto his child who is placed on the altar by Laplace. Then the Dragon God placed one of the three Divine Jewels in his chest which is absorbed into his body, the another Divine Jewel on the chest of his child which is absorbed into his body and the final Divine Jewel he gives to Laplace with a mission.

Aware that his death is unavoidable the First Dragon God still sought vengeance on the imposter pretending to be the Human God whom he now calls "
Hitogami
" and after parting ways with Laplace, he goes to the Human World to battle Hitogami. The battle of the First Dragon God and Hitogami lasted for 8 days but neither the First Dragon God nor Hitogami can be found afterwards.

Legacy

"Hitogami is... my father's ruin. And, overthrowing Hitogami is the ancient Dragon Tribe's dearest wish. Our, the Dragon God's sole reason for existence is to defeat Hitgami."

Orsted

Hitogami begins to also use the name "Hitogami" which is the name the First Dragon God uses to refer to him when talking to Laplace and he uses that name to introduce himself to
Rudeus Greyrat
.

Laplace succeeds the First Dragon God who becomes the Second Generation Dragon God and makes preparation for war against Hitogami to avenge the death of the First Dragon God, Lunaria and the Five Dragon General's regret.

Laplace together with Saleyakt and
Rostelina
 begins to live in the largest mountain of the Human World and renames it to "Dragon Roar Mountain"; named after the largest mountain in the Dragon World, the First Dragon God's home and his former home.

After witnessing destruction of their respective worlds at the hands of the Dragon Tribe, the surviving
Races
 begin to hate and fear the Dragon Tribe especially the Dragon God that permeates throughout the Human World.

The surviving Dragon Tribe are hunted and killed but Laplace refuses to help them since the mission given to him by the First Dragon God is more important than the survival of the Dragon Tribe.

Laplace initially thought that Hitogami and First Dragon God had killed each other but Hitogami's indirect interference to his activities made him conclude that Hitogami is in the
Void World
 after searching everywhere in the Human World.

Rudeus eventually becomes a subordinate of Orsted who tells him his objective of defeating Hitogami on behalf of his father.

Equipment

『Godsword』

I named it "Dragon Godsword". It is a sword that can withstand even the mighty power of Dragon God-sama. Even though Dragon God-sama might not need it; I plan to offer it to his child when he is born.

-Mad Dragon King Chaos

The Godsword, short for Dragon Godsword is forged by Chaos for the First Dragon God.
 At the hands of the First Dragon God, the sword's strike is so powerful that only the other Gods are capable of withstanding its strikes. When the First Dragon God wielded it against the Dragon Generals, its strike can cut everything in half which seems to distort the world that everything in its path, be it dragon scales, Battle Aura, or even the Flying Fortress Chaos Breaker was sliced in two.
 Godsword is eventually inherited by Orsted which costs a huge amount of mana to summon so he uses it only when he needs to fight seriously.

Power and Abilities

First Human-Demon War

First Job
=========

First Job
 (
初仕事
,

Hatsu Shigoto
)
 is the twenty-third chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ruijerd Superdia

Hitogami

Rudeus Greyrat

Summary

As Man-God advised Rudeus to take the lost pet quest, the trio are led by Ruijurd as he tracks the missing cat. As Rudeus ponders why with a theory that it could lead to more profitable opportunities, an annoyed Eris asks Ruijurd if he does know where he's going as they've trekked through slums, and Ruijurd reassures them given his third eye's radar ability. Once they found the location of the missing cat, they find numerous other animals caged, as Rudeus believes there's a criminal operation happening. Ruijurd finds the cat, really a large black panther, verifying it by the collar before Eris detects someone approaching. As three persons enter, Roman, Jalil and Vizquel, Rudeus uses the earth magic spell [Quagmire] to unbalance so Eris and Ruijurd can knock them to a wall for Rudeus to use [Earth Cuffs] to restrain them.

After Rudeus celebrates a peaceful capture, he is kicked across the room by Roman, before Eris is also set aback by Ruijurd's spear backing into her head. Finding blood, Rudeus finds Ruijurd murdered Roman with effortless bloodlust, reasoning that he had to as Roman kicked a child, and didn't know his position as a prisoner. Rudeus is sent into a quiet panic but knows that killing is common in the world, but since Ghislaine attempted reason first against Almanfi. As Ruijurd killed a man just for kicking a child, Rudeus recalls Roxy's words on Superds, but also recalls Ruijurd's vulnerability from before, and wants to reason with him. Arguing that killing even for the most minor offenses will forever hinder his aim to repair the Superd reputation, and those that love him will ultimately become scared of him as he kills, Ruijurd promises to stop after seeing his logic, and Eris scolds Ruijurd for whacking her in the head causing a cut.

Calming down, Rudeus approaches the surviving two and learns their scheme to abduct then return pets for D-Rank rewards at the Adventurer's Guild. However, as they overheard Rudeus talking to Ruijurd, they know his secret as a Superd and fearfully promise to keep it secret, putting Rudeus in a predicament. Thinking of a monetary and reputation solution, Rudeus learns that the slain prisoner imposed himself into their pet abduction scheme so it was more convenient that he was gone. With that, Rudeus invites them to team up and orders they promote from D-Rank to C-Rank, earning anger and confusion from Ruijurd. With that, Jalil and Vizquel take their leave to fulfill Rudeus's command. However, Ruijurd grabs Rudeus demanding to know why he did so, Eris attacks Ruijurd while also countering his arguments. As he promised to escort them home and if he didn't like how Rudeus was planning things, Eris berated him that he could leave. Bound by his promise, Ruijurd relents and they deliver the lost pet back to the owner.

There, the young lizard girl hands over the quest card and thanks the "nice devils" for their kindness. Receiving payment for the completed quest, a despondent Ruijurd accompanied Rudeus and Eris back to their inn, while Eris notes how small the coin is. While Rudeus agrees, he can't help but feel that the coin is too heavy as he is filled with doubts of his choice, but chooses to press forward. As they leave, Nokopara surprises upon Jalil and Vizquel, charming his way into their conversation.

Navigation

Fittoa Region
=============

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!





Sylphy overlooking the fields in the Fittoa Region



Fittoa Region
 (フィットア領
Fittoa-ryō
) is a fiefdom in the Asura Kingdom ruled by the Boreas Family.

Location

It is located in the northeastern part of the
Asura Kingdom
.
 It lies on the
Central Continent
.

Landmarks

It is a vast agricultural area on the borders of the Kingdom. The lands in the Fittoan Region are largely rural with many forests

Notable Places

Citadel of Roa
: The largest settlement in the Fittoa Region where the liege lord resides.

Buena Village
: A peaceful hamlet.

Wieden: A small town where Rudeus Greyrat and
Eris Boreas Greyrat
 once got kidnapped and held at. It is two settlements away from Roa.

Feudal Lord

Under the crown of the Kingdom of Asura, the Fittoa Region is reigned by the
Boreas Greyrat
 family, on of the great families of Asura Kingdom.

Before the
Teleport Incident
,
Sauros Boreas Greyrat
 was the Feudal Lord of the Region.
.

After the Teleport Incident, Sauros is blamed for the disaster and is executed through the scheme of
Pilemon Notos Greyrat
 and
James Boreas Greyrat
 becomes the new Feudal Lord of Fittoa Region.

Teleport Incident

Main article:
Teleport Incident

On the year
K417
 a mana calamity befell the Fittoa Region, teleporting a majority of its citizens to various random locations across the world.

Paul returns to Buena Village but finds it in ruins and begins his effort on finding his family and the rest of the villagers.

Known Inhabitants

Sauros Boreas Greyrat

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Hilda Boreas Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Alphonse

Folklore
========

Folklore
 (
昔話
,

Mukashibanashi
)
 is the twelfth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Summary

In the family library, Rudeus encounters Philip and asks for a translation reference to a Demon-God language book he purchased. When asked why he was learning the language, Rudeus wanted to learn a new language for a future benefit; when really a summoning book he wanted was already sold and he bought the book he did on a whim. But it was still half-true to him, remembering how he failed learning languages in his old life and now he wanted to dedicate some focus in this life. Appreciative of Philip's help, Rudeus is startled by a quick sinister expression by Philip in passing.

Searching for her husband, Lady Hilda finds him and Rudeus in the library. Rudeus bows courteously and gets a good angle on Hilda's bust, and wonders how Eris will develop in a few years. But as he returns to reality with Hilda's face in antagonistic disgust of him, she informs Philip that her gifts for Eris's 10th birthday only just arrived, and goes to see to their proper opening. While disturbed by the encounter, Philip explains to him that Hilda is rather upset given the Greyrat family tradition. After Philip failed in a bid to become head of the Greyrat family, Eris's older and younger brothers were "adopted" by his victorious brother to study in the Asura capital. As it is a Greyrat tradition to make compliance across all four houses, Hilda is upset since Rudeus can stay while her own sons cannot.

Philip asks Rudeus only tolerate Hilda's disdain for him, while Philip "enjoys" his presence. Taking his leave, Philip advices Rudeus speak to Ghislaine about learning the Beast-God language as she originates from the Doldia Tribe. Relieved the situational pressure had past, Rudeus spends some time looking over books for how to translate the Demon language. After so long and finding nothing, he remembers Roxy was of the Demon race and planned to write a letter for her help to learn.

Friendship
==========

Friendship
 (
友情
,

Yūjō
)
 is the fourth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Summary

One week after Roxy left, Rudeus is no longer afraid of the outer world. When exploring the village, he happens upon a shout, and remembering how he was bullied in his past life, he finds a group of children's bullying another by throwing mud balls. Rudeus decides to help and confront the group, whereby thanks to Paul's training, he evades their attacks until the group gets bored and they leave. Afterwards, Rudeus approached the
boy
 to clean his hair with magic, discovering that it was green, similar Roxy's description of the Superd race, but Rudeus finds no jewel in their forehead upon checking. Worried that he may be bullied again, Rudeus decides to become friends with the shy Sylph. After bringin lunch to Sylph's father at the village watchtower, Sylph asks Rudeus if he can teach magic and he accepts planning to begin tomorrow. Parting ways for the day, Rudeus returns home to find Paul upset because a mother say that her child was attacked by Rudeus. As Paul refuses to hear Rudeus' side of the story, Rudeus plays to Paul's pride as he lords over him, only for Paul to hit him. After which, Rudeus uses logic in reiterating his behavior to honor his parents and finally states his side of the story. After Paul apologizes, Rudeus asks him if Sylph can come to the house sometime and Paul approves; Rudeus is happy Paul holds no racial predujice. After a year passed since Rudeus met Sylph and decided to teach him magic, Sylph is able to cast chant-less magic. When it starts to rain, they returned to Rudeus' house and go to the bathroom, where Rudeus started undressing his wet clothes. When Sylph didn't want to remove the last piece of his clothes, Rudeus takes him by surprise to pantsed his underwear, only to discover that Sylph is a girl.

Gal Farion
==========

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Gal Farion
 (
ガル
・
ファリオン
)
 is the Sword God, ranked 6th on the
Seven Great Powers
, and the teacher of
Eris
 and
Ghislaine
 in the
Sword God Style
.

Appearance

Gal Farion is described as an adult
man
 with blue hair with a face "like a ferocious wolf" and a prominent scar below his left eye that reaches below his left ear and another scar at the tip of his right eye.

Personality

Gal has a calm personality and is able to withstand insults. He is capable in teaching others and is a little arrogant, due to his great strength. Gal also hates asking help from anyone with the exception of training Eris for her battle against Orsted where Gal asked Reida's help who was intrigued of what Gal was planning to ask help even from her.

Orsted describes him as "A man of good character, with a hobby of collecting swords."

He seems to be an impatient man and makes quick decisions, complementing his swift sword-god style.

After being defeated by
Jino Britts
, he becomes much more irascible and prone to carelessness, easily giving into Eris' provocation and failing to notice Ruijerd's presence until it was too late.

Background

A young Gal Farion battling Enzo Moreira in the Manga
Gal Farion defeated by Orsted in the Manga
Gal Farion meeting Ghislaine in the
Anime
1/3

At a young age, is already a talented
Swordsman
 and when during his time at the
Holy Land of Swords
 where he defeats
Enzo Moreira
 who was a
Sword Saint
 in a sparring match.

Gal Farion describes himself as stubborn Sword Saint when he challenged Orsted to a battle. Naturally, he lost but survived with his 4 limbs intact and his stubborness was completely broken. Since then, He trained earnestly and made no compromises with the goal to cut down Orsted and eventually his ascension on becoming the Sword God of his generation. He claims to have become strong using rational methods that he also teaches to his students.

Like in previous generations, battle for who is the strongest swordsman of the generation occurs which also results to which
Swordstyle
 controls the Holy Land of Sword where Gal Farion battles and defeats
Water God
 Reida Reia. He was considered to be the fastest of his generation as not even Water God Reyda could withstand his attacks.

On his journey to the Great Forest, Gal met
Ghislaine Dedoldia
 and trained her in the Sword God Style wherein afterwards, she attained the rank of Sword King. He gifted her
Hiramune
 as proof of her mastery.

Plot

Volume 9 - Special Student Chapter






Gal meeting Eris in the Holy Land of Swords



Eris arrives at the Holy Land of Swords and defeats Jino and Nina. Gal took interest in Eris' potential in the sword and agrees to train her as his student to defeat Orsted, a dream that they both share. News of
Badigadi
 attacking
Ranoa Magic Academy
 also reaches Gal and is looking forward to fighting the demon lord but lost interest when Nina told him that Rudeus has already defeated him.

Volume 10 - Younger Sisters Chapter

When Eris fought
Auber Corvette
, Gal has been watching the fight for some time and and calls them out to stop before the two kills each other. Auber greets Gal confirming he received his letter and has never met such a swordsman like Eris who was like a beast then realizes that she is the Mad Dog that Gal mentioned. That evening, Ghislaine questions Gal's training for Eris. Gal knowing Ghislaine will not understand even if you carefully spell it out from A to Z for her explains that Orsted is 『an existence beyond rationality』while recalling his own battle against Orsted when he was a Sword Saint where he was left alive and without a limb missing by Orsted. Ghislaine still doesn't understand so Gal explains why he brought Auber for Eris'
North God Style
 training and his plan to also bring a
Water God Style
 teacher in the future so Eris can cope up with the techniques of each school that Orsted uses at God Rank.

Volume 13 - Everyday-life Chapter

Gal invites
Reida Reia
 and
Isolte Cruel
 into the sword santuary with the objective of teaching Eris how to fight and counter the Water God Style, with Reida remarking how weird it is for him to ask her anything as he hates to rely on others for help, He makes Isolte fight against Eris and Nina, and makes the three of them train together.

Volume 23 - Young Man Period - Decisive Battle Chapter

He was one of the people employed by
Geese
 to kill
Rudeus
 by disguising himself as a guard that went to the Supard village for inspection.

When the first stage of the final battle began, he fought
Eris Greyrat
 who was accompanied by
Ruijerd
. His defeat against
Jino Britts
 made him lose his confidence, and he made 2 mistakes that costed him his victory. He hesitated using the Sword God Style and used the unfamiliar Water God Style due to his lack of confidence, and his tunnel vision of
Eris
 made him not notice Ruijerd's presence.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Legacy

Gal's Nodobue that he gives to Eris before passing is returned to the Holy Land of Swords and is used by Jino Britts

The 2 Sword Emperors does not recognize Jino to be the current Sword God and left the Holy Land of Swords to start their own school

Jino does not hold a grudge against Rudeus' group while the Sword Saints are upset that Jino refuses to defend the "honor" of the Sword God Style

Rudeus asks Jino to assist the
ORSTED Corporation
 in their preparation against
Laplace
's return that is supposed to be requested to Gal but Jino refuses as he only wields his sword for himself and his family

Orsted
 concludes that Jino's refusal that he will never be a disciple of
Hitogami

Despite Eris being responsible for Gal's death, Nina still considers Eris to be her friend and when she visits the Holy Land of Sword, Nina invites her to stay with them.

Power and Abilities

Sword God Style






Gal training Eris



As someone possessing God-rank, he was considered the strongest in the Sword God Style until Jino Britts defeated him. He possesses an extremely fast sword arm and was acknowledged by the Water God as the only man whose sword she could not stop.
 His speed is second only to Jino Britts. He knows various techniques of the Sword God Style and is adept at using them.

Water God Style

He possesses proficiency in the Water God Style at around the level of a Water Emperor, and was able to combine the Longsword of Light of the Sword God Style with one of the secret arts of the Water God Style. He thinks that he would have been able to reach great heights in the Water God Style if he had continued to pursue it.

Battle Aura






Gal's Battle Aura



Being the Sword God, when Gal unleashes his Battle Aura, it releases a pressure so strong that it knocked back Eris out of the dojo and the door also got destroyed as she crashed through it.

Equipment

Windpipe (Nodobue)

One of the Yulian
Sword God's seven swords
, It was a sword with a sparkling golden blade

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Gal: "You have good eyes, huh. Just who is it that you want to cutdown?"

Eris: "The Dragon God! The Dragon God Orsted!"

Gal: "Hahhahaaa! I see, if you compare me to Orsted then I'm certainly a small fry! I see, I see, so it's him that you want to cut down! So there was someone besides me who wanted to cut him down!"

Reida
: "What, are you planning on having this beast assassinate me or something?"

Gal: "Goodness, no. What use would there be in killing an old lady who would croak on her own?"

Reida: "In that case, tell me what you're thinking. Why do you need me to teach her the Water God Style? Just who on earth is she planning to fight?"

Gal: "Eris over there wants to defeat the Dragon God Orsted."

To Eris: "
That person
, for some reason won't fight seriously. Even though he knows sword techniques and
magic
, he'll limit himself to just
Battle Aura
 and barehanded techniques whenever possible. Especially when he knows his opponent's skills. Battle Aura and barehanded techniques, if these aren't enough he'll use magic. He'll try to win as efficiently as possible, but in unfamiliar situations... Seeing a technique for the first time, he will try to study it. That is probably his weak point."

Trivia

He lost confidence in his Sword God Style because
Jino Britts
 defeated him despite the student's inexperience.

He is hinted to be emotionally blind, being incapable of understanding Jino Britts's and Eris's strength over him. Jino defeated him only to ask for his permission to marry his daughter and Eris drew her strength from the desire to protect her dearest. Gal Farion believes that a person is strong simply because they trained on top of having talent.

Until
Light Novel Volume 25
 only Gal's lower face with a smile is always shown in the Light Novel and
Manga
.

Gallus
======

Redirect to:
Gallus Cleaner

Gallus Cleaner
==============

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Gallus Cleaner
 is a North Saint and a smuggler of
Windport
.

Appearance

Gallus is a fierce-looking man with a scar over his right eye.

Personality

Gallus is a cruel man that has no qualms in harming children and setting up his allies to die for his own benefits. He is also a cunning strategist, capable of setting up an elaborate plan to get rid of fellow smugglers and kidnap
Doldia tribe
 members on a large scale.

Background

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Plot

Gallus is first seen after
Rudeus
 has just received a Foresight
Demon Eye
 and bumps into him. Rudeus then pushes him with wind magic which saves him from getting hit by a pot dropped above them. Gallus then helps in smuggling
Ruijerd
 from Wind Port to
Zant Port
 as thanks for saving him.

Later, once it is revealed that he had even deeper schemes to capture as many
beastfold
 children as possible, Rudeus reluctantly fights him to prevent him from doing so along with the Sacred Beast. He was strong enough where even with the
demon eye
, Rudeus was on the defensive the entire time, unable to counterattack, until
Geese
 fakes a tear gas bomb, giving Rudeus a window to knock him unconscious. After being detained he was given to the Zant Port officials.

Power and Abilities

North Saint





Gallus attacking Rudeus



He was skilled enough to fight a group of Dedoldia tribe members alone. In his battle against Rudeus, Gallus is able to close the distance between them and used throwing knives to hit Rudeus in the right leg to end the chase.

Equipment

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Rudeus:
 “You sure do go about things in a very indirect manner,”

Gallus:
 “I told you, we aren’t a united organization. Can’t let my comrades get ahead of me.”

Trivia

He is one of the few characters that was added in the
Light novel
.

In the
Web novel
, the smuggler that help Rudeus was unnamed and without more participation in the plot.

Geese
=====

Redirect to:
Geese Nukadia

Geese Nukadia
=============

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Geese Nukadia
 (
ギース・ヌーカディア
,

Gīsu Nūkadia
)
 is an adventurer
Rudeus
 met while he was being held captive by the Dorudia Tribe due to a misunderstanding and is later revealed to have been a member of
Paul
 and
Zenith Greyrat
's
former party
.

Spoilers ahead

Though a supporting character throughout most of the story, it is revealed toward the end of Mushoku Tensei that he is actually a hidden Apostle of Hitogami and the final antagonist of the series.

Appearance

Geese is a Demon Race with described to have monkey-like facial features. He is lean and somewhat muscular.

Personality

A man of good-nature but is also manipulative, deceptive, easy going, and quite adaptive. Hard working and earnest to the point of placing himself in prison in order to take care of someone inside. Live his life following his rule of Jinx.

Background

Geese is the last survivor of the Demon Race Nuka Tribe, which was wiped out due to Hitogami's schemes. He is also a member of the party,
Fangs of the Black Wolf
, the same party that
Paul
,
Zenith
,
Tallhand
,
Elinalise
, and
Ghislaine
 were all a part of. He served as the thief and jack of all trades in the party, avoiding traps in the dungeon and cooking are but some of his contributions to the party. He lives his life by his code which he calls Jinx as it was the reason how he survived so many dangerous situations since he was a child. After teaching
Zenith
 how to cook, he swore to never teach anyone how to cook anymore since that was what eventually lead to the dissolution of their party.

Power and Abilities

As a thief, he can do mapping, establish the proper directions to advance in a dungeon, manage food supplies, and sort raw materials. He has the judgement necessary to decide whether to withdraw from a labyrinth as well. He has the ability to do numerous odd jobs in as a reader. He is able to make money by gambling, when in a pinch. He is also a great chef, but does not like to teach others how to cook due to his previous student
Zenith
 marrying
Paul
 soon after, causing the
Party
 to disband.

Equipment

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

He reached S-Rank as an adventurer, an impressive feat considering that he has almost zero combat capabilities.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

To
Eris
:
 "Being able to fight is a wonderful thing, you know? If you want to live in this world, there's nothing more essential than that. Don't waste your talent."

Ghyslaine:
 "Geese."

Geese:
 "Yo, Ghyslaine, it's been a while."

Ghyslaine:
 "Yeah."

Geese:
 "I'll be headin' on first."

Ghyslaine:
 "Yeah, give my regards to Paul."

Geese:
 "Sure... maybe, when you come too, at that time, lets drink together. Paul gettin' drunk and shovin' his face in ya chest and Zenith gettin' all sullen... I'd like to see that again..."

Ghyslaine:
 "Zenith probably won't be there for a while. I'll probably come first."

Geese:
 "Heh, I get it... well, 'til we all meet again..."

Trivia

Rudeus
 compared his face with
Lupin III
.

Orsted
 once used a hypnosis magic from Nuka tribe to put
Zanoba
 asleep, but whether Geese could use this magic or not is unknown.

He has his own set of beliefs and are often called Jinx.

Spoilers ahead

He is the one hidden apostle that Orsted never knew about and could never find due to Geese always living and dying as an
adventurer
 in every loop Orsted has ever been in.

References

Geese Nukadia/Story
===================

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Juvenile Period

Volume 4 - Voyage Chapter

Goes to the village and meets
Rudeus
 in Prison. He joins Rudeus in his escape but is caught afterwards. After Rudeus leaves, Geese joins him on his way to Milis.

Volume 5 - Reunion Chapter

Meets with
Paul
 and help him reconcile with Rudeus.

Youth Period

Volume 13- Labyrinth Chapter

Meets up with the the Fang of the Black Wolf, minus Ghyslaine and Elinalise, with Roxy in the party as well to go into the Labyrinth and find Zenith. He leads the way in the party and identifies traps. After the fight with the Manatite Hydra, he sells some of the Manatite.

Volume 21- Cliff Chapter

Meets up with Rudeus and his family in Milishion. Goes to Cliff's house to meet up with Zenith and take her around the town, but "mistakenly" hands Zenith over to a servant of Latreia House who Rudeus was currently feuding with. Was confronted by Rudeus about where Zenith was, he revealed that he left her in the care of a Latreia House servant and tells Rudeus that he didn't know about the feud. After Rudeus gets Zenith back and has Zenith examined by Miko and before they returned to Cliff's house, He leaves a letter with Aisha to Rudeus a letter revealing that he was Hitogami's Apostle all along and that He was saved by Hitogami many times when he was small and he decided to become his apostle until he repaid his debt, even though he was deceived into destroying his own tribe. The letter said that he saw Rudeus in his fight and declared his intention to fight Rudeus head on with his own forces that he will gather.

Young Man Period

Volume 22 - Organization Chapter

It was revealed by Kishirika's power that Geese was currently in a forest at the Eastern tip of the Northern lands of the Kingdom of Bihaeril meeting with someone, but her sight of him was cut off by Hitogami before she could see who he was meeting.

Georg
=====

Georg is the principal of the
Ranoa Magic Academy
.

Appearance

Georg is a short and stout man with a mustache. He is bald and wears a wig all the time.

Personality

He is normally reasonable and is willing to give someone who made a mistake a chance, but would get mad easily if his wig is removed.

Background

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Plot

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Power and Abilities

Georg is a King-ranked wind magician.

Trivia

Even though he's a king-class wind magician, he rarely used the wind magic because it can blow his wig away.

He uses the same speech every year during the opening ceremony.

Ghislaine
=========

Redirect to:
Ghislaine Dedoldia

Ghislaine Dedoldia
==================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

No, I will go hunt down those that killed Sauros-sama and kill them.

Ghislaine, to
Rudeus

Ghislaine Dedoldia
 (
ギレーヌ・デドルディア
,

Girēnu Dedorudia
)
 is a talented swordswoman from the
beast race
, is the daughter of
Gustav
, the former Doldia Village chief, the mentor of
Eris
, and the student of
Rudeus Greyrat
 in
magic
 and other subjects. She is one of the few people who have become a Sword King.

Appearance

Ghislane has dark skin and wears a revealing leather outfit.
She has a slender build along with rippling muscles, and is full of scars all over her body. She wears an eye patch with sculpted like face gives off a delinquent boss vibe. She completely feels like a female amazon warrior from some fantasy story. Also she has beast-like ears and a tail like a tiger's. Her fur is very thick.

Personality

Ghislaine was described as a strong-willed individual and a meathead by
Paul
. She often has an expressionless face that can feel intimidating, but behind that face is a more emotional and rash person at times. She is like an older sister to Eris, looking after her and listening to her problems. She is deeply loyal to
Sauros
 and Eris, who saved her when she was on the brink of death.

When she was younger, she was extremely violent and dumb, totally incapable of reasoning. She would just try to solve all problems with violence, creating a lot of trouble for the tribe, to the point everyone felt relieved when she was taken by an adventure forcing her to leave the tribe.

Ghislaine is also diligent and hard-working. During the time of Rudeus a tutor in Eris' house, Ghislaine succesfully learned to read, write, count and do elementary magic.

Background

Because of her enormous power, Ghislaine's childhood was spent by her bullying
her brother
, causing troubles and at some point lead to her running away from her family.






First meeting of Ghislaine and Gal in the
Anime



At age 10, Ghislaine first meets
Gal Farion
 who was a wandering swordsman at the time and took her in due to her wild nature and her potential as a swordswoman.

After becoming a Sword king, she traveled with
Paul Greyrat
's
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 party as a warrior and she also the one who train a sword skill to
Paul Grayrat
.

After that, their adventurers party disbands, due to
Zenith
 and Paul's marriage.

She became victim to many scams because she did not knew how to read, write and due to her not knowing math she was fooled many times in money matters, this led her wanting to gain wisdom and knowledge.

When she was down on the ground due to hunger and weak health conditions, Eris' family took her in and gave her a job as a bodyguard and sword instructor with a monthly salary of 2
Asura
 gold coins.

Plot

She was first seen coming to pick up Rudeus and safely transported him to the
Citadel of Roa
. When Rudeus' plan backfired, Eris and Rudeus were kidnapped again and almost died, but Ghislaine stepped in just in time and saved both of them by finishing off the kidnappers. After Rudeus was hired as Eris' tutor, she was also tutored by him, she convinced Eris that math and literacy was important after telling her tale of how she nearly died from being scammed before. Later, on Eris' tenth birthday, Rudeus saw that she was hungry, but being a guard on duty, she was unable to go and dine with the other guests. In a kind act, Rudeus asked a maid to set up a private party with food in his room. Rudeus gave both of them wands signifying that have successfully passed their exams, she was honored to receive this gift, setting as an example to Eris again. She would then gift Eris a ring that was passed down her family as a reminder of her.






Ghislaine during the Teleport Incident



On Rudeus' 10th birthday, she was tasked to distract him while the rest of the family prepared a private party, asking to see his most powerful
spell
. Later that day they would go out to a field outside the city, then and there a storm began to brew before Rudeus had the chance to cast his spell, when suddenly a
mysterious masked man
 appeared and try to kill Rudy, thinking he was the source of this chaos, instantly parrying them, within a blink of an eye, everyone was transported later called the
Teleport Incident
. She ended up in the
Strife Zone
 and would then try to locate anyone she knew, but all she discovered was the corpses of
Philip
 and
Hilda Boreas Greyrat
. She then went back to try to reunite with everyone where she came across the family butler in a survivors camp in
Fittoa Region
, where she would then spend the next 3 years helping its refugees.

Once Rudy and Eris made their way back, she rejoiced that both of them were alive, and shocked to hear that they were teleported to the
Demon Continent
. She had been worried about their safety for all throughout those 3 years, when it came time for the meeting, they broke the news to Eris about her family's demise and that most of the Greyrat staff are still missing. She and the family butler also then argued over what course of action should be taken, with both options being unfavorable, Eris chose to leave on her own accord. Despite desiring revenge for the death of
Sauros
, Ghislaine puts this on hold for now to train and watch over Eris' during her time in the Holy Land of Swords.

After 6 months, Ghislaine questions the training method of Gal for Eris causing Gal to explain his plan for Eris of having knowledge of all the three sword styles to defeat
Orsted
 who can use all of its technique in God rank. Ghislaine realizes the reason why
Auber Corvette
 is there to train Eris in the
North God Style
 and confirms with Gal that he plans to invite a
Water God Style
 teacher in the future. Convinced with Gal's answer and despite being annoyed by his smell, Ghislaine welcomes Auber who also returns the gesture.

Power and Abilities

Ghislaine using Longsword of Light
Demon Eye seeing the huge mana flow of the red orb
1/2

Physical Abilities

Enhanced senses of the
Beast Race
 that helped her detect
Wii Taa
. This includes enhanced hearing, smell, sight and strength.

Sword King

Ghislaine became a
Sword King
 under the tutelage of her master Gal Farion and is able to use the Long Sword of the Light to defeat multiple enemies at high speed and she is able to match
Almanfi
 in terms of combat and speed. Unknown to Ghislaine her prowess in the Sword God Style made her to be the Goddess of the Forest Reinu (based from the last syllable of Ghislaine's name) and the protector of the Malkin Mercenary State after fighting side by side with
Viga
, who wears a pendant of with a portrait of Ghislaine.

Magic Abilities






Ghislaine practicing Fireball in the Anime



Elementary Ranked Fire Magic

Ghislaine learns Elementary Ranked Fire Magic under Rudeus' training

Demon Eye

Ghislaine has a Demon Eye hidden under the eye patch on her right eye. It allows her to see the flow of
Mana
.

Equipment

Hiramune






Ghislaine's Weapon: Hiramune



Hiramune lit. Flat Core is Ghislaine's weapon, given to her by Gal when she became Sword King and is one of the
Sword God's seven swords
 that she sheathes by her left hip and usually uses forward grip style in fighting. Hiramune is a katana with a dark colored back side and patterns by its reddish edge side. The golden cross guard also serves as a blade collar but it is longer on backside and as it crosses to the edge side. The dark hilt is slightly curved and has a golden pommel.

Like Paul, Ghislaine is always seen with Hiramune wherever she goes and when on guard duty she is always ready to draw her Hiramune at a moment's notice.

Achievements

These are the achievements that Ghislaine gained through her adventure, action, and training:

S-Ranked Adventurer

Sword King Class Swordswoman

Princess Ariel's Bodyguard

Quotes

Rudeus:

"Ghislaine, what do you plan to do next? Will you stay around?"
Ghislaine:

"No, once I leave Eris-sama with you, my work here is done. I plan to head back to the Asura Kingdom."
Rudeus:

"Asura Kingdom? Going to help rebuild the Fedoa Region?"
Ghislaine:

"No, I will go hunt down those that killed Sauros-sama and kill them."

Trivia

Ghislaine has the ability pick the correct answer out of two choices consistently, despite being weak in analysis.

Nobody believes that Ghislaine can read, count, and do (elementary) magic.

She is able to speak both human and beast god tongue.

Judging from
Gal Farion
's sword collection, Ghislaine is the only Sword King before Eris,
Nina
 and
Jino
 ascended to the position.

Thanks to her demon eye, she could see through teleportation traps when clearing labyrinths during her adventurer days with Paul's party.

The reason why Gustav sent
Pursena
 and
Linia
 to the
Ranoa Magic Academy
 is that she and her brother Gyes are unsuited to become village chief.

According to Paul in a letter he wrote to Rudeus on his trip to meet Eris for the first time, she never lost to Paul in anything except for when in bed.

Elinalise
 states that she wagged her tail when Paul was around (in the sense that Ghislaine flirted a lot with Paul); Ghislaine states that this was because she was in mating season.

Rudeus thought Paul had plans to take Ghislaine as a third wife.

Friends

Paul Greyrat

Paul is Ghislaine's former party mate in
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 who Ghislaine describes as a frivolous man who is full of bad and useless ideas thus resulting to the bad reputation of their party. Although Paul mentioned that he took advantage during Ghislaine's mating season, Ghislaine has no feelings for Paul but she still upholds his duty to Paul of taking care of Rudeus when he begins working as Eris' teacher.

Elinalise Dragonroad

A old friend.

Gal Farion





Ghislaine's first meeting with Gal in the Anime



Gal is Ghislaine's teacher in the
Sword God Style
 who took interest in teaching Ghislaine who was a like hungry tiger who has a potential to be Sword Emperor at the time.
 Gal would tirelessly train Ghislaine and countlessly tell her to be "Logical" which Ghislaine describes to be similar to Rudeus' method of teaching. When Ghislaine became a Sword King, Gal gives him one of his swords Hiramune as proof of her mastery.

Upon meeting Rudeus for the first time on their trip to the
Citadel of Roa
, she questions whether or not he's actually Paul's son, noting him to be "way too polite for Paul's son" she asks why Rudeus wants to learn the
Beast God Language
 to meet pretty
Beast Race
 girls. During their time together, she learns how to read, write, how to do math and Fire Magic alongside Eris while Ghislaine also trains Rudeus in the
Sword God Style
 but she notices that Rudeus' approach in learning the Sword God Style is similar with how he learns
Magic
 and concludes that Rudeus is more suited with the
North God Style
 would gladly find him a teacher of the North God Style should he decide to pursue being a
Swordsman
. For this, she becomes rather grateful to him and also respects Rudeus as much as Gal Farion. Rudeus also has Ghislaine's respect, such respect that Ghislaine actually considers their advice valuable to the point of momentarily putting her goals aside to follow this advice.

Fittoa Region

After the Fangs of the Black Wolf party disbanded, Ghislaine was cheated and is left with no money and was on the verge of starving to death when she was found by Sauros, Philip and Eris who hires her to be their bodyguard and since then she is loyal towards her benefactor.
 Despite burning with desire to avenge the death of Sauros, Ghislaine did not pursue vengeance until she entrusts Eris to Rudeus and plans to avenge Sauros afterwards.

Boreas Family
 for the
Beast Race

Ghislaine Dedoldia/Story
========================

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Pre-Rudeus

Ghislaine was born to the Dedoldia tribe responsible for protecting the Sacred Beast. Ghislaine refused the responsibility and even refused to learn proper speech or fighting. She was eventually taken away by a wandering swordsman.

Once she became a Sword Saint, she joined
Paul Greyrat
's party. She joined them for many adventures, some of them in a bed with Paul. The party eventually disbanded when Paul married
Zenith Greyrat
. She took many jobs until she became a sword king and eventually became a bodyguard/sword instructor for
Eris Boreas Greyrat
.

Juvenile Period

She's eventually asked to bring
Rudeus Greyrat
 to Boreas territory in exchange for teaching her how to read, write and do basic magic. She brings him over and later helps save Rudeus and Eris when they're 'captured' by bandits. While training Rudeus in swordplay was difficult, everything else went smoothly for her. She gets along with Rudeus for the next four years and even helps him learn Beast God. When Rudeus is targeted for a possible mana disaster, she protects him. However she's the first to get caught up in it and flung far away.

Over the next two years she makes her way back to the Boreas area to find that it's been thrown into chaos after the mana disaster. She helps with rebuilding until Eris and Rudeus return. She defends Eris only for her to be left alone. The next day she leaves on a journey with Eris.

Youth Period

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Young Man Period

Ghislaine leaves the sword sanctuary with Eris, to help Rudeus in his fight against Orsted, she arrives with Eris, Silphy and Roxy but doesn't get involved in the battle. After the battle ended and Eris marries Rudesu, Ghislaine leaves Sharia to find the people that killed Sauros and kill them.

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Ginger
======

Ginger York is the loyal subordinate of
Zanoba
, formerly serving as his imperial guard.

Appearance

Ginger is a young woman wearing a military uniform with short dark brown hair that is tied behind her head with a loose bang at the right of her face.

Personality

Ginger has a serious personality and always has her master's best interest in mind. She is deeply loyal to Zanoba even though he sold her to get the
Roxy
 doll that Pax bought, but is not afraid to lecture him when she deem necessary.

Background

Ginger was asked to look after Zanoba by his mother, Minerva personally and swore in that moment to devote herself in his service. She served Zanoba until he traded her for a figurine of Roxy. She wanted to leave her position, but Pax held her family hostage and prevented her from acting on it.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Plot

When Pax heard the news of
Rudeus
 arriving the Shirone Kingdom, Ginger was ordered to lure Rudeus into a trap. She carried out the order, but arranged to send the
Ruijerd
 figurine carried by Rudeus to Zanoba as an act of defiance. After Zanoba captured Pax while Ruijerd and
Eris
 saved her family, she turned against Pax.

When Pax was exiled and Zanoba was send to Ranoa, she left her position as a knight to follow Zanoba to continue fulfilling Minerva's request. She joins
Ruijerd Superdia
 where they work as bodyguards of
Norn Greyrat
 and
Aisha Greyrat
 on their travel to Rudeus'
home
 in
Sharia
 while
Paul Greyrat
 goes to the
Begaritt Continent
 to rescue
Zenith Greyrat
.

In Sharia, Ginger is a constant presence in Zanoba's room where she is usually positioned by the wall attending to the guests and also assists in teaching
Julie
 on speaking the Human God Language. Ginger is also renting an apartment close to the
Ranoa Magic Academy
 instead of the room for bodyguards next to Zanoba's room to avoid presumptuous rumors.

Power and Abilities

She know healing magic and can use the Water God style to parry magic.

.

.

.

She is ranked #12 in skills as an imperial guard in the Shirone Kingdom.

Give And Take
=============

Give And Take
 (
ギブ＆テイク
,

Gibu ando Teiku
)
 is the nineteenth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Summary

After Rudeus convinced Ruijurd to guide them to the nearest inhabited area, Rudeus and Eris fought coyote packs on the way as combat training. But when Rudeus distracted Eris by his grazing her on an attack spell, they were met by a Stone Treant that was swiftly dispatched by Ruijurd and made into firewood. Arriving at the village, Rudeus's anxiety of what to do after Ruijurd leaves fades as a random child greets them before the front gate guard, Rowin, encounters them. Distrustful of outsiders, Rowin tells them to leave before the elder arrives to invite the group in, where Rudeus can't help but feel an uncertain familiarity with the people in the village.

With the sea between the Central and Demon continents homw to the rule of Sea Folk, Rudeus and Eris must head far south to Wenport before traveling through Millis Continent to then trek the Central Continent to return to Asura Kingdom. Given the perils on the road, Rudeus worries of the timelapse such a trek would take, but is surprised hearing Ruijurd state his promise to see them home. While not wanting events to play as Man-God wants, and with the elder noting he's a wanted man in every city, Rudeus hears Ruijurd's dedication is because of his ultimate goal: to clear the Superd's tainted name. Asking how given history, Ruijurd's angry flares trying to explain himself but subsides seeing a toddler fear him.

Ruijurd tells his story, how Laplace gave the demons on the continent rights when humans did not, as well as how the Superd were his fighting force due to their radar like third eye gems, garnering respect as warriors. But when Laplace provided "new spears" for them mid-war, many Superds were offended as their own spears are their souls; as a Superd's spear is their once tail, naturally detatched in adulthood and formed into a spear. When Ruijurd was action commander, he ordered his fellow Superds to comply, resulting in their people gaining incredible strength and madness as a result, attacking friend and foe alike before Ruijurd was freed by his son sacrificing himself. Ruijurd destroyed all the dark spears while the surviving Superd scattered across the world, as Ruijurd swore he would kill Laplace for his treachery, intervening in the battle between the three heroes and Laplace using his son's spear.

While Laplace was the perpetrator, Ruijurd still holds some culpability upon himself for his role, and aims to clear the Superd's reputation no matter what. Hearing how terrible his story was, Rudeus offers to help him in his quest. Ruijurd will protect him and Eris in the wild, while Rudeus and Eris will protect him in cities. His heart moved by Ruijurd's goal, Rudeus can't help but be quietly fearful he is playing into Man-God's plans. The elder has Rowin summon his wife, Rokari, to bring tea for their visitors. Curious to see him standing there, Ruijurd explains how the Migurd are telepaths, and Rudeus is shocked to see Rokari resembles Roxy. Rowin then gets in close to Rudeus asking how he knows Roxy and has her pendant, Rudeus berates him for not giving Roxy proper honorifics, before Rowin explains he and Rokari are Roxy's parents. Realizing he is in Roxy's hometown, Rudeus tries to play that Rowin is his "father-in-law" much to Rowin's annoyance.

Godbard
=======

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Godbard
 (
ゴッドバルド
,

Goddobarudo
)
 also known as
Godbard of the Splendid Heavenly Peak
 (
誇らしき天頂のゴッドバルド
,

Hokorashiki Tenchō no Goddobarudo
)
 is a dwarf and the current Ore God of the Dwarf Village where
Talhand
 is also born.

Appearance

According to elders of the Dwarf Village, Godbard is the spitting image of the late Ore God who was a God Class Earth Mage and with the stone he created, produced a legendary sword.

Background

"Someone who can't make their own sword, couldn't possibly understand my design. Those who don't understand can't assist me."

-Godbard to
Talhand

Godbard is the 38th of 51 siblings but not related by blood since the Dwarf Village he was born has a tradition that all children of the same generation are all grouped together similar to a school. Another tradition of the dwarves is when they reach the age of 7, they are given a name based on things they like or admire or things they are good at
 so he become known as 『Godbard of the Splendid Heavenly Peak』. When the dwarf children are of age, they are taught blacksmithing and crafts as well as simple Earth Magic and Godbard far outshine his siblings and at the recommendation of the elders who lived through the
Laplace Wars
, Godbard is selected as a candidate for the next Ore God and is given preferential treatment.

Even the other children acknowledges Godbard as their future leader especially his close friend Talhand who also considers Godbard to be his first love. Aware that the can never be a better blacksmith than Godbard, Talhand decides to become his right-hand man instead and tells Godbard of his intention of becoming a Water and Wind Magician to assist him in smelting steel despite the tradition of dwarves refused to acknowledge this fact. When Godbard became the Ore God, which effectively makes him the leader of the Dwarf Village, he selects his wife, friends, even his right hand man to which Talhand volunteers himself but Godbard choose someone else that angered Talhand. Due to Talhand's blacksmithing skills not up to par because he is practicing only Water and Wind Magic which Godbard berates him for it. When the ceremony for Godbard to be the Ore God begins, Talhand left the village.

Abilities

Godbard is considered to be talented in Blacksmithing, crafts and Earth Magic among his generation. Even in his childhood he could forge steel as hard as the adults, craft ornaments so splendid to make those see it doubt their eyes and can fix weak points of a building showed to him.

Gods
====

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Gods
 are the most powerful beings on the
Six-Faced World
, and the original guardians of each world. Unlike the other beings that followed with the title of "God" such as the
Seven Great Powers,
 these are actual beings of divine origins and are worshipped by the denizens of their respective worlds as deities.

History

Creation

After the Creator God created the Six-Faced World, he decided to use what was left of his power to split his body into 6 pieces and form divine beings who will ensure that all six worlds would prosper and to keep the worlds in balance. These six beings would come to be known as Gods to the people of their respective world.

Age Of The Gods

At the suggestion of the Human God, all the Gods formed a council to share information and knowledge with each other to benefit their worlds. The Gods would regularly meet, trade information, and discuss the state of the Six-Face World.

The God Wars

The God Wars (not the official name) began when the first Dragon God declared war on 4 of the 6 worlds in order to search for the murderers of his wife, Lunaria. Evidence pointed to a conspiracy of these four worlds that resulted in Lunaria's murder, and so the Dragon God and his five Dragon Generals began their massacre on the Beast world, followed by the Ocean World, the Heaven World, and finally the Demon world. Each time, the Dragon God faced off and killed one of the Gods while his Dragon Generals committed genocide on the world populations. The Human God then opened a rift to allow the survivors of those worlds to escape into the human world.

Dragon World Fall

After the war was won, the Dragon God ordered his Dragon Generals to invade the Human World, even though the Human God was their ally. The Dragon Generals then turned on him in order to stop his rampage but were eventually defeated. In the battle's final moments, the Human God appeared and struck down the Dragon God, revealing himself as the mastermind of the entire war. The Dragon God also revealed that he knew the god who defeated him was not the Human God, but an unknown entity wearing the Human God's form who then dubbed himself Hitogami. After which, Hitogami destroyed the Dragon world however the dying Dragon God challenged the trickster to a final fight that ended with the Dragon God's death and Hitogami's imprisonment in the Void World. With all the Gods dead and Hitogami imprisoned, the Age of the Gods faded into legends.

Abilities and Powers

"No. Like Dragon God, I'm not omniscient either. I don't know everything, but I do know knowledge from the Gods of each world. For example, your true potential..."

Human God to
Laplace

The power of the Gods was immense, they could destroy an entire world without too much effort and were impossible to kill by anyone or anything other than another God. Wounds inflicted by Gods would take around a century to heal even if they are inflicted on another God. The Dragon God's blood had healing properties, and the Demon God could change his size to more then 200 meters (it's unknown if this was exclusive to him or if all Gods could do this).

List of Gods

Creator God

The Creator God was an impossibly ancient being that created many worlds during its lifetime. At some point, it realized that it's death was near and decided to make one last effort to make one last world. But the world it built was unbalanced, so it made 5 more and stuck them all together making the Six-Faced World. Before his death he made the six Gods to govern each world. With his final work completed, the Creator God died.

Sea God

A man with a large amount of tentacles growing from his mouth and squid-like slimy skin.

Beast God

The Beast God Pudoria Dordia is man with two heads, a dog and a cat, riding on a white wolf.

Heaven God

A beautiful God with twin eyes on his forehead and six wings on his back.

Demon God

A man with eight arms and six horns, spanning a height of over three meters. He was considered the second most powerful God.

Human God

A featureless man with a mosaic-covered face. While he was the weakest of the Gods, he was also the most respected by all the other Gods and was considered their leader. He was the one who suggested that all the Gods come together and share their knowledge and technology with each other for the benefit of all worlds. It is due to these meetings that the Human God shared various wisdoms from his world such as the use of "Language" and "Letters" to the other Gods which greatly advanced their civilizations.

Dragon God

The First Dragon God had silver hair, skin covered in silver scale, golden eyes, sharp claws and fangs. He was the most powerful of all the six Gods. He was tricked by Hitogami into killing the other Gods and subsequently destroying 4 of the 6 worlds, only to be killed by Hitogami himself later causing the destruction of his own world.

Hitogami

Hitogami shares the Human God's features, however he is not the original Human God but an imposter wearing his shape. He is actually an unknown entity born in the center of the world that at some point usurped the Human God, and while not a proper God made by the Creator God he still wields divine powers equal to that of a God.

Demigods

Demigods are not actual Gods but rather the offspring of one of the Gods and a mortal. While not as powerful as their divine parents, they still carry immense power within them.

Kishirika Kishirisu

Kishirika Kishirisu is the daughter of the Demon God and the once Demon Empress Kirisis Calisis.

Lunaria

Lunaria is the daughter of the Human God, Wife of the Dragon God,
Laplace
's adopted mother and Orsted's biological mother. She was loved by all and had an almost otherworldly ability to calm people and make them feel safe and at peace. However, after giving birth to Orsted, she was murdered by Hitogami when she used her body as a shield to protect her newborn son, who was the true target of the assassination. Her death was the catalyst that caused the Dragon God, out of sadness and rage, to destroy other worlds believing that the other gods or their servants were responsible for her murder.

Orsted

Orsted's birth was the idea that came from the Human God, who proposed that the Dragon God marry his daughter Lunaria in order to produce a Demigod that is three-quarters God rather than only half, and the result was Orsted.

References

Grabell Zafin Asura
===================

Grabell Zafin Asura
 (
グラーヴェル
・
ザフィン
・
アスラ
)
 is the First Prince of
Asura Kingdom
 and half-brother of
Ariel Anemoi Asura
.

Appearance

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Personality

In the manga, Grabell comes off as being very snobbish. He desires the throne and is not above assassination to get it. He has shown himself to be talented in politics and exercising his authority, being able to see through others' schemes and exploit weaknesses. However, because of his meticulous nature, he is deeply concerned about unknown variables.

Background

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Plot

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Power and Abilities

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Equipment

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

Spoilers ahead!

Despite his talents for politics, the fact that the Asura Kingdom suffers in loops where he is king implies that he ultimately is not a good ruler. This might stem from the fact that he looks down on the lower-class, which he openly admits to.

It was noted by
Orsted
 that in futures were Grabell was to become king of Asura, he would create policies that would lead to them focusing more on their military might, as opposed to magical, which would eventually lead to them being unable to overcome an obstacle hundreds of years in the future.

Great Human-Demon Wars
