Reference

Paul Gaiden: Training arc/Summary
=================================

Information

Summary

Chapter 1: A New Life

After Paul leaves his house and status as a noble, he arrives at Ludd and Marrine's hideout and after telling them that he escaped from his house, he asks if he can stay for a while with them and they accept, after that he ask to Rudd to call the boys and he takes a blanket to sleep in another room. Mary Anne awakens Paul, after talking for a bit, Paul reveals to Mary Anne that he plans to leave the territory because is the lord's son and become an adventurer, Mary Anne hug him and they sleep together.

Chapter 2: Departure

The next day, Rudd gather the boys and Paul tell them that he is going to leave the territory and that Rudd is the boss again, Rudd decides to follow Paul, but he ask him who is going to protect Mary Anne, when they almost start to fight, Mary Anne appears and tell to Paul that she also is going with him, in the end Rudd with his sister and a small group of boys is going to follow Paul and decides to departure the next morning.

In the next Morning a group of knights arrive at the slums searching for an aristocratic noble kid, so the group leave the town aiming to the south of the kingdom of Asura.

Chapter 3: Growth

Paul Group arrives at a town, but Rudd doesn't want to enter because he had a fight with the boss of that town and he with a partner where injured for some weeks and he doesn't want that for Paul, Paul says that is not a problem and they can rest in the town.

The group arrives in the back alleys of the town and tries to negotiate with the boss of the city but fails, Paul decides to take the boss that was more strong to Rudd. The boss is easily defeated and his group falls apart. Paul feels that he is stronger than before. They decide to call Mary Anne and the others to loot their resources and rest in their hideout.

Chapter 4: Their own way

The group is still traveling and obtaining resources. A month has passed since their departure and Paul, Rudd and Mary  Anne are eating in a restaurant. Even though they already left the Millbots region, the Notos family still are searching for Paul. Mary Anne and Rudd asked if he was really kicked from his house, but Paul nodded. After thinking about his actual situation, someone entered the restaurant.

Chapter 5: Brawl

A thug with his men entered the restaurant and complained how that place became a kids hangout and started a fight with Paul and his group. Paul told Mary Anne to hide with the Landlady and say that those guys are small fry. Paul feel that those guys were weak, but excluding Rudd, the other boys are not strong enough to fight, Paul easily defeated one of them and decides to help his allies.

Chapter 6: Differences in Upbringing

After the fight, the Landlady angry, wanted to force to Paul and his group to leave the place for the damages in the store for the fight, even thought was raining that day, one of the boy almost hit the landlady but Paul stops him and tries to negotiate and obtain a single night before they need to leave. Some boys were uncomfortable with Paul's action, questioning him that if he plans to return to being a noble, but Paul angrily refutes that, Mary Anne arrives telling to is better to rest.

Chapter 7: Splitting up and taking another step

The Next day still is raining and Radd tell him that about half of the group disappeared, the reason is that they expected that Paul returned to his home and with that obtain a benefice, Paul asked to himself if every person are like that, Mary annae comfort Paul saying that they always are going to be together, after that they leave the inn. Mary Anne and Radd ask to Paul what they going to do, Paul proposes to do a Dojo breaking and obtain a roof, and decides to go to the village  Water God style Dojo.

Chapter 8: Dojo-busting

Paul and his group decides to search the strongest water god user, so they divided, Paul and Mary anne arrive to a Dojo and Paul defeat everyone without problem, Mary Anne is impressed by Paul skill, but he say that is normal, suddenly one of the boys arrive and say that Rudd was in problem, so they depart to help him.

Chapter 9: Dojo-busting 2

Paul and Mary Anne arrive to another dojo and see that Rudd was in problem against a water god user, and the other boys were already defeated, Paul was a little angry how he wasn't able to use better the terrain, and asked to one of the boys to return to the previous Dojo with Mary Anne and Paul decides to jump in the battle

Chapter 10: Holding back

Paul, Rudd and the other boys returned to the previous dojo and Mary Anne started to treat the injuries, Paul showed his disgust to the boys how they were weak and mood in the dojo becomes heavier, suddenly Mary Anne fall and Paul with Rudd rush to their side, Rudd say that she have a weak constitution and now she had fever. Rudd pick her and rushed with the other boys to a hospital meanwhile Paul was left shocked alone.

Chapter 11: Defeat

Paul was shocked because he was remembering how his mother also had a weak constitution, when he tries to leave the Dojo and follow the other boys, but suddenly a mysterious swordsman appear, he heard a rumor of how a strong boy was doing Dojo busting, and he wanted to meet him, after a brief discussion they start to fight, Paul attack but that mysterious guy was able to evade and counter him but Paul was able to evade, impressed the other guy was able to deal a decisive attack against Paul and he slowly started to lost his conscious.

Chapter 12: Instructor Augusta

Paul awakes and find a mysterious girl and decides to restrain her, asking where is he, the mysterious guy who defeats him appear and present him as Augusta and his daughter Lilia and he ask his, name, Paul present himself

Auguste ask him to release his daughter, because he don't have weapon or any other option he accept, Augusta say that they are in his house Dojo and want to Paul to be his disciple, Paul surprised, say that he can't because he is traveling right now and that he is suited more for the Sword God Style that the Water God Style, Augusta offers him to train him and he can stay lodging for free, Paul declines again and say that he need to go to the hospital to see a friend. Augusta decides to accompany him to the hospital, where Paul finds a Pale Rudd.

Chapter 13: Farewell

Paul asked Rudd what happened to Mary Anne, he answered that she is no longer in danger but her body was weak since her infancy, and even though she gained a little of strength with the years, the events of the previous days and the rain affected her. Paul feels responsible to do something similar again like his mother, Rudd tell him that was his fault to prioritize his own desires over health of his sister, he was always a strong man with many responsibilities with the sister and the slums boys until Paul defeat him and he was able to relax a little, Paul say that Rudd was stronger that him because he don't discarded everything unlike him. Paul makes a hard decision and decides that this is the end of the trip and he needs to take Mary Anne to their home. Rudd asked if he would say goodbye to Mary Anne, Paul said no because it is better that they forget about him. After leaving the hospital, Paul meets Augusta and after talking a bit Paul is dragged to the Dojo where Augusta is the instructor, when they arrive he presents Paul to the other students as a new practitioner, Paul decides that is a good idea to stay for now and pray for the happiness of Mary Anne.

Meanwhile Mary Anne and Rudd talk about how Paul decides to take the decision to separate the group and not force that to Rudd, Mary Anne asks herself if she was able to support him, but Rudd says that was guaranteed meanwhile both cries. A short epilogue for them say that after they returned to the slums in the Millbots region, they both move to a small village some years latter and Rudd married the daughter of the mayor, meanwhile Mary Anne decides to stay single

Chapter 14: Delinquent student.

Paul was now living in the house of Augusta, but sometimes he ran away to sleep with a random woman, when Paul was awakening, Augusta burst into the room to bring him to the dojo, Paul still doesn't recognize Augusta as his master, but Augusta's threat to knock him and bring him to the Dojo naked, without other choices, he accepts.

After they finish the training, they come back to the house of Augusta, Flute received Lilia and Augusta, but show a disgusted face with Paul and force Paul to change his clothes, when he leave Flute complain to Augusta why he picked that boy, Augusta say that he was a rough stone that can be polished, Flute disliked her personality and behavior and doubt that he can change.

Chapter 15: Swordsmanship of the Water God School.

Paul was exploring the market searching for girls to spend the night, when he tries to approach to a girl, some students of the dojo stops him and bring him to train, and they were angry with Paul because he was so impolite with his senpais, Paul see that the girl was observing the situation and decides to provoke them to fight, Paul easily defeat them meanwhile show his skill to the crowds and worked to get the girl's attention, he approached, seduced and bring her to the bed. When he awoke, Augusta forced him to go to the dojo again.

When he arrive, Paul see Lilia training and her foot movements and decide to greet her, Lilia tell him to do not disturb the person that are training, Paul tries to invite him to a date, but she refute his attempts because she know what he is doing with the girls, Paul teased her what did she meant with that and Lilia tries to hit him, but  Augusta stop them, after discussing Lilia leave, meanwhile Paul continue with his training.

Chapter 16: Conviction and Victory.

In the house of Augusta, Flute was discussing with Paul how he doesn't help in the house but Paul refuted her saying that was not in his deal in Augusta, Flute Angry , reduce his amount of meal until he starts to help.

In the dojo, Augusta was training Paul, giving him tips to improve. Paul wanted a rematch battle and Augusta accepted, because the training and using as reference Lilia  foot movements, Paul was able to land a hit to Augusta. Augusta was surprised because how he discover the trick of the movement that was still in development and accept that he lost, Paul was expecting more of him, and decides that is time to go away, but Augusta tell him that still have the problem of money and they still are in a draw (including their first meeting was 1 win-1 lose for both), Also tells him again how see his talent with the water god style, Paul change the theme and tell that Flutte reduced his meal and Augusta sa that he is going to fix that

When they return to the House, Augusta talks to Flute about the meal problem, Flute angrily asks why Paul is so special compared with the other students, and Augusta reveals that today he lost against Paul. Flute and Lilia are surprised by the news. After that Lilia decides to leave and Flute follows Augusta's order.

Chapter 17: The Final Battle.

With a new day, Paul wanted to settle his battle score with Augusta and find a way to fix his money problem to leave the city. When Paul was exploring the city, searching again for another woman, she found a girl leaving a weapon shop and asked her if she was a traveler, but  her answer was that she was an adventurer. They talked and in the end, they slept together.

In the next day, Paul decides that he is going to be an adventurer to gain money but before that, he want to defeat Augusta and decides to go to the dojo and challenge him, he gladly accept and start another fight in the dojo, Paul planned to use his previous strategy to win, but Augusta don't move his foot, leaving paul off guard and Augusta was able to defeat him. Paul was astonished after he lost against him again and angry left the dojo.

Chapter 18: Determination and...

Paul sneak to the dojo and finds that Lilia is training, she was surprised and drop her sword showing her hands with blood for the training, Paul tries to Seduce Lilia but she reject him, Lilia was angry with Paul and how hel was accepted by her father but he mostly spend his time doing nothing,  meanwhile the others put a lot of effort in the training, after that Paul leave.

Some time later, the amount of battle between Paul and Augusta exceeded 20 battles, but Paul still wasn't able to have more wins than Augusta. After talking a bit, Augusta declined the battle for tomorrow because the current Water God is going to arrive. Lilia and other students, surprised, decided to clean up the dojo meanwhile Paul asked to himself how she may be.

Chapter 19: Water God Reida.

Paul arrives at the dojo and finds that there are more people than usual and the dojo roof was destroyed and finds that Augusta was talking with the Water god Reida. Augusta asks her why she broke the roof and tells that it is cool to arrive from above. After talking a bit, Reida challenged Augusta to a sparring duel and he accepted. Paul observes the battle until Reida uses a strange movement and disarms Augusta. After talking a bit, Reida decides stay for some time in the dojo.

Chapter 20: Signs of turmoil.

On the night Augusta family, Reida and Paul were at dinner, Reida talked with Augusta and asked for Lilia sword and wanted to see her swordsmanship, meanwhile Paul and Flute felt left out with their conversations. For the next few days, Paul was seducing some women again in the street and decided to go to the dojo after some. He finds that Lilia was angry with him because some thugs that were defeated by Paul and his group in the past were searching for him for vengeance and were causing problems in the dojo. Even though they were repelled by his father and the water god, this was damaging the reputation of the place and wanted to kick Paul from the house, Paul say that is his father decision and she decides to attack him meanwhile discharge her emotions, when he was avoiding some attacks, Paul hear a voice and was able to deflect a attack from Reida, Saying that Augusta was right and he was the skill, Reida attack him and Paul tries to counter attack meanwhile she smile.

Chapter 21: Paul VS Reida.

Paul was in the floor without understanding what happened, Reida tells him that he have the talent but not the desire of the strength and is a waste, and tell to Augusta that she decides to train him personally, Paul was angry how they decide without his permission (As a note, he dont see her as a desirable woman, only like another opponent), Reida tell him that she is going to let him if he was able to scratch her, with Reida provocation, Paul attack but was defeated.

The next day Agusta arrived where Paul was sleeping with another random woman again, Paul was demotivated because Reida was a monster, Augusta said that he may increase his water god style rank. When Paul arrived at the dojo, the other students were angry about how he was disrespectful with Reida. Paul was feeling stressed like when he lived in his house.

Chapter 22: Plague God.

Reida was training at the dojo, and after training a bit decided to challenge Paul again and he accepted. Paul suddenly awakened in his bed in the house of Augusta and discovered that he fainted without knowing how he lost again. Paul fell hungry and decides to go to the kitchen, finding Flute drinking wine, she tells him that there are not food and was sad and angry how Augusta and Lilia spend so much time in swordsmanship with Reida and blames Paul for that, saying that he is the Plague God because he made everyone around him unhappy, after a tantrum of her, Paul decides to return to his bedroom, and thinks that is better to leave soon, but he dont know where is his sword after he was knocked up by Reida, still decides to spend the night outside. In the next day he arrives to the dojo to search for his sword, but he wasn't able to find it, also Reida, Augusta and Lilia are absent, the other students see that he dont posee a sword right now and decides to mock him with attacks, Paul angry asked if they hide his sword but they deny that, calling him the Plague God.

Chapter 23: The true intentions of Augusta.

Paul angry with the other student, fight against them using a style similar of Rudd (like a north god style), defeating everyone in the dojo, Paul asked again where is his sword but they weren't able to answer and decides to leave the Dojo, ignoring Lilia that arrived and was watching the situation.

When Paul was in a restaurant, Augusta found him, Paul told him that he doesn't want to return to the dojo but Augusta tells him that he already knew the situation from Lilia and tells him that she has his sword and the students are going to be punished. Paul asks Augusta why he has an obsession with him, he tells him that even if Lilia is doing her best, it is not enough to be the Dojo Instructor, So he wanted Paul to marry Lilia and inherit the dojo, because he had a great potential. After the conversation Augusta  wanted to teach something new to Paul, but he says that he cannot teach anything new anymore and uses a cheap sword obtained in the dojo to fight. Thanks to Reida training, he was able to counter a counter attack from Augusta and win. Augusta was surprised how much growth in a short amount of time, Paul says that this cut his relations, but Reida arrives breaking the cheap sword of Paul, and tells him that the training continues tomorrow and he needs to return to the house.

Chapter 24: The worst farewell.

In the night inside of Augusta House, Paul decides to leave, but before that he remembers that Lilia had his sword, so he decides to sneak to her room. When he enters he finds his sword and after that he sees Lilia sleeping face, and remembers the words of Augusta about the marriage, and how he recently was spending time only with women older than him, and decides to get on her bed. Lilia awakens and tries to shout but Paul stops her and decides to vent his recent frustrations with her.

Some hours after, before the dawn, Paul awake and remember the things that he do to Lilia, and thinks how may react their fathers (and probably how Augusta may force his marriage with Lilia) so he decides to escape, but when he leaves the house, he find that Reida was waiting for him, because she suspected that he may ran away (also she in unaware the recent events with Lilia), after discussing they start to fight, because he know that he can't win, decides to focus to escape and because all the training with Reida, he was able to deflect her attack and ran away. Reida was surprised that he was able to do that even though she wasn't doing her best and decided to let him away.

Paul Greyrat
============

Information

Chronology

Powers and Abilities

Relationships

Gallery

Paul Greyrat
 (
パウロ・グレイラット
,

Pauro Gureiratto
)
, born
Paul Notos Greyrat
 (
パウロ・ノトス・グレイラット
,

Pauro Notosu Gureiratto
)
, was the father of
Rudeus Greyrat
,
Norn Greyrat
 and
Aisha Greyrat
 who was both a talented man that became advanced in all three sword styles at a young age and a lustful man that attracted and slept with many women, but he eventually marries
Zenith Latreia
.

Following the
Teleport Incident
 and inability to find
his family
, Paul fell into depression and drowned his sorrows in alcohol until his reunion with
Rudeus
.

Appearance

Paul was a tall, muscular and handsome man with sandy light-brown hair where part of his hair is short that frames his face while the rest is gathered in a long ponytail that rests above his shoulder, green eyes and a mole near his left eye.

Personality

Paul was a confident, bold and playful man. Despite being born an Asuran noble, people who knew Paul described him to be rude and speaks like a thug which causes the same people to be surprised that
Rudeus Greyrat
 is his son. He was very caring of his loved ones and would go to great lengths to protect them.

Paul was also a lustful person drawn to women with large breasts, a trait that is seen in most of the Notos Family. He had a history of being a womanizer, bedding several women (especially comrades) before Zenith tied him down. As stated by Rudeus during his time in the
Demon Continent
, Paul wasn't a bad dad, but he wasn't a good person (in terms of fidelity, anyways).

Paul had a tendency to jump to conclusions and not hear people out, which has caused contention with other characters.

Background






Paul and Zenith settling down in Buena Village



Paul's birth name is
Paul Notos Greyrat
, born from a high ranking noble family in the
Asura Kingdom
. He got into a fight with his father Amarant and decided to leave his house and throw away the Notos name to become an
adventurer
. From there he formed a party called
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 consisting of six members, him included. Sometime later, he got married to one of his team members,
Zenith
, who gave birth to
Rudeus Greyrat
 and they settle in
Buena Village
.

Equipment

Paul's Beloved Sword






Paul's Sword in the Light Novel



Paul used a double edge sword that has a triangular shaped cross guard with 2 triangle holes and he was always seen carrying his sword where ever he goes incase of emergencies even while sleeping, a habit he formed when he was an Adventurer
 that
Rudeus Greyrat
 calls it "Paul's Beloved Sword".

Adventurer Card

Although Paul has retired from adventuring after settling down in Buena Village, he still kept his Adventurer Card always with him at the sheathe of his sword along with some
Asura Gold Coins
.

Short Sword






Paul's unnamed Short Sword in the Light Novel



"It was my keen eyesight that helped me to identify this sword's true power."

-Paul Greyrat

Paul also used a double edge short sword that has a curved black blade with 3 holes where the middle whole is bigger to the other 2. It also have a circular crossguard with a bow knuckle that wraps arount its wielder's hand and a silver pommel that he dual wields in his offhand.
 Paul bought the short sword in
Rapan
 because of its ability [Armor Break] where the harder the opponent's armor is; the sharper the cutting edge gets which is a rare ability that the seller was not able to identify and treated it like a dull butter knife that couldn't even saw through dried meat and practically sold for a few copper coins. The Armor Break ability is also mentioned in the book of [The Legend of Perugius] in Buena Village where a warrior in the book has a weapon with the same ability and because of this, Paul's attacks could easily kill Armored Warriors despite attacking with his offhand as long as he landed a clean hit.

Achievements

S-Ranked Adventurer

Trivia

Paul begged
Philip Boreas Greyrat
 to help him to get a stable job a small while before
Rudeus Greyrat
 was born.

Paul saying that "Anyone below 12 is a kid" refers to him leaving his house at 12 years old.

Despite running away from the Notos house, Paul inherited the family's preference for well-endowed women.

Among Paul's former lovers were
Ghislaine Dedoldia
 and
Elinalise Dragonroad
.

The full details of the incident that made party members of
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 resent Paul for years isn't revealed, but it was hinted by Elinalise that it involves Paul's romantic endeavor.

Toshiyuki Morikawa (Paul's anime Japanese voice actor) also voiced the main character's father in
Naruto
and
Bleach
.

Paul was the first character that obtained a new story in the
Mobile Game
.

Asuna Tomari is Paul's voice actor as a child in the Gaiden Story.

Paul carries his favorite sword all the time. According to other party members of Fangs of the Black Wolf, that sword is "the lost holy sword of Saint Millis", as it was crafted by inserting the blade of his existing sword into the hilt of the holy sword mock-up found in an ancient Millis ruin
.

The episode in which he died in the anime was shown on the same day as International Father's Day (June 16, 2024)

Paul Greyrat/Chronology
=======================

Information

Chronology

Gallery

When Paul's son,
Rudeus
, was about 3, Paul began teaching swordsmanship to him while
Roxy
 taught him magic. A few years later, some time after Zenith revealed that she was pregnant, their maid
Lilia
 also revealed she was pregnant with his child which caused some discord within the family. Rudeus' quick thinking prevented the family from falling apart and he ended up marrying Lilia as the second wife. After his daughters were born Paul saw just how dependent
Sylphy
 was towards Rudeus and felt that it wasn't good for both kids' futures. So after talking to her father he knocked Rudeus out during a sparring match, almost losing in the process, and sent him over to his
relatives
 to get a job as a tutor.

3 years after that he was caught up in the mana calamity and was transported with his daughter
Norn
. He spent his time in
Millis
 country helping out other refugees affected by the disaster and searching for his family. Eventually he and Rudeus reunited and he was initially happy to see him, but ended up becoming angry with his son while he was recounting what happened to him for his happy-go-lucky attitude as he though Rudeus was having nothing but fun while Paul himself was struggling as hard as he could to reconnect with his family, with absolutely no leads on finding Rudeus,
Zenith
,
Aisha
, or Lilia. He also thought that Rudeus wasn't trying hard enough to look for his missing mother. This angered Rudeus who threw out that he was fooling around with the women in his group. The two ended up getting into a serious fight which ended with Rudeus mounting his father and continuously punching him in the face. The fight was stopped by the arrival of Norn who demanded he stop bullying her father. After Rudeus left Paul went to go sulk in a bar where he met his friend
Geese
. After listening to Geese, Paul was able to make amends with his son and the two departed on good terms with each other.

Quite some time after Rudeus sent Lilia and Aisha to him, he is informed of Zenith's location by
Talhand
. He then made the decision to send his daughters to live with their brother so he could go save her and keep them out of danger, something Norn was against. After Paul and his group were having trouble rescuing Zenith, Geese sent Rudeus a letter asking for help. When Rudeus and
Elinalise
 showed up, Paul was in a pathetic shape apparently distraught over what he did when he was under the influence of a succubus. He believed Rudeus was a dream at first but he snapped back to reality when Rudeus said he had a child on the way. He was surprised to hear that he married Sylphy and at how quickly the two arrived to them. After informing the two that Zenith was trapped in a labyrinth, they went down and were able to rescue Roxy who got caught in a teleportation trap sometime before Rudeus and Elinalise arrived. Eventually they discovered the room that Zenith was in. She was trapped inside a giant mana crystal being guarded by a hydra. After a lengthy fight they were able to kill the hydra, but Rudeus had lost his left hand and Paul was snapped in half as he tried to save his son from the hydra's final attack. Paul looked up at Rudeus with a relieved look on his face before he died. Rudeus took some of his belongings before he reluctantly burned his corpse. He took a piece of his bone and placed inside a burial urn he created.

After returning home, Rudeus gave one of each of his things to his sisters and was intending to keep his armor for himself, but his amnesiac mute mother claimed it herself. Afterwords, he buried the urn in a cemetery which he goes to visit whenever he has some free time to talk about the things that's been happening around him and his family.

Paul Greyrat/Powers and Abilities
=================================

Power and Abilities

Physical Abilities

Paul battling a Manatite Hydra head on in the Anime
Paul tanking in the Anime
1/2

Being trained at a young age, Paul possessed physical prowess and he could fulfill the role of being a
Tank
 or
Subtank
 as necessary. Paul could also battle a
Manatite Hydra
 head on and being able to avoid all of its attacks and repositioning quickly to counter attack against it without exhaustion.
 (even though it being his cause of death)

Swordsmanship

Paul using Longsword of Silence in the Anime
Paul doing a Water God Style Flow in the Anime
Paul using Four Legged Form while dodging Rudeus' Rock Bullets in the Anime
1/3

Paul fought by using North God Style to get close to his opponent, strike with Sword God Style, and defend with Water God Style. His fighting style is the ideal style for a swordsman.

Advanced
Sword God Style
.

Advanced
Water God Style
.

Advanced
North God Style
.

Zenith Greyrat

Paul and Zenith in Buena Village
Paul and Zenith coming to a compromise
1/2

Paul first meets Zenith and forces her to join his party after seeing she was being exploited by her previous party mates by forcing her to be in the front lines. Zenith eventually falls in love with Paul despite being a womanizer and when Zenith becomes pregnant with Rudeus, Paul marries Zenith that the latter did not expect and they both retire from adventuring and settles in Buena Village.

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Philip is Paul's cousin and are in good terms that after Paul retires from being an
Adventurer
, Philip makes arrangement that Paul become a lower class
Knight
 to be stationed at
Buena Village
,
Fittoa Region
 where Paul settles down with Zenith.

Rudeus Greyrat

Rudeus and Paul at the Season 2 Part 2 ending

Rudeus is Paul's oldest son that he calls "Rudy" where he had an agreement with Zenith that if its a boy, Rudeus will be a
Swordsman
 but eventually comes to a compromise when Rudeus is talented in
Magic
 to be trained in the Sword in the morning and in Magic in the afternoon.
 Since then, Paul considers Rudeus to be a genius who is able to do anything very well but also causes Paul to put too much expectations on Rudeus.

When Rudeus asks Paul to find him a job so he can start earning to study at
Ranoa Magic Academy
, Paul is surprised by this as this is not something that someone of Rudeus' age would say but also notices that
Sylphiette
 is becoming too dependent of him so he decides to separate them.
 But he is also aware that he cannot win against Rudeus in an argument so he decides to fight him and knock him out but is also surprised on how he utilizes multiple
Magic
 against him and decides to start training again.

Lilia Greyrat

Paul first meets Lilia when they were young. Paul stayed at a
Water God Style
 Dojo owned by Lilia's father
Augusta
 but Paul runs away after raping Lilia. Paul would later hire Lilia to be her maid before Rudeus is born and she begins to stay with them at
Buena Village
.

Fangs of the Black Wolf

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Ghislaine is Paul's former party mate in
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 who Ghislaine describes as a frivolous man who is full of bad and useless ideas thus resulting to the bad reputation of their party. Although Paul mentioned that he took advantage during Ghislaine's mating season, Ghislaine has no feelings for Paul but she still upholds his duty to Paul of taking care of Rudeus when he begins working as Eris' teacher.

Elinalise Dragonroad

Former friend. While Elinalise does care about Paul's wellbeing enough to help him rescue Zenith, the two apparently had a falling out so bad that Elinalise did not attempt to seduce Rudeus as to avoid being permanently affiliated with Paul.

 When Roxy is about to leave after completing Rudeus' training, Paul tries to convince her to stay but she declines
. In the aftermath of the Teleport Incident, Roxy is among those who helped in searching for Paul's family and searches at the
Demon Continent
, the place she is from and is very familiar with.

References

Pax Jr.
=======

Pax Jr.
 is the son of the late King
Pax Shirone
 and best friend of
Sieghart Saladin Greyrat
.

His storyline is one of the major plot threads left unresolved by the end of Mushoku Tensei, making it likely he will once again appear in the planned sequel series.

Appearance

When he grew up, Pax Jr. has light blue hair inherited from
Benedict Kingdragon
 and stout figure like
Pax Shirone
.

Personality

Pax Jr is intelligent, diligent and ambitious. Despite being discriminated due to his hair colour, he never gave up to fate and poured his effort into excelling academically. As a leader of a duchy, he is willing to claim and develop a piece land deemed impossible to develop, and wait for years until the ideal chance for him to realize his dream of forming his own independent country.

Background

Pax Jr was born to Pax Shirone and Benedict Kingdragon.

Plot

Jobless Oblige

Pax Jr. is enrolled into Asura Royal Academy, where he meets
Sieghart Saladin Greyrat
 and befriends him. They spend time teaching each other things, with Pax Jr. tutoring Sieghart in School. After the graduation ceremony Pax Jr. reveals to Sieghart he is planned to govern a dangerous wasteland and take control of an important point for the King Dragon Kingdom and asks him to help him in his dream to establish an independent country. After he determines that Sieghart refused, he returns back to the King Dragon Kingdom and transforms the wasteland through smart tactics and good leadership, though he is then taken by a tribe of Indigenous people living in a nearby jungle for chopping down their Sacred Trees, where he is saved right before execution by his old friend
Sieghart Saladin Greyrat
 who defeats the tribe and makes them become allies. In the final chapter, Pax Jr. has transformed the land and it is thriving with him becoming part of a newly formed Knights Order. With Pax Jr. sitting at a table with 6 other people. These people are "Death God" Sieghart Saladin [
Seven Great Powers
], North Saint "Loyal Hound Knight" Jeda, Tribal Knight Herpel, Iron Knight Atmos Roland, "Dwarf Knight" Pyi Ku, his granddaughter "Screaming Princess"
Lauri Shirone
. With tensions rising around them between Asura, the King Dragon Kingdom, and Ogre God Empire. He then announces it is their time to become independent and sets out his forces for his plan to become independent from the King Dragon Kingdom.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Power and Abilities

Intellectual Abilities

Pax Jr. is a clever man and during his time at the Asura Royal Academy, he is able to quickly grasp the concept of Mathematics,
Magical Arts
 even entirely theoretical concepts but he holds a strong interest in the fields of territory management and economics for his ambition of governing a land that catches the attention of the teachers but ignored by the aristocrat students. By his second year in the academy, he is top of the class when it comes to academics while Sieghart is top in combat but is able to catch up in his academics with Pax Jr's help.

Pax Jr. is also able to speak the languages of
Human Tongue
,
Fighting God Tongue
 and
Beast Race
 Language that he plans to utilize when it comes to fulfilling his ambitions and negotiating with various races to achieve his goal.

Equipment

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Pax Jr. :“We shall take advantage of this standoff and declare our independence!”

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Pax Shirone
===========

This article may require a
cleanup
 to meet the wiki's
quality standards
.
Please
revise this page
 to fix any grammatical errors, poor wording, formatting and other issues.

Pax Shirone
 (
パックス・シーローン
,

Pakkusu Shīrōn
)
 is
Zanoba Shirone
's younger brother and
Roxy
's former student.

The former Seventh Prince of the
Kingdom of Shirone
. After various problems related to
Rudeus Greyrat
, Pax was sent to study abroad at
Dragon King Kingdom
. Years later, he came back to the Kingdom of Shirone and initiated a coup to become the new king. A short time later, he committed suicide.

One of his future subordinates would have been a parent of
Demon God Laplace
's reincarnation.

Appearance

His first appearance as a child, he was shown to be quite round being short and with short limbs. Rudeus said that he looked like a hobbit and a dwarf pieced together.

Years later, when he returned from exile, he seemed more mature and a little more intimidating. He had lost some weight and gained muscle.

Personality

During Pax's introduction, he was a spoiled, abrasive and cruel person. He was also a sexual deviant, constantly forcing himself on girls he has power over. He seemed to be sadistic and has no regard for human life, as he has all of his servant's families held hostage, and boasted that he would execute Rudeus after raping Roxy as he watches.

It was later revealed that his vile personality was stemmed from deeply seated inferiority complex that developed when he failed to earn Roxy's approval. Desperate for Roxy's attention, he began to commit increasingly serious pranks and offences, which alienated Roxy further, forming a vicious cycle.

In an attempt to get a good life during his exile, his personality changed almost completely. He stopped being lazy and became diligent. However, his inferiority complex stemmed from being unloved and untrusted remained, which was exploited by
Hitogami
's apostles and led to his eventual downfall.

Background

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Pax Shirone is the Seventh Prince of Shirone Kingdom. Due to his position, it is difficult for him to become king, so not many people pay attention to him. For this reason, he manipulates people who do not want to take his side with threats.

Plot

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Volume 2 - Juvenile Period - Home Teacher Chapter

Pax studied magic for 5 years with Roxy as a teacher. Roxy constantly sets him on fire in order to stop his advances. Right before the Metastasis event, he threatens Roxy with attacking Rudeus if she doesn't stay as her teacher. Roxy doesn't care and leaves, while Pax is punished.

Volume 6 - Juvenile Period - Homecoming Chapter

In an attempt to lure Roxy back, Pax kidnaps
Lilia
 and
Aisha
. The goal is for Roxy to fall into a magical barrier so Pax can do whatever he wants with her.

The plan is completely ruined by
Rudeus Greyrat
 due to the fact that he happened to meet Pax's half-brother,
Zanoba Shirone
. Zanoba nearly kills Pax but is stopped by his other brothers.

Pax is arrested and Rudeus's family are released. In the end, the king exiles Pax and sends him to the King Dragon Kingdom so he doesn't have to assassinate him. Zanoba is exiled to the Kingdom of Ranoa.

Volume 19 - Young Man Period - Subordinates Chapter

During his exile in the King Dragon Kingdom, Pax decided to change and he did. He lost weight, gained muscle, and learned magic. He fell in love with the 18th princess,
Benedict Kingdragon
, but although he obtained good grades and attracted the king's attention, his exile status did not allow him to marry a princess. Because the Shirone Kingdom did not accept the King Dragon Kingdom's proposals, they sent Pax to take power by force.

Pax returned to the Shirone Kingdom along 10 skilled knights including one of the
Seven Great Powers
,
Randolph Marianne
 the Death God. With their help, he carried out a coup killing all the royalty. Pax became the new king, although the kingdom was weakened by the recent civil war so he decides to send a letter to Zanoba to ask for help. Zanoba says he will work with him but does not pledge allegiance to him.

Zanoba departs for Shirone Kingdom along with Rudeus and Roxy. Pax sends Zanoba, Roxy, and Rudeus to defend an important position. Meanwhile, there is a rebellion against Pax in the capital due to which he gets depressed, as the country won't accept him as the new king and locks himself in his castle and makes his wife pregnant. When the group gets to his room, they have an argument in which Pax releases all of his anger and feelings that he held back for years. He verbally attacks Roxy, who never complimented his progress always comparing him to Rudeus, while she can only bite her lip.

Pax admits that he cannot bear that much load and jumps from the fifth floor, dying instantly.

Power and Abilities

Intermediate Rank Water Magic

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Equipment

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Securing the Throne of Shirone:
 Pax orchestrates a successful coup d'état, seizing control of Shirone with the support of the King Dragon Kingdom. He strategically utilizes the elite knights provided by King Dragon, demonstrating a degree of tactical planning and political maneuvering.

Winning Benedikte's Affection:
 Pax manages to win the heart of Benedikte Kingdragon, the sixteenth princess of the King Dragon Kingdom. He captivates her with elaborate tales of his (often exaggerated) exploits, providing her with an escape from her isolated life. This unlikely pairing showcases Pax's charisma and his ability to connect with others on an emotional level.

Earning Randolph's Loyalty:
 Pax gains the respect and loyalty of Randolph Marianne, the Death God and fifth of the Seven Great Powers. While Randolph initially treats Pax with indifference, he gradually comes to appreciate Pax's genuine personality and his surprising resilience. Pax's ability to win over such a powerful and enigmatic figure speaks to his hidden depths.

Implementing Reforms in Shirone:
 Pax, despite his flaws, demonstrates a genuine desire to improve Shirone. He dismisses corrupt officials, appoints more deserving individuals to positions of power, and takes steps to bolster the kingdom's defenses. These actions, though overshadowed by his more ruthless actions, suggest a capacity for leadership and a vision for a stronger Shirone.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Pax: “The discussion we had before…”

Randolph: “Your wish is my command.”

Pax: “Good”

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

According to
Orsted
, Pax was destined to carry out a coup around the year K457, abolished the monarchy and founded the Shirone Republic. Currently, this is impossible due to Pax's death.

Pergius Dola
============

Redirect to:
Perugius Dola

Perugius Dola
=============

I have a request for those who read this book. There is a child of the Dragon Race who does not know his name in this world. Please tell this child his name... This child has silvery hair, and must be a nameless man by now. Please tell him, "Your real true name is Perugius." Perugius, son of Dora-sama, the Great Dragon King Dora

-Laplace

Perugius Dola
 (
ペルギウス
・
ドーラ
)
 is a high-ranking member of the
Dragon Tribe
, holding the title of "Armored Dragon King", and one of the Seven Great Heroes who sealed away Demon God
Laplace
 500 years ago. He currently resides in the floating castle Chaos Breaker, where he awaits the Demon God's revival.

His storyline is one of the major plot threads left unresolved when Mushoku Tensei ended. This storyline maybe resolved in the planned “sequel” series. The author has clarified that this
will not be a direct sequel
. Instead it'll be set within the ‘
six-sided universe
’ some 80 years in the future. There will be some characters returning but none of the main characters.

Appearance

Perugius has an appearance similar to
Orsted
, but does not have a curse of being hated. Perugius has gleaming silver hair, sanpaku eyes with golden pupils and an aura of nobility radiates from his entire body.

Personality

Due to the Laplace War, Perugius holds intense animosity against all Demon Races. However, he is not insufferably stubborn, willing to bend his own rule for the sake of people who earn his favor. For example, he gave Rudeus his blessing to sell
Ruijerd
 figures because Rujierd once helped in dealing the decisive hit against Laplace in the past. Also, despite his dislike in politics, he still offered his assistance to Zanoba when the latter going back to Shirone, by letting
Roxy
 travel through the sky fortress. Perugius often allows the main characters to teleport to various locations in the
Human World
, showing he is kindhearted beneath his serious face especially to those he has taken a liking or for his amusement.

Perugius loves art and takes pride in his collections. He's very interested in
Rudeus
' figurines, just like
Zanoba
.

Background

Dora
 spawns the egg of Perugius prematurely about the same time Laplace was battling the culprit responsible for
Crystal
's death. Days later, Laplace informs Dora of the capture of the culprit to the relief of Dora. Dora then presents Perugius' egg to Laplace and asks him to name her child but Laplace was reluctant since he does not know if its a boy or girl but Dora assures him that her child is a boy, so Laplace names him Perugius and becomes his God Father.
 After the
First Dragon God
 defeats the Five Dragon Generals, Dora asks Laplace to bring Perugius' egg to the
Human World
 and has not been heard
 until he was introduced by Dragon God
Urupen
 to the
Adventure Guild
 is given the title "Armored Dragon" like her mother. Working under Urupen, Perugius is in the party with
North God

Kalman I
, Twin Emperor Migus and Gumis during the
Laplace Wars
.








Perugius became famous after rebuilding the ancient sky castle Chaos Breaker, and challenged Laplace with his companions. In honor of his deeds a new era was named after the war called the Armored Dragon era.

His companion North God Kalman the first defeated and married Laplace's most feared demon lord,
Atoferatofe
. Kalman made Perugius and Atofe promise not to kill each other. After the Laplace campaign he spent some time as a guest of Asura Kingdom, as an equal of King Asura. During this period he came to describe the king as his friend, but he grew tired of court life and later moved a life of seclusion. He sits afloat Sky Castle [Chaos Breaker] and travels the world preparing for the Laplace's revival.

Plot

Mushoku Tensei

Volume 2 - Juvenille Period - Home Teacher Chapter

He, like
Orsted
 and
Kishirika Kishirisu
 noticed how the abnormal
mana
 gathering occurred at the
Fittoa Region
's sky that and as a result he sent his servant,
Almanfi
, to investigate and kill any suspicious person involved in it to prevent the seal on Laplace from being undone.

Mushoku Tensei Sequel

Perugius' quest to kill Demon God
Laplace
 is one of the major plot thread that remained unresolved by the end of Mushoku Tensei. Because of this, he is likely to once again play a major role in the planned sequel series, which is set around the time in which the latter is said to finally resurrect.

Power and Abilities

Summoning Magic and Teleportation

Perugius is widely seen as a first class expert in Teleportation Magic initially researched by Crystal and Summoning magic inherited from Dora.  He has teleportation circles throughout the world and is also able to summon people to his castle with the aid of a magic tool.  As such, he is an extremely convenient "taxi service" according to Rudeus.

Magic Circles

Aside from creating Teleportation Circles, Perugius is so knowledgeable in creating Summoning Circles that he is able to rewrite the Summoning Circle that Orsted gave to Rudeus to summon the
Guardian Beast
 for the protection of his family.

Dragon Gate

Perugius raises his hands while chanting to summon two Dragon Gates at once when he confronts
Atoferatofe Raibaku
. The ornate silver Dragon Gate Drains magic power similar to Orsted's Dragon Gate while the ornate gold Dragon Gate drains
Battle Aura
 rendering Atofe unable to fight back nor escape.

11 Ancient Spirits






11 Ancient Spirits in the Anime Teaser



Perugius is also able to summon 11 ancient spirits of high intelligence and power that stays with him as long as he lives.  Even if one of them were to be defeated, Perugius has the ability to re-summon them at his castle.

Almanfi of the Bright

Almanfi is the first of the familiars that is introduced in the series, he is described as loyal, respectful and knightly.  He has the ability to instantly travel anywhere in the world that has light, this ability makes him a scout of sorts to Perugius and is often the one that makes the first move in any situation. In terms of combat he was able to match blows against
Ghislaine
 a sword king, though he got defeated pretty quickly by the Water God, as such though never directly stated he should be around Low-King Level. At one point, Rudeus annulled Perugius' contract with Almanfi and summoned him as his own guardian by mistake.

Yuruzu of Atonement

Aside from Almanfi we do not know much of Perugius other familiars. Yuruzu has the ability to transfer vitality between two people, as such he is basically the healer of Chaos Breaker.

Sukeakoto of Time

Sukeakoto has the ability to stop time for the person he is touching, though this ability also stops his own time.
 But despite the time of its subject is stopped some functions are still working like when the effects of the time stop is cancelled, the subject will be very hungry.

Clearnight of Thunder

His power allows him to listen to everything that is inside Chaos Breaker and a special flute that is given to those who are granted entry to Chaos Breaker

Dotbath of Destruction

Upon being summoned by Rudeus, Arumanfi told him that Dotbath of Destruction will be able to "destroy" the contract between them.

Karowante of Insight

Karowante is able to determine a persons powers and also the condition of a sick person

The following familiars are shown to be with Perugius though their powers were not yet revealed.

Trophimus of the Wave

Harkenmail of Life

Gall of Earthquake

Furiousful of Fury

Paramount of Darkness

Armored Dragon King Hand Sword(Break)

Summons a light that can sever an immortal demon lord in two. On his latest confrontation with Atofe, Perugius initially uses Dragon Gate to drain her magic and Battle Aura then finishes her off with Armored Dragon King Hand Sword (Break).

Equipment

Chaos Breaker

Chaos Breaker is a sky fortress that Perugius rebuilt during the Laplace Wars and later became his home as well as a transport to travel around the world.

It is unknown if his armour has any significance, but he is always seen wearing it, showing his readiness for battle.

Achievements

He was one of the three heroes to defeat Laplace, alongside Ruijerd's help which he feels indebted to.

Quotes

To Rudeus: "In this world there are three people you should never fight: Technique God, Fighting God, and Dragon God. Among those three, Dragon God Orsted is the strongest and the most ruthless. Even though I respect your determination to protect your family, and am curious of that Human God... I do not want to get involved. Until Laplace revives, I don't plan on dying."

Trivia

Apparently he had a bad naming sense stated by Rudeus as he named Rudeus fourth child
Saladin
.

He swore to defeat Laplace for the sake of revenge to his 3 dear friends (
Urupen
,
Kalman I
, and
Kaunis Freean Asura
).

His English voice actor
Kenny James
 is most famous for being the current voice actor to
Bowser
 of the super Mario games.

Pham Haindora
=============

A woman who
Rudeus Greyrat
 saves from near death under
Orsted
's orders.

Appearance

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Personality

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Background

Born at the western edge of the
King Dragon Realm
 in a village bordering a dense forest. Her father was a hunter and taught her how to be one as well before he died due to an
Ibri Lizard
, while trying to find an Eant Flower, whose petals can cure Ibri disease. He was searching for this plant with the help of
Angelique Curenttale
's parents, who were apothecaries, to save his wife who had contracted the disease, which has a very high mortality rate after being infected for 10 days. Due to the circumstances of her parents' death, she felt guilty towards Angie, but soon grew extremely close with her and they became best friends.

Plot

Pham and Angie went on an expedition to collect the petals of an Eant Flower to cure the village chief's son,
Dochil
, who has Ibri Syndrome. As they collect the flower petals, they are attacked by the Ibri Lizard that lives near the flowers. Angie was paralyzed with fear as Pham was yelling at her to run away, and by the time Angie started fleeing the lizard had already nearly caught to Pham. It clamped down on her leg and flung her through the air, quickly moving on to Angie. However, at the last moment, Rudeus was able to fling the lizard away, and blow its head off with his Zaliff Guantlet. Rudeus walked with Angie while carrying Pham and headed back to her village. He cast multiple healing spells as he carried her to ensure she was safe and would not die, as Orsted had instructed Rudeus to save her.

Power and Abilities

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Equipment

Her hunter gear consisted of a well-tanned fur vest, snug cropped leather leggings, thick fur boots, a mountain knife hung by her hip, and a quiver and bow around her shoulder.

Quotes

Philip

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Philip Boreas Greyrat
=====================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Appearance

Philip Boreas Greyrat
 is the father of
Eris Boreas Greyrat
 and the husband of
Hilda Boreas Greyrat
.

Appearance

Slender body and bright tea-colored hair. he is often depicted with his eyes narrowed and smiling.

Personality






Philip explaining his love of the Beast Race in the Anime



Like all of the Boreas Family, Philip has a love for the
Beast Race
.
 Philip can be a kind and lenient man, giving
Rudeus Greyrat
 a chance at a tutoring job despite believing that Paul is exaggerating. He usually presents himself as an elegant and smart gentleman, unlike his father
Sauros Boreas Greyrat
. He also has a more playful side that he won't shy from asking Eris to perform the "Boreas Greyrat etiquette" when they try ask Rudeus for a favor.

Despite losing to his brother during the power struggle to succeed the Boreas Greyrat family, he remained cunning and ambitious, always scheming in the dark to get back into power with the intent of using Rudeus to be the next head of the Boreas Family.

Rudeus describes Philip to be extremely resourceful and efficient, and is always having fun watching Rudeus move behind the scenes as he tries to do something. He also sees Philip to taking his fight to the inner Asura Kingdom.

Background

Philip, of the
Boreas Greyrat
 family, is Eris Greyrat's father and Cousin of
Paul Greyrat
. When Paul came to him asking for a job he made him a low ranking knight so that he would be able to provide for
his wife
 and soon to be born son. Philip became the mayor of the
Citadel of Roa
 after losing the bid to become the next head of the Boreas Family and Lord of the
Fittoa Region
 that was initiated by Sauros. As a result, Philip's two sons were taken from him to be raised by
James Boreas Greyrat
 as per Boreas tradition.

Plot

At the request of Paul, Philip hires Rudeus that he reluctantly accepted him to be her daughter's tutor where he shows interest on Rudeus' plan and arrange that they both be kidnapped.

After Rudeus' birthday party, Philip discusses his plans from behind the scenes to make Rudeus the head of the Boreas Family to that was previously impossible with Eris but Rudeus dismisses it as merely drinking chatter.

In the aftermath of the
Teleport Incident
, Philip and Hilda are teleported to the Conflict Zone at the southern part of the
Central Continent
 where they are captured and tortured to death.

Legacy

Eris: "If he were still alive and could see us now, I wonder what he'd think about it."

Rudeus: "I figure he'd be delighted."

Ghislaine Dedoldia
 is also teleported in the Conflict Zone but by the time she reaches Philip and Hilda, they are already dead

Ghislaine buries their remains up a hillock at the base of a tree, erected wooden grave markers with their names while grateful that she was taught how to write by Rudeus then travels back to Roa.

The
Princess Ariel Faction
 suspects that Philip is plotting to overthrow the Notos Family by using
Sylphiette
 who is teleported to the Silver Palace so they made their own countermeasures to prepare while he is still missing.

Paul mentions that Philip would always denounce him during their childhood but on Rudeus' 10th birthday, Philip sends Paul a letter with his intent of Rudeus to be married into the Boreas Family and become Eris' wife to which Paul replies that he can do what he wants

Paul later tells this marriage arrangement to Rudeus and they both concluded that Philip pulled a blind one over them as they both sigh.

Rudeus and Eris visits their graves in the Conflict Zone through details provided by Ghislaine and
Soldat Heckler
.

Rudeus and Eris digs up their bones to be reburied in Asura Kingdom instead of Fittoa Region which is still rebuilding.

Rudeus consults with
Luke Notos Greyrat
 who directs them to a graveyard created by the previous king which is marked: "Here rests the ferocious lion" and buries the remains of Philip and Hilda there instead of the Boreas Family Graveyard.

After graduating from
Asura Royal Academy
, Rudeus sees
Christina Greyrat
 to resemble Philip's figure or aura somehow but finds it natural since Chris is Philip's grand daughter.

Trivia

His two sons never appear in the web novel or the light novel.

In the anime, he has a ponytail like Paul.

He has close relationship with Paul when they were kids (Paul Gaiden story)

References

Pilemon Notos Greyrat
=====================

Pilemon Notos Greyrat
 is the brother of
Paul Greyrat
 and the father of
Luke
. He was the head of Notos house until Luke took over the position under
Ariel
's order.

Appearance

He has a pointy nose and a short mustache with drawn back hair and a cleft chin. He is often seen sporting a suit as is common for nobles.

Personality

Pilemon is unconfident and is a person that cling to power and wealth. Unlike Paul, he is a cowardly opportunist. This can be seen with his unwillingness to stand up to
Darius Silva Ganius
, and his attempt to act as if he never betrayed Ariel after Darius' downfall.

Background

Pilemon is an Asuran noble that was supporting
Ariel
, but after a surprise attack against her in the Red Dragon's Upper Jaw, he received Intel that she had perished, resulting in him joining to the
First Prince
's Faction.

Playback Miko
=============

The Playback Miko's real name was
Lilia
 (
リリア
,

Riria
)
. Like the other Mikos, the name was taken from her and she became a tool for the strong. Her power was the ability to to rewind time to a maximum of 24 hours.

Appearance

The Playback Miko was born with a blank expression, similar to the dead.

Personality

Due to her fate of being forced to repeat the same life continuously, the Playback Miko realized her fate in every timeline would only be slightly different, and would always end in her horrible and early death. Each time she died, a new nightmare. Eventually, her mind breaks and she becomes a vacant and obedient machine with one continuous reel of her death playing.

Background

She was born in the
Armored Dragon Calendar Year 500
. Regardless of the timeline, the Playback Miko is born in a remote countryside and is shunned by adults and children alike. At the age of 5, soldiers would take her away. With some variation, she is usually captured, imprisoned, and passed between ruling powers until she dies at the age of 10, or earlier.

Plot

Volume 24 - Final Volume - Conclusion Chapter

A girl is born with the power to rewind time of an object to a maximum of 24 hours. She is able to divert death, and disease, as such, she is coveted by nations. Regardless of her abilities, no matter what she did, she could not change her fate. Over the course of centuries, she attempted to change her destiny, but could never end the hellish loop of her birth and death. Eventually, she would reach a horrible death, watching herself be beaten to death, eaten, massacred, and dying shackled as a puppet to the strong.

In one playback, she is used in a magic formation and a boy,
Shinohara Akito
 is summoned to serve as that Kingdom's hero. The boy was different and since she was able to understand him, her world changed. She becomes his interpreter and fell in love with him. But he was no hero but just a normal highschool boy o so during the battle with an enemy Kingdom, he was beheaded and by the time the Lilia found him, 24 hours have already passed and it was too late for her to revive him.

Due to the emotional impact of losing Akito, Lilia opened a rift in time and space in the past so that she and Akito could live together, and the world looped with the girl as the core. This rift appeared in the past (K400) in the skies of the
City of Roa
 where the boy had died. The Miko tried to summon a soul with a strong relationship with the boy, with the same wish as the girl who wanted to live together with him. But the power of the world was too strong for her. But after some time a stray soul from Japan passed through the rift and desided in the body of a baby named
Rudeus Greyrat
. (K407)

This soul changed the world, weakening its resistance. Lilia used all of her remaining power and summoned
Nanahoshi Shizuka
 (K417), causing the
Mana Calamity
 in the middle of Roa.

A few years after Rudeus's death (K481) the Miko was reborn drained from her powers, unable to loop again.

Power and Abilities

.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision

Note: This section is under construction and revision

Princess Ariel Faction
======================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!





The Princess Ariel Faction pre-Teleport Incident in the Anime. From left to right:Luke, Derrick and Ariel



The
Princess Ariel Faction
, also known as the
Second Princess Faction
 is a group consisted of lower ranked nobles who supports Princess Ariel Anemoi Asura on becoming the next Queen of
Asura Kingdom
 and opposes the
First Prince
 Faction until its abolishment after news of Princess Ariel Ariel's death spread.

Background

Derrick: "That isn't true. You're the daughter of the queen consort. That makes you the only fully legitimate heir to the throne, and-"
Ariel: "Stop it, Derrick! What if those words reach my brother's ears? Do you want them to send assassins after me? Its bad enough that I've got all these nobles swearing fealty to me out of self-interest..."

While the date of the creation of the Princess Ariel Faction is not known, the nobilities and citizens of Asura Kingdom who are drawn to Princess Ariel's charisma and lineage believes she is the rightful ruler after the current
king of Asura Kingdom
 and establishes the group to support her ascent. But due to Ariel experiencing numerous assassination attempts since childhood that traumatizes her, Ariel refuses and would spend her days having tea at the
White Lilies Garden
 until the Teleport Incident occurs.

Plot

Post
Teleport Incident

Sylphiette saving Ariel from the Terminate Boar in the Anime
Fitz battling Nights Eye Crow in the Anime
1/2

A
Terminate Boar
 appears in the White Lilies Garden that injures Luke and mortally wounds Derrick Redbat

In his dying wish, Derrick requests that Ariel becomes the Queen of Asura Kingdom that she accepts

Sylphiette falls from the sky and kills the Terminate Boar before it attacks Ariel

Ariel nurses to health Sylphiette and is interrogated by the Princess Ariel Faction on where she came from but are in disbelief of her answers

The Princess Ariel Faction intends to dispose of Sylphiette since she is a commoner but Ariel insists that she become her new
Guardian Magician
 in place of Derrick where she becomes known as Silent Fitz

Fitz struggles his new life in the Silver Palace but gets used to it with the help of Luke and Ariel

Fitz defeats
Nights Eye Crow
 during her assassination attempt on Ariel

Pilemon successfully plots the downfall of
Sauros Boreas Greyrat
 and schemes to pin the blame on him for the Teleport Incident and is executed.

Exile

Ariel deciding to leave for Ranoa Magic Academy

Ranoa Magic Academy
 in
Sharia
 in the Northern
Central Continent

Ariel dismisses Fitz from being Guardian Magician but Fitz decides to join Ariel to Ranoa Magic Academy as her friend

The First Prince Faction sends assassins to Ariel's group of 15 nobles and were ambushed one by one when they are alone

Fitz defeats a group of 10
Swordsmen
, 1
Magician
 and 1
Healer
 in the Upper Jaw of the
Red Wyrm Mountains

The First Prince Faction stops sending assassins once the Princess Ariel Faction is beyond the borders of Asura Kingdom

Pilemon's investigation concludes that Ariel has died and defects to the First Prince Faction

By the time the Princess Ariel Faction reaches Sharia, only 5 of them are left: Ariel, Luke, Fitz, Elmore and Kleene

Adventurers
 in the north.

 and
Pursena Adoldia

Quagmire

Buena Village

Arm Chop

Ariel then tells Rudeus her plans to someday return to Asura Kingdom for her bid to being queen and will take Sylphy away from her if he does not cherish Sylphy

After Nanahoshi completes Phase 4 of his research that successfully summons a watermelon, she plans to see her
Summoning Magic
 teacher
Perugius Dola
 and allows Princess Ariel to join her to return the favor to Sylphy who has been caring for her while Rudeus was at the
Begaritt Continent

Ariel, Sylphy and Luke is brought to the
Chaos Breaker
 where Perugius summons them and is allowed to stay and he mentions that their meeting is
Fate
.

Ariel attempts to convince Perugius to support her but he refuses so Rudeus advises Sylphy to focus on Perugius' interest like how
Zanoba Shirone
 earned his favor.

Drain Syndrome
 and supports Rudeus while he is searching for a cure.

Orsted once again
.

Promise
=======

Promise
 (
確約
,

Kakuyaku
)
 is the fifteenth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Rudeus Greyrat

Summary

When Rudeus finds Eris in his room, she apologizes for his family not coming to the party. To make up for it, she came to his room to sleep with him. Thinking it over, Rudeus concludes how it was more likely that Philip and Hilda, so he initially refuses by telling Eris that he might do something perverted to her. Eris replies that she would be fine with "a little", Rudeus's awkwardness ramps up and he mistakenly gropes her. Fearing a classic punch, Eris instead does nothing trying to be accepting. Rudeus forgets himself and continues, until Eris grows uncomfortable and beats him up repeating "no!" with each hit. She leaves his room, angrily reminding him she said a little before calling him an idiot. Hurt and on the floor, Rudeus can't help but agree with Eris, realizing he was acting like events were dating sims from his old life, ignorant to Eris's feelings after she worked so hard to celebrate his birthday. Hating himself, he prostrates as soon as Eris returns through the door and begs for her forgiveness. She forgives him since it's his birthday, but she also tells him it's too soon to be doing what he had in mind, so she promises to try again in five years when they're both adults. After she leaves, Rudeus is happy that he didn't lose his connection with Eris, and looks forward to that day in five years.

Protection Magic
================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!





King Class Protection Magic in the Anime



Barrier Magic
 is one of the four systems of
Healing Magic (magic category)
. It is a kind of support magic that creates a magical barrier to raise one's defense, to block movement and magic, or to invoke certain characteristics within the barrier’s area (i.e. nullifying magic activation
, increasing or decreasing regeneration rate
, distorting space
).

Background





Protection Magic in the Anime



Barrier Magic properties are divided into anti-physical and anti-magical. Anti-physical barriers were considered an
Intermediate-level
 technique, and upon reaching
Saint-class
 and above, the properties of both anti-physical and anti-magical barriers can be combined to create barriers with special traits
. Barrier Magic relies more on the usage of magic circles compared to chanting which requires a continuous flow of
Mana
 to maintain that is usually supplied by a Magic Crystal or other equivalent mediums. As such, the usual way to neutralize a barrier is by searching and destroying the magic crystal.
.

Barrier Magic is not well-known around the world, but it is very advanced in the Holy Milis Kingdom
. Normally, only
elementary level
 can be taught as Milis Religious Orders are the only ones who have the rights to teach higher level Barrier Magic
.

Perugius Dola
 is presently the world's best Barrier Magic user with
God-class
 abilities in this magic type.

When
Rudeus
 visits the Shirone Royal Palace, he is trapped with a King Class Barrier Magic that
Pax Shirone
 plans to use to lure
Roxy Migurdia
.

Barrier Magic Users

Perugius Dola

After the battle of Biheiril Kingdom,
Perugius
 accepted
Dragon God Orsted
's request and made the
God-class
  Barrier Magic (originally created in order to seal the
Demon God
) to seal
Badigadi
. This barrier magic sealed
Badigadi
's main body and 4 other body parts in 5 different places in Earth Dragon Valley. The barrier sealing the main body could not be destroyed unless all of the remaining 4 seals were destroyed first. The barrier was operating using the mana of
Badigadi
’s body, which was further amplified with the Dragon King Sword and Fighting God Armor as a catalyst. Thus making the barrier powerful enough that not even
Orsted
 could break out of it and giving it the ability to self-sustainedly operate almost forever.

Orsted

According to
Hitogami
,
Orsted
 can use the techniques and arts of all living things in the world, including Barrier Magic.

Shilard

Holy Dragon Emperor Shilard created a magical barrier surround each Teleport Ruin, which distorted the space inside it and hide the Teleport Ruin from the physical world. When a
magician
 places his/her hand on top of the nearby stone monument, reading the incantation while pouring mana into it, then the space around the stone monument will start to distort and change into the Teleport Ruin.

The incantation to open the magical barrier surround each Teleport Ruin:
"That dragon lived solely while following its faith. Nothing is able to escape from the grasp of those grand arms. The second dragon that died. He who possesses the most ephemeral eyes Dragon General of Lustrous Green Scales. Borrowing the name of the Holy Dragon Emperor Shilard, I now pierce that barrier."

Randolph Marianne

Randolph
 possesses the
Absolute Void Eye
, which can create a magical barrier around a large area. He used it in the siege of Shirone Royal Castle to construct a barrier around the entire castle, holding off the enemy's force, buying time for
King Pax
 and
Queen Benedict
.

Rudeus Greyrat

Rudeus first learned
Elementary-class
 Barrier Magic 『Magic Shield』 in class during his first year at
Ranoa Magic Academy
.
 He later reached
Intermediate-class
 Barrier Magic by training with
Orsted
.

Cliff Grimoire

When Cliff first met
Rudeus
 in his second year at
Ranoa Magic Academy
, he introduced himself as
Elementary-class
 but soon-to-be
Intermediate-class
 in Barrier Magic.
 In his fourth year, he used his Barrier Magic to help
Rudeus
 with the research on
Mana Absorbing Stone
.
 Upon Cliff's graduation from
Ranoa Magic Academy
, he had reached the
Intermediate rank
 in Barrier Magic.
 During the battle of Biheiril Kingdom, Cliff created various barrier magic circles throughout the forest of Earth Dragon Valley that was set to activate when
Badigadi
’s limbs were thrown into them to stop the limbs' regeneration.

Members of Anastasia Keep

The members of Anastasia Keep, the strongest group in the Order of the Temple who protects the
Miko of Memory
 are capable of using all
Advanced-class
 barrier magic.
 They utilized a
King-class
 barrier in an attempt to capture
Rudeus
, which was erased by
Rudeus
’s
Mana Absorbing Stone
.
 During battle, their signature barrier magic is the
Elementary-class
 『Magic Shield』, which takes the physical shape of a translucent shield and they used it in conjunction with the
Water God Style
 to stop
Rudeus
’s 『Rock Bullet』.

Barrier Magic in Holy Milis Kingdom

The Holy Milis Kingdom has been a country that's very advanced in
healing magic
 and barrier magic since the past. However, even in Holy Milis Kingdom, most of the people will only learn them until the
elementary rank
.

During the war against
Demon God Laplace
, the whole Milis continent was protected by a holy barrier, which, toward the final day of the war, made Holy Milis Kingdom the final kingdom of human race and humanity's last stand.

Holy Milis Kingdom's capital, Milishion, is constantly protected by a magic barrier projected by 7 magic towers. The magic barrier protects the capital from external threats as well as serves as the mean to control the weather.

The
Millishion Holy Knight Orders
 are the only ones who have the rights to teach barrier magic beyond the
Elementary-level
. Even if magicians can use higher tier barrier magic, they cannot teach them, or else they will be excommunicated from the
Milis religion
 and may face a heresy inquisition.

The Pope of Milis's office was protected by a magic barrier of at least
Saint-class
 or
King-class
, which prevent the usage of magic inside.

Barrier Magic in Ranoa Magic Academy

Ranoa Magic Academy
 is limited to only an
Elementary-level
 class on barrier magic. Even though the teachers can use higher tier barrier magic, they cannot teach them. Originally, even an
Elementary-level
 class on barrier magic was not allowed, however, after the year
K420
, provided certain conditions were followed, limited teaching was authorized. Because of such limiting circumstances, the focus of the class shifts more to the methods of how magical barriers can be broken instead.

Trivia

100,000 years ago
, there was a magical barrier that separated the 7 ancient worlds. The barrier was destroyed
10,000-20,000 years ago
 by the first generation Dragon God.

References

Pursena
=======

Redirect to:
Pursena Adoldia

Pursena Adoldia
===============

Pursena Adoldia
 (
プルセナ
・
アドルディア
)
 is a member of the Doldia Tribe. Debuting at the
Ranoa Magic Academy
 alongside
Linia
, they were delinquents who terrorized the school until
Rudeus
 put them in check. Following her graduation, however, she was imprisoned by her tribe for stealing food. Fortunately, she was released by Rudeus, after which she became his maid.

Appearance

Pursena has long gray hair and red eyes, with a pair of drooping dog ears on top of her head and a fluffy tail behind indicating her Adoldia heritage. She is very well-endowed even by beast race standards, more so than Linia.

Personality

Pursena is abrasive and haughty, having the tendency to shift the blame away from herself when she gets into trouble
. Together with
Linia Dedoldia
, they are the two troublemakers in the
Ranoa Magic Academy
, but when it comes to fulfilling her dreams of becoming the Village Chief, she will do her best. In contrast to the hot-headed Linia, Pursena is more aloof and soft-spoken. Following Rudeus's victory over them in combat and subsequent imprisonment, she and Linia become more humble, no longer causing trouble and behaving as proper students.

She is a glutton when it comes to meat, constantly snacking on them wherever she goes during her school days. She is unable to learn how to control her appetite after graduation, much to her chagrin.

Background

Plot

After graduating and returned to her village, she became a warrior chief and quickly gained the trust of the other warriors with her healing magic. 10 days before
Rudeus
 arrived with
Linia
 and the
Sacred Beast
, she relieved a guard of their duty to guard the dried meat storage and her hunger got the best of her and she committed a felony by eating all of the food in the storage. She was then imprisoned until
Rudeus
 arrived and got a confession out of her. Since then she was designated as one of the
Sacred Beast
 caretakers.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Howling

Superior agility, physical strength, and the characteristics special to their race

 Elementary Rank

Water Magic -
 Elementary Rank

Earth Magic -
 Elementary Rank

Wind Magic -
 Elementary Rank

Healing Magic -
 Advanced Rank

Detoxification Magic -
 Intermediate Rank

Trivia

Pursena focused on learning healing magic when she was in
Ranoa Magic Academy
 because the Doldia tribe don't have many people capable of using it.

Pursena ends her sentences with -nano (なの) in the original text, and often swears in the form of "Fuck" (ファック). In the Anime this was replaced with "Nuuni", presumably the equivalent of said swear word in the Beast God tongue.

Pursena hates being called fat.

Later on confirmed that's Eris's "domination" of her and Linnia is simply hugging them until they bruise.

Quagmire
========

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

This article is about the
Magic Spell
. For the Rudeus of the Quagmire/Quagmire Rudeus article, see
Rudeus Greyrat





Rudeus using Quagmire in the Anime



Quagmire (
泥沼
)
 is a
Mixed Magic
 that combines Earth Magic and Water Magic to create a muddy swampland

Background





Rudeus using Quagmire against Paul Greyrat



"When I think about it, the first time we met he was using mud."

-
Sylphy

While the origins of the Quagmire spell is not revealed, it is used by Rudeus for the first time against
Paul Greyrat
 in an attempt to immobilize him but Rudeus only manages to trap on of Paul's leg.






Ariel deciding to enlist Quagmire



During his time at the Northern Regions of the
Central Continent
, Quagmire is one of Rudeus' signature spell that he is always seen using it to entrap large amount of
Monsters
 that he is also referred to as Quagmire Rudeus, Rudeus of the Quagmire or simply Quagmire and this reputation has been known through out the region that eventually got the attention of
Ariel Anemoi Asura
.

{{clr}]

Details

Quagmire is a combination of Earth and Water Magic where it creates a muddy pool at a targeted area causing anyone to be immobilized even a
Red Dragon
 is unable to fly away once caught.
 Depending on the skill of the user and how much
Mana
 is used, Quagmire can swallow up an entire town.
