Rudeus Greyrat

Rudeus Greyrat/Chronology
=========================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Chronology

Relationships

Powers and Abilities

Gallery

Mushoku Tensei

Volume 1 - Infancy Period





Volume 1 Cover



Reincarnates into the
Human World
 as a new born child with all his memories and knowledge from his previous life preserved.

Spends the first few years of his life absorbing as much knowledge as he could about the world, managing to learn both the
Human

language
 and how to read its characters.

Resolves to live in the fullest on this new world and new leash at life

Is greatly feared by
Lilia
 who believes the child is posessed since he didn't cry at all when he was a baby. Due to her bust size, he would often stare at her with a perverted grin, and that disgusted her.

Begins to practice
Magic
 in secret through the book of magics, one of the three books in the first
Greyrat House
 in
Buena Village
.

Discovers Silent Casting and how to raise his magical power or
Mana
 after repeated practice of
Water Ball
 that initially he can do 3 times a day but further increases the day after.

Conceals from his parents that he is practicing Magic as he does not know how Magicians are view and he might be treated as a heretic and burned

At age 2, he accidentally blows a hole in a wall of the house after casting
Water Cannon
, an intermediate water magic  which shocks
Zenith
 and
Paul
 but realizes Rudeus is a "genius"
Magician
 and wants to hire a tutor for Rudeus.

Paul initially getting a tutor due to their agreement that if their child is a boy, he would be a
Swordsman
 but after a suggestion from Lilia, they agree that he will be trained both in magic and the sword

Becomes Water Saint Ranked
Roxy Migurdia
's student at age 3 who she initially believes she is hired by doting parents but agrees training him after seeing his shortened chant of Water Ball and learns that he can also use Voiceless Incantation

Is trained in Magic by Roxy in the morning, in swordsmanship by Paul in the afternoon and in general lessons like history by Roxy at night

Is warned by Roxy about the
Superd Tribe
, a spear wielding
Demon Race
 with green hair and a ruby-like stone on their forehead that killed friends and foes alike during the
Laplace War

Due to his previous life trauma, Rudeus is afraid of going outside of the gate of their house

At age 5, he is taken outside by Roxy for his graduation test and becomes a Water Saint Ranked Magician after being able to successfully cast
Cumulonimbus

Roxy gives Rudeus her
Migurd
 Pendant and leaves the Greyrat House, while Rudeus begins to call her Shishou (Master) in gratitude for helping him overcome his fear of going outside

Meets
Sylphiette
 and protects her from bullies, they become friends then later begins teaching her Magic and other general lessons

--To be revised--

Age 7: He realizes how his magic growth has become stagnant after learning that Roxy has become a <<Water King>> ranked magician from one of Roxy's letters. He decided that he needed to attend
Ranoa Magic Academy
, but Sylphiette overheard this and cried that she didn't want him to leave her, so he decided to bring her with him. He asked Paul if he would help pay for their tuition, but Paul declined, stating that the tuition for the both of them would be too much. Rudeus countered this by saying he would be willing to work to earn Sylphie's tuition, since his family couldn't afford to send the both of them. Paul agreed to this, and stated that he would try to find him a job.
Ghislaine
 then arrives by carriage and is greeted by his family, at which point Paul asks Rudeus how he would feel if he were told not to see Sylphiette anymore. Shortly after, a fight ensues between Rudeus and Paul over this, and Rudeus is knocked out. Rudeus then wakes up in a carriage and reads a letter from Paul, stating that he is to be sent to his
uncles
 home with Ghislaine to become a tutor for
Eris
, his cousin, and that he is prohibited from returning home or sending letters for 5 years.

Volume 2 - Juvenile Period - Home Teacher Chapter

When he was 7 years old, he started tutoring/taming <<Mad Dog>> Eris to make her know mathematics, science , language and magic. He succeeded and established a good relationship with her. He also taught Ghislaine, and Paul also entrusted Ghislaine to continue Rudeus' swordsmanship training while he was away from home. Sometime before Rudeus' 10th birthday, he was also shown to have learned 3 new languages.







Age 10: On his birthday, he received his trusted partner Aqua Heartia, a very high quality magic staff that Eris had her family make for him. After his birthday party, he gets teleported to Magic Continent with Eris.

Volume 3 - Juvenile Period - Adventurer Chapter

He was one of the victims of Metastasis Event, and it teleported him








to the Demon Continent together with Eris, and for the first time, saw
Hitogami
 (Human God) in his dreams, who advised him to rely on
Ruijerd
 and help him accomplish his goal. He met Ruijerd, a member of the Superd Race, and befriended him. Together with Ruijerd and Eris, they formed a party <<Dead End>>, as adventurers to improve both Ruijerd's reputation, and the Superd as a whole. They became well-known throughout the Demon Continent. Rudeus obtained the nickname <<The Owner of Dead End>> or <<Kennel Master>>. (Subtitle/Anime only)

Volume 4 - Juvenile Period - Voyage Chapter








Later, Rudeus met
Demon Empress Kishirika
 and attained the demon eyes of foresight, following Hitogami's advice. These eyes allowed him to see few seconds into the future, and he used them to defeat Eris in a sparring match.

While on the ship to the
Millis Kingdom
, Eris got extremely sea sick and he had to take care of her, all while resisting his urge to take advantage of Eris' weakened state sexually. Oppai Sennin, the image of a wise old hermit, often appears in his mind when he is tempted by breasts. He also took care of his 'business' and became a sage on the ship in order to prevent himself from attacking Eris.






Rudeus in all of his glory



Immediately after arriving from the sea voyage, he and Eris went to retrieve Ruijerd, but due to the child kidnappings by the smugglers, they could not let it go unpunished and had to rescue the beast children. After rescuing the beast children, Rudeus had to separate from the party so that he could rescue the Sacred Beast on a cat girl's request while Ruijerd escorted the children to safety. As a result of a misunderstanding, Rudeus was incapacitated by
Gyes
, and taken to the village where he was stripped naked and placed in prison.

After a few days in prison, where he was kept naked, Rudeus got a new cell mate
Geese
, and he greeted him in all of his full glory, and asked for Geese's fur vest since it was cold not wearing clothes. The fur vest turned out to have bugs, which he then disposed of. As Rudeus was still itchy from the bugs, he asked Geese to scratch his back for him. As he was getting his back scratched, they were interrupted by the arrival of Eris and Ruijerd who saw a scene with Rudeus full naked and his ass sticking out while he was being massaged. After being freed, Rudeus spent a few days in the village.

Volume 5 - Juvenile Period - Reunion Chapter








After a sea voyage, he reunited with his father in Millis Kingdom. Their reunion was violent, and his younger sister,
Norn
, started to hate Rudeus, because of the confrontation that the two had. Rudeus and Paul made up after Geese had a talk with Paul.

Volume 6 - Juvenile Period - Homecoming Chapter

After arriving in Central Continent, he found out the whereabouts of his other younger sister
Aisha
, and her mother Lilia. He rescued them, and shortly after he left, he encountered Dragon God
Orsted
. << Dead End>> fought together against Orsted, but lost. Only Rudeus was able to make a small scratch on Ostred, with Rudeus almost dying in the process. He lost consciousness and only survived due to Orsted's companion,
Nanohoshi
, speaking up. After she did, Orsted cast a healing spell on him and brought him back from the brink of death. When he awoke, Orsted and his companion had already left, with Eris breaking down from her own perceived inability to protect Rudeus when it mattered most.






Eris seduces Rudeus



Age 13: Lost his virginity to Eris.

After finding out what happened to Eris' family, he became her only family and spent a night in Fittoa. Afterwards she left him while leaving a message saying they were not suited for each other right now. The beginning of a misunderstanding that broke his heart and his pride as man, which crippled his "son".

He also was able to eat rice in this chapter, something he hasn't had since his previous life.

He regained his precious artifact, the holy relic of Roxy, his God of the religion he created, called Roxyism.

Volume 7 - Youth Period - School Entry Chapter

A few years later, he was known as Rudeus of Quagmire. He tried to spread his name to find his still missing
mother
 as he felt that  if he made his name known, then she could find him. His fame spread through the whole of the Central Continent, but he had a few problems.
Hitogami
 told him if he goes to <<
Ranoa Magic Academy
>> it would solve his problem of impotency, and advised him to research the cause of Metastasis event.








He enlisted into the academy as "Special Student" and managed to completely own <<Silent Fitts>> (
Sylphiette
) and he made friends with other special students:
Zanoba
,
Cliff
,
Nanahoshi
,
Pursena
 and
Linia
. He even managed to beat a demon lord in a duel with one rock bullet, making him the top of Magic Academy.

Volume 8 - Youth Period - Special Student Chapter

He began to teach Zanoba on how to create dolls, since Zanoba did not have the magic power necessary nor the ability to use voiceless incantation. Given the problems of Zanoba's Miko power making it difficult to have the dexterity needed to do the delicate work required to make the dolls, Rudeus decided to have Zanoba get a slave that Rudeus would then train to make the dolls. Rudeus then had Zanoba buy Julie, a dwarf girl, as a slave to learn doll making.

After finding out that Rinia and Pursena had broken the doll made by him in the image of his god, Rudeus hunted the two down and captured them. They were stripped and kept that way until they repented.

Volume 9 - Youth Period - Sylphiette Chapter

He discovered that Silent Fitts was a girl and after a lot of effort on Fitts side Rudeus was finally able to realize that Fitts was actually Sylphy all along. He took her virginity after she cured him of his ED.

Volume 10 - Youth Period - Newlyweds Chapter

He bought a House that contained a moving doll. He stayed in the house to eliminate the demon that "Haunts" the house with Zanoba and Cliff. He had the house renovated.

Volume 11 - Youth Period - Younger Sisters Chapter

He experienced rose-colored school days and his 2 younger sisters moved into his house as with Aisha becoming his maid. He had some problems with Norn as she hated him initially, but solved them. Afterwards he found out that the rescue party for his mother encountered difficulties and he wanted to go help but Sylphiette was pregnant and the trip would have taken 2 years so he would have missed the birth of his child. Also Human God warned him that he'd regret it if he went. With encouragement from Norn and Elinalise he resolved himself to go and ignore the Human God's advice for the first time. Luckily before he departed Nanahoshi gave him the light spirit scrolls as well as the location for a teleportation magic circle to the Begaritto Continent that could be used, he used teleportation circles to travel there extremely fast making his trip there in one and a half month where it could have taken him 2 years.

Volume 12 - Youth Period -

Labyrinth Chapter

Rudy and Elinalise traveled to the Begaritto Continent to assist Paul in rescuing Zenith. They were able to make the trip faster than normal by teleporting using a nearby ruin. Along the way they encountered a Succubus and rescued a Caravan.

He rescued Roxy using a <<Water Emperor>> class magic Absolute Zero, although at the time he thought it was simply a lower class magic but more refined. He fought a Hydra that was immune to magic that is guarding his mother. As the hydra was about to be defeated, it went on a rampage and stated attacking on Rudeus. Paul kicked Rudues to save him from the hydra's rampage. He survived in exchange for his left hand and his father's life. And only to find out that his mother was incapable---losing her memories and expressions. Due to his depression, Roxy tried to cheer him up by having sex with him and was later accepted to his family as his second wife. His first child, Lucy, was born.

Volume 13 - Young Man Period - Everyday Chapter

After visiting Zanoba upon his return, he gains a prosthetic arm[Zariff Prosthetic Arm] from Zanoba research. He begins to teach Norn about swordsmanship. He becomes a <<Water King Class Magician>> after being taught [Lighting], the king ranked water spell by Roxy and manages to compress it's power due to [Lighting being an Overkill, he develop a smaller version of it named[Electric]. He marries Roxy and celebrates his sister's 10th birthday at the same time. He and Nanahoshi succeeded the 4th phase of their experiment: to summon a seedless watermelon from his world.

Volume 14 - Young Man Period - Summoning Chapter

He fought Atofe while he was at the Demon Continent searching for medicine to save Nanahoshi. He was visited by his Future Self who tells him not to trust the Man-god.

Volume 15 - Young Man Period - Human God Chapter

He read the diary given to him by his future self and was forced by Hitogami to fight Orsted, the Dragon God.

Rudeus proposes to Eris after ending a short duel between the two and declaring he still harbored feelings for her to which she agrees and they consummate their marriage right that night.

Volume 16 - Young Man Period - Kingdom Chapter

He starts working with Orsted in order to make Ariel the Queen.

Volume 17 - Young Man Period - Asura Kingdom Chapter

Rudeus accompanies Ariel to the Asura Kingdom capital city Ars in order for her to safely become the next Asura Kingdom's queen.

Volume 18 - Young Man Period - Subordinates Chapter

He buys Rinia's freedom from slave traders and has her work off her debt as a servant of the Greyrat Household. Pursena also becomes a servant of the Greyrat Household in order to redeem herself after Rudeus went to the Great Forest in order to resolve the crisis of the Dorudia Tribe in a letter about the disappearance of the Sacred Beast, Leo.

Volume 19 - Young Man Period - Zanoba Chapter

He, along with Roxy and Ginger traveled to Shirone with Zanoba to help him after Zanoba was called back to his home to defend it from invaders. He was involved in his first war and directly killed humans with his magic. He fought against Death God. He failed to stop Pax from committing suicide. His son, Ars, was born.

Volume 20.5 - Intermission Chapter

He attends Cliff and Zanoba's graduation.

He goes to the Asura Kingdom capital city Ars with Eris, Roxy, Slyphy and his daughter Lucy. Zanoba and Julie also traveled with him.

He holds a celebration for Norn and Aisha's 15th Birthday. He gives Norn a doll, that he made using his magic, that looks like Paul.

He graduated from Ranoa Magic Academy and submitted the teaching method of voiceless incantation as his thesis to gain C rank in the Magic Guild. He also established a subdivision of his Mercenary Company, a branch office of the Zanoba Shop, and factor for the production of goods in the Asura Kingdom with the help of Ariel's assistants. He receives a letter from his mother's family, the Latreia House, asking for Zenith, Aisha, and Norn to come to Milishion.

He starts his journey to Milishion with Cliff, Aisha, and Zenith. Sylphy is now pregnant again with Rudeus' child. He defeats goblins while thinking about how pitiful the goblins were living on a continent that hates magic race and demons.

Volume 20 - Young Man Period - Cliff Chapter

Rudeus, Cliff, Aisha, and Zenith arrive in Milishion. They meet Gisu after Zenith stands up in the moving carriage and points at him. They head towards Cliff's house in the Religious District and Rudeus along with Aisha give Cliff help in cleaning the house which was very dusty. Afterwards they ate dinner with the leftover food.

Rudeus takes Zenith to the Latreia House along with Aisha. He tells Aisha to sit down with Zenith while they are waiting since they are family and Aisha should be treated as a guest as well. When his grandmother Claire arrives, he greets her, but he is ignored and Claire heads straight to see Zenith and has her physician, Andel Berkeley, take a look at her condition all while ignoring Rudeus. They angrily question why Aisha, a mere maid, was sitting down and then Rudeus explained that he told her to since she was his sister. Claire explained that people are treated based on their clothing and that Rudeus was ignored since many people have claimed to be her grandchild and she didn't know Rudeus. Claire then asks for Rudeus to prove his identity. Rudeus told Claire that he has brought Zenith and Aisha and that he has the letter. Since it wasn't enough proof, Claire told Rudeus that he could not be considered a member of the Latreia House with just that. Rudeus did not mind since he was there as the head of the Greyrat Household in Sharia. Rudeus explains that even though he has inherited the kinship of a large part of the four feudal lords of Asura, he did not have the rank of nobility. He also explained that even if he held a high rank that bowing to his grandmother as a greeting after meeting her for the first time would be a natural thing to do. Rudeus also explains that even apart from his rank of nobility, he is personal friends with the newly crowned Asura Queen Ariel and is the subordinate of 『Dragon God』 Orsted who is ranked second of the seven major world powers. He also warned them not to make light of who he is because of his connections. After Rudeus proved his social position, Claire apologized for previously ignoring him. Rudeus told them that he has tried everything to help Zenith's condition and Claire calls Sharia a village-like place since compared to Milishion it was not as advanced in Healing magic. But Rudeus retorted by saying that even if Sharia was not as advanced in Healing Magic, he was able to have Orsted who knew all magic and Perugius who was knowledgeable in summoning magic help him. Claire then asked about Norn and Rudeus told Claire that Norn was currently studying in Ranoa Magic University and was at the top as the Student Council President. Claire told Rudeus in a commanding tone to bring Norn after her graduation and that a suitable person would not be found in a backwater country like the Ranoa Kingdom and that she would choose a suitable person for marriage if a suitable. That conflicted with Rudeus' ideology of giving Norn the freedom to pick her own path, but he told Claire that he would take responsibility for Norn to keep the peace. Rudeus answered many medical questions posed by Andel and Aisha answered any questions that Rudeus did not have the answer to. Since Zenith appeared younger than her actual age and was still able to have children, Claire wanted to have Zenith remarry even if she were to get many divorces and they were essentially treating Zenith as a tool to create children and not as a person which infuriated Rudeus. They also told Rudeus to cut his ties with Cliff and when Rudeus would not do so, they told them to leave, but leave Zenith with the Latreia House. After Claire expressed her desire to use Zenith as a tool to give birth and have her remarry and referring to Zenith as a thing and not a person, Rudeus blanked out and all he remembers is yelling. When Aisha called out to him as if cheering him on, Rudeus' mind was brought back. Claire attempted to get some guards to take Zenith, but Rudeus knocked them away and left the house with Zenith and Aisha. Rudeus realized he was hungry and then decided to head back to Cliff's house.

He meets the Miko who was saved by Eris long ago. His mother gets kidnapped by Claire. He gets attacked by the Order of the Temple and in the confusion he winds up kidnapping
Miko
. He returns to use Miko as a bargaining chip to get Zenith back. He explains his side of the story and they sentence Claire to ten years in prison and while they were going to take Claire, Zenith stops them and slaps Rudeus. Miko explains Claire's side of the story and Rudeus and the Latreia family reconcile. He recruits Miko into Orsted's camp and gives her a bracelet with a Dragon God symbol and a summoning scroll for a guardian after Miko reveals to them that Zenith never actually lost her memories or her mind and that Zenith was of dreaming since she was constantly using her Miko power of Telepathy. Gisu had Aisha give Rudeus a letter with Gisu admitting that he has been an apostle for Hitogami the entire time and next time they meet he will have properly gathered forces to defeat Rudeus. Rudeus feeling paranoid that he might be assassinated since Gisu could have easily come at him or his family with a poison knife while they were sleeping so Eris came to guard Rudeus. Before they went back home, they visited Miko so that Miko could finally meet Eris again. Eris did not remember Miko, but Miko said that she wanted to become like Eris and then Eris made a wood sword for Miko to practice sword swings with.

Side Story: The Truth of Santa Claus

Rudeus plan to give Lucy a gift during a fictional Christmas as a Santa Claus. But, in the end Orsted came and personally give Lucy and present as Santa Claus.

Volume 22 - Young Man Period - Organization Chapter

Rudeus arrives back home and gives Lilia and the rest of the family a summary of what has happened at Milishion. Rudeus meets Zanoba and they talk about improving the Magic Armor. Roxy asks Rudeus if she could help with the armor and Rudeus welcomes her help and notes to himself that if she was a part of the team, the Armor could be improved 100 times better. He later meets with Orsted and they discuss about how to gather forces to defeat Gisu and prevent certain pieces from becoming enemies.

Rudeus later goes to the Ouryuu Kingdom and meets with Death God Randolph to recruit him, but was turned down due to him needing to protect Benedict and Pax Jr. He later meets with the King of the Ouryuu Kingdom and was able to save little Pax from future threats by the Ouryuu Kingdom giving Pax Jr. or having assassins potentially aiming for him by the Kingdom by letting Rudeus deal with any issues that may arise between the Shirone Kingdom and Little Pax. Rudeus also able to further other parts of his agenda as well during the meeting using his connections and later on after meeting Randolph again, he was given a ring that would allow Rudeus to get a favor from Kishirika.

Rudeus travels to the Demon Continent with Eris and Roxy to gain Atofe as an ally. Passing through the front gate peacefully, they meet with the Demon King and offer gifts of alcohol. One is a hundred year old alcohol from the Asura Kingdom given to them by Ariel and the other is an extremely rare one that makes Atofe extremely excited. That rare alcohol <<Dragon God Jewel Spirit>>(Aleschneil) is a type only made by the dragon tribe and was given to them by Orsted. The last time Atofe had her hands on the alcohol was when it was gifted to her by Urupen for her wedding with Carl or Kalman I the first North God. She then had a duel with Rudeus and party. Atofe surrendered after Rudeus attacked with the Gatling gun from the Magic Armor MK I. He gain the <<Hero>> title for defeating Atofe. They all then had a banquet.

Two months after recruiting Atofe, while recruiting many of the other demon lords quite easily due to both hearing Rudeus as a <<Hero>> who made Atofe surrendered and the outrageous reputation of Atofe, Roxy requested to visit her home town and Rudeus took the opportunity to bring Lara as well so that they could all travel to Roxy's hometown to visit Roxy's parents and tell them of their marriage.

Nanahosi tried to return home with newly created magic circle, but ended up in failure, and then going into a deep sleep.

Rudeus learns from Kishirika that Gisu is in a forest.

Volume 23 - Young Man Period - The Decisive Battle Chapter

Rudeus is in a meeting where they make plans to corner Gisu.

Rudeus goes into the forest and finds out that there's a Supard village hiding within it. Rudeus fights Vita, wins, but in return, the Supards illness hastens causing the Supards who are sick to collapse. To find the cure Rudeus contacts many of his allies but to no avail until Cliff teleports to the village and uses his demon eye to figure out what the illness is and how to cure it. Cliff uses the Sokasu grass (the same thing Nanahoshi used to slow down the Drain Syndrome) which had the Supard race get rid of the remaining Vita(as Vita had been stopping the sickness from getting worse however died as a result of fighting Rudeus) in their system(Vita's real form is a blue slime//had to crap the slime out of their system). In order for the subjugation to no longer go into the forest and try to fight the demons (the invisible wolves), Rudeus apeals to the king to which the king hands over 2 soldiers in order to see if what Rudeus says is true. Rudeus guides the 2 soldiers to the Supard village and they said that they would like to tell the King of the truth. When going back, on the bridge that Rudeus made, the 2 soldiers take off their disguise rings and show who they are (Kalman III and Gull Farion. They slice off both of Rudeus's arms and he falls from the bridge, to where the Earth Dragon is.

Saved by Doga. Grew black arms from black lump of meat that came from black box given by Atofe.

He defeats North God Kalman III and becomes one of the "Seven Great World Powers".

On Ogre Island while celebrating peace Gisu came with Badigadi with his Golden Armor to attack. Rudeus with support from friends and family was able to get to his trump card the MK-0, and fought Badigadi with it.

Volume 24 - Young Man Period - The Final Chapter

Rudeus/Future dies at the age of 74.

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Mushoku Tensei Sequel

Despite the story of Mushoku Tensei ending with Rudeus' death at age 74 in the year 481, several story threats remained unresolved and will likely be taken up in the planned sequel series:

Orsted's
 mission to kill
Hitogami
, who is still alive at the time of Rudeus' death.

The revival of the Demon God
Laplace
, who was said to reincarnate around the time the sequel series seems to be taking place, and
Perugius'
 quest to kill him.

The fate of
Nanahoshi Shizuka
, who chose to be put into suspended animation to await the arrival of her friend,
Shinohara Akito
, so they might go back to Earth together using the teleportation magic circle she and Rudeus developed.

The destiny of Rudeus and
Roxy's
 eldest daugther,
Lara
, who is said to be the Hero who, together with
Leo
, would save the world from an unknown crisis.

Elinalise's
 mysterious past.

Rudeus Greyrat/Future
=====================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

"There are three things you should do. Consult with Nanahoshi. Send a letter to Eris. Doubt Hitogami, but don't oppose him. That's all."

Rudeus to his past self

Future Rudeus
 is the alternate future self of
Rudeus Greyrat
.

Appearance

He is tall, well-built and cool-looking man. He was born with brown hair, He also has slightly mismatched eyes, because he switched one of his eyes for a demon eye.

Appearing as an old man from the future to
Rudeus
 after using time travel magic. He is missing the bottom half of his body from below his stomach and is missing many organs as a result of his magic not sufficient in allowing him to make the large time jump in one go.

Personality

Future Rudeus became dejected with the death of
Roxy
 and always spent his time drinking and sleeping with different women. He was afraid to sleep with
Sylphy
 since he thought that he will just end up venting his frustration on her, which only caused to further drive her away.

After the death of Sylphy, his personality took an easy 180 and changed drastically. A person who would try his best to protect his marriage vow was lost. He would become so twisted that he's not above rape. A person who was once a pacifist and disgusted at murder, was lost. Bent on revenge, the only thing he cares for is to get revenge on
Hitogami
, and he hurts many people on his path of revenge.

Background

Future Rudeus was
Rudeus
 from the future, he came back into the past to prevent the actions that led to what happened to himself. After the events of the demon lord
Atofe
, Future Rudeus was visited by
Hitogami
 who told him to go downstairs and check if there was something off in the basement, which he did and found nothing. What happened though, a rat infected with
Petrification Syndrome
 that was roaming about in the basement was unleashed into the house and infected some leftover food, which Roxy later ate. Roxy became sick, and regular Detoxification magic wouldn't work, only God-tier Detoxification magic would work. Thus future Rudeus,
Cliff
, and
Zanoba
 snuck into the Church to learn God Detoxification magic, which ended up being a whole book, and was too long to remember, so they ended up having to steal it. However they were easily found, but they were able to make it out with the book. Cliff was poisoned during the escape, and died a few days later.

When future Rudeus returned, Roxy had already succumbed to the illness and died. This devastated future Rudeus and set him on a dark path. Around this time,
Eris
 came back after 5 years of training, but Rudeus thoughtlessly drove her away. Sylphy tried to comfort him desperately, but Rudeus refused it due to a heavy drinking habit, and ended up sleeping with a whore. Sylphy found out about this when he came home and smelled like another woman, and stopped talking to him, and eventually left him to rejoin
Ariel
, that was on her way to the
Kingdom Of Asura
, after
Hitogami
 supposedly influenced
Luke
 to propose the idea.

When Rudeus finds out
Sylphy
 left, he goes to follow her hoping to apologize and make up, but finds that
Sylphy
 followed
Ariel
 back to the kingdom, and after having a hard time at the border, he was smuggled in by
Tris
, Rudeus heard a rumor Ariel was planning a coup, which he at first chose not to believe, then he found
Sylphy
 and
Luke
 murdered by
the Water God
 and a
North Emperor
, who were royal guests at the time, while
Ariel
 was captured during the attempted coup.

Rudeus starts killing indiscriminately and changed to be bent on the revenge of
Sylphy
,
Roxy
, and all others who were killed unfairly.
Eris
 would come again and again only for him to drive her away again and again. Eventually
Zanoba
,
Julie
,
Ginger
 and
Aisha
 were murdered by the church of Milis, and future Rudeus personally massacred all templar knights in Ranoa.

Going down on this path, Rudeus hunted anything
Hitogami
 related, including the likes of Demon Kings, and it is implied that he killed a lot of people, weak or strong, in his quest to learn more, only to learn nothing. Before he knew it, he was an old man and when he finally found the information on how to defeat
Hitogami
, he learned that he would not be able to do it in his lifetime. Finally at the end of his life, he was able to learn how to time travel and traveled back to the past before
Roxy
 died, and informed his past self of all of this information.

Unfortunately the time travel trip left him missing a lot of organs and mana, thus he died to his injuries, but not before giving
his past self
 advices and a guilt-ridden diary.

Legacy





Orsted and Rudeus discussing the diary's content



After conducting an autopsy on Future Rudeus' body, Rudeus burned his remains and places the ashes in an urn to be buried in the same place with
Paul Greyrat
.

Rudeus confirms the truth in his words by going to the basement and kills the magic stone disease infected mouse that has violet crystal teeth that would have killed Roxy and the
baby
 in her womb.

After sealing the mouse's remains in a box made from Earth Magic, Rudeus sends it to the Magic Guild for study.

By heeding the advise to not oppose Hitogami, Rudeus is able to negotiate with him on the condition to kill
Orsted
 and also receive advise from him on how to make the Magic Armor described on Future Rudeus' diary.

By consulting with
Nanahoshi
 and showing her the diary, Nanahoshi agrees to cooperate with Rudeus, able to theorize the reason on why she failed on returning back to her original world and also advises Rudeus to consult with Orsted.

By sending a letter to Eris, she is able to join Rudeus on his second battle against Orsted, clear the misunderstanding between them and become his wife.

After becoming Orsted's subordinate, Rudeus shows Orsted the diary and is able to make plans on making
Ariel Anemoi Asura
 the next
Asura Kingdom
's queen and discover the fate of
Tristina Purplehorse
 after the
Teleport Incident
.

Through information from the diary, Rudeus is able to convince
Ghislaine Dedoldia
 to ally with Ariel and help uncover who is behind
Sauros Boreas Greyrat
's death.

The diary also contains information about mercenaries hired by
Darius Silva Ganius
 such as
Auber Corvette
 and
Reida Reia
 who are also Apostles of Hitogami.

Power and Abilities

『
Demon Eye: Foresight
』

It's a
Demon Eye
 that
Kishirika
 gave to Rudeus for giving her food. It allows the user to see a certain amount into the future. But it is hard to adjust the focus point, the farther he looks into future the more possibilities appear.

The
Demon Eye
 is activated using Rudeus' magic power, the more he inputs the farther he can see into future.

『Voiceless Incantation』

Rudeus is one of the few people capable of using voiceless incantation. He cannot use chantless incantation for healing magic. A normal Magician takes at least 5 seconds to cast a simple spell, and for higher level spells its 30-60 seconds. Rudeus can do it almost instantly no matter the difficulty of the spell.

『Magic』

While Rudeus is a pacifist and doesn't like fighting in general, when he does, he is a formidable opponent. Most of the spells he uses a lot, like Stone Cannon, have been stated by
Badigadi
 to have emperor level of power. Initially, during his childhood, he trained under Water Saint Magician Roxy to become a Water Saint Magician himself. However, he eventually shifted to using earth magic, relying on the easy versatility and power of spells like Stone Cannon and Quagmire. His efforts eventually landed him the epithet of "Quagmire". His total magical power has been stated by
Orsted
,
Kishirika
,
Badigadi
, and
Perugius
 to be similar to that of
Laplace
.

Future Rudeus was strong enough to look down on Demon King
Atofe
, which almost became his downfall as her retainer Moore also turned out to be formidable.

『Healing Magic』

『Antidote Magic』
『Barrier Magic』

Antidote Magic

Magic

Technique

Rank

Barrier Magic

Magic

Technique

Rank

Barrier

Magic Shield

Elementary

『Time Travel Magic』

Through the dragon god research, Rudeus was able to figure out a way to propel himself to the past, though ordinarily that requires an insane amount of mana. Unfortunately it was a one way trip, and he succumbed to his injuries.

『Gravity Magic』

He demonstrated the ability to use gravity magic by closing a door and lifting an inkwell. He can also fly using this magic by lowering the gravity.

『Electricity Magic』

He demonstrated the ability to use electricity magic. When his fist quivered and encircled it with cracking coiling purple lighting.

Afterward, he struck the desk and purple lighting scattered through the surrounding area with bright light and quickly faded. Leaving a burn mark on the desk.

『Electric』

Realizing that『Lightning』might be a bit overkill as a single target spell, Rudeus weakened the King-class Water magic. Rudeus was able to use Voiceless incantation to create a miniature thundercloud, compressing it, and designating a target for『Lightning』. In order to distinguish it from the normal overpowered spell, he named it『Electric』. The Electric strike is hard to avoid and can numb the nervous system, making it a very useful spell against people who can wear Touki. It is effective against the Immortal Demon Race as demonstrated in the battle against
Atofe
.

『Howling Magic』- Voice Magic

Howling is a type of magic that can locate or paralyze enemies by using sound as a medium, but dark future Rudeus can only use it to surprise or scare opponents; he name this new ability voice magic. He probably learned it from
Gustav Dedorudia
.

『Nuclear Explosion』

Rudeus created in a desperate attempt during his fight against
Orsted
. By focusing a tremendous amount of magic power at a designated area, he creates a huge explosion around his pinpointed target and leaves behind a mushroom-like cloud similar to a nuclear explosion.

『Ran Ma』- Disturb Magic

It is a unique magic that Rudeus learned from observing
Orsted
 in their first fight, it works by interfering with the magic of opponent disturbing it and preventing it from working. This is a very rare and possibly difficult technique as
Sylphiette
, a talented mage in her own right, had a lot of trouble learning it, and had not heard of it either.

『Light Spirits』

Rudeus can make a light spirit scroll to use them to summons bright light spirits as a source of light.

『Sword Techniques』

Intermediate-ranked
Sword God Style

Elementary-ranked
North God Style

Elementary-ranked
Water God Style

Since Rudeus cannot make use of Battle Aura, he cannot rise to Advanced ranked Sword Techniques.

Equipment

Diary





Diary in the Anime



Initially used by Rudeus to log the events of his life but later uses it as a reference point to travel back in time just before his younger self could go to the basement and convinces him to hear him out and to read the diary.

Achievements

Created powerful spells, such as Gravity Magic, Electricity Magic, Voice Magic and Time Travel Magic.

Be able to go to the past to change his fate, making a turning point for his younger self's later life.

He even managed to increase his healing magic to Saint Rank.

Trivia

Although he succeeded in going back to the past, but most of him (organs) didn't make it through due to insufficient mana.
Rudeus
 mused that he could've avoided the problem by segmenting his time travel, allowing his mana to recover in between
.

He was arrogant contrary to what
Rudeus
 always says that it would cause him if he becomes arrogant.

Rudeus
 believed that Rudeus(future) was really himself because future Rudeus introduced himself with his name from his past life, and making various pop culture references that only people from modern earth could possibly know.

He and
Eris
 had a love and hate relationship where she would beat him within inches of his life but would also save him from the shadow in a pinch. In the end, they never properly made up and Future Rudeus regretted it, telling
his younger counter
 part to make a point of apologizing to
her
 first.

Rudeus Greyrat/Powers and Abilities
===================================

Information

Chronology

Relationships

Powers and Abilities

Gallery

Abilities

Rudeus is a powerful magician born with a strong
Laplace factor
 which is one of the reasons for his great magical power besides his intense training at an early age. As he was reincarnated from another world, he is immune to
Orsted
's curse. This is a trait that is inherited by his descendants.

『Voiceless Incantation』





Rudeus discovering Voiceless Incantation



Rudeus is one of the few people capable of using a voiceless incantation, and even rarer as a person who can use voiceless incantation with melded magics.
 He cannot use voiceless incantation for healing magic due to his lack of understanding in regards to how
mana
 is manipulated to heal. A normal Magician takes at least five seconds for a simple spell, while for higher-level spells its thirty to sixty seconds. Rudeus can do it almost instantly no matter what difficulty of the spell, with the exception of healing magic. Rudeus needs to use the chant of a new spell being taught to him before he can use its voiceless incantation version which puzzles Orsted.

An interesting feature of Voiceless Incantation is that you can put a large amount of mana in a spell to increase it's effectiveness to your desire. This way, Rudeus was about to use Emperor-Leveled magic without his own knowledge

『Demon Eyes』

『Foresight Eye』

Demon Eye Foresight used in combat in the Anime
Demon Eye in the Anime
Demon Eye in the Manga
1/3

It's a Demon Eye that
Kishirika
 gave to Rudeus for giving her food replacing his right eye. It allows the user to see a certain amount into the future. It is difficult to adjust the focus point; the farther into the future he looks, the more unreliable it becomes.

The power of Demon Eyes are adjusted according to the amount of mana poured into them. The more mana Rudeus inputs into the Foresight Demon Eye, the farther into the future he can see. Rudeus is able to fine-tune the eye to see 10 seconds into the future reliably.

Experienced warriors can negate the Demon Eye's usefulness in battle by making split-second decisions, forcing the eye to see multiple futures. This is learned when Rudeus duels
Ruijerd
.
Badigadi
 is the only exception due to his own acquired abilities in the past that negates all demon eye to ever work against him making him invisible to the eye. The eye can also act as a conduit for another being's power as
Hitogami
 was able to show Rudeus a vision of where to find
Aisha
 and
Lilia
 through his eye. Another weakness of the eye is that it does not pick up sounds and as such,
Gyes
 was able to incapacitate Rudeus using
Howling magic
.

Overuse or losing control of the eye may cause the user some sort of pain and nausea as a result of overloading the brain. This is shown when Rudeus felt a moment of extreme nausea after Hitogami used the eye to show him a vision of the future, or when he originally received the eye and it took him a while to learn to control it since it would give him a double vision.

『Clairvoyant Eye』

It's a second Demon Eye that Kishirika gave to Rudeus for giving her a donut when she is captured by
Atofe
 replacing his left eye. It allows the user to see far away. However, the "focus point" is difficult to control. Rather than acting as a scope, the Clairvoyant Eyes seem to change the perspective of one's vision, with the amount of mana determining the distance from the user.

『Magic』

Rudeus practicing Disturb Magic
Nuclear Explosion
Rudeus using Earth Pillar to escape to the air
Earth Pillar
Rudeus casting Squall on Doldia Village
Rudeus' Earth Magic Attack
Fire Ball (Voiceless)
X-Healing
Saint Rank Water Magic Cumulonimbus
Rudeus making statuettes with Earth Magic
1/10

While Rudeus is a pacifist and doesn't like fighting in general, when he does, he is a formidable opponent. He is capable of casting magic simultaneously in both hands as well as cast melded magic in an instant. With his scientific knowledge from his previous life and creativity, he always strives for developing more efficient magics for himself to use. Most of the spells he uses a lot, like
Stone Cannon
, have been stated by
Badigadi
 to have an Emperor-class level of power. Initially, when he was a child, he mostly used water magic. However, as an adventurer, Rudeus primarily used earth magic such as Stone Cannon and his namesake, Quagmire to hinder and slow down his enemies. His total magical power has been stated by Orsted, Kishirika, Badigadi, and
Perugius Dola
 to be greater than that of Laplace. He was able to create a nuclear explosion, an extension of fire and air melded magic similar to that of the firework used in
Roa
, in his fight against Orsted. According to Orsted, this magic could be considered God-class magic [citation needed]. Rudeus also uses Earth Magic to make figures which
Zanoba
 and
Perugius
 takes interest in.

His rankings as a magician are as follows:

«Water Emperor Ranked»

«Earth Saint Ranked»

«Wind Saint Ranked»

«Fire Saint Ranked»

«Healing Magic - Saint Ranked»

«Detoxification Magic - Saint Ranked»

«Barrier Magic - Intermediate Ranked»

『Healing Magic』

『Unique Magic』

『Antidote Magic』
『Barrier Magic』

Antidote Magic

Magic

Technique

Rank

Barrier Magic

Magic

Technique

Rank

Barrier

Magic Shield

Elementary

Unique Magic

Magic

Technique

Effect

Unique

Nuclear Explosion

Unofficial God-class magic (stated by Orsted) that Rudeus created in a desperate attempt during his fight against Orsted. By focusing a tremendous amount of magic power at a designated area, he creates a huge explosion around his pinpointed target and leaves behind a mushroom-like cloud similar to a nuclear explosion. During the second confrontation with Orsted, he managed to destroy a village with this magic. Even with Orsted opening the First Dragon Gate to tremendously lower its power, the explosion was still packed with power similar to Laplace. It is hinted that this is a Fire-type magic.

Unique

Disturb Magic

It is a unique magic that Rudeus learns after observing Orsted in their first fight and works by interfering with the magic of the opponent disturbing it thus preventing it from working. This is a very rare and difficult technique as Sylphiette, who is a talented mage in her own right, had a lot of trouble learning it.

Unique

Dry Steaming

Dry Steaming is a melded magic of fire and wind originally developed by Rudeus to dry wet clothes with a risk of damaging the fabric.

Unique

Explosive Stone Cannon

It is a variation of Stone Cannon originally developed by Rudeus. The stone is hollow thereby exploding at the point of contact.

Unique

Electric

Realizing that 『Lightning』 might be a bit overkill as a single target spell, Rudeus weakened the King-class Water magic. Rudeus was able to use Voiceless incantation to create a miniature thundercloud, compressing it, and designating a target for 『Lightning』. In order to distinguish it from the normal overpowered spell, he named it 『Electric』. The Electric strike is hard to avoid and can numb the nervous system, making it a very useful spell against people who can wear Touki. It is effective against the Immortal Demon Race as demonstrated in the battle against
Atofe
.

Unique

Light Spirits

Rudeus can make a light spirit scroll and use them to summon bright light spirits as a source of light.

Unique

Howling Magic

Howling is a type of magic that can locate or paralyze enemies by using sound as a medium, but Rudeus can only use it to surprise or scare opponents. He learned it from
Gustav Dedorudia
.

Fighting Style

『Sword Techniques』

Intermediate-ranked
Sword God Style

Elementary-ranked
North God Style

Elementary-ranked
Water God Style

Since Rudeus cannot make use of Battle Aura, he cannot rise to Advanced ranked Sword Techniques.

『
Saint Dragon Battle Aura
』

Saint Dragon Battle Aura is a fighting style that was created by Dragon God
Urupen
, who was considered to be the weakest Dragon God due to having the lowest magical capacity ever and rose to become the strongest with this fighting style. It involves defeating an opponent using the minimal amount of magical power. It is described as a fighting style by Rudeus that combines magic arts and the real world martial art Wushu. Rudeus is currently being taught how to use this fighting form by Orsted. This fighting technique is the best fighting style for Rudeus due to it's great compatibility with the 『Magic Armor』, making the 『Magic Armor』 performance more potent, efficient, and useful during combat. It should be noted that it is a fighting style and not a type of battle aura as Rudeus lacks the ability to use actual battle aura.

『Tactics』

He has been noted by others to be a battle genius. During his first fight with Paul, he was smart enough to trap Paul's leg to restrict his movements. During his time as an adventurer, he was known for his skill with Quagmire and trapping opponents with earth magic before attacking. After training with Orsted, he became more aware of his tactics and was able to perform the strategies more efficiently since he was conscious of them. In the case that he is trapped by a high level barrier magic that restricts his magic, he will use the Manatite stone to destroy the seal and use a combination of Quagmire, Mist, and Electric to slow down or disable his opponents before using a summoning scroll to summon his trump card, the Magic armor MK I, to defeat his enemies should the need arise for the fire power. Taking stories and legends from his previous world, he was also able to come up with a strategy to defeat a hydra that could regenerate its heads.

Equipment

『Arrogant Water Dragon King』 (Aqua Heartia)

An expensive staff gifted to him by Eris on his 10th Birthday.

The material of the wand is made from a rough and bony wood that comes from a tree called 『Elder Torrent』, that grows in the large forest of the Eastern region of the Mills Continent. The Wand will







become a subspecies after it drinks from the Faeries' Spring. The tip of the staff is adorned with a large Magical stone that is the size of a fist that comes from a stray dragon located in the Begaritt's continent. The maker is from the Asura kingdom palace's Magic team, a wand-maker(Rod Director) called Chein Procyon. A wand's rank is determined by the wood and the Magic rock, both of which are A ranked materials. The Magic Stone alone is at least worth over 100 Asuran Gold Coins.

The wand has a lot of sentimental value to Rudeus, as Ruijerd was able to see how important it was to Rudeus and convinced him to not sell it so that they could take Ruijerd to the Mills Continent the legal route; instead, Ruijerd agreed to enlist the services of a smuggler even though they would be getting involved with people who would harm children, which is against Ruijerd's warrior code. Rudeus commonly calls it his friend and has a few nicknames for it. Although his power has outgrown the staff's abilities, he will still occasionally use it during important battles. The Staff is normally kept in his room as a decoration due to Rudeus who usually uses 『Shotgun Cannon』 as his main weapon.

Arrogant Water Dragon King is given to
Lara Greyrat
 when she leaves the house along with Leo.

Magic amplification coefficient:

Water Magic:
 5 times

Earth Magic:
 3 times

Wind Magic:
 3 times

Fire Magic:
 2 times

『Mana Absorbing Stone』

A stone made from the
Manatite Hydra
's body. From Rudeus' testing of the stone, there is a front and back of the stone. When mana is applied to the back of the stone, a high pitched sound would ring out and the front of the stone will emit magic canceling wave that is similar to 『Ran Ma』. The stone does not actually absorb mana and its magic breakdown power is similar to the Disturb Magic; however, the stone also requires an almost equal amount of magic power to negate attacking magic. But, the stone is more effective than 『Ran Ma』 due to its capability to cancel completed magic. Magically created objects like dolls that have their mana stabilized will not be destroyed by the waves, but magic attacks that do not have their magic stabilized will be destroyed. Magic Circles will not be destroyed by the stone, but the barriers created will. By inserting the stone into the 『Zariff's Prosthetic arm』, it can be an effective tool at the cost of magic-less effective from that arm.

『Zariff's Prosthetic Arm』

From Zanoba's research of the doll left by the previous owner of Rudeus' house, Zanoba with the help of Cliff were able to create an artificial prosthetic arm. With the chant, "『Oh Earth, become thine Arm.』", the magic tool can be activated, and can be deactivated with the chant 『Oh Arm, return to Earth』. It can also allow the wearer to feel tactile feedback from the fingers and even has the strength to restrain Zanoba's Miko Power. The arm can also fly out as a Rocket Punch. It was used as the replacement of Rudeus' left hand that was lost in the fight against the Manatite Hydra and continued to function as a Rocket Punch gauntlet, after all of his limbs were restored by Orsted's King Class Healing Magic, until its capabilities were replaced by the second version black 『Magic Armor』. He still wears them as gauntlets and he has one for both hands.

『Dragon Tribe's Robe』

It is a grey robe worn by Great Sage Titiana 1,000 years ago. It is made of the Death Adder Rat's skin and was sewn together using a thread imbued with magic. It has considerable magic resistance and is highly blade proof. The weight of the wearer is reduced by half and it is possible to move like the wind.
Rudeus
 received it from
Orsted
 in volume 17 before going to
Asura Kingdom
 to assist
Ariel
 to become the queen.

『Dragon God's Armlet』

Its crest was engraved by Dragon God with the ability to block
Hitogami
's future foresight from seeing the future of the wearer, effectively blocking Hitogami's view of Rudeus's immediate surroundings.
Orsted
 gave it to Rudeus after they started working together.

『Magic Armor』

Magic Armor 『MK. I』

The prototype created under the joint cooperation of Zanoba and Cliff. It’s height is a little less than 3 meters. The right hand was affixed with a Stone Gatling Cannon and the left hand was affixed with a shield and a Magic Absorption Stone.

Although its mana consumption was quite high, it was considered to hold defensive and offensive power similar to that of the Seven Great World Powers, It was specifically created in order to fight Dragon God Orsted, though it was still kept in use after that. It was destroyed by the Fighting God during the Battle of Biheiril Kingdom.

Magic Armor 『MK. II』

It was a complete set that could be separated into arm parts, leg parts, and torso part. It was a jet-black armor and helmet. A smaller version of the『MK. I』.

If worn, it could provide physical ability similar to that of a Saint Ranked swordsman.

Magic Armor 『MK. Zero』

The decisive battle weapon of Rudeus created for the Battle of Biheiril Kingdom. It is a stronger version of the『MK. I』, although it consumes double the mana.

Magic Armor 『MK. III』

The Magic Armor used by Rudeus during his last years. Its height was a little more than 2 metres and its ability was the same as the『MK. I』.

This Magic Armor became the basis for the mass-production of the All-Purpose Magic Armor Series later on.

『Summoning Scrolls』

Each scroll has a one time use and can be used to summon the 『Magic Armor Mk I 』. He also is able to create scrolls that link to hidden locations, in the event he needs to make a quick escape.

『Gatling Gun』

A weapon that Rudeus had Roxy with one of Roxy's friends developed, after taking Hitogami's suggestion to create a magic tool that shoots magic that only Rudeus can handle, for the fight against Orsted. This weapon is able to fire off 10 of his standard 『Stone Cannon』 per second. Rudeus only uses this weapon in conjunction when wearing the 『Magic Armor Mk I 』. Rudeus defeated
Atofe
 using this weapon by three steps:

In the first step, Atofe's armor was smashed into several small pieces.

In the second step, Atofe's shoulder was torn to pieces.

In the third step, Atofe's upper half of the body became full of holes that were blown off and separated from her lower half.

After Atofe realize that 『Magic Armor Mk I 』 wasn't the Fighting God Armor, she pointed out the difference in color and that the 『Gatling Gun』 didn't exist at that time.

『Shotgun Cannon』

A weapon that Rudeus developed after taking Orsted's suggestion about the Gatling gun to make it fire multiple stone cannons in one shot to counter Water God Style practitioner. This weapon is currently replacing 『Arrogant Water Dragon King』 as his main weapon when not wearing 『Magic Armor Mk Il』. Rudeus stated that this weapon is a very user-friendly weapon.

『Lithograph Stone』

Based off of the seven powers stone created by Technique God, Orsted created a stone that would allow long-range communication through writing on the Large Stone. Anything written on the main stone will appear on the sub-stones. Having a main and a sub-stone for the other person's main stone will allow for long-range communication. The stone also requires a bit of magic to actually use so it is not a widespread tool.

『Scroll Vernier』

The second Roxy made machine. A tool that was mounted on the back of the MK II. It has a bulky steampunk look to it that carries folded scrolls ready for activation. If a button near the waist is pressed with magic power, a corresponding slot with a scroll is automatically activated. There are 5 slots by each hand with a total of 10 types of scrolls.

『The Bone Ring of Laxus』

The Ring was given to him by Death God Randolph to show to Kishirika to gain favor. Kishirika told Rudeus to keep it since it may be useful. The Ring was originally owned by Death God Laxus who created the ring to kill the
Dark King Vita
. The ring works by using the death of the person the ring's holder relied on the most to break the illusion. The spiritual form of the Ring is a dirty black skeleton with a crown. The ring would not activate without the Ring's holder having experienced such a death. For Rudeus, that death was Paul's and an image of Paul's death appeared in each dream showed by the Vita. The ring caused Dark King Vita to self destruct and die. The ring broke after fulfilling its purpose.

『Atofe-hand』

A gift from
Atoferatofe
 given to Rudeus, a wooden box that contains flesh from Atofe. After getting both of his arms cut off by North God
Kalman III
 and former Sword God
Gal Farion
, Atofe-hand attached itself to Rudeus. It looks obsidian black and is hard as stone, Rudeus describes it as stronger than Zariff's Prosthetic Arm.

『Wooden Pendant』

Wooden Pendant in the Anime
Wooden Pendant in the Manga
1/2

A pendant hand made by Sylphiette for Rudeus' 10th birthday at the suggestion of her
father
 that is a good luck charm handed down in their family then
Lilia
 is suppose to send it to Rudeus but the
Teleport Incident
 occured.
 Lilia holds on to the pendant until Rudeus rescues her and Aisha in the Shirone Kingdom but didn't tell him it was made by Syphiette and when
Elinalise Dragonroad
 sees the pendant she shows a matching emblem engraved on her sword. Rudeus later realizes that Sylphiette made the pendant when they were at the Forest of Hail.
