Rudeus' Relationship in the Manga



Family

Paul Greyrat

Rudeus and Paul at the Season 2 Part 2 ending
Paul together with Rudeus in the Anime
Paul upset with Rudeus in the Anime
Paul battling Rudeus before they separate
Paul battling Rudeus in Millishion
Rudeus reuniting with Rudeus in Millishion
Rudeus and Paul reconciling in the Anime
Rudeus reuniting with Paul in the Begaritt Continent
Paul upset with Rudeus after seeing Zenith in the Anime
1/9

Paul Greyrat is Rudeus' father in the
Human World
 who trains him in the basics of the
Sword God Style
 and teaches him to protect the weak. Initially, Rudeus didn't see Paul as a father figure and instead saw him as a close friend who has the same perverted interests while Paul sees Rudeus like himself when he was younger.
 When Rudeus asks Paul to look for a job for him so he can earn money for him and Sylphy to study at
Ranoa Magic Academy
, Paul sees that Rudeus is making Sylphy to be too dependent on him and decides to separate them but is also aware that he cannot win against Rudeus when it comes to talking so he decides to fight him and knock him out before sending him to the
Citadel of Roa
.

When they reunite after the
Teleport Incident
 they had a falling out, but they reconcile soon after. He later joins him together with the former members of the Fangs of Black Wolf to reach the final floor of the
Teleport Labyrinth
 in the
Begaritt Continent
 to save Roxy and Zenith. During the final fight with the final boss Hydra, Paul saves Rudeus from a surprise attack after they are under the impression that it is dead, and was cut in half from his waist. He died knowing his son was safe. His death had deeply affected Rudeus.

Zenith Greyrat

Zenith:"Rudy"
Rudeus:"Yes, Mother?"
Zenith:"Thank you for being born"





Zenith healing Rudeus in the Anime



Zenith is the mother of Rudeus who she sees as a genius for being able to cast and intermediate rank spells at 3 years old.
 After the
Teleport Incident
, Rudeus continue to search for Zenith where he would build his reputation on each city in the Northern
Central Continent
 by helping out fellow adventurers and in returns, ask them to spread his name with the chance that Zenith will recognize him since his ability to use chantless incantation is a rare ability among magicians and they could find each other.

When Rudeus discovers that Zenith is in the
Teleportation Labyrinth
, he joins the
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 rescue her and they find that she was trapped in a Mana Crystal in the labyrinth guarded by a
Manatite Hydra
 for almost 6 years. After she had been rescued, she was thought to have lost all of her memories and emotions, which causes Rudeus to fall in to despair and depression after Paul's death and now having an invalid mother. Despite this, Rudeus brings her back to
Sharia
 where she would find a way to cure her even consulting with
Perugius Dola
 to help him.

During their trip to the
Millis Continent
, they came across the
Miko of Memory
 and through her power, it was revealed that she is capable of perceiving what is happening around her and knew what happened to her husband Paul and her life with Rudeus and his new family. Later on, it was revealed that she became a Miko and her inability to speak and her being expressionless were caused by her being in a dream-like state but still conscious of her surroundings and that she is happy with how Rudeus is looking out for her how she spends them with her grandchildren.

Lilia






Rudeus and Lilia in the Anime



When Rudeus was an infant she was afraid of him due to his smile and would try to avoid him with all their interactions being business like despite having the feeling that the child is possessed. After he convinces Zenith to forgive her and stay in the household when she got pregnant by Paul she felt indebted to him and starts to see him in good light. After she moves in Rudeus' home in
Sharia
 with Zenith, she gets closer to Rudeus and he starts to think of her like his mother.

Norn Greyrat

Rudeus seeing Norn off in the Anime
Rudeus and Norn in Ranoa Magic Academy
Rudeus and Norn at the Dorm
Rudeus and Norn studying together
1/4

When she was 5 or 6, Norn had witnessed Rudeus beating up their father which caused her to end up hating her brother, this which lasted for several years.
 Even when she and Aisha moved into his house at the age of 10 she still hated and feared Rudeus, believing that he'll hit her if she disobeys him. After that, an incident happened at school where everyone started to compare her to Rudeus which caused her to seclude herself in her dorm, Rudeus, after sneaking into her dorm room, had a little talk with her. Seeing how anxious he was trying to talk to her reminded her of their father's anxious expression which made her quickly forget her hatred towards him.

Afterwards, the two ended up growing closer to each other to the point where she starts showing a bit of jealousy when he starts showing too much attention to the other girls in the household. During the time they study together, Rudeus still continue his plan to restore the honor of the Superd but only started with the description of Ruijerd to which Norn offers to help since Ruijerd has told her stories about his past which eventually lead to Rudeus discovering that Norn has a talent for writing.

Upon finding out Norn is fated to be married with
Ruijerd
 in the previous timeloops from Orsted, Rudeus helped set-up their marriage and when Rudeus tells Norn that she will be wed to Ruijerd, Norn immediately urges she wants to marry Ruijerd.

Aisha Greyrat

Rudeus escaping with Aisha in the Anime
Rudeus giving Aisha his headband in the Anime
Rudeus shopping with Aisha in the Anime
1/3

Aisha first met Rudy when she was 5 or 6 in Shirone, he saved her when she was cornered by some guards. Rudeus pretended that he wasn't her brother because of her low opinion of him. She believed that he was just a pervert due to her discovering Roxy's used panties hidden in his room. She quickly figured out that Rudy was her brother, though it's possible that she probably already knew from the start, and ended up testing him to see if he was a bad person or not. When she and Norn moved into Rudeus' house at age 10, she was the only one of the two excited to live with him. She loves her brother dearly and will sometime make attempts to seduce him. Despite all of that, she's willing to blackmail him to get what she wants as she once had threatened to reveal his hidden shrine, that contained Roxy's used panties, if he didn't allow her to keep a
baby treant
 that she was growing in her room, forcing him to consent. Aisha was the only one who knew Rudeus was reincarnated from another world due to their previous adventures together.

Wives

Sylphiette Greyrat

Rudeus teaching Sylphiette Voiceless Incantation in the Anime
Sylphiette forgiving Rudeus
Rudeus tutoring Sylphy in the Anime
Sylphiette not wanting to separate from Rudeus
Rudeus meeting Fitz in the Anime
Rudeus learning Fitz is Sylphy in the Anime
Rudeus showing Sylphy their new house
Rudeus and Sylphy's wedding reception
1/8

Rudeus met Sylphiette at the age of 5. They became friends when Rudeus saved her from being bullied. During their time together, Rudeus taught her
Magic
, so that she could defend herself from bullies and also educated her in various fields of subjects. Rudeus originally thought she was a boy because of her short hair. He had planned to use Sylphy to pick up women. However, one day, after getting wet in the rain and not wanting Sylphy to catch a cold and as a prank, he forcefully stripped her and learned that she was not a boy. She was extremely attached to Rudeus, and Rudeus intended to bring her with him to attend
Ranoa Magic Academy
. When he asked his parents to pay for both of their tuition but was rejected, he was willing to work so that he could earn her tuition as well, seeing Sylphy getting attached and started to overly dependent on Rudeus, Paul separated them and forbade Rudeus to contact home because Sylphy it is not good for her growth. They were supposed to reunite in five years once Rudeus became 12 and attend Ranoa Magic Academy together, but the events of the
Teleport Incident
 caused her whereabouts to be unknown to Rudeus. After 8 years, they finally reunited in Ranoa Magic Academy, but he could not recognize her since she was disguised as a boy, wearing ( magical ) sunglasses, and no longer had her emerald green hair due to it turning white. After many encounters, Rudeus eventually realized that Sylphy, who goes by the name Fitts, was a girl. After Sylphy recreated a childhood event and was able to make Rudeus realize that she was Sylphy, Rudeus took her virginity after she gave him an aphrodisiac to cure him of his illness. The day after she lost her virginity to Rudeus, he cut out a piece of bedcloth that contained some of Sylphy's blood and put it in a box, worshipping it like what he did with Roxy's panties. They soon got married and Sylphy got pregnant with their daughter Lucy Greyrat, years later with their son Sieghart Saladin Greyrat. She is the Goddess of Love in Rudeus' religion.

Roxy Greyrat

Roxy and Rudeus sharing their first kiss in the Anime
Roxy comforting Rudeus after Paul's death
Roxy and Rudeus in the Teleportation Labyrinth
Roxy and Rudeus studying the book for the Teleportation Labyrinth
Rudeus embracing Roxy after saving her
Roxy giving Rudeus a Magic Wand
Roxy training Rudeus in Magic
1/7

Rudy met Roxy at the age of 3 and when his parents hired her as a magic tutor and and in additional taught him many other things from her. At the age of 5, during his graduation from Roxy's lesson's she cured him of his fear of the outside, and for this, Rudeus was extremely grateful towards her and even follow her path of being a tutor for Sylphy and later Eris. From then on, they only talked by letters and Rudy is very grateful when Roxy sent him a book to learn the
Demon God Language
 and even made a figurine doll of Roxy. By the time he had split up with Eris, Rudeus had began worshiping Roxy's artifact (panties) and hailed her as his god for what she had done for him. When they were finally reunited, Roxy didn't recognize Rudeus as how he has grown up into a young man, which led to him being in shock before she found out who he was. When Rudeus was grieving about Paul's death, Roxy came to his aid and had sex with him, which helped Rudeus recover from his depression. After the events of the
Teleport Labyrinth
, Roxy becomes Rudeus' second wife. They had two daughters, Lara Greyrat and Lily Greyrat. She is the Goddess of Wisdom in Rudeus' religion.

Eris Greyrat

Rudeus using X-Healing on Eris
Eris and Rudeus escaping captivity in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus training in Swordsmanship in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus dancing together in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus during the Teleport Incident
Eris and Rudeus in the Demon Continent
Eris consoling Rudeus in the Anime
Eris and Rudeus spending the night together
1/8

Rudy met Eris at the age of 7 where he is sent to be her tutor. During their time together at the
Citadel of Roa
, Rudeus tutors Eris in various fields such as writing, reading, math and
Magic
 and Eris begins to change over time. During Eris' 10th birthday, Rudeus helps her overcome her struggles in dancing and eventually fallen in love with Rudeus and openly praising him.

After the events of the
Teleport Incident
, they traveled together through the
Demon Continent
 and
Millis Continent
. When the trip was over and they managed to come back, Eris and Rudeus had their first night together, the next morning Eris was gone. this caused Rudeus to enter a state of depression and develop ED.

Since their separation, Rudeus believes that she cannot face Eris if they ever meet again but this changed after meeting his
future self
 and writes a letter to her. After 5 years, they reunited after
battling Orsted
 and Eris became Rudeus' third wife. Due to Rudeus' low skill in swordsmanship, Eris became his partner and swordswoman whenever they set on an adventure. She helped Rudeus during the fight for the crown in the
Asura Kingdom
, defeating
North Emperor Auber
 together with
Ghislaine
. During the final fight with
Geese
, she took on the Sword God
Gal Farion
 together with
Ruijerd
 splitting them away from Rudeus. They had two children together, Ars Greyrat and Christina Greyrat. She is the Goddess of War in Rudeus' religion.

Children

Lucy Greyrat

Lucy is Rudeus' and Sylphy's daughter. When she was 3 years old. she had a tendency to run away from her father whenever he came back because she didn't see him as a father but a complete stranger which was caused by him often being away from home. Later on she grew close to him, enjoying the time spent with him and complaining about his work taking him away from her.

Lara Greyrat

Lara is Rudeus' and Roxy's daughter. She has a strong look on her face and she hardly ever cries. The only time she really cried was when Rudeus was going to go to Shirone and she didn't stop crying until Rudeus decided to take Roxy with him. She is also the legendary Hero that the
Sacred Beast
 is supposed to protect.

Ars Greyrat

Ars is Rudeus' and Eris' son. He loves Boobs like any other Greyrat male. He especially likes his mother's breasts, but he is not limited to just big ones. He likes small ones like Sylphy's and Roxy's to large ones like
Linia's
 and
Pursena's
. Like his father, he does not discriminate between the sizes. He does not care much for males and will cry whenever Rudeus tries to picks him up to hold him.

Sieghart Saladin Greyrat

Sieghart is Rudeus' and Sylphy's son. He has a green hair almost like his mother and has a face similar to his father. Rudeus and Sylphy initially thought he was the reincarnation of Laplace and brought him to
Perugius
, who confirmed he wasn't. Also, his real name is only Sieghart Greyrat, he got Saladin name from Perugius and due to Rudeus and his family already liking his name, Saladin became his middle name.

Lily Greyrat

Lily is Rudeus' and Roxy's second daughter. At the time of the Jobless Oblige Story Lily still lives at Rudeus' House but later at the time of the Redundancy Chapter: The Last One to Leave the Nest she moved out. Rudeus inherited her his

Magic Armor research, and the production of an All-Purpose Magic Armor was completed in K483. It was useful for reducing the amount of casualties during the subjugation of large monsters.

Christina Greyrat

Christina is Rudeus' and Eris' daughter and the youngest child of the family. Amongst the siblings, she is the one that is most open about wanting to be spoiled by Rudeus. She's a daddy's girl and listens to him rather than to her mothers. Rudeus was skeptical at Christina's attitude when she first attended Asura Royal Academy as she was naive. However, after three years, he attended her graduation and was impressed when she turned around a plot to embarrass her in front of the nobles and
Ariel
. Afterwards, Rudeus showed her he was proud of what she became but was shortly interrupted when
Edward
, the son of
Luke
 and Ariel, asked for her hand in marriage.

Others

Ghislaine Dedoldia






Rudeus and Ghislaine in the Anime



Sword King Ghislaine Dedoldia is a member of the Fangs of the Black Wolf with Paul and Zenith until it was disbanded.
 At the request of Paul, Ghislaine picks up Rudeus and brings him to the
Citadel of Roa
 to become Eris' tutor and also teach Ghislaine
Magic
, math and reading while Ghislaine in turn teaches Rudeus the
Beast God Language
 and
Sword God Style
 while also acting as his bodyguard with Eris.

Ruijerd Superdia






Rudeus and Ruijerd



"Before, when I handed him this pendant, it was over a trivial matter. When we parted, I never intended for him to give it back to me, I hoped that he would hold onto it. Or perhaps I wanted to have a link with him. But he had returned it now. Because we were already brethren. Because we won’t be parting for quite some time now."

- Rudeus in regards to Ruijerd

His brother-in-law. Rudeus first meets Ruijerd at the
Demon Continent
 after the teleport incident and at the behest of Hitogami. After learning the Ruijerd's past, Rudeus offers to assist him in restoring the honor of his
Superd Tribe
 and after reaching an understanding on their personality they became close allies.
 Rudeus is incredibly faithful towards Ruijerd considering his wellbeing as one of his top priorities,
 and describing their friendship as one of his greatest sources of pride.
 After they went their separate ways, Rudeus still continues to help in restoring the honor of the Superd by making a storybook about them and selling Superd dolls.
 During the final battle arc Rudeus reunites with Ruijerd and manages to convince him to fight alongside him despite the risk this posed to the Superd tribe. Rudeus is furious at
Orsted
 for withholding information about Ruijerd's whereabouts and condition to the point he almost considered Orsted his enemy.
 When Orsted gives him a mission to arrange for Norn's wedding, he is surprised Norn is fated to marry Ruijerd. After confirming Ruijerd also has feeling for Norn and wants to marry her, Ruijerd returns the Migurd pendant as he considers him a part of his family now.
 They have a running gag where Rudeus likes to tease him by calling him father.

Zanoba Shirone






Rudeus and Zanoba in the Anime



"No one can match his abilities in regards to knowledge of dolls."

-Rudeus in regards to Zanoba

Rudeus was once saved by Zanoba when he got trapped in the Shirone Kingdom. He bought the earth doll of Roxy that Rudeus made, and when he found out that he made it, he was overjoyed and asked Rudeus to be his master, he then freed Rudeus and never saw him until Rudeus went to
Ranoa Magic Academy
. Zanoba greatly respects Rudeus and reports all of his doll research's results to him, which Rudeus in turn gives help and advice on how to improve his creations. Zanoba is slowly able to relate to humans and understand human emotion (at least conceptually) through his friendship with Rudeus.

Elinalise Dragonroad






Rudeus and Elinalise in the Anime



Elinalise first meets Rudeus at the city of Pippin, Basherant Kingdom and introduces herself to be a member of Paul's Party
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 then informs Rudeus that her mother has been found and Paul is going to rescue her. Since then, Elinalise has been Rudeus' companion where they head to
Ranoa Magic Academy
 in
Sharia
 and much to Rudeus' chagrin, she picks up men on the way but refuses to make advances on Rudeus since she has a history with Paul and does not want to be his mother in law.
 With the help of Rudeus, Elinalise and
Cliff Grimoire
 became a couple where they eventually marry and when Cliff returns to
Millishion
, he entrusts Elinalise under Rudeus' care until she can stay with him in Millishion.

Cliff Grimoire






Rudeus and Cliff in the Anime



"If Cliff-senpai wasn't here, then i wouldn't be here."

-Rudeus in regards to Cliff

Rudeus and Cliff first met at
Ranoa Magic Academy
. He was unfriendly to him at first, seeing him as a love rival between him and Eris, but after finding out he was a friend of
Elinalise
, whom he fell love at first sight, he asked Rudeus to introduce her to him and became friends with Rudeus afterwards. Upon knowing the curse of Elinalise, he and Rudeus find a way to suppress it by inventing a magic diaper/panties charged with Rudeus' magic. He also helped Rudeus in finding a medicine for Nanahoshi in the
Demon Continent
, where he received a
Demon Eye
 from
Kirishika
 by feeding her streetfood. After graduating from the academy, Rudeus and Cliff sets to
Millis Kingdom
 with the aim of becoming a high ranking official in the continent, however Cliff refuses to accept Rudeus help with the reason that he wants to make it on his own. During Rudeus' adventure in the Biheiril Kingdom, he came to his aid by using the demon eye he received from Kishirika to find the remedy for the unknown plague affecting the
Superd Tribe
, saving Ruijerd.

Perugius Dola

Perugius is Rudeus' teacher for Summoning Magic. Rudeus meets Perugius when Nanahoshi agrees to bring him along with his friends to Perugius' flying fortress for an audience with him.
 When Nanhoshi falls ill from
Drain Syndrome
, Perugius agrees to assist Rudeus while searching for a cure in the Demon Continent where, the opportunity to get revenge on
Atoferatofe Rybak
 was made by Rudeus at the delight of Perugius.

Under the guidance of Perugius, Rudeus and Zanoba creates
Anne
 an automaton doll based on Perugius' familiars that makes the summoned beast loyal to its master to the surprise of Perugius that Anne is more human than his familiars.

Orsted






Rudeus battling Orsted in the Anime



"With each person he encounters, the world greatly changes."

-Orsted

Rudeus first encounters while travelling back to Buena Village and nearly died in their
battle
.
 He became Orsted's subordinate after their second battle and has been working together ever since to prepare for the battle against Hitogami while Orsted would protect Rudeus' family. To prepare for the battle, Rudeus would do missions on Orsted's behalf to conserve his mana from gathering allies to thwarting Hitogami's plans.

Geese Nukadia






Rudeus and Geese in the Anime



Rudeus first encounters Geese when while in prison at the
Beast Race
 Village in the
Great Forest
 and they travelled together where Geese would cook for them until they part ways in
Millishion
.
 Through the intervention of Geese, Rudeus and Paul were able to return good terms after their quarrel.

Badigadi






Rudeus and Badigadi in the Anime



Badigadi took interest on Rudeus after hearing how
Kishirika Kishirisu
 praises Rudeus' Mana capacity which made him jealous and eventually challenges him to a duel at Ranoa Magic Academy. Rudeus on the other hand was initially bewildered at Badigadi's presence and demeanor.
 Although Badigadi admits defeat, he is seen together with Rudeus' group during lunchtime and would also help Rudeus and his friends out.

Julie






Rudeus and Juliette in the Anime



Juliette was a
slave
 that Rudeus and Zanoba purchased to teach her Earth Magic so she can make dolls for Zanoba. Aside from this, Rudeus also teaches Juliette Silent Spellcasting and the Human God
Language
 which in turn, Juliette refers to Rudeus as Grandmaster since Zanoba calls Rudeus his Master. Rudeus also opposed the idea that Juliette to be branded with a mark for slaves since Rudeus considers her to be another disciple.

Hitogami






Rudeus and Hitogami in the Anime



Rudeus first encounters Hitogami in the aftermath of the
Teleport Incident
 where Hitogami seems to give helpful advises but he is plotting to have him killed since then. Through out the series, Hitogami has been working behind the scenes to kill Rudeus  because of his descendants being destined to ally with Orsted and will kill him in the future. Hitogami successfully prevented this future but the
Rudeus
 of that timeline managed to travel back in time to warn his younger self and foiled the plot he is about to do.

Nanahoshi Shizuka






Rudeus and Nanahoshi in the Anime



Rudeus first meets Nanahoshi at the
Red Wyrm Mountains
 during his travels with his party Dead End, but he didn't have any interactions with her until they meet again at Ranoa Magic Academy. Rudeus later learns that it was Nanahoshi who suggested to Orsted to spare Rudeus instead which causes Rudeus' fear towards Nanahoshi to eventually fade and they agreed to work together in conducting research on
Summoning Magic
. Through the years, they both continue research on various fields and Rudeus' friends view his inexplicable behavior towards Nanahoshi with mixed reactions such as Sylphiette being jealous of their closeness
 while Zanoba views Rudeus' treatment to Nanahoshi to how he also treats his sisters.
 Despite being from the same world, the two generally maintain a professional distance from each other.

When Nanahoshi fell into depression and grew ill, Rudeus brings her to his
home
 and nurse her to recovery.
 Through the help of his friends they are able to help Nanahoshi advance her Summoning Magic Research
 and in return, Nanahoshi allows Rudeus and his friends to meet with Perugius.

Linia Dedoldia






Rudeus battling Linia in the Anime



Rudeus first meets Linia Ranoa Magic University where he introduces himself to be an acquaintance of her
father
 and
grandfather
 and they barely have any interactions until Rudeus learns that Linia is responsible for the destruction of the Roxy figurine that he gave to Zanoba which angers him. Rudeus and Zanoba defeats Linia and Pursena where they gag them and confine them in Rudeus' room where they eventually acknowledge their wrongdoings and begin to call Rudeus their "Boss".
 Linia and Rudeus gradually warm up to each other. Linia eventually comes to serve the Greyrat family as a debted slave, first as a maid and then as the head of a mercenary company.

Pursena Adoldia






Rudeus immobilizing Linia with Quagmire in the Anime



Like Linia, Rudeus also meets Pursena at Ranoa Magic University
 who also begins calling Rudeus her Boss after being defeated by him.  Together with Linia they would argue on who will be the "Number 2" rank of their boss and would make suggestions to show their dominance like demanding girls to surrender their panties which Rudeus rejected and also tells them to stop bullying the weak. Like Rudeus, Pursena also studied Advanced Class Healing Magic.
 Despite the imprisonment and torture, Pursena quickly warms up to Rudeus. Rudeus, likewise, views her fondly and arranged to have Pursena work for him as her punishment from the Beast Tribe rather than her being permanently exiled.

Silent Fitz






Rudeus and Silent Fitz in the Anime



Rudeus first meets Silent Fitz during an entrance exam for Ranoa Magic Academy where Rudeus defeats him and to prevent Fitz from looking bad, Rudeus declares that Fitz held back so he can be accepted in the University and Rudeus also promises to make it up to him. Fitz would later intervene to protect Rudeus from being punished when he unknowingly pass by the Girl's dormitory in the evening to which Rudeus is grateful for his help and would respect him by calling him Mister Fitz.
 Until Rudeus realizes that Silent Fitz is Sylphiette in disguise, Rudeus would spend most of their time together in the Library at the University researching and Rudeus would always ask for advice during situations he is at a loss on what to do. She helps Rudeus when he ties up Linia and Pursena in his room, at which she is reasonably worried by. Fitz uses some magic circle ink in order to convince the two that if they ever betray Rudeus, an incantation would be able to permanently etch the ink into their bodies. The last thing that Silent Fitz does before revealing herself to Rudeus is asking Rudy to assist her in finding a flower to impress some nobles on Ariel's behalf.

Sara

Rudeus rescuing Sara in the Anime
Rudeus healing Sara in the Anime
Rudeus and Sara on a date in the Anime
Rudeus and Sara reuniting in the Special Book Manga
1/4

Sara initially reminds him of Eris because of their talent but overall keeps his distance while Sara dislikes Rudeus for being related to the Asura Kingdom Nobility.
 After rescuing Sara from certain death, she begins to warm up to him that they even go on a date but it caused a misunderstanding that causes them to go their separate ways.

Rudeus and Sara would meet when they are both assigned to an escort mission of a Ranoa Kingdom Royalty and they reconciled.
 They would later meet again at the Conflict Zone where Sara and her party are unable to leave so  Rudeus asks Sara, who is now the leader of their party to join them to leave the zone which Sara decides that she will quit being an Adventurer and get married.
 Years later, Rudeus and Sara meets at the Citadel of Roa and to Rudeus' surprise, Sara is now married and is running a restaurant with her husband where Rudeus plans to visit whenever he is nearby.

Soldat Heckler

Rudeus first meeting with Soldat in the Anime
Rudeus and Soldat talking in the Anime
Soldat asking Rudeus to join him
Soldat's party completing the mission to slay a Red Dragon
Soldat seeing Rudeus off
1/5

Soldat initially dislikes Rudeus for his behavior while Rudeus sees Soldat's personality to be like Paul. After coming to an understanding of what has happened to Rudeus, Soldat begins to help him out such and when Rudeus broke up with Sara, Soldat offers that he join him to a mission to another town and since then would join his party for missions such as slaying a rogue
Red Dragon
.

Pets

Leo

Rudeus meeting Leo in the Anime
Rudeus summoning Leo to be the Protector of their Family in the Light Novel
1/2

Rudeus first meets Leo when rescuing the
Beast Race
 that were kidnapped but is he is later captured and taken to the Beast Race Village and at Leo's request to treat him kindly even while imprisoned.
 Rudeus later summons Leo to become the Guardian Beast of their family has been together with his family ever since especially when watching over Lara.

Jirou

Rudeus
 purchases Jirou along with a carriage to be pulled for preparations to travel from the
Begaritt Continent
 to
Sharia
 that will be used as a ride for
Zenith
 and
Lilia
 (in the Anime) as they travel through the desert. Rudeus initially plans to leave Jirou in the desert but decides to bring him since he can fit in the Teleportion Circle instead of letting him die in the desert. Upon arriving at the Northern Central Continent, Jirou seems to be struggling with the cold and could anytime that Rudeus decides to at least give him a name and decides that it will be Jirou. But Jirou manages to survive and gets used to the cold temperature in Sharia. Due to Jirou's tendency to sleep between the legs of Rudeus, Sylphy sees that to be a similarity between Jirou and Rudeus.
.

Beat

Beat is a baby
Treant
 Monster that Aisha cultivated in her room and until it starts moving after being transplanted to a pot. Rudeus initially wants to burn the baby treant but he is stopped by Aisha after she blackmails him into revealing his shrine at the basement for his wives. Rudeus finally agrees to keep Beat after Roxy confirms that the
Migurd
 train these treants to keep birds out of the field which also causes a rumor that a monster lives in Rudeus' house.

Rudeus vs Orsted I
==================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!





Rudeus vs Orsted in the Anime



Rudeus vs Orsted I
, also known as
Dead End vs Orsted
 is a battle between Rudeus Greyrat, Dead End against Orsted at Red Wyrm Mountain, Central Continent in K419 and this battle is also the second Turning Point in Rudeus' life.

Belligerents

Rudeus Greyrat

Orsted

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ruijerd Superdia

Although
Nanahoshi Shizuka
 is with Orsted when he encounters Rudeus, she never took part in the battle.

Prelude

Dead End's Journey





Dead End Party Travelling in the Anime



In
K417
, before the
Teleport Incident
 manifests, Orsted notices a red orb above the
Citadel of Roa
 and mobilizes towards the orb to  investigate. Meanwhile, Rudeus together with Eris and
Ghislaine Dedoldia
 are outside Roa when the Teleport Incident occurs causing Rudeus and Eris to be teleported to the
Demon Continent
 where they are saved by Ruijerd.
 Together, Rudeus, Eris and Ruijerd forms the
Dead End

Adventurer Party
 to earn money while travelling back to
Asura Kingdom
 for the next 3 years.

Orsted and Nanahoshi






Orsted and Nanahoshi travelling in the Manga



In the grasslands of Asura Kingdom, Orsted arrives at the area where the Teleport Incident occurred and finds Nanahoshi who was summoned from Earth so he helps her and a year later, Nanahoshi learns the
Human God Language
 then the year after, Orsted and Nanahoshi travels to Ars, Asura Kingdom's capital where she establishes various businesses that allows her to earn money through Orsted's influence as the Dragon God while gathering information on how to return to earth. They then travelled around the
Human World
 looking for Nanahoshi's friends in their journey.

Encounter

"Rudeus, whatever you do, don't move. Eris, you too."

-Ruijerd






Dead End Party meeting Orsted and Nanahoshi



In K419, Rudeus, Eris and Ruijerd are still travelling back to Asura Kingdom and at the Red Wyrm Mountain, they encounter Orsted and Nanahoshi also travelling where Eris and Ruijerd are visibly in fear of Orsted as he pass by them. Realizing who they were, Orsted turns back and greet them like they know who they are with the exception of Rudeus to which Orsted questions who he is and Rudeus answers while Orsted notices that Rudeus does not fear him unlike Eris and Ruijerd. After few more exchanges, Orsted and Nanahoshi is about to leave but Rudeus stops them and asks Orsted if he knows anything about the Teleport Incident to which Orsted also replies he does not know. Orsted then asks Rudeus if he is familiar with
Hitogami
 to which Rudeus replies he appears in his dream but Orsted suddenly attacks him.

Battle

Ruijerd vs Orsted

"You are in the way, Ruijerd Superdia!"

-Orsted






Ruijerd battling Orsted in the Anime



Ruijerd manage to block Orsted's attack directed to Rudeus and he tells both Rudeus and Eris to run as he begins to battle Orsted.
Rudeus in shock and unable to runaway is only able to see the battle between the two. Ruijerd attacks Orsted relentlessly but Orsted easily dodges and parries all attacks while being able to position in Ruijerd's blind spots. Using the
Dragon Tribe
 Fighting Style:
Teaching of Nail, Fangs and Wings
, Orsted lands his strikes on Ruijerd's solar plexus, chin and the third punch to the temple knocks Ruijerd out as he is sent flying backwards.

Eris vs Orsted

"Eris Boreas Greyrat, you've honed your skills quite well. I believe you have potential, but... youre still unpolished."

-Orsted






Eris vs Orsted in the Anime



The moment Ruijerd is defeated, Eris immediately attacks Orsted from outside his line of sight with her
Inscription-less Sword
 but Orsted is able to catch her sword with his hand and counter attacks with
Flow
, a Water God Style counter attack. This causes Eris to be knocked back and spinning then crashing onto the cliff face but Eris still tries to get up but is unable to fight any further.

Rudeus vs Orsted

"Is that a
power
 you gained from
Hitogami
? What else did he give you?"

-Orsted

Rudeus vs Orsted in the Anime
Orsted summoning Dragon Gate in the Anime
Rudeus casting Nuclear Explosion in the Anime
Dragon Gate cracks for absorbing too much mana
Rudeus defeated by Orsted in the Anime
1/5

With Ruijerd and Eris defeated, Rudeus would normally try to heal them but Orsted is glaring at him and when he uses his
Foresight Eyes
, all he sees is despair of being defeated by Orsted no matter what he do. Seconds later, Orsted closes in and fractures 6 ribs of Rudeus to prevent him for casting spells which also causes him to cough up blood and curl over. Seeing that Rudeus is on death's door, Orsted begins to leave but despite realizing that he is on death's door, Rudeus sees Orsted let his guard down so he casts
Stone Cannon
, the spell he is most familiar with that Rudeus modified to be the hardest he can conjure, at the fastest speed with the quickest spin. and launches it to Orsted but he smashes the Stone Cannon with his bare hand that leaves a small wound that surprises Orsted. Rudeus tries to use
Fireball
 but Orsted nullifies it with
Disturb Magic
. Rudeus realizes that his right hand is sealed by Disturb Magic so he uses
Blast
 from his left hand which knocks him and Orsted back.

Rudeus begins to cast his strongest fire spell
Nuclear Explosion
 while Orsted summons
Dragon Gate
 and when gate opened, the Mana gathering in Rudeus' left hand is swallowed by the gate. Moments later, the frame of the Dragon Gate cracks and splinters followed by a smaller explosion than Rudeus expected and causing Orsted to mention that Rudeus'
Mana
 capacity is almost on the same level as
Laplace
. With Rudeus' wounds taking its toll on him, Rudeus falls to his knees and Orsted picks him up and questions why he is not using
Healing Magic
 but Rudeus is unresponsive. Orsted then finishes him off with a
spear thrust
 with his hand to Rudeus' heart, drops Rudeus, leaving a gaping hole in his chest and begins to depart while Eris who witnesses this, wails and runs to Rudeus who is not moving...

Aftermath

Rudeus talking to Hitogami in the Anime
Rudeus after being healed by Orsted in the Anime

1/4

Eris tries to use Healing Magic on Rudeus but is unable to do so

At Nanahoshi's request, Orsted lets Rudeus live by using at least a King-Ranked Healing Magic on Rudeus

Rudeus once again meets Hitogami at the
Void World
 who tells him about Orsted's
Curse
 but tells him that he is still alive

Hitogami also tells Rudeus that the curse affecting Ruijerd is beginning to fade due to cutting his hair

After seeing Rudeus at the brink of death, Eris grew closer to Rudeus who promises her to escape next time

After observing Orsted, Rudeus begins practicing and learns how to use Disturb Magic

Rudeus tells Ruijerd that their opponent was Orsted, the Second rank of the
Seven Great Powers
 and Ruijerd mentions that he hasn't felt having no chance of winning since his battle against
Laplace
.

Rudeus tells Ruijerd about Hitogami and the fear and discrimination towards the
Superd Tribe
 is a curse that is also fading and restoring the reputation of the Superd Tribe is up to his effort.

After reaching
Fittoa Region
, Ruijerd part ways with Rudeus and Eris

After realizing how powerless she was against Orsted and felt like she is a burden to Rudeus, Eris decides to leave and goes to the
Holy Land of Swords
 to train with Ghislaine.

Rudeus falls into depression after being left by Eris but goes to the northern
Central Continent
 to look for Zenith and encounters the
Counter Arrow
 Party.

After battling the Dragon God and experiencing his killing intent, Rudeus is no longer intimidated even by a
Red Dragon
's killing intent which is significantly less compared to Orsted's

Rudeus wounding Orsted becomes known even by powerful beings like
Badigadi
 and
Perugius Dola
 which no one has achieved before due to Orsted's
Saint Dragon Battle Aura
 protecting him.

Rudeus uses Disturb Magic for the first time in a mock battle against
Fitz
 to enter
Ranoa Magic Academy

Badigadi arrives at the Ranoa Magic Academy to challenge Rudeus but agrees to let him do the first attack with the Stone Cannon that wounds Orsted

Fitz
 introduces Rudeus to an expert of
Summoning Magic
 who turns out to be Nanahoshi who is terrified of her but after explaining to Rudeus she asks Orsted to spare him, they agreed to work together on Nanahoshi's research

When Nanahoshi falls ill due to
Drain Syndrome
, Rudeus asks Perugius if he knows where Orsted is to ask about the sickness despite nearly being killed by him.

After being warned by
his future self
 and preventing Roxy's death due to
Magic Stone Disease
, Hitogami is angry at this but agrees to leave his
family
 alone if Rudeus kills Orsted.

Nanahoshi agrees to help Rudeus despite Orsted saving her when she is teleported to the Human World

Ruijerd

Ruijerd Superdia

Ruijerd Superdia
================

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Information

Relationships

Gallery

We were victims of Laplace's plot! The Superd are no race of monstrous beasts!

Ruijerd, to
Rudeus

Ruijerd Superdia
 (
ルイジェルド・スペルディア
,

Ruijerudo Superudia
)
 is the former leader of the Superd's Warrior group who once served under
Laplace
 with unwavering loyalty. He was accompanying
Rudeus
 and
Eris
 but left in search of his people. Under manipulation, Ruijerd killed his son, who was able to free him from Laplace's control. Following the annihlation of his species, Ruijerd travels the world to dissolve the stigma against the Superd race.

Appearance

Ruijerd is tall for an average
Superd
, muscular build, handsome and shared their distinctive features such as porcelain white skin and emerald green hair with a red gemstone on his forehead. He wears a brown tribal vest that only covers his back and sides, fully displaying his frontal torso and arms.

Moreover, he is distinguished by his smooth oval chin and a long scar that trails from the right top corner of his forehead across his glabella to the left end of his cheek.

When Rudeus bleached his hair, it became a different color. However, Ruijerd later shaved his head bald and wore a headband to cover the gemstone on his forehead.

He now wears the necklace gifted to him by Rudeus around his neck.

Personality

"A warrior protects children and treasures their comrades"

Despite having a scary demeanor, Ruijerd is very kind and fatherly. He always helps children no matter what the circumstances, and would go berserk when people try to hurt them.

Ruijerd follows a very strict warrior's code of honor that he would go to extreme lengths to fulfill his promises. He is also described as rather stubborn, having a very adamant sense of justice that he won't tolerate even minor crimes during his debut regardless of how it may look like to those surrounding him which also causes misunderstandings of his intention.

Background

Ruijerd was born to a pair of Superd warriors in a town in the Babinosu Region. Being a talented and hardworking warrior, he was elected as the war chief of the Superd warrior group that served as
Laplace
's elite force in just a few decades, an achievement that's almost unheard of. He also married Luwelia, a female tribe member that took care of him like an elder sister since childhood, and gave birth to his son Luiweld
.

However, Laplace betrayed their loyalty by ordering them to take up the cursed pitch black Devil's spears into battle in favor of their birth spears, which put them into a mesmeric frenzy that caused them to mindlessly slaughter those around them, including their own family. After giving his son a fatal wound, Ruiweld managed to destroy the Devil's spear and finally wake Ruijerd from his stupor to realize the truth.

In the moment of despair from his actions, Ruijerd had considered committing suicide to atone for his sins, but ultimately decided to exact vengeance on Laplace for the cruel fate befallen his people along with everyone of the warrior group. After several years of hiding and biding his time carefully, he finally got his revenge when he turned the tide of the decisive battle between Laplace and the three heroes, by striking Laplace's weak point
.

Although Laplace was defeated, there was no way to change the things that had already transpired, and the horrible reputation of the
Superd Tribe
 had already taken root which caused even stories about the Superd that kills friends and enemies alike to frighten children have circulated even to the
Central Continent
. After exacting his revenge, he now has a goal of restoring the honor and fixing the reputation that the Superd race has.

Plot






Rudeus and Eris meeting Ruijerd



Ruijerd meets
Rudeus
 and
Eris
 who are transported to the
Demon Continent
 in the aftermath of the
Teleport Incident
. He later brings them to a
Migurd
 Village where he tells Rudeus of his past with the latter volunteering to help restore the honor of the Superd. Ruijerd, Rudeus and Eris eventually forms the party
Dead End
 and joins the
Adventure Guild
 to use the money they earn to travel back to the Central Continent where Ruijerd is given the alias "Watch Dog".

"I'm sure you have your own complaints, but those complaints can only be said while your son is alive."

-Ruijerd to
Paul Greyrat

When they reach
Millishion
, Ruijerd reaches out to his contact to secure a passage out of
Millis Continent
 then assists in rescuing the family of soldiers in Shirone Kingdom held by
Pax Shirone
.
 On Red Wyrm Mountains, Ruijerd fights the Dragon God
Orsted
 who attacked Rudeus when he mentions
Hitogami
 which resulted in their defeat but they somehow survived the encounter.






Ruijerd, Norn and Aisha meeting Rudeus



Ruijerd saves Norn who was being confronted by two men and threatens them, causing the men to leave. As Norn vents her frustrations about her family, Ruijerd reflecting on his own pitfalls as a parent, he empowers Norn that she should work harder to overcome her weaknesses, Norn moved by his positive words asks his name, Ruijerd introduces himself, his headband falls revealing his third eye as
Roxy
 and
Lilia
 arrive at the scene. Following the aftermath, Ruijerd meets with Paul who was initially reluctant to let Ruijerd to escort Norn and Aisha to Rudeus in
Sharia
 but eventually consents so Ruijerd became Aisha and Norn's bodyguard on their journey.

Six months later, Ruijerd delivers Paul's daughters to Rudeus in Sharia as promised, yet he is disheartened to learn that Rudeus didn't marry Eris, seemingly crestfallen by the news, he advises Rudeus to reach out for Eris as he believes she's suffering from warrior disease.

The following morning, Rudeus wakes to an unexpected sight with Ruijerd and Badigadi locking tense gazes, Badigadi backs down once Rudeus comes into view and disappears. After that they have breakfast, Ruijerd prepares to depart to resume his search for remnants of his lost kin, with Rudeus, Norn, Sylphie and Aisha escorting him to the town's exit to see him off. As they reach the city's exit, Norn clings tightly to the hem of Ruijerd's vest,  Ruijerd comforts and assures her that their paths will cross again, that she should rely on her brother from now. With warm and hearfelt goodbyes exchanged, he entrusts the children and Rudeus to Sylphie and bids them farewell.






Ruijerd and Rudeus reunion



Seven years later, Ruijerd is spotted by the Rude Mercenary Company in the Biheiril Kingdom, buying medicine and wearing thick robes with a hood to hide his eyes. Fearing that Ruijerd may be in danger from Geese, Rudeus assembles a team to intercept Geese and recruit Ruijerd.

Ruijerd is found in a remote village within the Forest of No Return in the south, living among his tribe, whom Rudeus describes as exceptionally beautiful. At first, Ruijerd was wary and didn’t recognize Rudeus due to his disguise, but after revealing his face, the two shared an emotional reunion. Ruijerd had finally found his people and was no longer alone.

Ruijerd and Rudeus continue their conversation at Ruijerd's house, one of the largest homes in the village owing to his distinguished position. At the same time, Rudeus is struck by how empty the house feels. Rudeus brings up marriage but Ruijerd assures him the past doesn’t weigh on him anymore but he simply hasn't found a partner. Afterward, Rudeus recounts everything that transpired since their separation, including Paul’s death, his encounter with his future self, his marriage to Eris, and his alliance with Orsted, among other things.

Rudeus asks Ruijerd to join him in the future battle against Laplace, however, Ruijerd hesitates and ultimately refuses without explanation. Ruijerd then takes Rudeus into the forest, revealing a grim truth: the plague in the Superd village was never cured, only curbed. The supposed recovery was a lie he told the village elders. He removes his forehead guard to reveal a blue jewel marked with ominous markings, proof that he is possessed by
Abyssal King Vita
.

Volume 23 - Young Man Period - Decisive Battle Chapter

Found in a forest inside the
Biheiril Kingdom
 with fellow Superd Tribe members

Superd Tribe members are all sick with an illness that is temporarily being treated by
Dark King Vita

Possessed by Dark King Vita

Saved from disease by
Cliff Grimoire
 who determine the illness is
Drain Syndrome

Power and Abilities

Super Strength: Can kill A rank Monsters with just one strike. He's described as stronger than
Ghislaine
, and could block Sword God
Gal Farion
's Longsword of Absolute Silence.

Third Eye: Acts as a radar, able to locate enemies which are not in sight.

Master of Stealth.

Demon's long lifespan.

Equipment






Superd Spear



Roxy's Migurd necklace: A necklace of the
Migurd
 tribe that was originally given to Rudeus by his former magic tutor,
Roxy
. During his travels with Ruijerd after the
Calamity
 transported them to the
Demon Continent
, Rudeus gave the necklace to Ruijerd.

Superd Spear: The spear of the Superd will get sharper and harder every time it is used in combat. It was originally his son's and is slightly shorter than usual. Ruijerd has used this spear for at least 400 years, giving off the impression that his spear has sharpened itself to a drastic point and has become incredibly durable and resilient.

Achievements

He was able to deal a fatal blow that helps in the defeat of Laplace.

Quotes

To Rudeus:
 "We were victims of Laplace's plot! The Superd are no race of monstrous beasts!"

To Rudeus:
 "After my complete recovery, I'll become your strength."

To Rudeus:
 "Fighting is a necessity. It's been like this since the beginning of time, it's immemorial."

To Rudeus:
 "Yes. So don't you start crying."

To Paul:
 "You may have your grievances, but those only matter when your son is still alive."

To Norn:
 "Face him up without running away, you are family after all."

To Norn:
 "If you want to be with someone, you need to get bigger, stronger, more impressive."

To the Superds:
 "Do you want us to go extinct?! Rudeus brought that man here, and I trust Rudeus. If you have complaints, save them until after I’m dead."

To Rudeus on Orsted:
 "Appearances can be deceiving."

Trivia

Ruijerd's spear is the last memento of his son Luiweld. It is slightly shorter than usual because Luiweld has a smaller stature than regular warriors
.

Ruijerd's original spear is staked at his son's grave.

During the Laplace War, Ruijerd was deployed with a squadron of elite Superd warriors to infiltrate and scout the Central Continent's defenses. During their mission, they clash with the Dragon God
Urupen
 and his comrades repeatedly, slowly being cornered with every encounter. In order to shake them off they draw lots and one of Ruijerd's partners acts as a decoy, sacrificing themselves to ensure the team's survival. In recognition of this warrior's valor and strength, the Dragon God erects a grave in their honor. Hundreds of years later,
Dead End
 would discover and unearth that site.

Ruijerd is so skilled at "Chinchirorin" that he crushes
Geese
 without ever losing, leaving
Geese
 convinced that he's cheating.

Ruijerd's daughter would be the last
Superd
 warrior that would deal the final blow to
Laplace
 in other loops. Ruijerd is fated to marry
Norn Greyrat
 in many loops.

Kissed
Rudeus
 (Through Possession by
Vita
)

In Orsted's previous loops where Rudeus didn't exist, Ruijerd never met the surviving Superd race in
Biheiril Kingdom
, where they would have been killed by
the plague
.

After learning this, Rudeus finally realized the reason
Hitogami
 told him to help Ruijerd was because Hitogami plotted Ruijerd's death by having him travel to Biheiril Kingdom and encounter the surviving Superd after Rudeus' journey back home and contract the plague that would kill the entire Superd race in order to prevent
Laplace
's death, which is required by
Orsted
 in order to obtain Laplace's treasure for reaching Hitogami.

Ruijerd Superdia/Relationships
==============================

Information

Relationships

Gallery

Rudeus Greyrat





Ruijerd and Rudeus in the Anime



"He's strong, clever and a warrior worthy of respect."

-Ruijerd

Rudeus first meets Ruijerd after the
Teleport Incident
 where he is instructed by
Hitogami
 to help him. Although Rudeus is initially suspicious but not afraid of Ruijerd, he is not dangerous according to his intuition and he begins to talk to him which baffles Ruijerd on why he is not afraid of him despite being to aware of the
Superd Tribe
's reputation. They would travel together with Eris back to the
Fittoa Region
,
Asura Kingdom
 For the next three years where they became close comrades.
  Ruijerd is deeply grateful for Rudeus whose influence reshaped his worldview by expanding his perspective and helping him move past the foolish thoughts and rigid mindset that once defined his existence on the Demon Continent. Ruijerd's trust in Rudeus is second nature as he's willing to follow his judgment by taking a potentially dangerous medicine created by Cliff despite his tribe's protests and the inherent risks. Futhermore, one of the reasons Ruijerd desired to marry Norn was to establish a familial bond with Rudeus.

Eris Boreas Greyrat





Ruijerd and Eris in the Anime



Like Rudeus, Ruijerd first meets Eris after being teleported to the Demon Continent is very afraid of him because of the stories used by her parents about Superd but with Rudeus' help, she realizes that they are not true. Together with Rudeus, the three became
adventurers
 to be the source of income on their journey back to Asura Kingdom under the party
Dead End
.
 During their free time, Ruijerd also trains Eris and also teaches her Superd Techniques that utilizes bloodlust.

Norn Greyrat





Ruijerd and Norn in the Anime



Ruijerd first meets Norn in
Millishion
 but they barely have any interactions but Norn remembers his face. They met once again at East Port, Central Continent where Ruijerd saves Norn from a bearded man and later escorts Norn and Aisha to
Sharia
 so they can live with Rudeus while Paul goes to the
Begaritt Continent
.
 To help restore the honor of Ruijerd, Norn assists Rudeus with the Superd story book by telling him the stories that Ruijerd told him while on their journey together.

References

Saleyakt
========

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Saleyakt
 is a
Red Dragon
 who lived in the
Dragon World
, later in the
Human World
 and is the companion and mount of
Laplace

Appearance

Saleyakt is a small Red Dragon when he first met Laplace and grew while being his companion and mount. By time he lives in the Human World, Saleyakt is larger than any other Red Dragons.

Personality

"The shyest of all Red Dragons."

Laplace

Saleyakt is a proud dragon who refuses to submit to any of the
Dragon Tribe
 even if it means starving. But after being acknowledge by Laplace and becoming his companion and mount, Saleyakt became loyal and would also help him in his tasks of taming other dragons. Despite this change, Saleyakt is still wary of other Dragon Tribe members and is only fond of Laplace.

Background

"I won't teach you anything. Dragons, better get used to them with your own skin."

-Dora to Laplace

During the
Six-Faced World
 Era, Red Dragons dominated the
Dragon World
 where the Dragon Tribe would be their prey. This changed when the
First Dragon God
 trains the Dragon Tribe on harnessing their
Battle Aura
 and would eventually subjugate them and becomes the rulers of Dragon World with the First Dragon God as their leader.
 Since then, dragons are either tamed to be mounts or livestock to be eaten for their meat and various facilities were built and Saleyakt is among those Red Dragons who are interred in these facilities.

Plot

"Saleykat. I shall riase you."

-Laplace

After
Laplace
 completes his Dragon Warrior training, and is assigned to one of the facilities where Saleyakt is held.
Dora
 gives Laplace his first assignment to either tame or kill it to make him understand that there are dragons that cannot be tamed to they are free to kill it. Living like a primal and wild animal in the Demon World, Laplace has an understanding of how Saleyakt feels after numerous attempts of being tamed through taunts and beatings. Saleyakt refuses to submit even Laplace tried to name him and even offering him food but Saleyakt refuses. Laplace decides to try outlast the dragon on who can endure without food to which the dragon eventually collapse while Laplace continues to watch over him to his end as a sign of respect for the dragon's pride.

--To be added

Power and Abilities

References

Sara
====

Information

Relationships

Chronology

Gallery

Sara
 is an
adventurer
 and member of
Counter Arrow
.

Appearance

Sara is a pretty young girl with light blue eyes and short blond hair during her debut. Her face has a sharp expression and facial features from Asura, such that Rudeus felt like she kind of resembles
Eris
.
 She has a slender body with moderate-sized bust.

Personality

During her debut, Sara is headstrong and impulsive, having the tendency to jump into conclusions. She is not afraid to be openly hostile towards those that she dislikes, but cares about her friends and
party members
 deeply.

Initially, she was suspicious, harsh and abrasive towards
Rudeus
 to the point that even Suzanne would call her out on her behavior and gets frustrated to admit that Rudeus saved their lives during their first mission together. But warmed up to him and took initiatives to spend time together after he saved her from an
Icefall Treant
.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Background






Sara meeting Suzanne and Timothy



Sara is born in
Asura
 in the Milbotts Region ruled by the Notos Greyrat Family. Her father was a hunter from whom she learned how to use the bow.

When a horde of monsters attacked her hometown, Sara's parents tells her to stay behind but later learns that they both have died, leaving Sara to survive on her own by selling the fur and meat.
 Sara later learns that the Notos family refused to send their soldiers, because of that she lost her parents, which lead to her hatred of the nobility in general.

Suzanne
 who was helping in the subjugation of the monsters, took in Sara and years later, she became an official member of the party
Counter Arrow.
 During their missions, Sara would encounter children of nobility who would join their party but abandons them when the situation becomes dangerous causing Sara to further hate nobles and anyone associated with them.

Plot

Mushoku Tensei Volume 7






Sara and Counter Arrow Party



Sara and her party first met a depressed
Rudeus
 in a carriage that was traveling to Ranoa Kingdom. She became angry at Rudeus when
Suzanne
 was being nice to him but Rudeus does not want to talk about himself. Later on, Rudeus joined her party after Suzanne recruited him for a Rank A quest of killing
Grizzlies
 for their hide that Rudeus plans to do alone.
 When Rudeus first joined, Sara's very unfriendly toward him and immediately shoots down any suggestions he makes about party formations because she thought him to be a runaway noble playing as an adventurer, but after many shared experience where he helped the party, she started to warm up to him.

When the party took on the quest to gather
Snow Drake
 scales in the Galgau Ruins, at one point in it, they were rushed by a pack of agitated Snow Drakes forcing Rudeus to try to hold them off with his magic. In doing so, he was too slow to run away from them, luckily, Sara inspired her party to come back to help him and they end up complete the mission, although much less successful than they would had liked due to
Soldat's

party
 interference. In the aftermath party, when a drunk Soldat confronted Rudeus, Sara was quick to jump to his defense.

Later on in the winter season, when Rudeus was not in the party, Counter Arrow took on a mission during a blizzard which made them get lost into the territory of the hostile
Snow Buffaloes
 in Trier Forest. She was separated from her party while running away from the Buffaloes. Sara built an ice cave to shelter from the cold but she got captured by an
Icefall Treant
 to suck out her lifeforce. She would have died slowly if not for Rudeus setting out immediately to find her after hearing the news from her party members. Due to this experience, she grew quite close toward him - going out together and sharing their past experience with one another.

After a date where she got drunk and told Rudeus to bring her back to his room, they ended up trying to make out. But due to the fact that he had ED, it became an awkward experience and she ran away after it, embarrassed and angry, thinking that it's because of her that Rudeus couldn't do it. Afterwards, she tried to come back and make up with him but discovered that he had been going to the prostitutes, misunderstanding him, slapping him, and telling him off, she ran away again. After she calmed down thanks to some advice from Suzanne, she realized that she might have been in the wrong and went to meet Rudeus, unfortunately he had already moved with Soldat's party to another place by then.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Mushoku Tensei Volume 13

Sara was working in a new party Amazons Ace and out on a quest for Ranoa kingdom Royalty when she coincidentally met Rudeus again who happened to be working for them as well. They have a talk regarding what happened several years ago where they reconciled and recovered their old relationship. After completing the quest, she says goodbye to Rudeus and leaves
Sharia
.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Mushoku Tensei Volume 23

The party of the Amazons were on a quest in the kingdom of Gardenia in the conflict zone, where they met Rudeus and Eris, who were incidentally looking for North God there. The Amazons have trouble crossing the border out of the country due to war breaking out, but Rudeus escorts them out as he had a passage permit from Millis's missionary knights.

At the time, Sara was the party's second-in-command as one of the leaders had been killed. After accompanying Rudeus out of the Conflict Zone, Sara decides she would retire from being an adventurer, find herself a man and have kids.

Light Novel Special Book






Sara and Rudeus reuniting years later in the Manga



Years later, Sara once again meets with Rudeus who is now living in the rebuilt
Citadel of Roa
. After exchanging stories of what they have been doing, Sara invites Rudeus to dinner and to his surprise, Sara is now married and the restaurant is owned by Sara and her husband.

Power and Abilities

Physical Abilities

Sara stands out for her sheer raw talent that is comparable to Eris.  In combat, her battlefield awareness and agility is top notch that is already in the level of an A-Ranked Adventurer.

Archery






Sara's archery skills in the Anime



Sara is a prodigy for her talent in the bow who has a lot of potential despite the bow being an inferior weapon of choice compared to magic and the various sword styles. She can shoot down monster after monster with perfectly placed arrows even at long range making the disadvantage of carrying arrows seem irrelevant. She can also make her own bows and arrows using raw resources and has the best eyes in the party to scout an enemy over a hundred meters away.

Equipment

Bow

A bow made by her.

Magic Earring






Sara using her Magic Earring



Magic Earring is a
Magic Item
. Its ability activates when the user stabs the end of the feather into the opponent. This will cause the target to be caught in an illusion for a short time, useful for emergencies.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Talented use of the bow from a young age.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

Sara is one of the new characters introduced in the Light Novel. She doesn't appear in the Web Novel.

Sara is similar to
Eris
 in many ways - both of them are highly talented combatants, initially hostile towards
Rudeus
, being tsundere in personality, and offered Rudeus their virginity (although Sara failed due to Rudeus' ED). They are even same in age.

Despite not being one of Rudeus' wives, some fans still consider her one of Rudeus' harem members, nicknaming her "Blonde Mama".

References

Sara/Chronology
===============

Sara is born in
Asura
 in the Milbotts Region ruled by the Notos Greyrat Family. Her father was a hunter from whom she learned how to use the bow.

When a horde of monsters attacked her hometown, Sara's parents tells her to stay behind but later learns that they both have died, leaving Sara to survive on her own by selling the fur and meat. Sara later learns that the Notos family refused to send their soldiers, because of that she lost her parents, which lead to her hatred of the nobility in general.

Suzanne
 who was helping in the subjugation of the monsters, took in Sara and years later, she became an official member of the party
Counter Arrow.
 During their missions, Sara would encounter children of nobility who would join their party but abandons them when the situation becomes dangerous causing Sara to further hate nobles and anyone associated with them.

Plot

Mushoku Tensei Volume 7

Sara and her party first met a depressed
Rudeus
 in a carriage that was traveling to Ranoa Kingdom. She became angry at Rudeus when
Suzanne
 was being nice to him but Rudeus does not want to talk about himself. Later on, Rudeus joined her party after Suzanne recruited him for a Rank A quest of killing
Grizzlies
 for their hide that Rudeus plans to do alone. When Rudeus first joined, Sara's very unfriendly toward him and immediately shoots down any suggestions he makes about party formations because she thought him to be a runaway noble playing as an adventurer, but after many shared experience where he helped the party, she started to warm up to him.

When the party took on the quest to gather
Snow Drake
 scales in the Galgau Ruins, at one point in it, they were rushed by a pack of agitated Snow Drakes forcing Rudeus to try to hold them off with his magic. In doing so, he was too slow to run away from them, luckily, Sara inspired her party to come back to help him and they end up complete the mission, although much less successful than they would had liked due to
Soldat's

party
 interference. In the aftermath party, when a drunk Soldat confronted Rudeus, Sara was quick to jump to his defense.

Later on in the winter season, when Rudeus was not in the party, Counter Arrow took on a mission during a blizzard which made them get lost into the territory of the hostile
Snow Buffaloes
 in Trier Forest. She was separated from her party while running away from the Buffaloes. Sara built an ice cave to shelter from the cold but she got captured by an
Icefall Treant
 to suck out her lifeforce. She would have died slowly if not for Rudeus setting out immediately to find her after hearing the news from her party members. Due to this experience, she grew quite close toward him - going out together and sharing their past experience with one another.

After a date where she got drunk and told Rudeus to bring her back to his room, they ended up trying to make out. But due to the fact that he had ED, it became an awkward experience and she ran away after it, embarrassed and angry, thinking that it's because of her that Rudeus couldn't do it. Afterwards, she tried to come back and make up with him but discovered that he had been going to the prostitutes, misunderstanding him, slapping him, and telling him off, she ran away again. After she calmed down thanks to some advice from Suzanne, she realized that she might have been in the wrong and went to meet Rudeus, unfortunately he had already moved with Soldat's party to another place by then.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Mushoku Tensei Volume 13

Sara was working in a new party Amazons Ace and out on a quest for Ranoa kingdom Royalty when she coincidentally met Rudeus again who happened to be working for them as well. They have a talk regarding what happened several years ago where they reconciled and recovered their old relationship. After completing the quest, she says goodbye to Rudeus and leaves
Sharia
.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Mushoku Tensei Volume 23

The party of the Amazons were on a quest in the kingdom of Gardenia in the conflict zone, where they met Rudeus and Eris, who were incidentally looking for North God there. The Amazons have trouble crossing the border out of the country due to war breaking out, but Rudeus escorts them out as he had a passage permit from Millis's missionary knights.

At the time, Sara was the party's second-in-command as one of the leaders had been killed. After accompanying Rudeus out of the Conflict Zone, Sara decides she would retire from being an adventurer, find herself a man and have kids.

Light Novel Special Book

Years later, Sara once again meets with Rudeus who is now living in the rebuilt
Citadel of Roa
. After exchanging stories of what they have been doing, Sara invites Rudeus to dinner and to his surprise, Sara is now married and the restaurant is owned by Sara and her husband.

Sariel Anemoi Asura
===================

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Sariel Anemoi Asura
 is a princess of the Asura Kingdom and the daughter of Ariel.

Appearance

Sariel is graced with long fluffy blonde hair
, has big breasts and beauty that she inherited from her mother,
Ariel Anemoi Asura

Personality

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Background

After Ariel becomes Queen of
Asura Kingdom
, she arranges to establish closer ties through a marriage alliance with
Rudeus Greyrat
, one of her main allies that helped the
Princess Ariel Faction
 to successfully win the throne of Asura Kingdom. As such, Rudeus' first son
Ars Greyrat
 is the candidate for the arranged marriage but Ars marries
Aisha Greyrat
 instead so the
Sieghart Saladin Greyrat
 becomes the new candidate to have an arranged marriage with Sariel and they never met until they start studying at the
Asura Royal Academy
.

Plot

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Sauros Boreas Greyrat
=====================

Information

Appearance

Sauros Boreas Greyrat
 (
サウロス
・
ボレアス
・
グレイラット
)
 was the Landlord of the
Fittoa Region
,
Asura Kingdom
 and the grandfather of
Eris
.

Appearance

His age seems to be around 50 years old, and his dark brown hair is mixed with a little white hair. Despite his advanced age, he still seems to be in a pretty good shape and shows no sign of physical issues.

Personality

Sauros is a strict and boisterous man that tend to speak his mind out loud. When he doesn't agree with the actions of those close to him, he tends to yell at them and sometimes punch them. Even though his demeanor made many believe him to be a tough man that is difficult to please, he was shown to have a soft side: when he sees something cute cause him irritation, he can't manage to stay mad at them for long.

He inherits the fetish for beast race run in the Boreas Greyrat bloodline, shown when he forced
Eris
 to ask
Rudeus
 to be her tutor using the "Boreas Greyrat etiquette". He also believes that having sex with maids isn't cheating.

Background






Boreas Family Emblem in the Manga



Sauros is a noble and head of the Boreas
Greyrat
 family house hold. His son is
Philip Boreas Greyrat
 and he is also
Paul
's uncle. He is the grandfather to two unnamed grandsons and
Eris
.

He played a large part in influencing
Eris
' childhood. Most of her mannerisms stemmed from him, such as the tendency for violence, her foul attitude, pride and incredibly loud booming voice. He would often spoil his granddaughter, which led to her to be so entitled and bratty when she first met
Rudeus
.

After
Fangs of the Black Wolf
 party disbands, Sauros and Eris saves
Ghislaine Dedoldia
 who would have starved to death and she becomes the bodyguard of the Boreas Family because of their fetish towards the beast race.

Plot

In the manga he was the first one to talk to
Rudeus
 criticizing him for improper noble etiquette. He too also fell for the charm of young
Rudy
, stating that he would wage war to make him head of the Notos house hold. After the
Teleport Incident
, he was blamed for the loss of the Fittoa Region and was executed.

It was later revealed that the Boreas
Greyrat
 family bought a lot of beastmen slaves as they were infatuated with them.

Legacy

James Boreas Greyrat
 succeeds him as the Lord of Fittoa
 .

Eris learns of Sauros' death from their head butler
Alphonse
 who now is in charge of the Fittoa Refugee Camp from the Ruins of Roa

Alphonse proposes that Eris become
Pilemon Notos Greyrat
's concubine since James refuses to adopt her

Ghislaine proposes that Eris should run away with Rudeus

Eris chooses to relinquish being a part of the Boreas Family and is now known as Eris Greyrat then Ghislaine brings her to the Holy Land of Swords

Eris' "death" was announced years later
 and the rebuilding effort for the Fittoa Region eventually comes to a stop.

Power and Abilities

As the Lord of Fittoa Region, he held a lot of political power and wealth.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Second Princess Faction

Princess Ariel Faction

Separate Journeys
=================

Separate Journeys
 (それぞれの旅
Sorezore no tabi
) is the eighteenth episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on November 14, 2021.

Synopsis

After reconciling with Paul and parting ways to find the other's family member, Rudeus, Eris and Ruijerd take a ship to the central continent. Meanwhile, Roxie, Elinalise, and Talhand search for the Greyrat family, including Zenith. At the urging of Nokopara, whom she meets again in the city of Rikarisu, Roxy visits the village of the Migurds, her hometown. Roxy is not at peace with the fact that she ran away from home, but will she be reunited with her parents?

Plot

WIP/Outline

Rudeus
,
Eris
, and
Ruijerd
 leaves
Millishion
, and sets off on a ship towards Central Continent, thanks to
Paul Greyrat
 and
Therese Latreia
 (cut content).

Roxy
 meets with
Nokopara
 in
Rikarisu
 and learns that a former team-member
Blaze
 has passed away. At the mention of
Dead End
 and the deadly
Superd
 member, she nearly wets herself. Nokopara encourages her to meet her parents.

Roxy returns to her village and reunites with her parents. They share that Rudeus, Eris, and Ruijerd. Roxy faints when she hears that Ruijerd is a Superd.

After the visit, Roxy realises the party
Dead End
 actually constitutes Rudeus. She returns to her lodgings in Rikarisu and walks into a scene where
Elinalise
 is having sex. She reacts by casting
Icicle Break
 and blows up the room.

Roxy, Elinalise, and
Talhand
 sets off to find the missing members of the Greyrat family.

Characters

Paul Greyrat
 (review)

Rudeus Greyrat

Rodriguez
 (road encounter)

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ruijerd Superdia

Roxy Migurdia

Nokopara

Blaze
 (mentioned, deceased)

Rowin Migurdia

Rokari Migurdia

Elinalise Dragonroad

Talhand

Locations

Millis Continent

Millishion

Ringus Sea

Demon Continent

Biegoya Region

Migurd Village

Rikarisu

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 5

Chapter 7: To the Central Continent

Interlude: Roxy's Homecoming

Roxy Gets Serious Manga Volume 1

Chapter 1: Departure

Differences with the light novel:

Meeting Rodriguez, one of the disciple of
Auber
, originally happens on their way to
Wind Port
 in
Light Novel Volume 3
 Chapter 14.

All the
Chapter 7: To the Central Continent
 was cut except that Rudeus and his group pick the boat to travel to the Central Continent. some scenes cut are:

Rudeus and his group arriving to West Port and try to travel with the letter of presentation of Ruijerd.

Rudeus Meeting his Aunt
Therese Latreia
 and receiving her help to travel.

The Anime add a new scene where the Dead End party have a conversation to his new objectives in the boat travel.

In the Light Novel Roxy meets her parents and afterward Nokopara.

The anime uses some scenes from the first chapter of
Roxy Gets Serious
 manga when Roxy remembers how was her past in the village.

Because there isn't a language barrier, like when Rudeus that know the language but Eris not, the anime show Roxy and her family speaking normally (Japanese/English) and not using the demon tongue.

Separation
==========

Separation
 (
離別
,

Ribetsu
)
 is the sixth chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Summary

Using magic, Rudeus was able to evade Paul's surprise attack having witnessed Paul's strength when defending the village in the past. Rudeus always simulated how to fight him and is grateful to him for being a strong role model. Without knowing his father's motives, Rudeus uses magic to create a stone sword for him and used liquefaction on one of Paul's shoes to momentarily trap him. When Rudeus attempted to repeat the magic on the other foot, Paul easily escaped and rushed against Rudeus, who used "Bomb Blast" to try to gain distance, but Rudeus' evasion proved futile as Paul appeared in front of him. With Rudeus' desperate attack with his stone sword met by Paul's Water God Sword style parry, Paul knocks Rudeus unconscious. As Paul catches his knocked out son, he voices how proud he is of Rudeus for his keen battle sense.

After the match, Ghislaine arrives to talk with Paul as the semi-unconscious Rudeus hears their conversation and learns that Paul and Laws, Sylphie father, were worried because their children were too dependent with each other. Seeing their friendship may hinder their growths in the long term, Paul decided to send his son with some relatives for five years. Paul leave a letter to Ghislaine, while Rudeus begins to lose consciousness.

When Rudeus awakens, he finds himself in a carriage with Ghislaine, and discovers Pauls sent him to the Citadel of Roa, Fittoa's largest metropolis, and arrive at the Mansion of the city ruler, the manor of family Boreas Greyrat. After meeting with the lord of the city, Sauros Boreas Greyrat, and his son, Philip, both Paul's uncle and cousin respectively, Rudeus receives confirmation to the contents of Paul's letter: Rudeus is to be a magic tutor for Ghislaine and Philip's daughter, so that Rudeus will have enough money for the magic university in five years. Philip warns Rudeus that his daughter is a problem child, but Rudeus thinks that can handle it. When Rudeus try to enter to her room, he receives a punch to the face from the young girl, angry that someone younger is going to be teaching her.

Appearances

Characters
