Turning Point 1
===============

This article is about the anime episode titled "Turning Point" You may be looking for
the manga chapter
.

Turning Point 1
 (ターニングポイント
Tāningupointo 1
) is the eighth episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on February 28, 2021.

Synopsis

Rudy reaches his 10th birthday, and Eris and her family plan a surprise party for him. Meanwhile, the strange orb hovering over the city remains a mystery as powerful entities across the world begin to take note of it.

Plot

Two years later, Eris and her family hold a birthday party for Rudeus, who is disappointed at first that his own family could not attend due to the increase of monster activity around the country. Rudeus is presented with a top quality magic staff and Philip expresses his will to have Rudeus marry Eris and become his successor, but Rudeus rejects the offer. Later that night, Rudeus is surprised to see Eris waiting in his room. He then attempts to have sex with her, but she pushes him away. Realizing his mistake, Rudeus apologizes to Eris, who forgives him. A few days later, a huge cloud of mana forms in the sky and the legendary hero Perugius Dola sends his aide Almanfi to investigate. Suspicious that Rudeus, who was practicing with his new staff alongside Eris and Ghislaine, could be involved with the cloud's appearance, Almanfi attacks him, but Ghislaine defends Rudeus and confirms his innocence when a massive burst of light envelops them.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Hilda Boreas Greyrat

Sauros Boreas Greyrat

Paul Greyrat

Zenith Greyrat

Lilia Greyrat

Norn Greyrat

Aisha Greyrat

Sylphiette

Laws

Pax Shirone

Roxy Migurdia

Perugius Dola

Almanfi

Orsted

Kishirika Kishirisu

Locations

Citadel of Roa

Buena Village

Demon Continent

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 2

Chapter 7: Absolute Promise

Chapter 8: The Turning Point

Differences with the light novel:

The anime adds a minor scene where Rudeus sees the orb in the sky.

The description of the characteristics and origin of Aqua Heartia was cut.

A minor scene that explains how was the succession war of Boreas was cut.

The PoV of Roxy before the calamity was greatly reduced in the anime.

The anime adds a short scene where Paul and Laws fight some monsters.

The anime adds a scene that show Rudeus' Family and Sylphiette before the calamity.

In the LN, Orsted killed the dragon that attacked him.

Perugius was also with Sylvaryl in his PoV before the calamity.

A PoV of the Sword God Gal Farion about the calamity was cut.

Minor info about how Aqua Heartia increases his skill was cut

Trailer

2-28(日)放送第8話予告：『無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～』次回予告⑧
Episode 8 Trailer, February 26

Gallery

View Gallery

Click here to view the Gallery

Trivia

Is the first Episode PV voiced by Eris Boreas Greyrat.

Norn uses the same Clothes that Rudeus used when he was 3-5 Years old (Episode 1-2).

Arc System Works is credited in the ending for figures made by Rudeus featuring the characters Dizzy and Jam Kuradoberi from the Guilty Gear Series.

Turning Point 2
===============

Turning Point 2
 (ターニングポイント 2
Tāningupointo 2
) is the Twenty-first episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on December 5, 2021.

Synopsis

After parting ways with Lilia and Aisha, Rudeus and his friends head to their homeland. On their way, they encounter Orsted, the Dragon God, one of the seven great powers. Eris and Ruijerd suddenly change their expressions and begin to tremble. Although they have never met before, Orsted knows Eris, Ruijerd, and even Paul well, but he doesn't seem to know about Rudeus. When Rudeus answers a question from Orsted , Orsted suddenly attacks him!

Plot

PRELUDE

The inner self of
Rudeus
 explains how life can be unpredictable, since everything happens suddenly. Both
Ruijerd
 and
Eris
 are shown unconscious and Rudeus is spitting blood with a hole in his chest in front of
Orsted
.

PLOT

The party
<<DEAD END>>
 is travelling through
Red Dragon Mountain
 to reach the
Fittoa Region
 of
Asura Kingdom
. One night, after a brief spar, Ruijerd acknowledges  Eris as a
warrior
. An astonished Eris asks Rudeus to pinch her, to check if it's not a dream. Rudeus asks Eris if she'll not punch him if he does so, to which Eris tells she won't. Rudeus playfully pinches her chest and Eris sends him flying neverthless. Now that she realizes it's not a dream, she gets excited, but Ruijerd warns her not to get cocky, since acknowledging her as a warrior means he won't treat her as a kid anymore.

The next day, they climb the Red Dragon's Lower Jaw valley, to avoid any fights with a group of
red dragons
. But Eris suggests that, instead of taking a detour, they should climb the mountain and fight them. Both Rudeus and Ruijerd reject this plan, since fighting a herd of Red Dragons is very risky. Ruijerd then goes to explain that even the
lower ranked

<<SEVEN GREAT POWERS>>
 will have to retreat halfway, while fighting a herd of red dragons. Rudeus is surprised to hear that even people that strong will have hard time against red dragons, to which Ruijerd tells that an upper ranked <<SEVEN GREAT POWERS>> can easily dominate them even in herds. Rudeus starts thinking how strong the Technique God and Dragon God are when both Ruijerd and Eris stop moving, stiff as rocks. Since they had a terrified look on their face, Rudeus asks them what happened and looks ahead.

In the thick mist,
a tall man in white
 is seen coming in their direction along with a
masked girl with black hair
. They both pass the members of <<DEAD END>> and after a while, the pair stops. There was a long pause. Ruijerd warns both Rudeus and Eris not to move at any cost. <<DEAD END>>'s pack animal jumps off the side of the cliff. Hearing that voice, the man in white asks him if he is 'Ruijerd Superdia'. Rudeus tries to look at that man with his clairvoyence eye, but couldn't find anything. The main in white then looks at Eris and asks if she is 'Eris Boreas Greyrat'. The man then looks at Rudeus and tells, he doesn't know who he is. Ruijerd and Eris asks him how he knows them, to which he comments that it is a strange place for them to meet and turns back to leave.

Rudeus, now curious about this person calls at him and introduces himself. He then asks for that man's name, to which he answers his name is 'Orsted'. Rudeus asks Orsted if he knows Ruijerd and Eris, to which he answers that "they haven't properly acquainted yet". Rudeus, surprised by that answer, asks what that means. Orsted tells he doesn't need to know that and asks which Greyrat family is he from and what is his father's name. Rudeus tells his father's name is "
Paul Greyrat
". To his surprise, Orsted comments that "Paul is supposed to have only two daughters".  Orsted then asks Rudeus, why he doesn't look away, to which Rudeus politely tells that he wants to look away since Orsted is kind of intimidating him. Orsted then asks Rudeus why he called for him, to which Rudeus asks if he knows anything about
Mana Calamity
. Orsted, a little annoyed by the question, tells he doesn't know anything.

Rudeus then thanks him and turns back to leave, when Orsted asks if he knows anything about the word "Human God". Rudeus turns back with a smile on his face and admits he sees him in his dreams, and immediately gets attacked by Orsted. Ruijerd blocks his attack with his spear and tells Rudeus and Eris to run away. Orsted looks at Rudeus with rage telling Rudeus is an apostle of "Human God" . Ruijerd then fights Orsted but is immediately sent flying away with a punch. He then approaches Rudeus to finish him. Eris comes roaring at him with her sword, but her swing is stopped by Orsted and sends her flying too. Rudeus looking at his party members getting overpowered, gets terrified and gets a vision of his lungs getting punctured. Orsted catches Rudeus and crushes his abdomen area, and tells him to inform "Human God" before dying that Dragon God Orsted will kill him soon, and turns back to leave. Eris, makes a desperate attempt to attack Orsted with
<FireBall>
 spell, but couldn't since she was badly injured. Looking at this, Rudeus builds up his
mana
 to make a very powerful
<Stone Cannon>
 spell and fires it at Orsted, which injures him.

Orsted notices that Rudeus can use chantless magic casting and asks if he learnt that from "Human God". Rudeus uses wind magic to breathe and then builds up a <FireBall> spell in his right hand. Orsted, now more annoyed, uses
<Disturb Magic>
 to disperse the magic built by Rudeus. Rudeus uses wind magic to fall back. Orsted notes his skill and calls up a <Front Dragon Gate>. Rudeus starts developing a very strong, saint level fire magic and fires it at Orsted. Orsted then opens the <Front Dragon Gate> and sucks the spell which almost breaks it. Orsted then noted that Rudeus' magic power capacity is as powerful as
Laplace
's. He then lifts Rudeus and asks why he doesn't heal himself with chantless casting and thrusts his hand through Rudeus' chest, leaving a hole as shown in prelude. Eris looking at this, starts crying for help. As dying Rudeus loses his consciousness, The masked girl, whom Orsted calls 'Nanahoshi', asks him a question that puzzled her.

Rudeus, now in his original form, finds himself in the void dimension. He looks at his body and finds a hole in his chest. "Human God" appears and tells that he wasn't expecting Rudeus would meet Orsted. Rudeus then asks "Human God", why Orsted attacked him after hearing his name. "Human God" starts explaining that Orsted is an evil Dragon God and he hates him, since he is a virtuous Human God. Rudeus comments that, it's easy for people to hate "Human God" and asks why he didnt inform him beforehand about his meeting with Orsted. "Human God" tells that he can't see anything about Orsted since he is
cursed
. He further goes to explain that Orsted was born as a cursed child, which made living creatures of that world to either hate him or fear him. Rudeus finds that situation relatable and tells that it is a very sad curse. He then asks "Human God", why he didnt hate or fear Orsted in the first place, to which he answers that Rudeus is originally from an another world. A curious Rudeus asks if curses dont affect reincarnated people, to which "Human God" answers that the situation was same, when he met Ruijerd. A surprised Rudeus asks what he meant by it. "Human God" tells that Ruijerd's curse is due to the spear that Laplace gave him during the war, which passed the <Curse of Fear> to the
Superd race
.  Rudeus now starts thinking that, him helping Ruijerd was useless after all, to which "Human God" tells that the curse is slowly fading away, since Ruijerd shaved his head off. He then tells that Ruijerd can build their good reputation back, by doing good work.

Rudeus then asks "Human God", how he can defeat Orsted. He tells that Orsted can't be defeated, since he is the most powerful person in the world with the power to destroy that world but cannot do so due to the curses that limit his power. Rudeus gets suspicious because "Human God" seems to know a lot about Orsted, even though he can't see him, but tells he doesn't care about it since he is already dead. "Human God" then tells that Rudeus has got the wrong idea and is still alive, pointing at his chest which now didn't have a hole.

Rudeus wakes up on Eris's lap, who explains to him that after he passed out, the girl named Nanahoshi asked Orsted to heal him. Rudeus, filled with a wave of mixed emotions, hugs Eris. She asks if she can punch him, which Rudeus accepts. But she punches him softly and starts crying and tells him that she is glad that he is still alive.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ruijerd Superdia

Orsted

Masked Woman

"Human God"

Locations

Central Continent

Red Wyrms Lower Jaw

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 6

Chapter 8: An Adult.

Chapter 9: The Second Turning Point.

Chapter 10: The Wide, Gaping Hole In My Chest.

Differences with the light novel:

Some short explanation of the Red Wyrm mountains was cut.

A short scene where Rudeus thinks about his previous meetings with "Human God" was cut.

Rudeus was traveling in a carriage in the Light Novel.

In the anime they are walking, but use an Ox to transport their belongings.

The Ox that was used by the Dead End group to transport his belongings, fell to the cliff of the mountain because of the curse of Orsted.

In the anime, Eris tries to use a Fireball after she was defeated by Orsted .

Some comments of Orsted about Rudeus in their battle were cut.

===============

This article is about the Manga chapter. For the Season 2 Episode 18 Anime, see

Manga Volume 21
.

Begaritt Continent
 or to stay in Sharia. After consulting with his friends and even Hitogami, Rudeus decides to stay but Norn has other plans.

Turning Point 3 (Anime)
=======================

This article is about the Season 2 Episode 18 Anime. For the Manga article , see
Turning Point 3
.

Turning Point 3
 (ターニングポイント3
Tāningu Pointo San
) is the eighteenth episode of the
second season
 (42nd overall)
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on May 12, 2024 and also the third episode of the
Sisters Arc
 for the Anime.

Synopsis

Norn's interaction with Rudeus has improved for the better and has made friends at Ranoa Magic Academy. Rudeus' life with his family and at the academy progresses smoothly. One day, what does Sylphy plan to tell Rudeus...? And what is the content of the letter he receives from a certain person...? And what is Hitogami's new "advice"...!?

Plot

At Ranoa Magic Academy, Rudeus spots and waves at Norn who is walking with her friends and returned the gesture then catches up to her friends. The siblings are later seen together working on a book about
Ruijerd Superdia
's life which is one of Rudeus' previous plan to help restore the
Superd Tribe
's reputation but Rudeus is struggling on how to present the story. Upon seeing that Rudeus only have Ruijerd's physical appearance in writing so far, Norn volunteered to help since Ruijerd told her about his past and Rudeus agrees as long as she can keep up with school.

That evening at the Greyrat House, after being asked by Rudeus, Aisha asks if she can be paid for her work.

At the Commerce District, Rudeus is shopping together with Aisha buys some seeds and Rudeus buys a pair of earrings for Sylphy. After seeing Aisha haggle the price of a curtain after name dropping his and
Ariel Anemoi Asura
's name, he is awed of her sister's business sense. On their way home, Aisha is told by her mother,
Lilia Greyrat
 that as a maid, she cannot own furnishings of her preference but Rudeus allows her to keep the curtains which she places in her room.

At Ranoa Magic Academy in Nanahoshi's Research Room, Nanahoshi discusses the 4 phases for her
Summoning Magic
: Summon an inorganic matter, organic matter, living organism, Summon an organism with detailed conditions and to return the summoned organism back to its original location. Nanahoshi also mentions that she needs to consult with the
authority of Summoning Magic
 sometime in the future. For assisting in the completion of the first phase of
summoning an inorganic matter
, Nanahoshi gives Rudeus a scroll containing a
Magic Circle
 to
Summon Lamplight Spirits
, a rare spell that is not known by the
Magician Guild
 which is invented by the authority of Summoning Magic and Nanahoshi intends to give Rudeus something even better when the next phase is complete.

At Zanoba's Research Room, Juliette is happy with the
Red Dragon
 figure Zanoba made for her. Ginger, who is once again serving Zanoba at her
mother
's request then brings them drinks and is also been teaching Juliette etiquette and continued her
Human Tongue
 training.

At Cliff's Research Room, Cliff shows a prototype of a
Curse Supressing Tool
 to extend the limit of effects of Elinalise's
Curse of Promiscuity
 but has 2 problems. First is its ugly appearance but with help from Zanoba and Nanahoshi, they can probably make it smaller. Second, it requires a huge amount of
Mana
 to which Rudeus agrees to provide.

Rudeus' everyday routine has been the same from working out, having meals, helping on his friends' research, help Norn on her studies and returning home until Sylphy tells Rudeus that she is pregnant which made Rudeus happy. That night, Norn congratulates the couple while Aisha informs them that she already told Rudeus' circle of friends and Elinalise will take over Sylphy's bodyguard duty to Ariel. Rudeus longed for his family to be reunited and living together in Sharia but he received a letter from
Geese Nukadia
 requesting assistance on rescuing
Zenith
.

At the Void World, Rudeus confronts Hitogami on regretting his decision on going to the Begaritt Continent but Hitogami insists that he will regret it all the same. After a couple more exchanges, Rudeus decides to stay in Sharia and wakes up from the dream where Sylphy is worried that he has been tossing and turning. Sylphy assures Rudeus not to worry about her but Rudeus tells her that he will stay.

Rudeus continues with his daily routine and reflects and the possibilities on why Geese sent him the letter. Rudeus also consults with his friends to which Elinalise agrees that he should stay but plans on going instead for her granddaughter's family's sake and will leave Cliff as he has the making of a future pope of the
Milis Religion
 and sees his love as youthful indiscretion. Zanoba advises Rudeus that he should make the decision on his own and while he is willing to join if he asks, he will slowdown Rudeus and he cannot take Juliette on such a long trip. Zanoba also advises him that children still grow when their father is not watching them but urges him to go if he is worried and he will watch over his family in his stead.

One morning, Rudeus while outside the house sees Norn packed and plans to leave in his stead. Rudeus tells her that she will not make it but Norn insists on going in tears since their mother and father are in trouble and Rudeus refuses despite being strong. Seeing Norn wanting to go badly but unable to, Rudeus decides to go and asks Norn to watch the house for him.

Characters

Norn Greyrat

Urupen
======

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Urupen
 (
ウルペン
,

Urupen
)
 is a former Dragon God and one of the three heroes who helped vanquish
Laplace
. He is described as the weakest Dragon God but became the (Supposed) strongest after founding the Saint Dragon fighting style.

Appearance

Like every Dragon Race, he has silver hair and golden eyes. Rudeus describes his portrait as Half-human looking.

Personality

N/A

Background

Was known as the weakest Dragon God in history, due to his excessively small mana pool and therefore low ability for combat, until he founded the Saint Dragon fighting style, which utilizes the ultimate technique "Saint Dragon Battle Aura". Left behind notes on this fighting style, which
Orsted
 found and used to teach himself, and eventually his disciple, 7th ranked world power, "Quagmire"
Rudeus
.

Plot

N/A

Power and Ability

Saint Dragon Style

Fighting style/Martial art developed to minimize mana usage in battle to it's utmost fraction. Combining spells and movement along with a thinner, but more solid
Battle Aura
 in the form of the Saint Dragon Style ultimate technique, Saint Dragon Battle Aura.

Disturb Magic (Ran Ma)

Disturb Magic cancels an opponent's magic by disrupting the magic and causing it to never take shape and scatter. Disturb Magic only targets one part of the body.

Equipment

N/A

Achievements

He assisted
Perugius Dola
 and
Kalman I
 in defeating the Demon God
Laplace
.

Founded the Saint Dragon Style school

Creator of the Disturb Magic

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

N/A

Trivia

He was known as the strongest Dragon God after founding the Saint Dragon Style (Which is definitely false)

He is one of the three heroes who helped vanquish the Demon God.

He and
Kalman I
 rescued a young
Perugius Dola
 from a deadly situation involving immortal demon king
Atoferatofe

He was known as the most genius Dragon God of all time.

=====

Vierra

Veskel

Vizquel

Vierra
======

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

She was caught with her sister
Shierra
 in the mana calamity, and helps
Paul
 to find all the missing people.

Appearance

Vierra is a very beautiful young woman with short brown hair, brown eyes, and large breasts. She wears highly revealing grey bikini armor and has bandages on her forearms.

Personality

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Background

She was a adventurer before she was caught in the Mana calamity along with her boyfriend Tashiro who fell in love with her large exposed chest. Because her sister and various other women were traumatized by men, she wears a Bikini armor to focus all the stares on her.

Plot

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Power and Abilities

They never show how she fights, but she was the vanguard before Elinalise replaced her in the Teleport Labyrinth.

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Equipment

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Achievements

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Quotes

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Trivia

Vierra wears skimpy clothing to divert male gazes away from her sister Shierra, as she suffers from PTSD from being sexually abused. After being teleported during the mana calamity, they were both captured by bandits and taken advantage of. Vierra was able to recover from the incident through sheer willpower, but her sister still suffers from extreme PTSD and cannot handle men looking at her, regardless of their intentions. Thus, Vierra started wearing revealing clothing to attract the attention to herself.

Visquel
=======

Redirect to:
Vizquel

Vita
====

The “Nether King" Vita is a slime like creature that lived in the labyrinth "Netherworld" of the Divine Continent. He is one of
Hitogami
's apostles participated in the final battle against
Rudeus
.

Appearance

Vita is a pile of blue slime.

Personality

Vita was eager to gain new experiences, which almost resulted in his demise twice. When he infested and controlled a demon lord, he was drunk with power and committed various atrocities. After Death God Laxus killed his host and made it his life goal to hunt him down, he was so afraid of Laxus that he was content with hiding in the labyrinth for the rest of his life.

Despite being somewhat opportunistic, he had his sense of gratitude and was willing to return the favor he received. Despite recognizing Hitogami as a malevolent god, he was still willing to help him to defeat Rudeus when called for help.

Background

He was a enemy of the
Death God Laxus
,
Hitogami
 helps him to escape to the
Divine Continent
 labyrinth
Netherworld
.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Plot

He was one of the Hitogami's apostles in last battle in Biheiril Kingdom.

When he tried to use his illusion techniques against Rudeus, he was killed by The Bone Ring of
Laxus
, a ring made by the Death God Laxus to counter him.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Power and Abilities

Mind Control

He can read the memories of his enemies, predict the future that might have occurred and blend it with the desires of his opponent, putting them into an endless illusion.

By splitting off part of his own body and inserting them into people, he can control many people at the same time and even halt a disease outbreak.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

He was able to threaten and control the last group of
Superd
 race in
Biheiril Kingdom
, including
Ruijerd
.

Quotes

To Rudeus:

“.......No, that’s not it. I had you completely under the illusion. Certainly, the effect was shallow because of your special spiritual body, but that much would never break the illusion.”

Trivia

By his own words, he was the most powerful slime of the slime race.

Vizquel
=======

She was an adventurer of Rikarisu Town and member of the Zumeba race.

Appearance

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Personality

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Background

A member of
P-hunters
, a party that kidnap pets and when the owners publish a petition in the adventure guild, they return the pets for the reward.

After she was caught by
Roman
, she and
Jalil
 were blackmailed and started to work for him.

Plot

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Power and Abilities

Aphrodisiac Poisonous Saliva

The members of the Zumeba race saliva was poisonous, but also highly enticing to all sorts of bugs. Any insect that ingested it would either die or be rendered totally immobile, providing the Zumeba with a tasty snack.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Equipment

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Old Lady:
 “Thank you, Vizquel. Those things were driving me crazy.”

Vizquel:
 “No problem. If you ever need anything, just remember the name Dead End Ruijerd, okay?”

Old Lady:
“Dead End Ruijerd? Is that the name of your new party?”

Vizquel:
“Yeah, more or less.”

Trivia

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Wake Up, and One Step Forward
=============================

Wake Up, and One Step Forward
 (目覚め、一歩、
Mezame, Ippon
) is the Twenty-third and final episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on December 19, 2021.

Synopsis

Suddenly, Eris disappeared, leaving behind a letter. Rudeus thought that he was able to start his life over again and change through various encounters and journeys, but the shock of losing Eris made him withdraw again like he did in his previous life. Just when he is about to give up on everything, the memory of his mother Zenith comes back to his mind. ......

Plot

Rudeus falls into a state of depression, and begins having flashbacks to his old life where severe bullying at school traumatized him into become a social recluse. Meanwhile, Eris has left on her own journey with Ghislaine so that she can grow strong enough to fight Orsted and protect Rudeus. Ruijerd rescues some travelers from beasts, earning their praise despite revealing his identity as a Superd to them. Zanoba and Geese continue on their respective journeys as they recall Rudeus fondly. Gyes and Tona continue to train together in Doldia Village. Roxy encounters Kishirika and helps pay her enormous bar tab. In gratitude, Kishirika uses her Demon Eyes to locate the whereabouts of Rudeus' family, revealing Aisha and Lilia have safely reunited with Paul and Norn, while Zenith is located in the Labyrinth City of Rapan on the Begaritt Continent. Roxy and her party immediately make preparations to leave for the Begaritt Continent to rescue her. Rudeus is still in a depressed state, but after having a dream about Zenith, he remembers he still has a duty to find her and overcomes his insecurities to continue his journey. Elsewhere, Sylphiette, who is alive and now has white hair, tries to convince an unknown group to recruit Rudeus into their ranks.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Ruijerd Superdia

Alphonse

Zanoba Shirone

Geese Nukadia

Roxy Migurdia

Kishirika Kishirisu

Elinalise Dragonroad

Talhand

Paul Greyrat

Zenith Greyrat

Lilia Greyrat

Norn Greyrat

Aisha Greyrat

Gyes Dedoldia

Minitona Dedoldia

Tersena Adoldia

Holy Beast

Fitz

Ariel Anemoi Asura

Luke Notos Greyrat

Elmore

Kleene

Locations

Central Continent

Asura Kingdom

Roa (Refugee camp)

Buena Village

Kingdom of Ranoa

Sharia

Demon Continent

Krasma

Millis Continent

Millishion

Great Forest

Bergarit Continent

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 1

Extra Chapter: The Mother of the Greyrat Family

Light Novel Volume 6

Chapter 13: The Young Miss's Resolution.

Interlude: The Two She Encountered.

Light Novel Volume 7

Extra Chapter: Ruler of Ranoa Magic Academy

Differences with the light novel:

In the light novel, Eris PoV was a monologue between the sex scene and before Rudeus awake.

The anime expands Rudeus' worries after his separation from Eris.

The anime adds many PoV  for some characters.

Ruijerd helped some travelers.

Zanoba traveling in a carriage in a snowy land.

Geese traveling in a desert.

Gyes, Minitona, Tersena and the Holy beast in the Great forest.

Kurt arriving in the ocean.

Paul and Norn reunion with Lilia and Aisha.

How Roxy's group arrived and started the party was cut.

In the light novel, Kishirika sees Rudeus that was training in the northern lands.

Some scenes after Roxy discover the Localization of Zenith thanks to Kishirika were cut.

A scene Elinalise proposed to tell about Zenith localization to Rudeus.

The demon king Badigadi appears for the first time and decides to help them.

How the group is divided in two, Roxy with Talhand traveling to Millishion to meet Paul and Elinalise with Badigadi to the northern land of the central continent to meet Rudeus, with the purpose to inform about the localization of Zenith.

The anime adds a dream of Zenith about the Family.

Looks like that was inspired in the LN 1 Extra Chapter: The Mother of the Greyrat Family

The
LN 6 Extra Chapter: Distorted, But Unchanged
 was cut.

The
LN 7 Extra Chapter - Ruler of Ranoa Magic Academy
 only was covered a little with the last scene.

Wake Up, and One Step Forward/Gallery

Wake Up, and One Step Forward

pertain
 to the article.

Warrior
=======

Redirect to:
Classes#Swordsmans and Warriors

Water God Style
===============

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

"Even if it's cold, they can't wear heavy things on their bodies. They're the opposite of us who wear thick clothes even when it's hot. It's interesting, isn't it?"

Water God Reida Reia

Water God Style
 (
水神流
,

Suishin-ryū
)
 is one of the three major schools of swordsmanship.

Background

The origins of the Water God Style started a long time ago in a country by the sea that is frequently attacked by Water Dragon King especially the fisherman that encroached on his territory and incurred his wrath which also results to attacking the port town. The country's knight order tried to subdue the dragon but failed due to its massive size and ability to move freely through the water of the country which pushed the country to the brink of ruins. In this situation, the king declared that he would offer both his crown and daughter's hand to any who could subdued the Water Dragon King but many knights, brave men and heroes who took up the challenge were torn to pieces by the Water Dragon King.

With all the heroes and knights defeated, Reidar approaches the king and tells him that he will defeat the dragon who consents but is doubtful that a sloppy man with a vagrant visage will make a difference and like the king many thought he would give up half way. Despite his appearance, Reidar was strong and froze the surface of the ocean to stop the Water Dragon's movement but he eventually broke out of the ice and attacks Reidar. With his worn out sword, Reidar returned the Water Dragon King's unblockable strike and slicing its head off with a single slash.

With the Water Dragon King's head in hand, Reidar returns to the king who gave him a fortune great enough to play around for the rest of his life but the king refuses to give his daughter nor the crown to this dirty man. Reidar was not mad but he fell into a deep depression as he is in love with the princess that he had always watched from afar. Despite being able to become king through sheer force easily, Reidar decides to leave the country; but the princess grew angry at the king and hit him hard enough she sends him flying then left the castle.

The princess chased after Reidar who was leaving the country and clung to his legs then tells him: "I have abandoned my country. I am no longer a princess, nor do I have a last name. Even if you obtain me, you won't be able to have the country, you won't be able to become king. But if that is agreeable with you, please take me as your wife." Reidar held the princess in his arms and left the country and the two eventually married then vanished.

Decades later somewhere in the world, the Water God Style was born. And accordance with the Reidar's story a custom was born. "The spouse of the Water God Style shall abandon their household." like the princess did.

Characteristics





Paul doing a Water God Style counter attack



This style of swordsmanship specializes in defensive techniques, emphasizing parrying and counterattacking incoming attacks. Since there are only a few ways to attack, the art of provocation is also employed to make the opponent take the initiative.

A skilled practitioner can read the flow of
magic
 and use their senses to block and counter any attack, including magic and projectiles.

The weakness of Water God Style is that users cannot attack first while displaying its techniques, which makes it vulnerable to
North God Style
 due to its sudden attacks, trickery, and adaptability, all of which are difficult to anticipate. Conversely, Water God Style is well-matched with
Sword God Style
 because of their shared philosophy of taking the initiative and striking first.

Practitioners often wear heavy equipment, such as full-body armor, because they do not need to move. This sword style is mostly used by palace knights and nobles whose job is to protect someone.

Techniques

Flow

Flow
 (
流
,

Nagare
)
: The basic counter-attack technique that can be applied to all the techniques of the Water God Style.
This technique, once mastered, is said to be able to return any attack that comes in the user's way.
Although it is a basic technique and not one of the Five Secret Arts, the school considers it to be the backbone of the style and the most important technique, thus it is also regarded as a
Secret Art
 (
奥義
,

Ōgi
)
.

Five Secret Arts

Five Secret Arts
 (
五つの奥義
,

Itsutsu no Ōgi
)
: The collective name of the five undisclosed ultimate techniques of the Water God Style. Even just one of the Arts is extremely hard to master, and when at least three of them have been perfected the individual is qualified to be a Water God.

Deprivation Sword Kingdom

Deprivation Sword Kingdom
 (
剥奪剣界
,

Hakudatsu Ken-kai
)
: An ultimate technique created by the Water God Reida Reia by combining the two of the most difficult Five Secret Arts, also called the phantom
Sixth Secret Art
.
Upon entering stance, the user establishes a six-dimensional domain of attack, with a range "approximately the size of a party hall," encompassing all directions—front, back, left, right, up, and down. If any enemy within this range moves—even slightly, including mana—the technique automatically responds by cutting them down.

Since it is a pure counterattack technique, it cannot be used to cut a completely motionless target. It also can't counterattack faster than the user's reaction time.

Ranks

There are seven ranks in the Water God Style:

Water God

The Water God is the most powerful practitioner of the Water God Style and leader of the school. Practitioners who are of Saintly level and above may call themselves a Saint, King, Emperor or God of the Water God school. Similar to the system of
Sword God Style
, there can be only one swordsman of the God rank while the there can be multiple practitioners who can assume the rank of Water Emperor and below. To succeed to the title of Water God, one must master at least three of the
Five Secret Arts
 of the Water God Style left by the founder, the first Water God Reidar.

Water Emperor

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Water King

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Water Saint

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Advanced

A standard Advanced Water God Style Practitioner can self consciously use their
Battle Aura
. Until the the Advanced rank, the focus for lower rank is learning the foundations.

Intermediate

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Beginner

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Known Practitioners

Water God:
Reida Reia
 †,
Isolte Cruel
, Reidar,
Orsted

Water Emperors:
Isolte Cruel
 (Former),
Gal Farion
 †

Water Kings:
Isolte Cruel
 (Former)

Water Saints: Klein Dinoltas †, Cortage Head

Advanced:
Paul Greyrat
 †

Intermediate:
Soldat Heckler
,
Lilia Greyrat
,
Ginger
,
Therese Latreia


Beginners:
Rudeus Greyrat
,
Luke Notos Greyrat
,
Aisha Greyrat

Trivia

The first generation Water God was the only individual ever to master all of the Five Secret Arts.

The name of the first generation Water God, Reidar, is a popular name around the Shirone Kingdom
.

Male Water Gods would inherit the Reidar name, whereas female Water Gods would be called Reida
.

The headquarters of the Water God school is located in Ars, the capital of
Asura Kingdom
 on the
Central Continent
.

Water God
Reida Reia
 is the only known swordsman who have mastered the technique Deprivation Sword Kingdom, and is what allowed her ascension to the God rank despite the existence of several other qualified swordsmen.

Water God Style is regarded as last among the three Sword Style after the North God style, perhaps due to its passive nature.

References

Web Novel
=========

Tales of men and women who have made their mark in the Six-Faced World.

Original preface on Naro, translated

Tales of the Six-Faced World
 (六面世界の物語
Roku-men Sekai no Monogatari
) is a collection of five web-based novel series authored by
Rifujin na Magonote
, hosted on the website
Shosetsuka ni Naro
 (abbreviated as
Naro
 in this article). It takes place in the fictional world known as the
Six-Faced World
.
Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu
, the first story, serves as the base for the other four.

Mushoku Tensei

A 34-years-old virgin NEET with no work experience was kicked out of the house one day. While condemning himself, his life ends when he gets hit by a truck. When he woke up, he finds himself inside an infant's body; he had been reincarnated into another world.
This time, he vows he will get serious and live a new life he will not regret.

Original synopsis on Naro, translated

Mushoku Tensei: I'll Seriously Try If I Go to Another World
 (無職転生 - 異世界行ったら本気だす-
Mushoku Tensei - Isekai ittara Honki Dasu
) is the main story that follows an autobiographical narrative of the protagonist
Rudeus Greyrat
 who had been reincarnated into a new world and vowed to himself he'll be serious with life this time.

The series started with the Prologue released on November 22, 2012. The story has been divided into a serial of
Parts
 (otherwise, called
Volumes
 in translations) by the author, with each part exploring Rudeus, in his different stages of life as he grows up. During its run the story has made several impressions by topping the cumulative popularity ranking charts on Syosetsu at one point and has stayed in the top 10 ever since. The series came to a conclusion after compiling 23 volumes and running for a total of 286 individual chapters, on April 3,  2015.

Subjugation of the Great Dragon King

The roots of the 48 Magic Swords scattered around the world and the legends of heroes who have been laughed at for years are closely linked.
This is the story of four groups of dragon slayers, their plots, ambitions and schemes, and one boy's involvement in them.

Original synopsis on Naro, translated

Subjugation of the Great Dragon King: Preface to the Final Chapter
 (王竜王討伐 - 最終章にして序章 -
Ō Ryūō Tōbatsu - Sai Shūshō ni Shite Joshō
) is story that takes place 300 years prior to the main story of Mushoku Tensei, offering insight on the slaying of the Great Dragon King from different perspectives. Though it must be noted that this story is partly non-canon; according to the author, this was one of the prototypes for Mushoku Tensei.

The story, consisting of 11 parts in total, was uploaded on a single day making it the one with the shortest serialization period out of the five stories.

Redundancy

Rudeus Greyrat has won the battle of Biheilil Kingdom.
But what does he think and what will he do next?...

Original synopsis on Naro, translated

Mushoku Tensei: Redundancy
 (無職転生 - 蛇足編 -
Jabashi-hen
) is a story that takes place between the events of Mushoku Tensei web-novel Chapter 259 and Epilogue. It is a collection of stories that focuses on various characters that the author was not able to give focus in the main story.

Publication started on May 19, 2015, a month after the end of the main story. It has been divided into 8 parts with each exploring different characters. It was originally 9 parts, but the author removed the chapters regarding the character
Aisha Greyrat
 after a re-evaluation of the controversial content. The story came to a conclusion on September 9, 2017.

Jobless Oblige

Sieghart Saladin Greyrat. He is unemployed.
When he was a child, he wanted to be a hero. That's why he studied the sword and became stronger. But when he left his hometown, he faced reality and gave up his dream.
This is the story of an unemployed man who claims to be an advocate of justice, and how he discovers his own path.

Original synopsis on Naro, translated

Jobless Oblige
 (ジョブレス・オブリージュ -
Joburesu Oburīju
) is a story regarding the character
Sieghart Saladin Greyrat
 on how he rose to great power while being a dreamer of childish fantasies.

The series started during the run of Redundancy on May 1, 2016. Chronologically, this story takes place between the Redundancy Chapter's "Nanahoshi Gourmet" and "The Last One to Leave the Nest". It compiled into 5 parts and a total of 15 chapters during a short period of 5 days, and ended on May 5, 2016.

Old Dragon's Tale

There was an ancient dragon in the guise of a man who lived in the mountains. By his side, there was a young girl who took care of him.
One day the girl asked the Dragon, "Tell me about yourself". The Dragon replied, " Very well, but it will be a long story".
The girl nodded, and the Dragon began to tell her the story of a time long, long ago, a time of legends immemorial...

Original synopsis on Naro, translated

Old Dragon's Tale
 (古龍の昔話 -
Kotatsu no Mukashibanashi
) is a an origin story of the character who would later be known as the legendary Demon-Dragon King
Laplace
 and how the ancient worlds were felled by the Dragon God. The serialization began on October 25, 2016 and has been divided into two parts. It ran for a total of 23 chapters and concluded on March 6, 2017.

Web Novel Volume 16
===================

Redirect to:
Light Novel Volume 15

Web Novel Volume 16/Summary
===========================

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Information

Summary

Chapter 155: Diary - First Part.

Rudeus reads the diary from his future self, which described the following events. Roxy became infected with Magic Stone disease, which was identified by Cliff and his Eye of Identification. This can only be healed with God rank detoxification. So, Cliff, Zanoba and Rudeus go to the Holy Kingdom of Milis using teleport magic circles to get the book with God Class Detoxification chants. Unfortunately, this book is within a cathedral that cannot be entered unless you are archbishop level. They decide to steal the book but are caught. Cliff dies during the battle and the magic teleporting circle that they used is destroyed. They also become wanted men in the Milis region. By the time Rudeus and Zanoba arrive home, Roxy was already half crystalized and had died. Elinalise is informed of Cliff's death, and leaves town while heavily pregnant. Rudeus then becomes depressed due to Roxy's death and dependent on alcohol. He begins neglecting Sylphy. Sylphy then leaves with Ariel who has returned to the Kingdom of Asura. Rudeus then decides to chase after Sylphy by following her to Asura. During his travels, he frequently runs into Eris. She is unable to properly express her feeling towards Rudeus and so just hits him. Rudeus discovers that Ariel has returned to Asura in order to gather an army to perform a coup d'etat. This fails however, and so Ariel, Sylphy, and Luke all die.

Chapter 156: Diary - Second Part.

Rudeus continues to read the diary from his future self, which described the following events. After Sylphy's death, Rudeus spent more time going to brothels. He also frequently ran into Eris, who also was living in Sharia. Rudeus continues to have mixed feelings about Eris. The Milis Church put a bounty on the heads of Rudeus and Zanoba due to their exploits from stealing the God Class detoxification chant book. Zanoba completes his automaton research. He is able to create essentially a robot that looks like Sylphy and acts like her as well. Rudeus ends up destroying this robot. Zanoba ultimately mass produces his robots. Rudeus develops a hatred for Hitogami. He vows to get stronger in order to kill Hitogami. Throughout this process, he loses touch with his family; only Aisha stays in touch. To augment his physical strength, he and Zanoba develop fully body armour similar to his prosthetic hand, which Rudeus can augment with magic to improve his physical strength.

Future Rudeus continues to work on his magic over the years, developing gravity magic, electricity magic, voice magic. However, he becomes a bad person; he would frequently get into arguments, do whatever he wanted, and occasionally raped women. Rudeus continued to run into Eris, and so he begins to falsely suspect that she is affiliated with Hitogami. Rudeus continues to try to gather more information about Hitogami by questioning beings who are long-lived. He ends up trying to speak to Atofe, but ends up fighting her and her imperial guard, including Moore. During the battle, he becomes careless and is saved by Eris, but then she is killed as a result. After Eris' death, Ghyslaine explains to Rudeus that Eris has loved him all this time and had followed him around for this reason. Ghylaine blames Rudeus for Eris' death.

Years pass, and Zanoba dies, killed by the Order of the Temple. Julie, Ginger, and Aisha are killed as well. With this, Rudeus no longer has any living loved ones. There was no mention in the diary of the fate of Lucy, Norn or Lilia. Through his travels, Rudeus discovers the nature of this world, which is that it shaped like a cube, with six sides: Dragon world, Human world, Demon world, Beast world, Ocean world, Sky world. The interior of the die is the Void World, where Hitogami resides. Rudeus learns that in order to travel to the Void World, one must collect the 5 ancient Dragon Race treasures. However, collecting all 5 treasures turns out to be impossible within his lifespan. Rudeus then learns how to travel to the past and he decides to go to the past to correct his mistakes. The diary then ends here.

Chapter 157: Resolve.

After finishing reading his future self's diary, Rudeus has a discussion with Sylphy and Roxy. He vaguely reveals that someone has shown him the future in which a bad person would cause terrible things to happen to his family. Rudeus then broaches the subject of adding Eris to their polygamous relationship. Sylphy and Roxy initially object, since they know that Eris broke Rudeus' heart, which resulted in his erectile dysfunction. Rudeus reassures them that he now knows that this was actually a misunderstanding. Both Sylphy and Roxy tentatively agree to accepting Eris, depending on how well Rudeus' and Eris' are able to reconcile in their meeting together.

Rudeus then falls asleep, and he sees Hitogami in the white void. Hitogami is initially extremely frustrated at the fact that future Rudeus has disrupted Hitogami's plans to kill Rudeus' family. Hitogami reports that Orsted is trying to kill Hitogami, but cannot do so alone. However, Rudeus and his descendants are not affected by Orsted's curse, which cause all beings to hate Orsted. This means that Rudeus' descendants may end up assisting Orsted and kill Hitogami. Furthermore, Rudeus and his descendants have 'strong fate', which means that Hitogami has difficulty with changing their fate. So, because Rudeus and his descendants have strong fate and may end up helping Orsted to kill Hitogami, Hitogami tries to kill Rudeus' descendants to prevent his own ultimate death. Rudeus tells Hitogami that he will do anything for him if he is able to save his family. Hitogami therefore suggests that if Rudeus wants to save his family, he needs to kill Orsted.

Rudeus then wakes up. He vows to kill Orsted to save his family from Hitogami.

Chapter 158: Nanahoshi's Hypothesis.

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Chapter 159: Letter Arrives.

Eris gets ready to leave the Holy Land of the Sword to meet up with Rudeus in Ranoa, who she hasn't been in contact for many years. Just prior to departing, she receives a letter from Rudeus. The letter describes how Rudeus initially thought Eris had rejected him, but he now knows this was a misunderstanding and that she actually loves him. Rudeus informs Eris in this letter that he currently has two wives, but is willing to accept Eris has his third wife. Eris' two friends argue over whether Rudeus is an asshole or not. Rudeus' letter also included a post script, which stated that he planned to challenge Orsted to battle, with the caveat that he may not survive. Eris becomes excited at this, and she and Ghylaine head off toward Rudeus.

Chapter 160: Preparation.

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

''Note: This section is under construction and revision''.

Chapter ???: Draft of Orsted.

After the Reunion with Ariel,
Rudeus
 inform about what happened to Orsted and the possibility to search about the first King of Asura to find the answer. Orsted proposes to go to the Book Labyrinth, a place where exist a copy of every book of the world made by a demon king, this place is located in the demon continent and they need to teleport. Orsted give to Rudeus a sketch of a certain book if he don't find the necessary information

Rudeus now in Chaos breaker he find Ariel, talk a bit and inform the plan to search in the labyrinth, she accepts the plan. The next day in the base of operation of Orsted they find a magic circle in the basement, The person that go are Rudeus, Sylphiette, Luke, Ariel, Eris and Ghislaine Rudeus formarly presents Eris and Ghislaine as escort to Ariel, in the end they use the magic circle.

Chapter ???: Library Labyrinth.

They appear in a room similar to the others teleport rooms, Eris excitedly wants to explore but is stopped by Rudeus, when they enter, they find hallways of books, arranged from oldest to newest and in the center of the labyrinth they find the Demon king Betobe, a huge slime with a eyeball that use his tentacles to write the books. They avoid him decide to search a book about the first king of Asura, Gaunis.

They find a book, he was the third prince during the Laplace war, after his older brother and parent were killed he became the next king of Asura, also find that he have many achievements but in the same time he wasn't perfect, and commonly he went to taverns, got drunk and fought. Rudeus also find books about Mikos, one of them is called "the powerless God" a miko that can change the rules of the world and can nullify the power of gods and abilities, Rudeus think how to remove curses and may help Zenith, taking notes of this in his diary.

He realizes that one of the tentacle started a copy of his diary, and Rudeus write in his diary that he want conversation with the demon King and he appear, because the future diary of Rudeus was a interesting experience of a alternative future, the demon king grant to Rudeus a wish, he show him the sketch that Orsted drew and he give him a book, that book is the Diary of Derrick Redbat.

After reading his diary, Ariel find the answer of being king and pass the diary to Luke, crying because the content, when they almost leaving, the demon king becomes angry because a tear of Luke damage the diary and he start to attack.the group start to run way meanwhile they block every attack and they leave the labyrinth.

Web Novel Volume 18/Summary
===========================

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Information

Summary

Chapter 176: Departure Towards Asura Kingdom.

The Group of Ariel, Sylphiette, Luke, Elmore, Kleene.  Rudeus, Eris and
Ghislaine
 leave Sharia, and take a teletransportation circle to Chaos Breaker. After greeting Perugius, they take a magic circle that transported them in a ruin near the Red Dragon’s Upper Jaw. Because it was almost the night, the group rest near the road

On Rudeus's patrol turn, he goes into the forest  and meet Orsted that is following the group to report the events of the days, Orsted say that the forest of the Red Dragon’s Upper Jaw it was the most likely place that Darius sent his soldiers to kill Ariel and The North Emperor
Auber Corvette
 may lead it. Talking how Luke may be a apostle, Orsted say that they stop being apostles after the prediction is fulfilled or not, after they conversation, Rudeus return to the camp.

Chapter 177: Red Dragon's Upper Jaw.

The group is reaching to the forest of the Red Dragon’s Upper Jaw, reaching to the forest, that by Orsted advice, that was the most probable place for a ambush. The group stop for a moment arriving at a place where Ariel's group was ambushed when she was fleeing to Ranoa and pray for the people that she lost.

The next day the group is ambushed by a group of soldiers, Ghislaine, Eris and Sylphiette are fighting meanwhile Luke is protecting the carriage and Rudeus is in the rear, using his Eyes of Foresight to see the situation, waiting if Auber try to do a surprise attack to them. In the middle of the fight, a man comes and introduces himself as the North King
Wii Taa
 and challenge Ghislaine to a duel, because his polished armor with the sun affects Ghislaine's vision, she is having problem to fight him, and Rudeus decides to support her with a Mud Rain, countering the fighting style of Wii Taa. Ghislaine take the opportunity and deal a serious injury to him.

After helping Ghislaine, Rudeus looks the rear and finds that Auber appeared from a hole in the road, Auber try to kill Rudeus, but he use the Zarif hand as a rocket, repelling him. After Ghislaine, Eris, Sylphi arrives, Auber and the group decides to retreat. Rudeus see that Luke have a strange face and see that the soldiers have the Milbotts crest, meaning that Philemon Notos Greyrat betrayed Ariel.

Chapter 178: Conjecture.

Luke still don't believe that his father betrayed Ariel, but for her was in her expectations. Because Auber and his group may continue to ambush them, Rudeus proposes to search the bandits to smuggle the group to the country, also seize the opportunity to find Trish.

Luke think that the recently actions of Rudeus were strange, showing remarkable distrust to him and ask to Ariel  a temporal retreat, asking help to Perugius, but Ariel decides to follow Rudeus Plan, changing his destination to find the Bandits

Rudeus In the night in his patrol turn, meets Orsted  again, talking about the recent events, even if they confirmed that Luke also was a apostle they decide to leave him alone for now. After returning, Rudeus finds that Ariel woke up, and she asks him to accompany her on a walk in the woods.

Chapter 179: Ariel's Choice.

After entering the forest, Rudeus and Ariel sit in a trunk and talk about trivial things, but suddenly Ariel talk about Luke and think that he is betraying them. Rudeus says that he is probably being manipulated, but he hesitate to say that
Hitogami
 is the reason. Ariel Wants to meet Orsted to know the reason why he is helping her, before Rudeus can give a answer, Orsted appear, even after being affected by the curse, they start to talk.

Orsted explain that a being called Hitogami is his enemy and is sided with Darius, and in the future if Granbell become the king, the country may perish, but if Ariel become the King, the kingdom may survive. Ariel decides to became a Orsted subordinated.

Chapter 180: Tristina.

The group enter to the territory of the band of thieves surrounded and the leader appear, using codes that learned from Orsted, Rudeus say that he want that the group be smuggled and meet Tris. They arrive to a Hut and need to wait that they bring Tina and group decide to rest.

Some hours latter Tris arrives, when she was talking with Rudeus, Ariel awakes and recognize her as
Tristina Purplehorse
, a noble daughter that she meet years ago, and ask her why she is now a bandit.Tristina tell her that she was kidnapped an became a sex slave Darius, after she was sold to bandits and some years latter she become free. After hearing her story, Ariel ask if she can testify Against Darius and she accept.

Chapter 181: Along the Way.

The next day, they group leave the hut,  leading by Tris, they arrive to a lake and near a cliff they enter to a secret cave, after some hours walking in the labyrinthine tunnels, they leave the cave and arrive to Asura kingdom territory, the group pass near the Fedoa Region, and Rudeus, Sylphi and Eris talk about the past.

After taking various alternatives routes, they arrives a town named Rickett that connects to the Asura capital. arrives to a inn related to the thief guild to rest. When Rudeus and Ghislaine were in his guard duty, Tristina arrives with news and go to Ariel room, after hearing a commotion Rudeus enter to the room and find that Ariel and Luke are fighting, because Tris confirmed that Pilemon was one of the culprit in the execution of Sauros, and Ariel want to prioritize his promise with Ghislaine to kill him, Luke angry still believes that Rudeus aim for the Notos house, Ariel denies this, claiming that after she won, Rudeus is don't going to receive a noble tittle. The next day Luke admitted that Hitogami give him advice's that Rudeus is going to betrayed them,

Days latter, with Luke still hostile against Rudeus, they arrive to the capital Ars.

Chapter 182: Imperial City Ars.

The groups is going to the second house of Ariel in Asura, even after 10 years, traveling in the commoner district, they see that Ariel still is popular with the common people. When they enter to the noble district, a soldier run to them, after removing her helmet show that is the one of the friends of Eris, Isolte and talk with her. The group arrives to the house of Ariel, where the servants began to prepare the house.

Ariel says that she need ten days to prepare all the necessary a Venue to take down Darius and the first prince faction. They decide to use Ariel as bait and do a preventive attack against his forces to reduce their strength.

Chapter 183: Mortal Combat at Dusk.

Ariel still is working in her preparations and the group is almost always attacked by assassins that's princiaim Ariel's life, that is impersonate by Sylphi, meanwhile the true Ariel is hiding as a maid, the even try to set up a trap bu failed. In one party, Luke meets his father, discussing why he betrayed Ariel and pleading to return to his faction, but he refuses to talk him.

In the nine day, Ariel finished the Venue, a party in the royal Castle where Ariel supposedly is going to nominate Granbell as the king, and all the nobles of the country are going to assist. In the night, when the groups was returning to the mansion, a assailant blocked the road and present himself as  the North King 『Twin Swords』
Knuckle Guard
, a twin swordman, Eris decides to fight them, meanwhile Wii Taa Appear with a a black armor and shield and confront
Ghislaine
.

In the middle of the fight, Rudeus decides to search Auber, that probably is waiting to do a surprise attack. using a spirit of light, notices that in the wall was a weird clothe, and without hesitation use a stone cannon, Auber evade a mortal wound, but his leg was pierced, losing almost all his mobility. Eris easily defeats Knucle Guard and thanks to her great night vision, Ghislaine overwhelmed Wii Taa, cutting him a arm, seeing the situation, Wii Taa throw a smoke screen and try to attack the Carriage, but Sylphi was inside and attack using the magic Flame Tornado, that also cleaned the smoke screen and illuminated the surrounding. They see that Auber ran away using a pair of claws climbing a wall and running in the roofs, and Wii Taa disappeared, leaving a trail of blood, They decide to pursue and finish Wii Taa

When Rudeus enter in the alleyway, he find that he was already dead with a hole in his chest, and realizes that the wound was made by Orsted. Even though Auber escaped, the plan of the group to reduced the enemy strength was a success.

Chapter 184: Ariel's Battleground.

Wedding Reception
=================

This article is about the Season 2 Episode 14 Anime. For the Manga article see
Wedding Reception - Part 1
 or
Wedding Reception - Part 2
.

Wedding Reception
 (披露宴
Hirōen
) is the fourteenth episode of the
second season
 (38th overall)
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on April 14, 2024.

Synopsis

In this
world
, when people get married, they hold a party at their home, so Rudeus prepares for it with Sylphy. And on the day of the party, while Ariel, Zanoba, and other members of Ranoa Magic Academy were in attendance, Elinalise expression seems different than usual. Meanwhile, Rudeus is summoned by Ariel...

Plot

Rudeus and Sylphie decide to organize the customary wedding reception feast, and invite all of their friends and classmates to attend where Sylphy personally wants Elinalise and Nanahoshi to be invited.

Rudeus and Sylphy then goes to the
Commerce District
 to shop the materials for the wedding where Sylphy wants to buy Rudeus some new clothes to which Rudeus agrees although has fond memories of his current robe that he has been wearing since his time at the
Demon Continent
.

At the clothes store, the shopkeeper offered various clothes that matches Rudeus' preference for water and earth magic but Sylphy chooses a gray robe that is made of
Lucky Rat
 pelts from the Demon Continent which also makes it expensive. But thanks to the patronage of Luke, the shopkeeper gives a discount after learning that Rudeus is also a Greyrat.

Rudeus and Sylphy continues with their shopping where they buy kitchen wares, dining wares, furniture and various foods. That night they went to the bath together where Sylphy tells Rudeus that he will do the cooking and after a few more exchanges, Rudeus carries Sylphy to the bedroom.

A few days later, the day of the wedding reception arrives and most of their friends have arrived except
Soldat Heckler
,
Jinas Halfas
 while Badigadi made a surprise entrance during Rudeus' speech. At course of the reception, the guests each gave their well wishes but Sylphy asks Nanahoshi what she meant when she said that Rudeus came from the same place to which Nanahoshi responds that she just assumed it since they both can speak Japanese.

When Cliff and Elinalise gave their congratulations, Elinalise suddenly broke down in tears to which Sylphy confirms that Elinalise is indeed her grandmother. Rudeus suggests that Cliff take Elinalise to a room upstairs to calm her down while jokingly whispering to Elinalise that she did became related to
Paul
 that she never wanted.

The guests eventually leaves for the night and upon seeing Elinalise feeling better, Sylphy have a talk with Elinalise while Rudeus and Cliff talks to Ariel who wishes for Rudeus to duel Luke with swords.

At Ariel's signal, the duel to begin so Rudeus and Luke both charge at each other. Rudeus strikes Luke with
Sword God Style Arm Chop
 causing Luke to drop his sword but insists to continue fighting so Rudeus knocks him down before he can pick up his sword and Ariel declares Rudeus to be the winner. Ariel then tells Rudeus how Sylphy helped them throughout their journey and her plans that she will someday return to
Asura Kingdom
 where she will either win the throne or die trying and asks Rudeus to stop Sylphy from joining her and leaves after hearing Rudeu's answer.

Cliff informs Sylphy and Elinalise about the duel that just concluded and they all settle down at the living room once again. While Sylphy and Elinalise talks by the fireplace, Cliff informs Rudeus that he wants to cure Elinalise's
curse
 and needs his help to do it to which he accepts. After Elinalise and Cliff leaves for the night, Sylphy plans to grow her hair out and they also retire for the night.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Ariel Anemoi Asura

Luke Notos Greyrat

Cliff Grimoire

Elinalise Dragonroad

Zanoba Shirone

Juliette

Linia Dedoldia

Pursena Adoldia

Nanahoshi Shizuka

Badigadi

Locations

Central Continent

Ranoa Kingdom

Sharia

Commerce District

Greyrat House

Adaptation Notes

Light Novel Volume 10

Chapter 5: Wedding Reception Preparations

Chapter 6: Hosting the Wedding Reception

Chapter 7: End of the Wedding Reception

Differences with the Light Novel:

The event where Linia and Pursena brings a boar they hunted for the wedding feast has been cut but replaced by Rudeus and Sylphy buying the boar themselves during their shopping

The event where Ariel arrives and gives gifts to Rudeus and Sylphy has been cut

Wedding Reception - Part 1
==========================

Wedding Reception - Part 1
 is the 80th chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Summary

With the house purchased and the renovations completed, Rudeus shows Sylphy around the house and proposes to her. Days later, the wedding reception begins and all their friends attend the party congratulating the newly wed with Badigadi arriving late in a flashy display. While the party is ongoing, Elinalise has been gazing at Sylphy with something in mind.

Appearances

Characters

Balda
 to renovate the Greyrat House has been cut.

Wedding Reception - Part 2
==========================

Wedding Reception - Part 2
 is the 81st chapter of the
Mushoku Tensei

manga adaptation
.

Cover Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Linia Dedoldia

Pursena Adoldia

Summary

The party continues as the guests feast and chatter with each other. Elinalise congratulates Sylphiette but tears suddenly begins to flow uncontrollably then Sylphiette asks her a question that shocks Rudeus and Cliff.

Appearances

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Sylphiette

Linia Dedoldia

Pursena Adoldia

Zanoba Shirone

Julie

Ariel Anemoi Asura

Luke Notos Greyrat

Elmore Bluewolf

Kleene Elrond

Cliff Grimoire

Elinalise Dragonroad

Nanahoshi Shizuka

Badigadi

Paul Greyrat
 (Flasback)

Volume 1

What Lies Beyond Effort
=======================

What Lies Beyond Effort
 (にあるもの
Doryoku no Saki ni Aru Mono
) the seventh episode of the
Mushoku Tensei
 anime series originally broadcasted on February 21, 2021.

Synopsis

Eris's 10th birthday is fast approaching, and her grandfather has invited nobles from across the kingdom to a dance party to celebrate. There's just one problem: Eris can't dance, and she's quickly losing patience with her lessons.

Plot

With the approaching date of
Eris
' tenth birthday party.
Rudeus
 allows her dance teacher to take some time from his schedule to have her improve, while he makes use of the extra time to learn other languages. Despite that, Eris barely improves her dancing and considers giving up, but Rudeus encourages her to continue and starts helping with her lessons. As Rudeus improves on his foreign language skills with
Ghilsaine
 and
Roxy's
 help, Eris barely improves her dancing at all and on the day of the party, she fails to dance with another noble. Rudeus steps in and successfuly dances with Eris after instructing her to incorporate some of her fighting skills in her moves. After the party, Rudeus meets Eris' grandfather
Sauros
, who sees a strange ball of light in the sky and fears it could be an ominous sign.

Characters

Rudeus Greyrat

Eris Boreas Greyrat

Ghislaine Dedoldia

Edna Rayrune

Philip Boreas Greyrat

Hilda Boreas Greyrat

Sauros Boreas Greyrat

Roxy Migurdia

Pax Shirone

Zanoba Shirone
 (cameo)

Locations

Citadel of Roa

Adaptation Notes

This episode adapts the following material:

Light Novel Volume 2

Chapter 5: The Young Miss Turns Ten

Chapter 6: Learning A Foreign Language

Differences with the light novel:

The events of the chapter 5 and 6 were merged:

In the anime, Rudeus learns other languages and receives the letter and book made by Roxy meanwhile Eris practices dancing for her birthday.

In the light novel, Rudeus learns other languages and receives the letter and book made by Roxy after the birthday party of Eris.

Edna is introduced in this episode.

The anime adds a scene where Philip lent to Rudeus books.

The lore events of the last 100.00 years of the world was cut.

The book that Rudeus received from Roxy was made of animal hide.

A minor scene that explains that Ghislaine is one of the four strongest Sword god Style user in the world and the content of the book from Roxy was cut

A PoV of Ghislaine thinking about Rudeus was cut.

In the light novel, Rudeus tells Eris the "charm" to dance in the practice sessions before her birthday party

In the light novel, Rudeus was the first dance partner of Eris to calm her, afterwards he danced with other nobles and danced again with Eris.

In the light novel, Rudeus and Eris clothes and hairstyle are different for the birthday party

Trailer

2-21(日)放送第7話予告：『無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～』次回予告⑦
Episode 7 Trailer, February 19

Gallery

View Gallery

Click here to view the Gallery

Trivia

In the light novel, after the party when Rudeus give to Eris and Ghislaine the apprentice wand, the group was drinking wine, but because the television cant show minors drinking alcohol, they dont show the content of the cup or say what they are drinking, leaving only the jar and the cups.

Arc System work is credited in the ending for some character figures made by Rudeus from Guilty Gear Series

Wii Taa
=======

One of the
Three Swords of the North God
, Light and Darkness, Wii Taa.

Appearance

He's about 1 meter tall, he wears a polished full body armor that shine brightly in the light.

Personality

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Background

He was a pupil of
Kalman III
, and served the Notos family for many years.

Plot

Took part in multiple ambushes on
Ariel Anemoi Asura
. The first was while her, her attendants,
Luke Notos Greyrat
,
Rudeus Greyrat
,
Eris Boreas Greyrat
,
Sylphiette
, and
Ghislaine Dedoldia
 were traveling from the
Magic Academy
 back to Ariel's homeland, the
Asura Kingdom
. The ambush took place in the dense forest known as the
Red Wyrm's Whiskers
 just before the fortress that leads into the Asura Kingdom. In the battle he declared that he wanted to have a duel with Ghislaine and at first he had the upper hand as he was able to cut her a few times, enough to draw blood. But after Rudeus figured out the trick he was using to prevent Ghislaine from attacking, and cast
Mud Rain
 which dirtied his armor enough to stop it from reflecting light, Ghislaine was quickly able to slash his shoulder using
Longsword of Light
, forcing him to retreat.

The second was while Ariel and her bodyguards Rudeus, Eris, Ghislaine, Luke, and Sylphiette were traveling back from speaking with
Pilemon Notos Greyrat
. While Ariel took a secret underground passageway back to her residence and Sylphiette used a magic item to disguise herself as Ariel, Wii Taa, another of the Three Swords of the North God,
Nuckelgard
, and
Auber Corvette
 attacked them in the middle of the street at night. He fought against Ghislaine again, but this time Rudeus had warned her about his tricks and how to counteract them, and she had little trouble cutting his arm off and forcing him to use his item that created extremely thick black smoke to flee. While Rudeus hesitated whether or not to go after him, he was able to enter an alley where
Orsted
 used his powers to create a gaping hole in his chest, causing him to die. While this may have been his true cause of death, Eris declared that it must have been Rudeus who killed him, and no one but him knew that Orsted would be helping them out from the shadows, so Rudeus obtained credit for it.

Power and Abilities

He fights mostly by blinding his opponent by reflecting sunlight with his mirror-like armor during the day. He simply needed to lift his gauntlet and let it reflect the Sun's light in his opponents eyes, which was enough to prevent even the
Sword King
 Ghislaine from attacking him. At night, he covers himself in ink and uses thick black smoke that blends him with the night.

North
 King.

Equipment

Unnamed Armor
 - a set of full body armor that was kept so shiny that it could interfere with his opponent's vision while in combat.

Unnamed Sword
 - a blade around 30 centimeters long that also gleamed brilliantly.

Unnamed Shield
 - a jet black shield he used in combination with his night equipment.

An item capable of quickly producing an extremely large cloud of thick black smoke that he would use at night.

Achievements

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

Rudeus noted that he look like a disco ball with his short posture and his shiny armor.

He cared about or trusted Auber Corvette to some degree, as when he attempted to flee from Ghislaine after being badly wounded, he shouted Auber's name either as a cry for help, or to inform Auber that this was his chance to escape, since Auber was injured as well.

Template:ThreeSwordofNorthGod

World Map
=========

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!





World Map



World Map

Background

"When I came to the Human World, it was a great shock. What once was an endless flat plain has become filled with forests, mountains and trees. Inhabitants of all the world live here. Its as if all the Six Worlds were weaved together... the world you're now familiar with..."

-
Laplace

The Human World was originally an endless grassland, rolling hills covered in grass spreading endlessly. It is originally part of the Six World ruled by the
Human God
 and is prominently known to be the most developed civilization among the worlds but their inhabitants, the Humans are the shortest-lived race and as such unique individuals and revolutionary ideas evolved more frequently for them.

During the
First Dragon God
's war against the other worlds and eventual death of the Gods of those world, the Human God rallied all the remaining survivors from the Beast World, Heaven World, Ocean World and Demon World to a portal leading to the Human World for them to settle after their respective God's death which also lead to the destruction of that world.

Central Continent

It's split into three parts by the Red Dragon Mountain Range.

The poor and needy Northern areas with many wars, Asura Kingdom in the West one of the worlds most abundant and rich regions, a number of large countries are always struggling for power and rioting in the Southern area.

Human race makes up the majority of the population.

Asura Kingdom

The country that holds the greatest national power in the world.

It's abundant with natural resources, a land of fertility with no starvation. The soil hasn't become barren.

Fittoa Region

The region in the Northeast of Asura Kingdoms interior. Asuran barley (wheat) and Flowers of Batirusu are the local specialty products.

Red Dragon's Lower Jaw, Upper Jaw

The only valleys of the Red Dragon Mountain Range that can be passed through.

Dragon King Kingdom

The third ranked country in the world.

It holds a wide territory in the southern area.

West Port - East Port

Port cities that connect Central Continent and Milis Continent.

Shirone Kingdom

An ally of the Dragon King Kingdom. The border area of the strife zone.

Sanakia Kingdom

A vassal nation of the Dragon King Kingdom. Local specialty is rice.

Kikka Kingdom

A vassal nation of the Dragon King Kingdom. Local specialty is oil(side dish).

Strife Zone

A place where large countries just keep continuing with nothing but skirmishes.

Biheiril Kingdom

In the northenmost part of the Central Continent, a place where both humans and orcs live, the Superd have also taken residence here.

Demon Continent

A poor place with strong monsters.

There are Demon Lords ruling over various places.

Demon(Magic) Race make up the largest portion of the population.

Town of Rikarisu

Great Demon Emperor Kishirika Kishirisu's old castle. It was created in the center of a large crater.

The current ruler is Demon Lord Badigadi.

Town of Kurasuma

The only town where Demon Continent and the Sea Race make exchanges.

The current ruler is Demon Lord Bagurahagura.

Wind Port - Saint Port

The port cities that connect Milis Continent to Demon Continent.

Milis Continent

In the north there's the Great Forest, in the south there's the Holy Milis Kingdom.

Splitting those two regions is the Blue Dragon Mountain Range, with the Holy Sword Highway going straight through them from top to bottom with not a single monster on the Highway.

Population is roughly 50/50 of Human Race and Beast Race.

Great Forest

A huge forest where the beast races live. Within each year there's a three month period of rainy season.

Holy Milis Kingdom

The worlds second ranked country. The place where the worlds largest religious faction "Milis Church" headquarters and the Adventurer's Guild headquarters exist.

The name of the capital is Milishion.

Begaritto Continent

A large number of labyrinths, a place of many strange occurrences in terms of magical power.

The strength of the monsters is equal to those of Demon Continent.

A variety of races live here. The majority of them are Adventurers or ex-Adventurers.

Maze City of Rapan

The most prominent city of Bergaritt Continent that was built inside of an enormous rib cage of a Behemoth monster, which could easily contain an average-sized city, the buildings are mostly made of earth and monster materials.

Heaven Continent

A level ground 3000 meters above sea level.

The place where the Heavenly Race live.

References
