Zanoba/Story
============

Redirect to:
Zanoba Shirone/Story

Zanoba Shirone
==============

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Zanoba Shirone
 (
ザノバ・シーローン
,

Zanoba Shīrōn
)
 is the former third prince and a
blessed child
 of the Shirone Kingdom. Initially presented as a minor character, harboring an abnormal infatuation with figurines and being intrigued by
Rudeus'
 crafting skills, he later turns into one of the main supporting characters of the series after becoming classmates and friends with Rudeus at the
Ranoa Magic Academy
.

Appearance

He is a tall, thin, oval-faced man, with his cheekbones clearly visible. He wears round glasses. He also sports a bowl cut hairstyle.

Personality

During his debut, Zanoba appeared as an impulsive and boisterous man-child who's deeply obsessed in dolls and figures, to the point that he has no qualms in killing people or trading his loyal subordinates for a figurine. Contrary to his comical appearance, he is highly intelligent and observant, but as his monstrous strength causes him to be alienated by others, he doesn't often have the chance to display these skills.

He has utmost respect towards Rudeus, whom he regards as his master. Although he used to think of other humans as nothing more than dolls made of flesh, he slowly comes to accept other people thanks to the influence of Rudeus and other people around him. Zanoba harbors a deep patriotism for his country and a fondness of warfare, but often tries to hide these traits from others. He is a highly proficient military commander, capable of rallying soldiers and planning effective tactics against tremendous odds.

Due to his intellectual level, he often conducts research and produces several inventions for Rudeus. He also has a deep level of understanding and appreciation of arts and crafts, enough to eventually earn the favor of Armored Dragon King
Perugius Dola
.

It's revealed that his patriotism, fondness for warfare and his love for his younger brother
Pax
 were simple attempts to act more human. Even though he does not fully understand such emotions, he feels like they are the right ones to act on.

Background

Zanoba is born as the Third Prince of Shirone Kingdom. When he was three years old, he accidentally killed his brother Julius, the Fourth Prince causing him to be known as the Head Ripping Prince. When he was 15 years old, he also killed his wife by accident.

Power and Abilities

Magic Abilities

Earth Magic
 - Intermediate

Miko of Superhuman Strength






Zanoba's Miko Power in the Anime



Even at a young age, Zanoba is possess inhuman strength that makes him known to be the Miko capable of standing off against a demon king as far as raw strength goes and can lift objects several times heavier than him at will. Any hit from Zanoba is potentially fatal even with
Battle Aura
. This power does not include stamina, however, as Zanoba is described to be unfit for long travels. Because of this, his older brothers are afraid of him and sees him as a bomb that could go off anytime so they propose to exile him.

Miko Body






Zanoba withstanding attacks from an automted doll in the Anime



Aside from his strength, Zanoba's Miko powers also grants him a resilient body than can withstand numerous physical attacks that does not wound him easily that are otherwise fatal to others
 but despite this, Zanoba has a natural vulnerability to fire.

Equipment

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Achievements

He created the world's first prosthetic arm.

He created the world's first automaton with the help of
Rudeus
.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Quotes

To Rudeus:

“I have a weakness for figurines. I collect them from all over the world,”

Zanoba:
 "When I lifted Pax's corpse up I suddenly had a thought. Why, I wonder why, at that time, did we not speak to one another, huh?"

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

Among the special students of his generation, he was the oldest.

He's able to use the first generation Zariff Prosthetic Arm for 3 hours.

He became
Perugius
' closest friend as they have the same interest in art. This friendship was enough to make Perugius offer his assistance in retaking Shirone for Zanoba, despite his blatant hatred for power struggles.

Beside Rudeus he enjoyed the company of
Cliff
 and
Julie
.

He named Julie after his late younger brother.

Zanoba Shirone/Relationships
============================

Information

Story

Relationships

Appearance

Family

Pax Shirone





Zanoba and Pax in the Anime



Pax is Zanoba's younger brother.

Other Brothers

Zanoba's has 2 older brothers who fears his Miko Power and sees him like a bomb that could go off anytime so they decided to exile Zanoba to
Sharia
, Ranoa Kingdom where he became a Special Student of
Ranoa Magic Academy
.

Friends

Cliff Grimoire

His friend.

Rudeus Greyrat

Someone that Zanoba holds to high regard, due to the combination of Zanoba's obsession with dolls, and Rudeus' proficiency in earth magic and making them. He refers to him as Shishou (master) and trains his earth magic to match Rudeus although he makes little progress in doing so. He helps Rudeus in many tasks that require a lot of physical strength due to the fact that he is a
Miko
 with immense physical strength and endurance.

Julie





Zanoba, Julie ang Ginger in the Light Novel



His slave that he bought in order to train earth magic for making dolls. Zanoba is very kind and caring towards her and acts as a father figure towards her. She is shown to respect him and refers to him as Shishou.

Ginger

His previous personal guard, Zanoba doesn't think much of her and sometimes even injures her when she gets on his nerves, but later recognizes her loyalty to him and treats her as someone he respects.

Others

Orsted

Unlike Rudeus, Zanoba voluntarily became a subordinate of Orsted. After the death of Pax, Orsted concludes that this time loop is a failure but Zanoba refutes this and that it is still too early to say that and suggests to gather allies on their fight against Hitogami.

Anne

A Automaton made by him and Rudeus.

Hitogami

References

Zanoba Shirone/Story
====================

SPOILER ALERT!

This page contains
spoilers!
  Read at your own risk.

Information

Story

Relationships

Volume 6 - Juvenile Period - Homecoming Chapter

He helps Rudeus and becomes his disciple.

Volume 7- Youth Period - School Entry Chapter

He is reunited with Rudeus and accompanies him throughout the school.

Volume 8 - Youth Period - Special Student Chapter

He could not learn how to make dolls from Rudeus, so he bought a young dwarf slave girl,
Julie
 to make her learn doll-making techniques from Rudeus. Later he tells the story of how Roxy's figure Rudeus made was destroyed and accompanies Rudeus who completely wiped the floor with Pursena and Rinia who were criminals behind that crime. He could not beat them by himself.

Volume 19 - Young Man Period - Zanoba Chapter

Zanoba received a draft notice sent from Pax who had successfully seized with backing from the Dragon king Kingdom. Despite many warnings, including Rudeus', Zanoba decided to go back, as he feels indebted to his country for tolerating and funding his whims. Using his friendship with Perugius, he managed to ask for his permission to use the magic circle as a shortcut back for both him, Rudeus and reluctantly, Roxy.

Along with a worried Rudeus and Roxy, Zanoba came back and got assigned to the front line fort against a nameless north country. Despite many worries, they successfully held against he invasion with Zanoba setting an ambush and capturing the enemy's commander. With the hostage, they successfully forced a truce with the north country for 3 years.

However, Ginger came with a message from the capital. A warlord called Jade, backing a minor-known 11th prince, had turned coat and surrounded the capital. Arrived at castle in a secret passage, Zanoba and co. confronted the Death God, with him they fought to a draw. However, it was a misunderstanding and Death God simply defended Pax instead of being an apostle of Hitogami.

Zanoba tried desperately to save Pax as he attempted suicide but failed. Tearfully, he let go of everything, including his royal title to go back to Sharia, leaving the castle to rebel force. Afterward, he resolved to become Orsted's follower in order to extract vengeance against Hitogami who manipulated the events leading to Pax's death, as revealed by Orsted's investigation.

Zenith
======

Redirect to:
Zenith Greyrat

Zenith Greyrat
==============

Information

Relationships

Gallery

This article contains information about spoilers describe in the novels, anime-only watchers and manga-only readers should please proceed with caution!

This article
lacks information
 and requires expansion. Please
expand this page
 to include missing information to help improve the article.

Zenith Greyrat
 (
ゼニス・グレイラット
,

Zenisu Gureiratto
)
,
née

Latreia
 (
ラトレイア
,

Ratoreia
)
, is the wife of
Paul Greyrat
 and the mother of
Rudeus Greyrat
 and
Norn Greyrat
.

Born a noble, she ran away from home and joined Paul's party before starting a family with him later. Following the
Teleport Incident
, however, she was transported into the
Teleportation Labyrinth
 and encased within a mana crystal. After being rescued, she awoke as a
Miko
, but was left in a constant dream-like state.

Appearance

Zenith is a very beautiful
Human
 woman who has blonde hair that she normally ties in a ponytail with chin-length hair strands hanging on either side, blue shaded eyes, she has a slender build and a voluptuous figure with large breasts (which
Norn Greyrat
 inherited) and she appears more youthful than her actual age as noted in,
 as a result of her being trapped in a magic crystal after the
Teleport Incident
.

Personality

Zenith has a very warm and loving personality, acting as a loving mother who can be strict at times. She is very conservative in morals as a
follower of Millis
, and will get angry at
Paul
 due to the fact that he is a womanizer. She will also get angry when people damage the plants in her garden.

After being freed from the
Teleport Labyrinth
, she does not express emotions actively since she sees the world around her as if she were in a trance or dream. Occasionally she will display actions that show her emotions, such as when she smiled at
Norn
 or hit
Rudeus
 when he said he was going to add
Eris
 to his family as a wife, which shows signs of her personality basically unchanged but hidden and suppressed by her dream state caused by her Miko Powers.

Background

Zenith was born in the
Holy Country of Millis
 as the second daughter of an Earl of Millis. She grew up following the Millis Church religion, never breaking the rules, getting good grades in school and had the nickname
Millis young lady standard
. However, when Zenith reached the age of 15, she rebelled against her parents and ran away from home, thus turning her back on the noble's [road] of being in an arranged marriage with another Earl's family in Millis.






Zenith and Paul settling down in Buena Village



While trying to find a job as a Healer, she was a solo adventurer for a time. However, she was frequently conned out of a large amount of money due to the little knowledge she had on how expensive healers are and being used as a human shield against monsters, but she was later saved by
Paul Greyrat
. She then joined Paul's party, the
Fangs of the Black Wolf
, as a healer. She spent a long time in the party as a healer and gradually began to fall in love with Paul and wanted to marry him. However, Paul was a womanizer who frequently slept with multiple women and she didn't want to be with someone like that, so she told him if he promised to be faithful to her then she would sleep with him, to which he agreed. However, she still thought that if Paul doesn't keep his promise, she will just give up and leave him.

Shortly after she became pregnant with
Rudeus
, Zenith was extremely uneasy and did not know what to do since she had not thought that Paul would keep his promise. However, Paul took responsibility and married her so they both retired from adventuring and settled down in the
Buena Village
 where Zenith works at the village clinic.

Plot

Volume 1






Zenith after giving birth to Rudeus



Zenith is first introduced after giving birth to
Rudeus Greyrat
 and she uses
healing magic
 on him when he falls hitting his head. Zenith later asks
Paul Greyrat
 to hire a
magic tutor
 when Rudeus uses
Water Cannon
, an intermediate ranked water magic, believing that Rudeus will grow up to be a mage.

Volume 6






Kishirika telling Roxy that Zenith is in the Teleportation Labyrinth



After paying for
Kishirika Kishirisu
's debt from drinking, Roxy requests her to look for Rudeus' family with her
Clairvoyant Eyes
 and tells Roxy that Zenith is located in
Rapan
,
Begaritt Continent
 but upon further checking, Kishirika could not see her precise location leading her to conclude that Zenith is in the
Teleportation Labyrinth
 and its high concentration of
Mana
 prevents her from seeing in the labyrinth due to her weakened state but assures Roxy that Zenith is still alive.

Volume 12






Zenith freed from the magic crystal



According to
Geese
, several adventurers who previously explored the Teleportation Labyrinth saw her there.

Rudeus, Paul,
Elinalise
,
Talhand
, Roxy, and Geese reaches the seventh floor of the Teleportation Labyrinth and they see Zenith inside the magic crystal. It got shatters after they kill the Guardian of the Labyrinth, the
Manatite Hydra
 who imprisoned her.






Zenith travelling the desert in the Anime



She had lost the ability to speak and is believed to have lost her memories. On their journey back to
Sharia
, Geese purchases
Jirou
 to pull the coach where Zenith is riding during their desert travel.

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Powers and Abilities

Zenith has attained Intermediate Rank
Healing Magic
 from Millis noble school which could allow her to work in Millis' hospital, but she instead becomes an adventurer where she acts as a healer.






Zenith using Healing on Rudeus



『
Magic
』

Attack Magic:

«Fire Magic - Elementary Rank»

«Water Magic - Elementary Rank»

Support Magic:

«Healing Magic - Intermediate Rank»

«
Detoxification Magic
 - Intermediate Rank»

『Miko Power』: Telepathy

Zenith has gained the ability to read minds after being trapped in a Magic Crystal during the
Teleport Incident
. A side effect of her power is that she is in a dream like state where she is not fully awake and not able to actually speak, but thinks she is speaking due to her telepathy. Her lack of reaction to her surroundings leads others to think that she has lost all of her memories and ability to speak. She can hear the thoughts of babies and animals with this power, as she thought she was hearing
Lara Greyrat
 and
Leo
 speak, but in reality she was actually reading their minds. Additionally, she is unaffected by
Orsted
's curse of being feared and hated as noted by her remarks to everyone's reactions to him whenever he visits their home in Sharia.

Achievements

Reached S-rank as an Adventurer

Quotes

Note: This section is under construction and revision
.

Trivia

Zenith met
Orsted
 and was not afraid of him. It might be a result of her being in a dream like state and has not met Orsted with her full consciousness.

In the previous loops, Zenith's first child was always a stillborn male, and she never became mute as a result of the
Teleport Incident
.

Zenith learnt how to cook from
Geese
. Because she married
Paul Greyrat
 after learning the technique, Geese swore to never teach someone else to cook again.

Zenith gave birth to
Rudeus Greyrat
 when she was 17.
